item.text: dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra bzhugs so//
dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra yin// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// rtsis 'gos gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// dbang chen
bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las 'go nan rtsis 'go'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'go nan rtsis 'go'i le'u 'di la don rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan te/ de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ lung las/ 'jig
rten khams na dkon pa'i bka' gsang rin po che// shes rab rig pa mdzod kyi kha phye nas// ye shes rig pa nyid la nyid kyis ston pa 'di// stobs ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba gang gi
mthu// rgyal sras khro bo snyan khung brgyud pa'i lung// dbyings la rig pa gab pas man ngag mchog/ gsung rab rgya mtsho thugs kyi nying khu 'di// dgongs rgyud zab mos sbas pa'i tan+t+ra
gang nas phyung// bsgom bsgrub 'chad cing man ngag dpyis 'byin pas// bdag gzhan sems kyi mdud pa dam po rnams// mang po rtsis kyi klong nas 'grol mdzad
pa// mkhyen rab rtsal gyi slob dpon gang gis mdzad// dgongs rgyud thabs kyis 'brel ba'i phyag rgya la// blta bde brtag par sla ba'i don ched du// le'u dang grangs su bcad pa'i
gsungs rab 'di// yon tan grangs su bcad pa'i dgos ched du yis bstan// gab pa'i sbas pa'i ma rtogs 'khrul pa yis// sngon gyi bag chags rtsub mos mtshams sbyar te// rnam
smin las kyi dug gsum me 'bar ba// bdud bzhi'i dpung 'joms gdul bya gang gi ched du mdzad// khyad par gzhan las 'phags pa'i ya mtshan rmad kyi bka'// thos pa'i skal

dang ldan pa'i gang zag snga rabs 'das// mi srid srid par sbyor bas 'jig rten dam pa'i dpe// phung po lhag ma med par mngon sangs gang dang gang rnams rgyas// gsang ba'i phrin las bag yangs bsgrub pa'i
gnas// seng ge khro bo ma mo gnas pa'i sa// sems dga' yid 'ong bkra shis dben pa'i gnas// grub pa'i dgon gnas gang dang gang du mthar ru phyin// lung rgyud lta bas bsgyings pa'i man ngag rgya mtsho

'di// che btsan 'gran gyi zla med rgyal ba'i bka'// brtags na da lta nyid nas sangs rgyas 'di// ye shes mtshon gyi khyad par don las ji ltar gsal// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las 'go nan rtsis 'go'i
le'u ste dang po'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// lo rgyus gtan la dbab pa'i phyir dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bcas ka gleng gzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so// bcas ka gleng

gzhi'i le'u 'di la yang don gsum ste/ de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ gdul bya mang po thabs gang gis brgyud pa ni rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'o// bka' rgyud zab mo rgyal ba'i snyan khung nas gang zag gi rna ba brgyud pa ni

lung gi gleng gzhi'o// ting nge 'dzin thabs kyis brgyud pa ni man ngag gi gleng gzhi'o// gdul bya mang po thabs kyis brgyud pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ lha chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thabs
kyis gdul ba dang/ klu chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang gis gdul ba dang/ phyogs skyong 'khor dang bcas don gyis gdul ba dang/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi skus gdul ba dang/ gza' dang rgyu skar

dgongs pas gdul ba'i gdul bya'o// bka' rgyud zab mo rgyal ba'i snyan khung nas gang zag gi rna bar brgyud pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin thabs kyis brgyud pa'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las bcas ka gleng
gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// don gyi sa rnams bcad pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las don gyi sa gcod le'u 'di gsungs/ le'u 'di la yang
don ched lnga ste/ lung chen po nyi shus sa gsal bar bcad pa dang/ man ngag chen po bcu drug gis rigs gnyis brgyud pa'i lha gsal bar bsgom pa dang// dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad kyis bsgrub pa ma bslad

pa brtsam pa dang/ dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gis thabs che ba'i yon tan lhun gyis grub par bstan pa dang/ drod chen po gsum gyis mgo mjug gi bya ba chud ma zod par bstan pa'o/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra

las don gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las bsgrub pa zab mo'i le'u 'di gsungs/

bsgrub pa zab mo'i le'u 'di la yang don rnam pa brgyad de/ de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dus phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rdzas phun sum tshogs pa
dang/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang// phrin las phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa rnams so// de la gnas la yang gsum ste/ seng ge'i dgon

gnas dang/ khro bo'i dgon gnas dang/ ma mo'i dgon gnas so// dus la yang gsum ste/ nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma'i dus dang/ dbyar rgun ston dpyid rigs kyi dus dang/ phyi nang rgyu rkyen yo byad kyi dus so/

'khor la yang gsum ste/ gang zag pho mo phyi'i 'khor dang/ rgyal ba yab yum nang gi 'khor dang/ shes rab gzungs ma gsang ba yum gyi 'khor ro// yo byad la yang gsum ste/ rtsi 'bras bcud kyi yo byad dang/

zhing bcu gal gyi yo byad dang/ byang chub sems kyi yo byad do/ rdzas la yang gsum ste/ rten 'brel yo byad kyi rdzas dang/ dam tshig gi rdzas dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rdzas so// ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs

pa la yang lnga ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phyi nang gi chos thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bsgyur thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab pa'o// phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis

'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ging chen sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyu dang yum byin gyis brlab pa dang/ tshogs chen 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdzas byin gyis brlab pa'o// phrin las phun sum

tshogs pa la yang bcu ste/ dang por zhe sdang mtshams kyi phrin las dang/ dmigs pa rten gyi phrin las dang/ rgyan gzungs sdebs pa'i phrin las dang/ bsnyen pa dbul ba'i phrin las dang/ thugs dam bskul ba'i
phrin las dang/ glu bro gar gyi phrin las dang/ brtul zhugs chen po'i phrin las dang/ dbugs chen 'byin pa'i phrin las dang/ bkra shis bsdus pa'i phrin las dang/ dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa la yang

gsum ste/ mtshan rtags kyi dngos grub dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i dngos grub dang/ gnyi gar 'brel pa'i dngos grub bo// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las bsgrub pa zab mo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// tshe la
dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// sngags pa gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u 'di gsungs/ man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u 'di la yang don gsum ste/

blta ba nyams drod kyi 'brel pa dang/ dam tshig yum gyi 'brel pa dang/ thugs rje phrin las kyi 'brel pa'o// lta ba nyams drod kyi 'brel pa la yang bzhi ste/ lung dang/ man ngag dang/ rigs pa dang/ gtan

tshigs so// dam tshig yum gyi 'brel pa yang gnyis te/ sgrol ba thugs rje'i 'brel pa dang/ sbyor ba chos nyid kyi 'brel pa'o/ thugs rje phrin las kyi 'brel pa yang gnyis te/ mdzad pa'i phrin las dang/ mi

mdzad pa'i phrin las so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las man ngag 'brel pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de ni gal po dkyus kyi le'u 'byung ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// ji ltar dngos grub dam pa
gcig thob par 'dod na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid las langs te/ yi ge hUM du bsgoms la/ yid kyis bar snang gi khams thams cad/ gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa la

'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa drug drug gi steng du/ rin po che'i khri phyogs bcur 'od 'bar ba bzhi'i steng du pad+ma'i le'u brgan 'od zer phyogs bcur 'bar ba/ de bas chag gang tsam gyis mtho ba'i steng du/

ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par dmigs la/ de'i steng du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas mngon sum gyi bsgrub

par bya'o// de nas yang hUM zhes bzlas pas/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir/ rin po che'i ka ba dpangs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bas kyang klas pa/ ka ba gcig la yang sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun
gyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po bas kyang klas par dmigs la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ skye gnas bzhi las skyes pa'i sems can/
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang/ rigs ngan dang rigs med pa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags thams cad 'od zer 'bar ba des bcom brlags nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod

pa'i thabs 'dis bya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yang yin la/ khams gsum gyi bdag po chen po yang bdag nyid yin la/ khro bo chen po yang bdag yin no zhes

dmigs la/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du snga ma'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug par dmigs la/ rin po che dang rdo rje las byas
gshog pa bzhi yang bskyed par bya'o// dbu lnga las bzhin phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta ba'o// dbu dbus ma klad par ni rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dpal rnam par
snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par dmigs la/ thod pa'i ngos bzhir yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rjai sems dpa'i sku mdog dmar po phyag rgya tshul bzhin du gnas par bsgom mo// g.yas

g.yon gyi dbu ni sku mdog dmar po spyan gsum par dmigs la/ dbu ral ba'i dbus nas rta mgo ljang gu re re byung ba/ lhag par dpal rta mgrin dngos su byung bar bsam ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags

pa tsam gyis/ nub phyogs kyi phra men ma rnams kyis/ 'khor mang po klu thams cad drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis dbang du bsdu bar bya'o// lho dang byang du bltas pa'i rta mgo ljang gus kyang hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin
pas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor thams cad dang/ grul bum gyi 'khor thams cad dang/ phra men ma'i 'khor thams cad kyang/ hUM hUM zhes bsgrags pa tsam gyis zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la/ gnas brtan par

bya'o// zhal shar phyogs su bltas pa'i mdog dmar po spyan gsum pa zhal nas kyang hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags pa tsam gyis/ ljags 'dril zhing spyi bo'i gtsug tu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'bar ba gsum gnas par bsam

mo// yang shar phyogs 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta bar bya ste/ smin ma glog bzhin du 'gyu ba/ smin mtshams khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod par byas la/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam gyis/ brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ phra men ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la gnas brtan par bya'o// phyag bcu drug g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis ni rdo rje lcags kyu 'bar bas
'gugs pa'o// g.yas pa gcig ni sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams par bya'o// g.yas pa gcig na ni rnge'u chung dang kha T+wAM ga lhan cig 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa gcig na ni thod rlon khrag gis bkang ba nad dang
bsres pas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mtha' klas pa 'od zer bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas za ba'o// phyag g.yas pa bzhi ni rgyun mi 'chad par hUM zhes zlos shing rdo rje 'bar bas brdegs

pa'o// phyag g.yas pa rnams kyi dpung rgyan dang gdu bu yang/ sbrul nag po mi srun pa'i kha nas hUM zhes zer ba bskal pa'i me 'bar ba mang pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis ni/ steng ma rin po che'i rgyu
las 'byung bas nga rgyal bskyed pa'o// 'og ma ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyun mi chad par rdo rje 'bar bas 'joms pa'o// the'u gshog rnams ni gang gi snying las 'dren
pa yin pas/ rdo rje lcags kyu rno ba'i mchog kyang yin la sgrol ba thams cad la brtson pa yin pas bsgral ba dam pa'o// phyag g.yon pa gcig na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse la bskal pa'i me chen 'bar

ba'o// gcig ni lu gu rgyud kyi zhags pa'o// gcig la ni thod rlon khrag gis bkang nas bdag nyid chen po'i zhal du 'bul ba'o// gcig gis ni khro bo brgyad kyi snying rgyu ma dang lhan cig tu chang par bcug nas

za ba'o// gcig gis ni rnge'u chung dang kha T+wAM lcags kyu gsum lhan cig tu bzung ste gang gi snying las 'dren pa'o// phyag g.yon pa brgyad char yang sbrul nag po dang sngo bkra sha dag gis brgyan pa/ kha nas kyang hUM gi

sgra sgrogs pa sha dag go/ de dag gi snying po ni A+oM ha ha ru lu hUM phaT ces brjod pas/ snga ma'i brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang/ phra men ma yi tshogs mang po dbang du bsdus nas sprin phung bzhin du bsdus pa'i steng du
bdag nyid chen po'i hUM thang gcig bzlas pas/ zhabs dmar po brgyad dus gcig tu byung bar bsam mo// de la steng phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba'i zhabs ni/ drag shul dpa' bar ldan pas stag gi 'ging dkris

te/ steng phyogs kyi hUM kA ra'i snying gar rdog pas brdzis te/ nyam thag pa'i 'bod sgrogs kyi sgra chen po 'byin pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni lho nub mtshams su Ar+ya a tsa la mdog sngo skya gan rkyal du mnan pa'i

snying gar zhabs kyi bol man chad nub par mnan te/ zhabs kyang baiDUr+ya sngon po zhun khrab kyis g.yogs pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni lho phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba yin pas/ ya mAn+ta ka'i snying gar rdog pas
mnan nas/ zhabs kyi bol thams cad man chad nub par dmigs la/ zhabs kyang rdo rje 'chol ba'i na bzas bklubs pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni shar lho mtshams kyi nI la dan+d+ra'i snying gar rdog pas mnan te
bod sgrogs kyi sgra 'byin par dmigs la/ zhabs kyang bse khab smug pos dkris pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni nub phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba yin pas pad+ma kuN+Da la'i mdog nag po'i snying gar zhabs kyi

rdo rje phur pa btsugs pa zhabs kyang sbrul nag pos dkris te/ 'khor mang po dbang du bsdus pa'o// zhabs gcig gis ni nub byang gi mtshams gdul phyin ta ki rA tsa kha sbub tu mnan pa'i spyi bor/ zhabs dmar

po'i mthil khro bo chol pa'i khar dmigs la/ rkang gi nang gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs la/ zhabs kyi mthil khro bo chol ba'i kha dmar po'i 'od du 'phros pa'i nang du 'dod pa'i dbang po ta ki ra tsa'i

mgo rkang ni nang du song bar dmigs la/ zhabs kyang rdo rje'i mche bas dkris te/ 'khor mang pos phyag byed pa'o// zhabs gcig ni shu ken gyi smad g.yogs can/ byang phyogs su brkyang bas a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha
sbub tu mnan nas/ rdog pas sgal pa thams cad bcom nas bol man chod rlon pa'i nang du nub par dmigs la/ sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar byas te/ phyi ma'i dus na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i
gral thob par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so// zhabs gcig gis ni byang shar mtshams ma hA ba la'i ldan sar mnan pas dung chen po bcom ste/ 'dod pa'i lha mos phyag byas nas zhabs kyang gzig gi

bgo bas dkris te/ 'khor gyi lha mo'i tshogs dang/ ma dang chung ma dang bu mo dang tsha mo rnams phrogs pa'o// g.yon gyi gshog pa ni rin po che'i rgyu las byung bas 'dod chags chen po'i rgyu yin no// the'u gshog

rnams ni 'dod pa'i gtso bo yin pas shes rab kyi mchog dang sbyar ro// spyir gshog pa bzhi char 'bar ba ni sbrul nag po'i rgyu las byung ba/ bar bar ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rgyu las byung ba'o// bar bar ni rin po

che'i rgyu las byung ba nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'o// de dag thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni/ A+oM dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra hUM/ badzra a mo ka traM zhes brjod cing las thams cad bcol lo// sngags gong ma ni rdo rje dra ba ma/ 'og ma

ni lha mo klog 'gyu ma'o// de la he ru ka khro bo thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni 'di yin te// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT Ar+ya la hrIHdzaHnye ba'i snying po lan bzhi 'bum bzlas na las ci bya ba 'grub bo// de lta bas na dpal

pad+ma he ru ka bsgrub pa la/ drag po'i bgegs kyi dbang du 'gyur bar mi 'byung ste/ byung na yang bar chod dang dngos grub gnyis dus gcig tu 'byung ste/ de la bud med kyi tshogs mang po dag rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis brgyan te mdzes par byas nas 'ong srid kyis/ de la chags pa'i sems ma bskyed cig/ bar bar du phra men ma'i tshogs mang po dag mi'i thod pa mang pos brgyan te/ lag na thod khrag dang mi ro thogs nas mi
sdug pa'i 'bru tshugs su blta zhing/ mi snyan pa'i tshul gyi bdag la bsad do bcad do// brdeg go zer ba dag 'od srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par dbang chen gyi skur sgoms shig/ 'khor de rnams kyis

rang dbang med par phyag byed kyis/ dngos grub kyi rtags dang po gcig dang sbyar ro/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gyi tshul ston cing ral pa 'bar ba la mi mgo mang pos lus brgyan cing/ lag na mdung thung dang ral
gri thogs pa dag mi'i rgyu mas bdag gi ske nas 'dogs shing/ sbrul nag po dag bdag gi lus la za zhing dam du dkris te/ rtsib ma dag com com dam du sdom pa dag 'ong srid kyis/ de la mi 'jigs par dbang

chen gyi skur bsgom dang/ gnod sbyin dang grul bum gyi dbang por gyur te/ dngos grub kyi rtags gnyis pa yin no// de'i 'og tu bar snang la gnas pa'i lha khro bo rnams kyis bsdig pa dag 'byung ste/ bar snang la

gshe ba'i sgra 'brug skad drag po sgrogs shing/ sbrul nag po kha nas me dang dug skyugs pa dang/ a la la zer zhing sgra 'byin pa dang/ mig g.yas g.yon nyi mar bsgyur te 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta ba dang/

rang gi khog pa kha phye nas mi ro gsar rnying bdag la stob pa dang/ pho mo'i mtshan ma thams cad za ba'i khar bsgyur nas/ 'jig tshogs kyi mche ba brdar nas rkang pa phur par bsgyur te bdag la 'debs shing
gnod pa byed pa dang/ mi mgo lpags pa rlon pas g.yogs shing/ lag pas rdo rje brdeg pa dag 'ong srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs dang lha thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur to// dngos grub kyi rtags gsum pa

yin no// da ltar dngos grub kyi rtags dang bar chad dang nyams len ni dus gcig tu 'byung bas ngo shes par bya'o// de bas na dpal pad+ma he ru ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul ni cir yang ston cing cir yang

snang ste/ gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir na/ sku'i che ba dang/ gsung gi che ba dang/ thugs kyi che ba'o// sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las cis kyang ma bsgribs pas na/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i don

zab tu bstan to// sku'i che ba la yang gsum ste/ chos kyi sku gdal ba chen po// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byas/ sprul pa'i sku ji lta 'dul bzhin ston pa'o// gsung gi che ba la yang gsum ste/
tshig gi gsung dang/ rig pa'i gsung dang/ don gyi gsung ngo// thugs kyi che ba la yang gsum ste/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i thugs dang/ gnyis su med pa'i thugs so// de
ltar khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sku gsum du ni grub/ gsung gsum du ni bstan/ thugs gsum du ni dgongs nas/ sku gsum gyi tha ma sprul pa'i sku la/ gsung gsum gyi tha ma ni tshig gi gsung
bsgra[¿]gas/ thugs gsum gyi tha ma 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i thugs kyis dgongs nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du sku mdog mthing ga zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing

ga/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje dang rnge'u chung dang mdung rtse gsum/ g.yon pa dril bu dang rgyu zhags dang thod rlon gsum/ bskal pa'i me ri dang sbrul nag spungs pa dang thod rlon gyi phreng bas rgyan du brgyan te/ nyid kyi

nyid la che ba rngom pa'i tshig 'di smras so// nga ni khro bo rnam par rgyal// chos sku gdal ba chen pos ni// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams bshad// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes

so// longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// seng ge glang chen khri steng nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// yod dang med pa'i chos kyang bstan// me long lta bu'i ye shes so// sprul pa 'gro

don byed pa'i skus// 'jig rten phal ba'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma'i chos bstan pas// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sku gsung thugs kyi che ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la bka' bsgos ba/ gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang// dbyings las thabs mchog sprul pa'i phyir// tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung
gis// lcang lo can gyi pho brang bcom// snang mdzad chen po a la la// gnod sbyin chen po a la la// chos kyi dbyings nyid a la la// sangs rgyas bden tshig a la la// tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung
gis// 'jig rten phal pa'i sar brdungs pas// mtshan ma dngos po'i chos rnams las// yod med chos la spyod par shog/ tshar gsum can gyi rnge'u chung gis// 'og min gnas kyi sar brdungs pas// yod med

chos la spyod pa rnams// rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs shog/ de skad ces gsungs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar ma gyur pa gcig kyang med do// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po
lag na rdo rjes gsol pa// snang ba kun rdzob tshul gnas pas// rnga yi don gzhung gang lags pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i lan 'di gsungs pa la// dang po rgyu dang rang bzhin dang/

don dang bsgom pa grangs dang ni// bsnyen par bya dang thabs la sogs// rgyu ni phyi nang gsang ba gsum// b+ha ga yangs pa'i sdong po dang// b+han+d+ha ltag sprod rnga shing dang/ tsan+dan dkar po'i shing sogs la'o// lcag
dang skad dang rnga'i rang bzhin// dbyings dang ye shes rig pa'i sgra// rang bzhin don du shes par byos// don la rnam pa gnyis yod de// mtha' gnyis spangs pa gzi ldan ma'i// b+ha ga mi gnas ye shes
yin// blta bar bsgom dang lha yi sku// sprul par bsgom pa bsgom pa'i don// sgrub pa las kyi rnga dang gsang ba yum gyi rnga// rol mo dbyangs kyi rnga ste grangs yin no// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen

dang// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bsnyen pa'i thabs// 'di ni rdung ba'i thabs yin no// dbang chen rnga yi rdung thabs ni// rdo rje nam gyi cha phyed na// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug ste// seng ge'i phyag rgya bcas

nas kyang// mtshan ma chen po de la gdab// mdun du b+han+d+ha srubs med bzhag/ steng du rnga gzhag lcag gis brdung// 'on tang dngos grub mod la thob// de nas rdung ba'i thabs mchog ni// rnga ni gar gyi dbang

phyug ste// rnga lcag gzi ldan pad+ma can// rnga skad rdo rje gshog pa mo// gzi ldan pad+mar gyur nas kyang// mi brdung mi bskyod dbyangs su bzhag/ dur khrod ma mo'i rdung thabs ni// rnga ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la// lcag
ni shes rab yum gyi ngang// yab yum 'brel pa'i gar thabs kyis// rnga skad zab mo'i dbyangs blangs pas// thugs dam ma lus yongs su bskang// nam tshod skya rengs dang po la// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag

'dug la// g.yas kyi mthe bong mthe'u sbyar// kha T+wAM phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// srin lag kha la rnga bsar te// nyi ma shar gyi bar du ni// rnga skad mi grag dal bur brdung// ma mo rnams ni bran bzhin 'khol// rbod

gtong pho nya'i rdung thabs ni// mchog chen brkos pa'i rtsib rus la// mchog chen nyid kyi pags kyis g.yogs// mchog chen phur pas lan dgu drag tu brdung// nyi tshod grib so phril li li// dus kyi nyu lo sha ra

ra// pho nya las byed khrigs se khrig/ g.yas kyis rnga lcag bzung nas su// grul bum skad ltar ku co 'don// thengs dgu drag tu brdungs nas ni// las bdag ma lus 'dur gam chad// phra men ke'u ri tshogs pa'i
rdung thabs ni// las kyi gzhug gu zung ni ltag sprod la// ca ra shel sgong shun gyis g.yogs nas kyang// bcu drug phyag rgya rol pa yis// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du bsdus// tshangs pa'i the'u brang

dmyal thag gcod// rnga ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la// lcag ni shes rab yum gyi tshul// rnga skad byang chub sems kyi ngang// dpal gyi rnga skad thengs gcig gis// dpal chen yab yum thugs dam bskul// dpal

gyi rnga skad thengs gnyis kyis// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i re ba skong// dpal gyi rnga skad thengs gsum gyis// dbang phyug chen po dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i ri la rnga brdungs pas// gzugs khams lha tshogs dbang du

sdud// lnga yis ri rab rtse mo la// lha yi dbang po brgya byin yang// longs spyod lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// drug gis 'jig rten khams su sgra bsgrags pas// mi yi gnas su thim par 'gyur// thugs rje thabs kyi
rol pa mdzad// phyogs skyong zil gyis mnan pa'i rdung thabs dang// dngos grub nye bar len pa'i rdung thabs ni// gri na mgrin sngon can du bregs nas ni// mgrin sngon nyid kyi pags kyis g.yogs nas

kyang// zhing gi gzar bus lan gsum drag tu brdungs nas ni// nyi ma shar gyi zer ka la// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'dug la// g.yon gyi mthe bong gnam du bsgreng// rnga skad grangs su bcad pa ni// drug cu

rtsa gnyis drag tu brdung// ma mo bcu drug dngos grub 'thob// ces gsungs so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las 'og min dang/ lcang lo can/ ri rab rtse mo// 'jig rten phal pa'i gnas rnams su tshar gsum
po'i rnga brdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan pad+ma gar dbang gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa dang/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i bar
gcod du 'gyur ba'i bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhe gcod pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa'i// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad nyon// dper na dam tshig mchog rab ni// smad par bya ba

ma yin te// gtso bo rab tu sdug pa la// drang du smra ba gang byed pa// bsgrags pa'i tshig gis brgyan nas su// sri zhu sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes
te// gnyis ka nges par mnyam pa ni// stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten khams na rgyal po bzhin// dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten// des na rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi dri chen maN+Dal

bya// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// spos dang du ru a ga ru// li shi dang ni ga pur dang// dza ti pha la mchog tu bsngags// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// de lta bu yi gnas mchog tu// gzhan zhig nges

par bsgral na ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rak+sha'i mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos shing// pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drang// snying gar mngon sum dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon
sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang snying dang rkang lag dag/ ya mAn ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan yang lhag ma ci yod pa// he ru ka la yon du dbul// gnas lung 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de lta bu yi dus
dag tu// lag cha phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba'i sor ni bdun par bya// rgyas pa'i sor brgyad zung yang brgyad// dbang la zla gam nges par bzang// drag po sor drug zur gsum pa'o// kun gyi rtse mor hUM

gzhag ste// dngos su ha ha ru lu bsgom// rgya mdud thog tu oM bsam mo// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// pho nya 'od zer dud ka spro// shar gyi phyogs su mngag pa ni// mgo dgu pa la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la
'od phung gnag/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag cing lag pa gnag/ mgyogs ni rlung gis phyogs su bskyad du med// 'di dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// zhum pa med cing stobs chen

'joms// g.yas pa gsum ni s+t+wa re phyar// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags kyu 'dzin// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan// g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying nas drangs// g.yas kyi s+t+wa re nges par bcom// 'di ni sgo

srung mchog yin te// pho nya rgyun du mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// rkang gcig de yi pho nya ni// kha dog 'bar ba ci 'dra na// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te
'gro// mig kyang med cing cang mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms te// lan 'ga' drag tu mngag pa'i tshe// gnyis ka song nas der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par

byed// sus kyang bzlog par mi nus so// lho yi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad po// rkang pa brgyad la mig kyang med// g.yas pa bzhi ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa bzhi ni phur pa 'dzin// ha

ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// mgo brgyad de yi pho nya ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa rlung dang

mtshungs// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// nub kyi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma

gtong// mgyogs ni rlung gi shugs dang 'dra// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// rang gi rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges par 'chi// rkang drug de yi pho nya ni// lcags

kyi spyang mo rkang gsum ma// gang nas gang 'du 'gro ba'i tshe// gzugs la rdog pas brdeg cing 'gro// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud kas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i
gnas kyang 'jigs byed na// gzugs can dgra bor smos ci dgos// byang gi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// lag pa drug ni rgyud drug 'joms// mi sha za zhing bdud rnams

sgrol// gnod sbyin gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang gsum de yi pho nya ni// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa mo// lcags kyu khyi ste rkang gsum la// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsgril ba

bzhin// bang ni klog gis bskyad du med// skad ni gnam gyi 'brug pas che// rab tu mi bsrun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgrengs pas ni// ya bdud rgyal po'i snying nas
'dren// rkang gcig mthur du phyung bas ni// ma bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// rkang gcig thad kar phyung bas ni// dgra bo ma lus snying las 'dren// 'byung po ma lus dmyal thag gcod// sku ni

lcags thag bsgril ba 'dra// tshems ni spu gri gshibs pa 'dra// mAM sa za zhing ri lung rgyug/ 'jig rten khams kun za ba po// gnod sbyin kun gyi steng na rgyug/ glo snying nang rol 'byin cing za// bar snang khams su

khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla dag kyang thang la rlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu khro nas rbad pa'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo 'thung// bar snang khams nas gnod byed kun// rdul cha tsam yang
med par mdzod// ku ku ra tsa kha lang khA hi/ zhes brjod cing rbad do// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las gnas bstan pa dang/ phur bus gdab pa dang/ sgo bzhi'i pho nya mngags pa'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas 'di rnams bstan pa'i phyir// dbang chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i tshe// bar snang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// cha lugs ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems

kyis mnyam par dgod par bya// bdag phra men ma yi 'khor mang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po dang rol par 'dod na/ bdag dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ sku mdog dkar por bsgyur te klu

dang bros bsten par bya'o// bdag 'khor mang po dang mnyam par 'dug pa'i dus na sku mdog dmar por bsgyur te/ lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i dus na/ sku mdog ljang gur bsgyur te he he zhes bya ste dgod cing

'gro'o// gang du phyin pa'i gnas su hUM zhes byas la 'dug go/ 'on tang ma mo thams cad dbang du 'du'o// nyal ba'i tshe na a zhes byas la tsog tsog por yud tsam zhig gnas par bya'o/ bdag nyid gser btso

ma'i kha dog bzhin 'tsher bar bsgyur nas/ kun tu bzang mo nam mkha' las langs nas mngon sum du 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ 'dod sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyi rtsed mo yang byas par bsam
mo// de ltar bsam pa'i yon tan ni/ sa yi 'og tu mda' 'phang bas// gnam gyi steng gyi lha bran 'chi// spyod lam 'grub pa 'di lta bu// mtshon thogs kun gyi rgyal po ste// ral gy-i 'dzin pa chen por
'gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyis phyag byas pa'o// zhes smras so// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor rnams kyis/ bdag la rab tu gces gyur na// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// sa yi
'og tu mngon sum bya// ngag gis hUM zhes brjod par bya// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang phreng glad la lan gsum bskor// de ltar byas na bdag rgyal zhing// nad
gtong ma ni 'ching bar 'gyur// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// de yi gzugs ni khrag gi bris// dur khrod chen pos song nas ni// snying gar phur pas mnan nas
ni// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// ma 'ongs bar du bsdad na ni// zhag bdun gyis ni khug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnams la ci dgar spyod// bdag gi bran dang 'dra bar 'ong// phra men rnams ni
'khol 'dod na// phra men gzugs ni khrag gis bri// yan lag phur pas mnan nas su// snying gar rdog pas mnan byas te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'ong// phra
men rnams ni ci dgar 'khol// khong gis len na khong dag 'chi// bdag gis len na bdag nyid nyams// gnyis gtso las la 'khol 'dod na// de yi gzugs ni khrag gis bris// phur bu snying dang kha ru
gdab// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni dbang du 'du// phyag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur// mi mo las la 'khol 'dod na// bud med bongs tshad khrag gis bris// snying gar rdog
pas mnan nas ni// phur bu 'dril zhing bsgom par bya// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par ru// ci bgyi gsungs zhes zer te 'ong// de nas bdag gis spyad par bya// bud med rnams ni ci dgar 'khol// bgegs
rnams las la 'khol 'dod na// so so'i gzugs dag khrag gis bris// phur bu'i rtse mor ming bri zhing// gong du hUM gcig bzhag nas ni// tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pas gdags// lan gsum bskor te gdab
byas na// bdag gi dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// ji ltar bsgo ba nyan par byed// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ci byed kyang// 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsnyen pa 'bul// nang par mal nas langs nas kyang// yi dam
gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// gom gsum spags nas dran par bya// gshang gci byed pa'i sa dag tu// dri chen lag tu blangs nas kyang// phyogs bcu kun tu kha bltas te// sus ma mthong bar kham gsum
bza'// dri chu khyor bar blugs nas ni// sus ma mthong bar hub gsum btung// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dri chen mdun du bzhag nas ni// yan lag bzhi ni sa la gzug/ phag skad thengs gsum ngur

bar byed// ru lu ru lu tshal pa bzlas// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chu mdun du bzhag nas ni// khyi skad thengs gsum ngus nas ni// ru lu ru lu kha long kha// ku ku rA

tsa kha long khA// nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar sbyor ba bya// skye bos mthong bar gyur na nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub yin// byang chub sems ni lce la bzhag/ dus dang rnam par
med par ni// sbyor ba kho na las su bzang// skabs la bab pa'i dus dus su// dur khrod gnas su byug par bya// zhing dang b+han+d+ha mang du bsags// rang gi dben sa gang yin par// skye bo rnams

las thag bsrings te// srod dang tho rangs nam gyi gung// dros dang nyi phyed dgongs ka'i dus// dbyangs dang skad drug shes par bya// dus drug kun tu rnge'u chung brdung// srod la 'khor gsum bro brdungs

te// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// rta skad 'tsher ba'i glu skad blang// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas shing// snum chen gsur gyi spos me gtong// nam gyi gung la ma nyal bar// phrin las gong ma bzhin du

bya// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// glu dbyangs khyi skad thengs gsum zug/ tho rangs langs nas phyag rgyar gsal// byang shar mtshams su kha bltas la// dbyangs ni shin nu gdung bar byed// de yang bsnyen pa

gong ma bzhin// dus la bab pa'i bro mchod la// phyi nang drag tu mtshams bcad do// rnge'u chung dir dir lan gsum brdung// sha khrag gtor ma rgyun mi gcad// glu bro shar gyi phyogs su dbul// nyi ma phyed kyi dus

su ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// grul bum skad du ku co byas// phrin las dgongs pa gong ma bzhin// dgongs mchod dus la bab pa'i tshe// grib so bzlog pa'i cho ga bya/ ha cang skad ni mi che bar// der

yang rnge'u chung dir dir brdung// dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar blang// der yang dus drug kun tu yang// gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// lan 'ga' de dang ma ldan na// ku

ku ra dang ra la sogs// ba dang bud med gang yang rung// shin tu dkon na med pa'i tshe// byes dang 'gron po byed pa na// lus las sprul pa'i lha mo yis// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi gcag go/ de ltar byas nas

dngos grub thob// rgyun dang rgyun med rtag par ni// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phrin las mthar phyin thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// tshangs pa'i gzhal

yas khang bstan pa// nyan thos mdo sde kri ya dang// theg pa chen po yo ga dang// gsang ba yi ni theg pa gsum// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang// srin po rak+sha yag+mo bsgral// de yi khog sbubs skye mched

pas// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu yin te// sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po'i khro bo'i khyams la chibs// gser gyi a long khra la la// nub nas long ba brgyad byung ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i sku lus la//

phyag na byu ru'i 'khar ba bsnams// ba glang dmar po brgyad la chibs// dbu la thog rgod char ltar 'bebs// byu ru dmar po'i a long 'khrol// byang nas long ba brgyad byung ste// rin chen 'bar ba'i sku lus la
sogs// tshangs pa'i gdung chen gshag tu gtams// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// brgya byin lha yi dbang po bsgral// khyab 'jug gtum po 'khor dang bcas// theg mchog a nu yo ga
yi// gzhung las byung ba bzhin du bsgom// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg rgyal a ti yo ga'i gzhung// khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum po gzhal yas khang// snod bcud 'byung
ba'i yum du gsal// ting 'dzin gsal ba skad cig la// bskyed nas gsang yum bzhi yi mkhar// b+ha ga dgyes pa'i nang du bsgom// de yi dkyil du bdag po dmigs// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam
mkha' lta bur rab rtogs ni// gzhal yas khang zhes mkhas pas gsungs// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gzhal yas khang tshangs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor

gyis// ting 'dzin gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u 'di gsungs// bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u 'di la yang le'u rnam pa bzhi ste/ gang dang gang zhe na/ bsgom

khog rtsa ba'i le'u dang/ gsang ba tshe'i le'u dang/ sgrol ba thugs rje'i le'u dang/ mdzad pa phrin las kyi le'u dang bzhi'o// dang por bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u 'byung ste/ 'di skad ce'o// rnam par mi rtog ye shes skye

med cing// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// thams cad spros bral mnyam nyid ji bzhin ngang// rnam rtog brjod med smra bsam yul las 'das// A+oM ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma

ko\u0f85haM/ ma ltar byams pa'i snying rjes yongs la khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yum// kun la khyab pas ye shes gsal ba'i ngang// rin chen gter ldan che ba'i khyad par ston// A+oM d+harma d+hA tu swa

b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ yi ge hUM ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i skyon bral rin chen sna lnga'i mdog/ 'byung ba lnga dang yum lnga ye shes lnga// gdul bya'i phrin las rnam pa lnga ru sbyor// badzra tsit+ta hUM/ zhabs bskyed
mthing ga'i spro bsdus las// gsal ba'i go 'byed nam mkhar 'gyur// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pas kun tu bzang// gtos ni 'byung ba kun la khyab// rna ru ljang gu'i spro bsdu las// rgya gram rlung gi dkyil

'khor shar bar gsal// thams cad skyod byed yum chen dam tshig sgrol// gtos ni nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// ma nyid dmar po'i 'phro 'du las// rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil// thams cad bskyed pa'i yum
chen mA ma ki/ gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// thig le sngo skya'i 'phro 'du las// keng rus chen po'i ri rab ste// thams cad rten pa'i yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang
mnyam// ha nyid ser po'i 'phro 'du las// bskal pa'i me dpung chen por 'bar// 'byung ba drod snyoms yum chen na bza' dkar// gtos ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// hUM mdzad hUM gi byin
rlabs bsam mi khyab// 'byung lngar spros pas yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// dbang chen yum du brtsegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// yi ge hUM yang nam mkha'i dbyings na gsal// yi ge hUM gi byin rlabs

kyis// dbang chen yum lnga'i mkha' dkyil du// gzugs khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// lha chen brgyad ni rmang du bting// 'dod khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// phyogs skyong bcu ni rtsig par brtsigs// sku

bzhi dpal brgyad tshang ba'i phyir// rgyal chen bzhi ni ka bar btsug/ gti mug la sogs ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// klu chen brgyad ni gdung du bris// gzhal yas ma bsgribs yongs su gsal ba'i phyir// gza'

chen brgyad ni gdan du bor// dus bzhi 'gyur ldog med par bya ba'i phyir// rgyu skar rnams ni phyogs nas mig tshags byas// rgyal mtshan bzhi dang bla rer bcas// nya sbrul mchog phran za ra tshags// bde

gshegs gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin no// A+oM d+he ba ka pA la b+h+rUM/ d+he ba ka pA la b+h+rUM/ d+he ba ka pA la b+h+rUM/ A+oM rak+sha ka pA la b+h+rUM/ rak+sha ka pA la b+h+ruM/ rak+sha ka pa' la b+h+rUM/ oM rA dza ka pA la b+h+rUM/ rA dza ka pA la b+h+rUM/ rA dza ka pA

la b+h+rUM/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ nA ga ka pA la b+h+rUM/ sUr+Ya ka pA la b+h+rUM/ sUr+Ya ka pA la b+h+rUM/ sUr+Ya ka pA la b+h+rUM/ kro ta ka pA la b+h+rUM/ kro ta ka pA la b+h+rUM/ kro ta ka pA la b+hUM/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha

ha ru lu hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de lta bu yi dbus nyid du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi man d+ha la// dbus ni zla gam e yi dkyil// bcu drug 'khor lo'i mtha' bskor zhing// hrIHlas pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// zur bzhi rin

chen khri rkang la// sprin med nyi ma bdun gyis brgyan// bar khyams gnyis dang sgo bzhir ldan// bde gshegs bzhugs pa gnas kyi dbyibs nyid de// rdo rje'i gzhal yas nam mkha'i tshad mnyam pa// ka ba yid

bzhin bum pa brgyad du bstan// rin chen mchog sbyin dbang gi yum du ston// kun tu rol pas cir yang sgrol ba'i dbyings// b+ha ga ma d+ha la g+hu ya sid+d+hi hUM/ hUM/ dbang phyug mar bsdus sid+ha dzam b+ha la// drug

gsum zil gnon rnam dag 'joms mdzad pa'i// mthu rtsal che ba'i khyad par kun las 'phags// don dam gsang sbas dbang phyug rgyal ba'i bka'// sid+ha dzam b+ha la bi ma la si ti hUM/ hUM/ rin chen khri rkang

'bar ba'i skur ston pa// yon tan drug stong dpag tshad 'phangs dang mnyam// sprin med nyi ma bdun brtsegs gsal bas brgyan// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung sku yi ngo bor rdzogs// rat+na trAM/ hUM/ 'dam gyi skyon bral
rA ga'i mdog/ dri zhim dbyibs legs kha dog so sor gsal// chos dbyings che ba'i khyad par rab ston phyir// rigs mchog brjid ldan gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// pad+ma d+ha ra hrIH/ hUM/ 'jig rten
'od kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ni// thabs mchog brjid ldan 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// stong gsum mun nag gting nas sel mdzad pa'i// ye shes gsal ba'i me long mA ma ki/ sUr+Ya ma d+ha la hUM/

tsan+d+ra a/ nyi zla de dkyil gdan stengs su// nam mkha'i yi ge hUM bab ste// rnam gsum tshul gyis sku nyid rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// A+oM badzra satwa ya ta At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan dpal mchog rdo rje
sems dpa' ni// sku gsum lhun grub dbu gsum brjid par ldan// mthing ga dkar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i zhal// rgyud drug rtsad gcod ye shes drug gi phyag/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'dzin// g.yon pas

dril bu rin chen ral gri 'dzin// rnam pa thams cad mchog dang rab ldan pas// thams cad rgyan gyi ma lus yongs su rdzogs// spyan drangs mchod pa rdzogs pa dang// bsgrub pa'i don du mchod pa 'bul// dbang

dang byin rlabs dngos grub stsol// gsol byas de gnang thob dmigs la// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje las// rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pa dang// 'gro drug gnas nas drang pa'i phyir// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul
bstan// khro bo'i rgyal po khro ba'ihUM sgra can// hUM gis khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// hUM gis ma rig dug gsum mun khang 'joms// hUM gis dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed// hUM gis thams cad
'jigs shing thams cad sdud// hUM gis ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// hUM gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// hUM yig drug las 'od zer 'bum spros

pas// lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs dam bskul// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can sdig sbyangs te// bla med byang chub bde chen dbyings su bsdus// A+oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ha

na ta ka pa tsa hUM phaT/ sku bzhi gcig tu bsgoms pas kun tu zhal// sku mdog pad+ma rgyas pa'i dbu lngar ldan// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bco lnga'i spyan bzlog smin mtshams khro gnyer brjid// snyan

bcus gsan cing shangs lngas sgra chen 'byin// zhal lnga rngam zhing brjid pa'i smang ra 'khyug/ ljags lnga 'gril zhing dkar ba'i mche ba gtsigs// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// zhabs brgyad

zil gnon stangs stabs tshul du bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang// cang te'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag gis bkang// rdo rje rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga
dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ g.yon gyi phyag brgyad phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub lu gu rgyud// thod rlon zhal du stob dang khro bo brgyad snying

'dzin// cang te'u kha T+wAM lcags kyu lhan cig bsnams// ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal med khang// rgyal ba 'khor bcas dbu lnga'i cod pan 'dzin/ phyogs bzhi

dbus dang rigs lnga'i skur ston pa// spyimathun lnga lngar snang bas nam mkha'i rgyan du che// A+oM tsakra A+oM b+h+rUM/ tsakra hUM b+h+rUM/ tsakra trAM b+h+rUM/ tsakra hrIHb+h+rUM/ tsakra hA b+h+rUM/ b+hud+d+ha ya thA ta twa

a haM/ badzra ya thA ta twa a haM/ rat+na ya thA ta twa a haM/ pad+ma ya thA ta twa a haM/ karma ya thA ta twa a haM/ ka ma la mu kha/ ka ma la si ti/ ka ma la sha dza oM AMHhUM/ dbu gtsug lhag par rta mgo ljang nag lnga// phyogs bcu khyab par gzigs shing dbang gi rta skad

sgrogs// dbang gi rta gdong mgyogs pa'i phrin las ni// rnam shes yid myur glog gi rgyan du snang// A+oM shrI pad+ma bi mok+Sha yo gI shwa rI/ ha ya g+h+rI ba hriM hriM/ skye ba med las skyes pa'i tshul// mtshan ma med las mtshan

mar snang// thugs kar dpal be'u shar ba ni// skyes bu chen po nyid kyi rtags// A+oM dz+nyA na sa twa hUM dzaHA+oM AM hUM/ rdo rje rin chen sbrul nag gshog pa ni// rtogs pas 'phang gcod phrin las rlabs kyis sdud// nyi ma

stong gis brgyan pa'i the'u gshog can// mkha' 'gro rgyal po rgyal mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// A+oM dz+wa la dz+wa la a mu ka hUM/ dz+wa la dz+wa la a mo ka trAM/ mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston phyir// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems

bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang chen gnon// A+oM nA' na ya stam+b+ha ni/ nA sha ya stam+b+ha ni hUM/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ zhabs brgyad ting
'dzin brgyad kyi chas dang ldan// bka' dang dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i phyir// snying gar mkhrig ma bsnubs shing sgal tshigs 'joms// nyon mongs nyams thag 'bod sgrogs sgra chen 'byin// dbang po rab

brjid ting 'dzin stag gi chas// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje phyed pa'i chas// dbang gis bse khrab smug po gzi 'bar chas// dpa' brjid nyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril
pa'i chas// dbang phyug dmar gsal mche ba chags pa'i chas// shu keng smad g.yogs chu ris dar gyi chas// gcan gzan rgyal po thabs mchog gzig gi chas// zhabs kyi chas brgyad ting 'dzin bye brag

gis// phyogs mtshams khro bo tshul bzhin gnas par bya'o// hUM kA' ra dang mi g.yo mgon// gshin rje gshed dang dbyug sngon can// g.yas kyi zhabs bzhi'i gdan du bting// pra be sha ya phaT/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma
ya s+t+waM/ pad+ma 'khyil dang 'dod pa'i rgyal// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang stobs po che// g.yon gyi zhabs bzhi'i gdan du bting// pra be sha phaT/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ raM/ 'bar ba 'phro ba ye
shes thugs rjer ldan// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon mongs dug bsreg cing// shes rab gsal bas ma rig mun pa sel// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba stong la gnas// raM dza la s+pha ra Na hUM/ dung chen khong

gseng rgyu ma'i thod phreng ni/ dus gsum sangs rgyas ye shes lnga dang ldan// sku gsung thugs ldan rdo rje rtse gsum 'bar// dbang po dbyer med stong pa'i rgyan du snang// oM rat+na kro tI shwa rI sma sha ni ba bi sha na/ ni la

dza la ma la ma ku te ma hA pra daM pra be sha ka pa la/ ru lu ra li ha sti kha T+wAM ga trishU la// tun du ma la hUM hUM phaT/ thod sbrul mnyen lcug 'jigs byed rgyan du che// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i rngom brjid can// klu
lngas mchod phyir sku yi gnas lngar 'khril// dug lnga ma spangs dbang gi rtags su bstan// nA ga rA dza ha ra ru lu hUM phaT/ rno gdug zhon pa bzlog pas bdud bzhi 'joms pa dang// khams gsum g.yul las
rgyal ba'i rtags su bstan// zhing lpags gos su gsol bas dur khrod bdag/ 'gro sra 'doms su bsdus pas phyi nang gsang bar gcig/ glang chen ko rlon brjid du che ba dang// stag chen sham thabs dpa' bar

ldan pa dang// zhing lpags rlon pa thabs la mkhas pa yi// na bza' rgyan gyis sku la mnga' gsol lo// bam snig ta dz+wa la hUM/ skye med dbyings nas skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan// mi gnas dbang chen thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor nas// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yum// kro tI shwa rI gzi ldan phyag rgyar gsal// A+oM e ka bi ka te ma ta ka te swA hA/ dza A+oM AM hU~M/ zur gsum logs gsum gdan stengs

su// phyag rgya chen po bzhi las ma g.yos te// gnas pa byang chub sems la rtag bzhugs kyang// 'jug dang smon dang ldan pas 'gro don mdzad slad du// rigs mchog gsang yum kham rgya drug tu gsal// b+hud+d+ha

badzra A+oMH/ sarba badzra hUM/ rat+na badzra trAM/ pad+ma badzra hrIH/ karma badzra hA/ g+hu Na badzra phaT/ thod rus nyi ltar shar ba'i bar khyams dang po la// chos nyid spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las// mtshan ma'i dngos po rtog pa

mi mnga' yang// khams gsum 'khor ba rnams kyi don slad du// sprul sku long ba brgyad dang dmus long drug cur gsal/ A+oM shwa ri khA hi shwa ri khA hi hUM/ me ri sprin ltar 'khrigs pa'i bar khyams tha ma la// de ba'i

bdud 'jos 'bar ba'i zhabs brgyad pa// skye med don rtogs lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// phyi nang gnyis med rtogs 'joms khyi brgyad gnyis// rtsa ba rang sngags brjod pas phyag rgyar gsal// tip+ta tsakra shwa na mu
kha kha lo kha/ ku ku rA tsa rak+sha kha lo kha hUM phaT/ 'bar chen dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi'i sgo bzhi na// theg chen dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// rnam thar brgyad la gzud

pa'i phyir// mgo brgyad lag brgyad rkang brgyad po// ye shes drug ldan rtogs pa'i phyir// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med phyir// mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// sngags

brjod tsam gyis phyag rgyar gsal/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ trAM hUM phaT/ hrIHhUM phaT/ hA hUM phaT/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams thabs dang shes rab las// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin me dbal rlung// 'khor ba dong sprug bag

chags bsreg pa'i phyir// sngags brjod tsam gyis me rlung 'brug tu gsal// dzi na kha to tse re ma/ yak+sha ku ba na tsa hUM/ hUM// bde gshegs pho brang rin chen gzhal yas ni// yid bzhin 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya

mtsho'i dbyings// shes rab zab mo rnam dag yum gyi mkha'// b+ha ga'i klong nas sprul pa mang po 'byung// sna tshogs yon tan gsang ba mdzod kyi gter// khro bo 'byung gnas dpal chen rngam pa'i yum// tug chom

'brug sgras stong gsum yongs su ldir// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pas chos kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu rgya ma chad pas dpag cing tshad las 'das// tshad med yon tan dpag gis mi lang ste// klu chen pho mo
bsnol ba'i gdong phyi la// rgyal chen rigs bzhi gzhibs pa'i ka ba btsugs// lha chen dregs pa bcom pa'i brtsigs rmang la// phyogs skyong pho mo bsnol ba'i brtsig tu brtsigs// gza' brgyad bad du bkram

pa'i dral drab la// rgyu skar rnams kyis phyogs nas mig tshogs byas// zhing chen bla re mchog phran 'phan gdugs dang// nya chen blud bu sbrul chen za ra tshags// chu srin sgo dang me ri sprin ltar 'khrigs// thod
rus bar khyams rdo rje'i gzer mgo la// nyi ma zla ba bar snang yos tar bskad// dbus kyi 'khor lo lte ba zlum po la// skar ma rgyal gyi 'od zer gdub bur bskor// snga ma 'das pa'i rgyal sras gsang ba'i
gnas// slad kyis 'byon pa'i rgyal sras gshegs pa'i shul// da ltar bzhugs pa'i khro bo'i gzhal yas la// gar gyi dbang phyug chen pos bstod pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin lha yi bu dang gang zag rnal 'byor

pas// smon lam mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal bstod// A+oM d+harma d+hA tu g+hu h+ya ma d+ha la rA ga sid+d+hi b+h+rUM/ de ltar bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas// spyan drangs mchod pa
rdzogs nas ni// sgrub pa'i don du bsnyen pa 'bul// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub stsol// gsol bas de gnang yid kyis dmigs// dkyil 'khor bsdus la bkra shis gsol// lus bsrung ba dang go bgo
bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gang du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// lha rnams sngags kyis bskyed byas nas// gtso bo'i sku mdog

phyag mtshan ni// gong du smos pa'i gzhung dang mthun// yum gyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pas yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin/ g.yon pas rin chen za ma tog/ gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir// gzi ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gru gsum mUM dang bcas par dmigs// gtso bo yab kyi thugs ka ru// rtse lnga A+oM dang bcas par dmigs// mUM dang oM du ldan byas te// yi

ge 'bru bcu bzhi'i phreng ba yis// thugs nas sku yi gsang brgyud pas// dang po gsung gi yig 'bru la// gnyis pa thugs kyi phyag mtshan te// gsum pa skur 'grub yungs 'bru'i tshul// A+oM las dbang chen yab

yum sku// yan lag bzhi las gyur pa ni// rigs bzhi yab yum brgyad kyi sku// hu lu gong ma te ki ma mo brgyad// hu lu 'og ma ta ki phra men brgyad// de yi yon tan phrin las las// sku gsung thugs su grub pa

ni// kham rgya chen mo drug gi sku// hUM las sgo srung bzhi ru 'gyur// phra las long ba dmus long tshogs// ta las spyang mo khyi yi tshogs// e las yum gyi gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor gzhung dang mthun par
dmigs// ye shes 'bru las bskyed pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha rnams bzhugs su gsol// A ni ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// ra li rig pa byang chub sems// hriM ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ dzaHsa ni thams cad
dbang du bsdus// de ni yig 'bru bcu bzhi las// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'o// dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// yi ge bcu bzhi 'od du 'phros// gzi ldan yum gyi gzhal yas su// thugs
nas sku yi gsang brgyud de// gser zhun lta bur 'khyil pa la// dz+nyA na sa twa zhes brjod pas// ye shes sems dpa'i skur gyur te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pas yid bzhin nor bu
'dzin// g.yon pas rin chen za ma tog/ gsang ba tshe yi dngos grub ste// byang chub sems kyi grub brtags so// gtso bo yab yum thugs ka nas// hUM dang e yi spro bsdu las// rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs
nas// yum gyis yab la 'di skad bskul// hUM/ bde gshegs gnyis med rnal 'byor zab mo la// thabs dang shes rab zung du ye 'brel yang// 'gro don yid bzhin shugs kyis mdzad slad du// byang chub

sems kyi spro bsdu gtang ba'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba da ni dus la bab// a la la ho// yab kyis yum la 'di skad bskul// hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po kun 'jug phyir// rin chen rdo rje bla na med// chos kyi rdo rje'i glu
blangs pas// las kyi rdo rje gar byed 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// nan tan mchod pa 'bul bas ni// tshim 'gyur gnyi gar spro bar bya// a la la te dus la bab// A+oM b+h+rUM/ hUM b+h+rUM/

trAM b+h+rUM/ hrIHb+h+rUM/ AHb+h+rUM/ nr-i b+h+rUM/ bde gshegs rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas// dzaHlas lha mo lcags kyu can// stong khams khyab par spros pa'i tshe// 'gro ba yongs kyi tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// rdo rje'i rig 'dzin tshe la

dbang bsgyur zhing// ri rab rmang dral rgya mtsho'i gting dral te// dregs pa gshin rje'i lag na gnas pa'i nr-i// ji ltar lcags kyus nya rnams drangs pa bzhin// zla gsal dri med thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// A yu

tshe yi las rnams 'grub par mdzod// A+oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hrIM dzaHhUM phaT/ gsang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yig 'bru bcu bzhi'i 'phro 'du yis// nr-i yi rang bzhin hUM du gyur// hUM las ye shes

sems dpa'i sku// sran zlum tsam gyi zla dkyil du// yungs 'bru tsam gyi phyag rgya gsal// yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/ mi 'dzin 'dzin pa'i tshul du gnas// mi gnas gnas pa'i sba thabs ni// skye ba med pa'i

dbyings su sba// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' la sba// rang rig ye shes gdeng la sba// de gsum dang du lon nas ni// 'du 'bral bya ba'i ming yang med// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang gnas tshe yi le'u ste
bcu gnyis pa'o// gang du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// dkyil 'khor lha rnams sngags kyis bskyed// spyan drang mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// khams gsum rgyud drug bsgral ba'i don slad du// sngon gyi rgyal
bas thugs dam bzhes pa ni// log rtog 'khrul ba'i zhen pa bzlog pa dang// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i 'dam nas dbyung ba'i phyir// rtog pas bdag bsgral don dang ldan pa la// thugs rje chen pos bzung nas bdag

bsgral rnams// phrin btags gnang ba'i tshig stsal nas// brtul zhugs chen po drug gi bro// zhing bcu'i sgrib pa rgyud gcod do// de ltar sgrib pa rgyun bcad nas// sgrol byed ging gi dbang drug sbyin// de yang gang

dang gang zhe na// yi ge 'khor lo phra dgod pa'i dbang dang/ dri med ye shes pad+ma spyan gyi dbang dang/ shes rab snang ba kun tu 'od kyi dbang dang/ sgrol ba shugs kyis bsdus pa gsang ba yum gyi dbang dang/ rdo

rje dang pad+mar ldan pa byang chub sems kyi dbang dang/ 'debs pa phyag mtshan thugs rje mchog gi dbang ngo// 'debs pa phyag mtshan thugs rje yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral nas// pra be sha phaT ces sgo phye

ste/ sems kyi bdag po nr-i dud ka/ bzung bas ti yi dngos gzhir gyur// thugs kyi sa bon hUM bar du// skad cig gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ti hUM ti hUM zhes brjod pas// ti yang hUM du gyur nas ni// sku
gsung thugs su gnas nas ni// dug gsum dngos la 'bigs par byed// khams gsum yongs la khyab par gdal// chos dbyings gnas kyi mthar ru phyin// gsang lung 'phrul gyi dgongs

pa'o// de ltar gyur pa'i duHkha nas// bsgral ba'i yon tan bcu bzhi ste// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// 'khor ba'i gnas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su bskyas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i dmag tshogs kyi nang
du mi 'jigs pa chos nyid kyi dpung bsnyil ba dang/ gti mug gi mun khang du ye shes kyi sgron ma btegs pa dang/ ma rig pa'i rgyu dang bcas pa'i sems phral nas/ rig pa'i ye shes kyi gter bcug pa dang/

'khor ba'i ru mtshon chen po bcag pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i g.yul so bstod pa dang/ dug gsum gyi mdun pa bkrol ba dang/ dpal thar pa'i sgo phye ba dang/ ye shes mtshon gyi char phab pa dang/ rgyu drug

'khor ba'i gnas sbar ba dang/ skye shi med pa'i yul du phyin pa dang/ 'du 'bral med pa'i grogs dang phrad pa dang/ rang bzhin med pa'i sku thob pa dang/ g.yung drung brtan pa'i sa rnyed pa'o// kun gyi thun mong ma

yin yang// bdag dang gzhan gyi don slad du// dang du blangs nas bya bar gsungs// phung po lhag ma'i rjes shul la// gnas kyi bro brgyad brdung bar gsungs// mgo la lang ka mnan pa'i bro// nang grol tsit+ta

'khor ba'i bro// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ta krita brgyad kyi bro// phung po khams dang skye mched zhabs kyi chas brgyad bro// yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed bzhi yi bro// nang grol srid pa'i grong na ngan song gnas kyi

bro// g.yang gzhi ma mo las la 'khrugs pa'i bro// sla bzhi khro bo gzir chen gnon pa'i bro// de ltar bro brgyad brdungs nas ni// smon lam btab nas phung po grol// tshogs la rol nas lhag ma bskyod// dbang

chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las thugs rje sgrol ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// gang du bskyed pa'i gzhal yas su// lha rnams sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// spyan drang mchod pa rdzogs pa dang// ma bsgral ba yi
phung po la// brtul zhugs bro drug brdung par gsungs// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// ngan song gsum gyi phung po la// 'khor ba'i lam lnga dgag pa'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga phra bkod

pas// rgyud drug 'bros khungs gcod pa'i rgyud// lus ngag sems kyi sa gzhi la// yig 'bru 'khrigs pa'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rdul phran bzhin du bshig/ phung po khams dang skye mched tshogs// rdo rje

dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// phyag rgya chen por dbang sgyur cig/ tshon lngas rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khams gsum bskor ba'i bro brdungs pas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i
rgyal por bshad// thig le gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje las kyi bro brdungs pas// dbang phyug gar gyi rgyal por gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo rdo rje'i bro brdung

ba// dgra bo kun gyi klad yang brdung// ma tshogs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rkang pa phur pa'i bro brdung ba// bgegs dang 'byung po'i snying la brdung// ging chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor lo thabs

kyi bro brdung ba// ma srin rnams kyi snying la brdung// pho nya 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bskal pa brgyad kyi bro brdung ba// rgyab nyan rkun bu'i snying la brdung// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dkyil du// tsit+ta 'bar

ba'i bro brdung ba// mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la brdung// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// las kyi ling+ga'i bro brdung ba// bag chags stug po'i tshogs la brdung// tshogs chen 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// yungs

kar gser gyi bro brdung ba// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la brdung// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje mche ba'i tshems bdar bas// bka' las 'das pa'i snying la brdung// ha ha ru lu ha ha ru lu hUM
phaT/ ngan song gnas kyi bro ste dang po'o//// rta yi brtul zhugs chen pos ni// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// gtum chen rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs shing// dbang

mchog rta skad tse re re// khro bo'i 'brug sgra 'u ru ru// dpal gyi rnga sgra ldi ri ri// rol pa'i rta bro chems se chem// gsang ba'i bshugs pa kyu ru ru// bskal pa'i glog dmar ljibs se ljib// rdo rje thog 'bebs
lams se lam// hUM gis dbang bskur khams gsum g.yo// phaT kyis sku sprul 'jig rten khyab// raM gyis me 'bar thams cad bsreg/ gcan gzan chu la sprin ltar gtibs// kaM ka 'dab chags skar ltar
'khrugs// sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum mngon bsgral mdzad pa che// za byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rus pa'i phung po spungs pa

la// gcan gzan mche ba'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu blta ba'i zhe sdang bcom// khrag 'thung chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khyil ba la// ma tshogs mkha' 'gro bro brdungs pas// 'dod chags ngo
bo rtsad nas bcom// rngam chen 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// sha che phung po spungs pa la// sder chags 'dus pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdag tu blta ba'i nga rgyal bcom// gtum chen rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor

du// dbang po yan lag tshogs pa la// gshog pa rlabs kyi bro brdungs pas// bdag tu rtog pa'i phrag dog bcom// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// sbubs kyi khri rkang zlum po la// rdo rje mchu yi bro
brdungs pas// gti mug rmongs pa'i ngo bo bcom// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum gzhom pa'i las byas pas// sngon gyi dam tshig chen po skong// ma bdun mkha' 'gro'i dkyil
'khor du// tan gaN 'phrul ba'i las byas pas// rnal 'byor skong ba'i cho ga rdzogs// dbang chen gar gyi dkyil 'khor du// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i las byas pas// khams gsum bsgral ba'i cho ga

rdzogs// phyag brnyan tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bka' 'das bsgral ba'i las byas pas// dgra bo mnan pa'i cho ga rdzogs// ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ rta'i bro ste gnyis pa'o//// khrag 'thung chen
po'i brtul zhugs ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// dbu ni rigs lnga'i tshogs la rol// thugs ni skye mched dbyings la rol// phyag ni phra men tshogs la

rol// gshog pa gti mug klu la rol// zhabs ni khro chen brgyad la rol// sku ni rngom brjid ches la rol// rdo rje gsang ba'i yum la rol// gsung ni pho nya'i tshogs la rol// 'khor ba'i skyams lings chen po

la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ra mdar gnyer// khong snying yum gyi b+ha ga la// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i tshe// ye shes lnga yis ru dpon mdzad// khro bo rdo rje'i go tshags sdoms// sprul pa'i pho nyas dang

ru chum// dug gsum dpal gyi mda' khar 'grim// rdo rje mtshon gyi char pa phob// lus ni rdul phran bzhin du shig/ sems ni yum gyi mkha' la ltob// ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ khrag 'thung khro bo'i bro ste gsum
pa'o//// zhe sdang zhabs kyi cha lugs las// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// khams gsum ma lus bza' ba'i

phyir// dpal gyi khyi brgyad las la bkye// tshems ni sra snyi med par rno// skad ni phyi nang med par zugs// de phyir bdud kyi mel tshe ba// bang ni ngal dub med par mgyogs// de phyir ye shes sprul ba'i khyi// zas

su gtsang sme med par bza'// de phyir mAM sa dri chen za// skom du kha mngar med par 'thung// de phyir khrag dang dri chu 'thung// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// 'brug sgra ldir bas lha chen 'dul// lho yi phyogs

nas rgyug pa ni// glog dmar ljib kyis gshin rje sgrol/ nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// rdo rje khyung gshog klu 'brug 'dul// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// gnod sbyin pho mo'i sgal rtsib 'joms// shar lho
mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// drang srong bdud 'dul cham la 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// za byed srin po'i don snying 'byin// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// rlung lha sngon po'i ba dan
gcod// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// bgegs chen pho mo'i tshogs la rol// steng gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// nyi zla gza' skar kha lo kha// 'og gi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// sa bdag pho

mo'i thibs kyis gnon// kun kyang mi bzad ci 'dra na// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// spyan ni nyi zla zhun ma 'dra// ral pa nyi zer 'dzings pa 'dra// sder mo gnas lcags zhun ma 'dra// khyod kyi phrin las dus

la bab// ku ku rA tsa kha lo kha hUM phaT/ khyi yi bro ste bzhi pa'o//// phag gi brtul zhugs chen mo ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// blang dor med pa'i mnyam pa
la// phyogs bcu zas su bza' ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i khron brko nga re mkhas// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// sku ni 'bar ba'i cha lugs la// gnam lcags ur mo'i ze bas brgyan// zhal ni phag rgod mche

bar sprul// gsung ni grul bum phyogs bcur sgrogs// tshems ni sra snyi med par rno// shangs ni nyon mongs tha ba rlog/ rbad nas khros pa'i bro brdungs tshe// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// dmyal tshogs me

dpung rtsad nas gcod// du ru du ru tshal pa tshal pa hUM phaT/ phag gi bro ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje gshog pa'i byin rlabs la// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// bdag nyid

chen po'i skur bsgoms te// rdo rje'i gshog chen gdengs pa'i tshe// khams gsum khyab par bzan la rol// rdo rje'i gshog chen bcum pa'i tshe// rgyud drug sems can spar mor 'dzud// rdo rje mchu chen gdengs

pa'i tshe// rgyud drug sems can ril ming mdzad// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po ni// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i lhag rol la// dkar po'i tshogs dang dmar po'i tshogs// dbyar gyi char sprin 'khrigs pa bzhin// lding
shing 'babs la 'babs shing gzhol// gtan nas len pa'i las mdzod cig/ ma mo ko da k+Sha ya ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ bya yi bro ste drug pa'o//// bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u las// mdzad pa phrin las kyi le'u
ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de yan chad du ma bsgral ba'i phung po la brtul zhugs chen po drug gi bros rgyu'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyang ba dang gnod byed kyi dgra bgegs btul ba bstan nas/ 'di man chad

du bsgral ba'i lhag ma la// sgrol ba gnad kyi bro brgyad brdung bar gsungs te/ de yang mgo la lang ka mnan pa'i bro zhes pa'o// hUM/ rU tra bsgral ba'i ngo bo la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams pa// bdag nyid chen

po'i skur bsgoms te// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug tu// mthing nag grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// hrIHlas grub pa'i rta mgo la// hUM gi 'brug sgra ldi ri ri// de yi byin rlabs chen po las// lang ka
mnan pa'i bro brdung 'tshal// rta gdong chen pos stong gsum g.yos// rta skad rngam pa'i thugs dam bskul// bka' bzhin las la gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn hrIM hrIM// zhes drug tu

brjod do// lang ka gnon pa'i bro ste dang po'o//// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro zhes pa/ hUM/ lang ka bsgral ba'i tsit+ta la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams shing// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs dkyil nas// hUM las

grub pa'i dpal be'u las// ye shes lnga yi phyag rgya 'khrugs// de yi byin rlabs chen po las// rigs lnga khrag 'thung sprin ltar gtibs// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i ri dwags la// ye shes lnga yi khyi bkye ste// dus gsum

sangs rgyas ra mdar gnyer// khong snying yum gyi b+ha ga la// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i lings 'debs so// rnam shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod brgyad kyi lam phyung ste// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod thugs rje'i

bro// srin po bsgral ba'i snying la brdung// dz+nya na sid+d+hi s+pha ra Na yaM yaM zhes brjod do// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro ste gnyis pa'o//// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ta kr-ita brgyad kyi bro zhes pa'o// hUM rU tra bsgral ba'i rnam

shes la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams te// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i de

ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang ches dgon// drag shul chen pos 'dul bar bka' stsal to// hUM dang kA yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing nag sprin ltar 'khrigs// khro chung tshon gang

skar ltar 'khrugs// hUM chen kA ra'i phyag rgyar gsal// nyi zla bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa

la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// A dang t+ya yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang sngon sprin ltar 'khrigs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// mi g.yo

mgon po'i phyag rgyar gsal// me lha bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag

'tshubs mas sprin ltar 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ya dang ma yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo mthing nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgyar

gsal// gshin rje bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs
bcur 'khrigs// 'od zer rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// nI dang la yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo sngon po sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// dbyug pa sngon po'i phyag rgyar

gsal// srin po bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i phro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs

bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// pad dang ma yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dud ka sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// pad+ma 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// sa bdag

bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od

zer rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// Ta dang ki yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo dmar skya sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// Tak+ki rA dza'i phyag rgyar gsal// rlung lha bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita

chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// a

dang mr-i yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnod sbyin bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la

gshegs// dgra ni thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la// rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ma dang hA yi 'phro

'du las// khro bo ser nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// ma hA ba la'i phyag rgyar gsal// bgegs chen bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// dgra ni thal

bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen sa la la/ rlung nag 'tshubs mas phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ha na ha na rgyob/ gardza gardza sgrogs/ da ha da

ha sregs/ pa tsa pa tsa chos/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha chings/ hu lu hu lu zhugs/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phug/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da chod/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha gnas/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta s+phor/ zhes gsungs shing drag por rol lo// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra

las/ ta kr-ita brgyad kyi bro yi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i phung po khams dang skye mched la zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyi bro brdung ba zhes// hUM// srin po rU tra
bsgral ba'i phung khams skye mched la// lu gu rgyud du sgrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// mi gnas ye shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha chen mgo bcu dur khrod brgyan du

sprul// zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs brgyad gnas su bsgral// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhabs kyi chas brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi ngang// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi 'phro 'du

dang// phra men mu ka brgyad kyi 'byon tshul gyis// ta kr-ita brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gar dang brda yi mtshon nas spyan 'dren na// dam tshig gsang ba'i bro la gshegs su gsol// dpa' bo ting

'dzin stag gi chas mchog gis// dregs pa'i mgo bcad b+han+d+ha gsang ba'i bro// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u chas mchog gis// rtog 'joms spyod pa brtul zhugs chen po bro// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje'i chas
mchog gis// mi 'gyur g.yung drung skyid rtags dpal gyi bro// dmag gi bse khrab gzi 'bar chas mchog gi/ khams gsum dbang bsdud rak+ta chags pa'i bro// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag chas mchog
gis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gsang ba yum gyi bro// dbang phyug dmar gsal che ba'i chas mchog gis// sdug bsngal nad sel zug rngu gcod pa'i bro// shu ken sha chen snang smad g.yogs dar gyi chas mchog
gis// dur khrod gnas su ma mo mnyes pa'i bro// gcan gzan rgyal po gzig gi chas mchog gis// 'dul sbyong drag po las kyi tshar gcod bro// 'dul byed zhabs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// dzaHhUM

hoHsa spyan drangs tshur gshegs la// ngag gi dbang phyug thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// dbang chen yum du brtsegs pa'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i bro ra btsug/ dregs pa 'dul phyir zil gnon

stobs kyi tshul// srid gsum la ma lus dbyings su bsgral ba dang// lha chen khyab 'jug zil gyis gnon pa dang// gsang ba'i rU tra thal bar brlag pa'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched don la gshegs su

gsol// trag rak+sha rU tra ma hA tsit+ta dza dzaH/ zhes drag tu bskor ro// phung po khams dang skye mched zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyi bro ste bzhi pa'o//// yan lag bzhi lha mo za byed kyi bro zhes pa/ hUM/ srin po rU tra
bsgral ba'i yan lag la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms te// thogs med las kyi dbang sdud ma mo ste// yan lag chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la// lcags kyu dmar pos
'khor ba'i nad khrag 'byin// a mo de ba 'dir gshegs aM ku sha/ yon tan lhun grub cir yang sprul pa'i yum// dur khrod gsang ba'i lha mo glog 'gyu ma// rdo rje zhags pas khams gsum cig char 'chings//
lha mo glog 'gyu 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// gsung gis thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i yum// rdo rje dra ba bka' yi rjes gcod ma// lcags sgrog dmar po rgyud drug cig char sdom// rdo rje dra ba

'dir gshegs s+pho Ta bam// sku mchog mi bzad 'bar ba'i yum gcig ma// rdo rje sder mo ral pa'i cod pan can// rdo rje dril bus ma lus dgyes pa bskyed// dur khrod sgra yis 'tshog 'gyur g+haN+De ho// zhes

brjod la drag tu bskor ro// yan lag bzhi la lha mo zad byed ma bzhi'i bro ste lnga pa'o//// nang rol ngan song gnas kyi bro zhes pa// hUM/ srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i slo shul la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams

nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// sdug bsngal yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis// ngan song gting nas sbyang ba'i phrin las mdzod// mkha' lding shugs kyis 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus dang// phra

men mgo brnyan tshogs kyis rkan sgra yis// khams gsum 'khor ba sngangs pa'i glu blangs te// lhag phud med pa'i nang grol spungs pa la// bya rog 'ug pa bzhad dang khwa la sogs// stag seng spyang ki 'jigs pa'i

gdong rnams ni// la la lding zhing la la 'babs// la la 'jol zhing la la 'thog/ ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// zhing bcu gnas nas blang phyir gshegs su gsol// zhes brjod la/ nang grol kha phye la sdang
mig gis blta zhing gtum bag gis drag tu bskor ro// nang grol ngan song gnas kyi bro ste drug pa'o//// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro zhes pa/ hUM/ srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i g.yang gzhi la// lu
gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// sha khrag dmar la dgyes pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams// gsang ba'i god bsrung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyong// ma bdun las la 'khrugs
pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'khor ba'i gting bsnyeg zhing bcu'i nang grol la// dug gsum rngubs pa'i shugs kyis 'dir gshegs shig/ gsang ba'i shun chen brdal ba'i sa gzhi la// phyogs skyong rgyal po las la

'khrugs pa'i bro// srin po smug nag thugs rje chags pa'i bro// gling bzhi kun 'byams rab tu rngam pa'i bro// brtan ma bcu gnyis ma chen 'khrugs pa'i bro// g.yang gzhi shun gyi bro gra 'dir gshegs la// khyi

phag bya dang rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis// nga dang bdag tu lta ba'i mun khang shig/ rU tra'i gnas bcom sha za'i man d+hal la// sha zan stong gi chun lag dengs se deng// rak+ta dmar gyi rba klong 'khyil pa la// khrag

'thung stong gi rkan sgra chi li li// rus pa tshogs kyi mkhar bu gtams pa la// mche ba dung gi so sgra thams se tham// g.yang gzhi sprin gyi ba dan lhubs se lhubs// 'di 'dra'i dur khrod 'bar ba'i sa gzhi
la// dbang chen 'khrugs pa'i bro gra di ri ri// skyes bu ging chen 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// ma mo las la 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdud dang srin po'i mig 'bras thang la rlog/ gti mug klu

dbang snying khrag kha nas skyugs// lang ka gdon gyi kha so sil bur lhogs// rak+sha rU tra ha ha ru lu hUM phaT ces brjod la drag tu bskor ro// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro ste bdun pa'o//// rkang lag

khro bo zil gnon bro zhes pa// hUM/ srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i sla bzhi la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// rkang lag rdo rje phur pa'i bro// ya ga can gyi snying la brdung// rdo

rje khro bo'i thugs ka nas// khro mo 'bar ba'i thugs ka ru// sum+b+ha ni yi sgra bsgrags nas/ sngags dang phyag rgya rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang can gyi snying la brdung// bskal pa mtha' yas mi ldang phyir// brjid pa'i stabs

dang sngags kyis 'chams// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ g+h+r-i h+Na g+h+r-ih+Na hUM/ g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn bid+ya rA dza nan/ zhes brjod la mnan no// khro bo zil gnon bro ste brgyad pa'o//// dbang
chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// mdzad pa phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bar cis kyang ma chod par sgrol ba gnas kyi smon lam 'di gsungs te/ hoH/ smon lam du gsol ba ni/ mi gnas ye
shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ dpal dur khrod kyi mnga' bdag/ he ru ka ma bdun phra men tshogs kyithugs dam bskang ba dang/ rgyu dug gsum gyi rtsa ba gcad nas/ 'bras bu ngan song gsum stongs par bgyi

ba'i/ rgyu nyon mongs pa'i sems can 'di dag la/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga lus la bkod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ldan te/ phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ sha khrag mang po mchod pa'i tshogs
su rol pas// zas kyi ro bde ba nyams su bstar bas 'byung ba chen po bzhi rigs kyi yum chen mo bzhir gyur cig/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid du bsgyur bas/ sku

gsung thugs yon tan phrin las mang po'i sgo nas/ cis kyang ma bsgribs par gyur cig/ khog pa ni rin po che gzhal yas khang du phul bas/ rin po che'i 'od zer sna bdun las gyur pa'i gzhal yas khang/ rgyan

sna tshogs mdzes pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par gyur cig/ nang khrol snod kyi dkyil 'khor du dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang gnas thun mong ma yin pa nas/ glo ba las kyi he ru ka la phul bas/ glo ma

bu thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las hUM dbugs kyi rang bzhin sgra chen po 'byung bas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi sgra bsgrags nas rnam smin dbang du 'du bar gyur cig/ mchin pa pad+ma he ru ka'i
tshogs su phul bas/ mchin gri dbang gi bla re sprin gyis khebs pas/ gti mug klu dbang ni dbang du bsdus/ mkhris pa chos nyid bdud rtsi phul ba la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char chen po 'babs par

gyur cig/ mkhal ma g.yas g.yon rdo rje rigs kyi pha lam/ rin po che'i rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs la phul bas/ rin po che'i rigs la phul bas ni dgos 'dod kyi re ba yid bzhin skong bar gyur cig/ rdo rje'i

rigs la phul bas dus gsum du 'gyur ba med de sra mkhregs rdo rje dang 'dra bar gyur cig/ rdzu 'phrul yang/ tsit+ta sdug bsngal gyi tshogs ye shes sems dpa' la phul bas/ chos nyid sgyu ma'i don ye shes sgyu mas

rtogs nas sprul pa sgyu ma'i sku mngon du phyung ste/ rnal 'byor pa mang pos 'gro ba'i don byed par gyur cig/ lhu bcu gnyis lha mo bcu gnyis kyi tshogs su phul bas/ skye mched bcu gnyis lha mo bcu gnyis su

gnas bsgyur te/ rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi gdan tshoms chen po mdzad par gyur cig/ rgyu ma shes rab kyi lam du phul bas// rgyu yi chos nyon mongs pa lnga dang dug gsum
las/ 'bras bu'i chos sku gsum ye shes lnga las/ gzhan du 'gyur 'ong med par nyid las nyid du sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ gnye ma thabs kyi dkyil 'khor du phul bas/ thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rje'i mdzad

phyogs kyis 'khor ba ni dbyings su zlum pas/ phyi dang nang gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs par gyur cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la/ mid pa chos mthar byed kyi sgo srung du phul bas/ chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri

bzhi stong/ nam du yang nub pa'i dus med par gyur cig/ sgro ba shes rab mthar byed kyi sgau srung du phul bas/ phyi nang gi gsang rgyud phun sum tshogs pa nam du yang nub pa'i dus med par gyur cig chu so

bgegs mthar byed kyi sgo srung du phul bas/ 'das pa dang da lta dang ma byon pa dang dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdung rgyud mtha' nam du yang mi 'chad par gyur cig/ tshil nag gshin rje mthar

byed sgo srung du phul bas/ gshin rje dang bcas pa'i ma mo mtshams 'dral ba'i 'byung po tshar bcad nas/ gzhal yas khang dus gsum du bkra shis par gyur cig/ mgo mngon par byang chub pa'i dkyil 'khor du
phul bas/ mig shes rab kyi sgron mas ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar gyur cig/ kha za byed kyi hom gyis rgyud drug gi rtsa ba gtor mar bzhes par gyur cig/ so las kyi khro bos dug gsum rtsad nas gcod par
gyur cig/ lce 'jig rten srid pa'i me dpung du phul bas/ 'khor ba'i bag chags bsreg pa'i gnyen por gyur cig/ sna sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'bud pa'i rlung du phul bas/ skyon gyi bag chags sel zhing 'thor
ba'i gnyen por gyur cig/ rna ba yon tan ma 'gags pa'i sgo mor phul bas/ gsung rab rgya mtsho chos nyid kyi sgra thos pas phrin las kyi rgya mtsho ji ltar bcol ba bzhin thos shing 'grub par gyur

cig/ lpags pa dbang gi bla re phul bas ye shes thibs su che ba'i khyad par las/ ba spu nyag re las kyang sprul pa lcam dral gyis 'jig rten yongs su 'khrigs pas/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du byed par gyur
cig/ srin lag g.yon pa gyen du bsgrengs pas ni/ bka' drin chen po ni zhar yang mi nub pa'i g.yung drung gi rgyal mtshan chen po ni btsugs/ gsang sngags phyogs bcur dar ba'i dbang gis bdud bzhi bsnyal
zhing mgo mnan pas/ chos kyi ru mtshon chen po phyar ba'i mthus/ 'khor ba'i g.yul so ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su bzlog/ dbal so rnon po ni dug gsum gyi dgra la btsugs pas/ phrin las
