rgyal thabs chen po brnyes te nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ngan song gsum ni stongs// sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu gsang sngags chos kyi dbu rmog ni btsan/ 'bras bu ye shes lha yi rgyal srid ni mtho bar gyur cig/ dgra lag
g.yas pa thur du bcag pas ni/ mu stegs lta ba sum brgya drug cu'i klad pa 'gems pa gsang ba'i gaN+Di yum gyi mkha' dbyings su brdungs pas nag po phyin ci log gi bstan pa ni bshig/ tshe la bar du gcod
pa'i bdud bzhi ni btul/ mtshan ma log par ston pa'i dgra bgegs mang po ni bri/ dus nye bar lhung ba'i ye 'drog mang po ni bzlog/ byur chag mang po kun nas sdang ba'i dgra bgegs mang po ni bcings nas/

bdag cag rdo rje che ge mo rnams ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dbang phyug chen po'i gral thob/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs par gyur cig de skad ces gsungs so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sgrol ba gnas
kyi smon lam gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// mdzad pa phrin las kyi le'u bzhis bstan pa'i tha ma mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u 'byung ste/ mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u la'ang rang bzhin gnas nas spyan 'dren
le'u dang/ bsti gnas bzhugs gsol gyi le'u dang/ bskur 'os phyag 'tshal gyi le'u dang/ mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u dang/ rtogs pas bdag bsgral le'u dang/ thugs rjes gzhan bsgral mchod pa'i le'u dang/

bcol pa'i phrin las kyi le'u dang/ phrin las kha skong phyag rgya'i le'u brgyad kyis bstan te/ de la dang por rang bzhin gnas nas spyan 'dren gyi le'u 'byung ste/ gong du bskyed pa'i dbu lnga'i gzhal yas khang du rdo
rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM/ dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// rnam par snang mdzad rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// dbang rnams rdzogs par mdzad pa'i don slad

du// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rigs lnga spyi yi phyag rgyas spyan 'dren no// gar gyi spyi gtsug rgyan du gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A+oM dzi na dzika lA ma dA+e Sha ra ti/ hUM badzra

d+h+r-ika mUM d+hA twI shwa ri/ swA rat+na d+h-ika mAM mo ha ra ti/ AM A ro lika byaM rA ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h-ika tAM badzra ra ti/ ka ma la mu ka/ ka ma la pa 'di/ ka ma la la se/ ka ma la la sha ka/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ snga ma

bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM/ dbang gi rgyal po khro bo rta mchog dpal// phrin las myur mgyogs gar yang thogs pa med// drag shul srin po 'dul

pa'i don slad du// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rta gdong zhal gyi phyag rgyas spyan 'dren na// dbang gi rta skad 'tsher zhing gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A+oM shrI pad+ma ba Da mu kha yo gI shwa ri ha

ya g+h+rI wa e h+ye hi hriM hriM/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM/ mkhyen rig ye shes mnga' ba 'phrul pa'i gnas// phra mo'i ting 'dzin khro bo dpal
gyi thugs// tshon gang gsal bar shar bas ma rig rmongs pa sel// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rig byed lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan 'dren no// shes rab sgron dang bcas nas gshegs

su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dz+nyA na sa twa hUM/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cig char skem pa'i

phyir// thabs ldan 'phrul gyi phyag mtshan sna tshogs kyis// 'gro drug gnas nas drang ba'i don slad du// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// lu gu rgyud kyi zhags pas spyan 'dren na// sdug bsngal phung

po 'joms phyir gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT/ ha ha ru lu hUM phaT sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor spyan

drang ba 'di skad do// hUM// mkha' ltar khyab pa'i thugs rje nyi ma'i sku// 'gro ba'i dpal bskyed 'phags lam 'gro ba'i dpal/ rmad byung phrin las sna tshogs skur bstan pa'i// khams gsum rnams rgyal dkyil

'khor ma lus kun// khyung chen gshog pa'i phyag rgyas spyan 'dren no// gdug pa'i klu tshogasa'adul phyir gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH// A+oM dz+wa la dz+wa la a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM// dz+wa la dz+wa la a mo g+ha sid+d+hi traM/ sa ma ya

ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// hUM mdzad khro bo zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM// srid pa ma lus dkyil 'khor rab byams 'dir// 'jig rten 'das pa dbang du
bsdu ba'i phyir// zil gnon drag po 'dul ba'i don slad du// hUM mdzad zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// brkyang bskum phur pa'i phyag rgyas spyan 'dren na// gnon mdzad stobs kyi rgyal por

gshegs su gsol// A+oM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ nA sha ya s+t+waM b+ha ni/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ gsang mchog thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad

do// hUM// shes rab sems ma yum gyi gzhal yas 'dir// rang byung ye shes thugs kyi sa bon rgyu// rdo rje che mchog bskul ba'i don slad du// gsang mchog yum gyi b+ha ga ma lus kun// dam tshig sbyong ba'i phyag

rgyas spyan 'dren na// bde mchog dbyings la rol cing gshegs su gsol// A+oM dzaHhUM baM hoH// dz+nyA na sid+d+hi/ A+oM rA ga sid+d+hi A+oM// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ gong du bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du// yon tan lhun gyis

grub pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba 'di skad do// hUM// chags pa'i skyon bral pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ yon tan lhun gyis grub pa gar gyi dbang phyug sku// log par lta ba gtan du rgyun gcad phyir// lhun gyis grub

pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// glu bro gar gyi phyag rgyas spyan 'dren na// tshogs chen 'dun sar 'dus shing gshegs su gsol// A+oM dzaHhUM baM hoH// pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ha na ta ka pa tsa hUM hUM

phaT/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+wam/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje tshig drug pas rang bzhin gnas nas spyan 'dren gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// da ni spyan drangs pa'i dkyil 'khor der
bzhugs su gsol te 'di skad do// rin chen pho brang klad pa'i gzhal yas su// 'od zer mang po'i gdan khri bshams pa la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs
su gsol// gdul bya drag po thod rus gzhal yas su// ti ra gsar rnying gdan khri bshams pa la// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// rngom brjid bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// skye
med tsit+ta thugs kyi gzhal yas su// dri med zla gsal gdan khri bshams pa la// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// za byed dur khrod phyag gi
gzhal yas su// mos pa 'thad pa'i gdan khri bshams pa la// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// dgyes pa rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi gzhal yas su// sbrul

nag spungs pa'i gdan khri bshams pa la// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// khyung chen rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// khro bo chen po thugs kyi gzhal yas su// sha khrag rlon pa'i
gdan khri bshams pa la// hUM mdzad zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// zil gnon bgrad pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// gzi ldan pad+ma thugs kyi gzhal yas su// longs spyod dgyes
pa'i gdan mchog bshams pa la// gsang mchog thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// ye shes lha yi pho brang gzhal yas su// nyi zla 'od kyi gdan mchog

bshams pa la// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// yon tan rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs su gsol// A+oM tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya hUM/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje'i tshig bzhi pas bsti
gnas bzhugs gsol gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de ltar bzhugs su gsol ba nas dkyil 'khor la phyag bya ba 'di skad do// srid gsum 'joms mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i lha// rnam par snang
mdzad rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// spyi gtsug rgyal ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// dbang drag 'joms byed srin po 'dul ba'i lha// rta mgo ljang gu 'khor
dang bcas pa la// brkyang bskum srin po'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// thig le chen po klong gi dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa
la// mi g.yo bsam gtan tshul gyis phyag bgyi na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// ta kr-ita bcu drug thabs kyi brgyud pa'i tshogs// sprul pa'i phra men phyag mtshan 'khor bcas la// ma mo
'dzum pa'i tshul gyis phyag bgyi na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// gti mug gsum sel 'jig rten sgron ma'i lha// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la// klu 'brug 'bros pa'i

tshul gyis phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// khams gsum dbang sdud khro bo non pa'i lha// hUM mdzad zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus la// drang srong tsog pu'i tshul gyis phyag
'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// bde ba chen po byang chub sems kyi gnas// gzi ldan pad+ma 'khor dang bcas pa la// ma mo mdangs byi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje
mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sku// pad+ma dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug la// thal sbyar mi yi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la
dgongs su gsol// a la la ho// a ti pu ho// pra tIts+tsha ho// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje tshig bzhi pas bkur 'os phyag 'tshal le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// da ni mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u
'byung ste/ mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ snang srid kyi mchod pa dang/ glu bro gar gyi mchod pa dang/ rang byung bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dang/ dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa dang
bzhi'o// de la dang por snang srid kyi mchod pa 'byung ste 'di skad do// hUM bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gtso// bde bar gshegs so A ra li// rgyal ba rgyal mtsho ye

shes kyis// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' dag kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// A+oM ma hA shU n+ya tA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gnyis pa glu bro gar gyi mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// hUM/ lha yi lha mo glu bro gar gyi
tshogs// dga' ldan longs spyod bsod nams grub pa'i rtags// mthun par snang ba'i longs spyod la// mdzes par 'gyur ba'i gar dang tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu// mi gnas rol pa'i bro dang thugs dam bskul

ba'i tshig/ sprul pa mchog gi rkyen du 'tshams pa'i phyir// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'bul lags na// kun tu bzang po'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gsum

pa rang byung bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ rgyud las/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha la// bdud rtsi lnga dang dza gad bcas// raM yaM khaM gi yig 'bru yis// mtshan nyid med par stong byas nas// bdag nyid chen

po'i thugs ka nas// yig 'bru bcu yi 'od 'phros pas// mtshan nyid med pa'i stong pa las// A+oM las dbang chen yab yum sku// hu lu gong ma ta kr-ita bcu drug la// hu lu 'og ma phra men bcu drug sku// hUM las

kham rgya dmus long sku// phaT las khyi spyang sgo srung sku// e las yum gyi b+ha gar gyur// As ni ma skyes mnyam pa nyid// ra lis gsang ba'i rdo rje las// yig 'bru bcu bzhi'i rang bzhin ni// rin chen phreng ba
brgyus pa'am// mgal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// hrIHyis thams cad dbang du bsdu// dzaHyis yab yum thugs dam bskul// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dus

gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i rdzas// de phyir rang byung bdud rtsir bsngags// zhes bya ste/ rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// rin chen pho brang klad pa'i gzhal yas na// rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen mtha'
las grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// thod rus me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// rta
mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs dngos grub stsal du gsol// dri med zla gsal 'od kyi dkyil 'khor na// ye shes sems dpa'i
dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// mkhyen rig gsal ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// za byed dur khrod phyag gi gzhal yas na// rta mgrin ma mo phra men ma

lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dur khrod brgyad kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje rin chen sbrul nag gshog pa dang// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// dug lnga sman

du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// khyung chen rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// khro bo chen po thugs kyi gzhal yas na// hUM mdzad zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa
'bul// zil gnon drag po'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// gzi ldan pad+ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor na// gsang mchog thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// skye 'chi

med pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes lha yi pho brang gzhal yas na// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dug lnga sman du bsgyur ba'i mchod pa 'bul// 'du 'bral med pa'i dngos grub stsal du
gsol// zur gsum logs gsum gdan steng na// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// thod skam 'bar ba'i bar khyams la// long

ba rgyab sbrel brgyad rnams dang// sprul sku dmus long drug cu la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// me ri smug po'i bar khyams na// ye shes dpal gyi khyi spyang

la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi sgo bzhi na// sgo ba chen mo bzhi rnams dang// me 'brug rlung 'brug la sogs la// dam tshig mchog gi
mchod pa 'bul// bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// bzhis bstan pa'i tha ma dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// yab yum gnyis med dgyes par sbyor ba'i rdzas// dbang po
dbyer med bde ba chen po'i ngang// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dam pa 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// blang dor med pa'i ngang du bzhes su gsol// srid pa'i gcong snying zad par bya

ba'i phyir// khams gsum nad pa gso ba'i gnyen po'i rdzas// bdud rtsi chen po pany+tsa a mr-i ta// bla med sman pa'i tshogs la 'bul lags na// 'gro ba'i rims nad gcad phyir bzhes su gsol// nyon mongs ma

rig las kyi 'khrul pa'i dug/ 'jig rten skye shi rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba'i dam rdzas 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyi 'bul lags na// blang dor med pa'i ngang gis bzhes su
gsol// yid la gdung ba'i rig pa 'phreng ba'i phyir// yab yum thabs dang shes rab ye 'brel yang// zla gam 'du 'bral med pa'i mchod pa 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags

na// blang dor med pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// rang rgyud bshig pa'i phung po rdos pa can// bdag med rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba'i tshe// zhing chen rdzas kyi mchod pa dam pa 'di// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis

'bul lags na// blang dor med pa'i ngang du bzhes su gsol// A+oM ru ru pa ti ma hA su kha sid+d+hi a la la ho// ma hA yo gi ni kha raM/ ma hA ta ki ni kha raM/ kha kha le le hrIHb+h+yo/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi khA hi// dbang chen
bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mnyes pa mchod pa lngas mchod pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// da ni rtogs pas bdag bsgral gyi mchod pa 'byung ste 'di skad do// hUM/ khams gsum rgyu drug bsgral ba'i don

slad du// sngon gyi rgyal bas thugs dam bzhes pa ni// log rtog 'khrul pa'i zhen pa bzlog pa dang// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i 'dam nas dbyung ba'i phyir// rtogs pas bdag bsgral bsam dang ldan pa yis// thugs
rje chen pos bzung nas gzhan bsgral rnams// snying po byang chub sems su dgod pa'i phyir// rab 'byams srid pa'i 'jig rten ma lus kun// skad cig cha la ting 'dzin gyis// shes rab zab mo yum gyi mkha'

dbyings su// sngags dang phyag rgya'i smon lam mthu stobs kyis// rgyal ba'i sras su 'bras bu grub par bsngo// sha khrag drod dang dbyug kyi tshogs la sogs// sa chu me rlung 'byu ba chen po bzhi// shes rab yum gyi
pad+mar rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes bya byed rnams// phung po lnga yi 'khor dang bcas pa
rnams// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i thugs su rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ khams dang skye mched 'du byed mang po
rnams// rta mchog 'bar ba'i tshogs su rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ kun gzhi yid dang nyon mongs sgo lnga'i
'khor// rnam par shes pa 'khor dang bcas pa 'di// mkhyen rab ye shes tshogs su rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ mig

dang rna ba sna dang lce yi tshogs// dbang po lnga yi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di// sprul pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs su rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam
bskang gyur cig/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro reg chos// 'dod pa lnga yi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di// rdo rje gshog pa'i tshogs su rab bstims pas// dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi
'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog che// nyon mongs lnga yi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i tshogs su rab bstims
pas// dgyes par rol pas dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ gzugs kyi khog stong dur khrod gzhal yas su// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par rab sprul nas// rgyal
ba yab yum sras dang bcas pa 'di// bzhugs gnas dam par dmigs te 'bul lags na// pho brang bla med thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ nang khrol glo snying mkhal ma mchin pa dang// rgyu long la sogs snod
dang bcas pa 'dis// dur khrod 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bsngo// thabs la mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// sgo skyong 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ lpags chen g.yang gzhi sdug

bsngal gsob kyi tshogs// khro rgyal gang gi na bzar rab sprul nas// bkra shis chen por byin gyis brlabs nas ni// glang chen ko rlon brjid du che ba dang// stag chen sham thabs dpa' bar ldan pa dang// zhing
lpags rlon pa thabs la mkhas pa yi// na bza' rgyan gyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ a la la ho// a ti pu ho// pra ti pu ho// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rtogs pas bdag bsgral gyi le'u ste nyer
gnyis pa'o//// da ni thugs rje chen pos khams gsum yongs bsgral gyi mchod pa dbul ba 'byung ste 'di skad do// hUM/ khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i sha khrag la// gtum chen me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal
yas su// gdug pa'i 'khor dang phra men srin mo'i tshogs// gcan gzan dom dred wa spyang mang po 'byung/ za byed mche ba ngar mas dkar dang dmar la rol// nang cha don snying thod khrag dbang po'i
tshogs// 'jig rten srid pa'i don snying sngon gyi lugs bzhin 'bul// mi mjed stong gi gnas mchog dam pa ru// tshangs pa khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen spyan gyi thugs dam bskang gyur
cig/ dga' byed bsten pas myos pa'i 'jig rten na// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang dbang bsgyur gtso// brgya byin khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen zhal gyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ gzhan

'phrul dbang byed bsod nams grub pa'i mthus// bdud kyi rgyal po khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen mche ba'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ blta ba log par rtogs pa'i mu stegs lha// ma hA de ba
khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen shangs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'jig rten dug gsum dbang gis myos pa'i lha// zhe sdang srin po khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// rta mgo

ljang gu'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ dus ngan las kyi mnar ba'i 'khor ba'i lha// nyi zla gza' skar khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen snyan yi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ rnam smin zhe sdang brdar

ba'i 'chi bdag lha// gshin rje khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal chen phyag gi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'jig rten las kyi grub pa'i mthu bo che// klu chen khyo shug bsgral ba'i phung po yis// dpal

chen gshog pa'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ dur khrod gsang ba'i longs spyod ci 'dra ba// ti ra gsar rnying zhing chung tshogs la sogs// keM rus gnas su gyur pa'i ri rab kyis// dpal chen zhabs kyi thugs

dam bskang gyur cig/ nyon mongs lnga dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga// sdug bsngal nad dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi// 'dod chags rkyen dang bcas pa'i dbang po lnga// sku lnga chos lnga dbyer med ye shes lnga// kun tu
bzang mo mkha' dbyings bde ba la// mnyam nyid don gyis dbyings nas bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi bde ba mchog skyed cig/ oM AHhUM/ dgyes pa chen po dam tshig mchog la rol cig sa ma ya/

bzhad pa'i gad mos 'brug stong sgrogs shig ha ha he// ha ha he/ gnod pa'i 'byung po za byed tshogs su bstab po ma tang kha ma tang kha// sdang ba'i dgra bgegs tshul bzhin drongs shig ka ruk+sha ka ruk+sha// dbyings kyi

bde ba 'bul lo mal lu phe khA hi// kun rdzob cho 'phrul bskyed cig ha le hu le khA hi// shes rab thabs su rol cig ma tse me tsa khA hi// yab yum zung du 'khril te rak+ta rug ti khA hi// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor

bskyed cig kro ta sham b+ha ri// thugs dam chen po skongs shig a la la ho// dngos grub dbyig mchog stsol cig/ bsam pa rgya mtsho sgrubs shig/ bdud dpung chen po chom zhig/ dgra dpung chen po chom zhig/ a
la la ho// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ thugs rjes khams gsum yongs sgrol gyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// da ni mnyes pa'i mchod pa'i le'u las spyi don bdun pa/ bcol pa phrin las kyi le'u

'byung ste 'di skad do// dus mtha'i bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// za byed khrag 'thung le brgan 'bar ba'i sku// dbang gi rta gdong phrin las ljang gu ni// 'od kyi gzi byin nam mkha'i mdangs su
che// spyan gyis gzigs thabs phrin las rnam bzhi ni// sdang mig log pa'i spyan dmar bzlog pa ni// nga med bdag tu lta ba'i khro bo kun// phyogs med zil gyis mnan par thugs dam bskul// zur mig 'phreng
kyi gzigs thabs bstan pa ni// gsang ba yum gyi tshogs chen ma lus kun// gdung pa'i tshul gyis sku la 'khril ba dang// zla gam 'od kyi 'phro 'du 'bul ba dang// b+ha ga'i gnas su ling+ga bsten
pa'i phyir// thogs med zil gyis mnan par thugs dam bskul// ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i gzigs thabs kyis// log 'dren gtan du 'khyams pa'i yi dwags dang// gti mug yun du rmongs pa'i byol song
gnyis// sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'i dmyal ba gsum// thar lam yang dag gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir// 'khor ba g.yul bzlog phrin las thugs dam bskul/ dgyes mdangs zhi ba'i gzi mdangs
bstan pas ni// srid pa rab byams 'jig rten ma lus kun// phyogs med dbyings kyis zil gyis mnan pa dang// zhe sdang khro gtum gzhil bar thugs dam bskul// snyan gyi khro rgyal dung gi khong gseng
nas// gsan pa ma 'gags chos nyid sgra dbyangs kyis// nyon mongs sgra rnams dbyings su dbang bsgyur zhing// dmigs pa ma chad sna tshogs sgra la sogs// sgra mtha' ji bzhin go bar thugs dam

bskul// gzhan gyi snyan dang thun mong ma lags te// ye shes snyan gyis 'bod sgrogs mang po gson// thugs rje'i snyan gyis nyam thag sgra la gson// thabs kyi dbyangs la bskul ba'i dbyangs la gson// phyi
nang gsang ba'i snyan gsum rdzogs pa yis// ji skad bskul bar gsan pa'i thugs dam bskul// shangs ni khro rgyal 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// dug lnga gsod pa'i mtshon lnga ye shes sku// khams gsum bsgral

ba'i phrin las bcol ba ni// AM/ 'dod chags dbang bsgyur dri med pad+ma'i sku// chags pa'i skyon rnams sbyang bar thugs dam bskul// hUM/ zhe sdang dbang bsgyur skye med rdo rje'i sku// sdug bsngal phung po bshig
par thugs dam bskul// A+oM// gti mug dbang bsgyur ye shes 'khor lo'i sku// ma rig rmongs pa bsal bar thugs dam bskul// swA/ nga rgyal dbang bsgyur yid bzhin rin chen sku// dregs pa'i rgyal po bshig

par thugs dam bskul// hA// phrag dog dbang bsgyur bde chen gar gyi sku// skye 'chi rtsad nas gcod par thugs dam bskul// zhal ni khro rgyal 'bar ba'i klong rum na// hom lngar 'brel pa'i sbyin bsreg chen po
mdzad// za byed khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// dug gsum bza' ba'i mgron du spyan 'dren no// rgyu drug gtor mar bzhes pa'i thugs dam bskul// pad+ma le brgan cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags// zla gam

'phro 'du dbyings su 'gyur ba'i gsung// dri med rgyal ba'i gsung rab bdud rtsi'i char// bde chen chu bo'i rgyun ltar spro bar thugs dam bskul// thugs ni khro rgyal phra bar bsgom pa'i lha// phra mo'i ting 'dzin ye
shes he ru ka/ rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed skur sprul zhing// chos nyid dbyings kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten na// ma rig rmongs pas ldongs pa'i skye 'gro dang// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa'i sgrub

pa po// thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor ba'i rgyu// gzung 'dzin skyon gyi bag chags ma lus kun// gtan nas sbyang bar thugs dam chen po bskul// sku ni khro rgyal rngom brjid bsgyings pa'i lha// thod sbrul me
ltar 'bar ba'i hUM sgra can// zhag chen thig le dmar chen tshom bus brgyan// sprul pa rgya mtsho 'khrigs pa'i sprin tshogs la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gnyid kyis rmongs pa rnams// gdug pa ma lus 'dul
bar thugs dam bskul// phrin las rgyan gyi thugs dam bskul ba ni// thugs dam dbang gi log 'dren 'dul ba'i phyir// dbu rgyan tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i phrin las
'grub par mdzod// rta mchog tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// srin po 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ye shes tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// thabs la mkhas pa gsang ba'i thugs dam
'grub par mdzod// phyag mtshan tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// dur khrod gzhom pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gshog pa'i tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// klu chen 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub
par mdzod// zhabs kyi tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// gzir gnon bgrad pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gzi ldan tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// tshe gnas gsang ba'i phrin las 'grub par

mdzod// dpal chen tshogs la thugs dam bskul ba ni// lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// A+oM ye shes lnga las sprul cig a la la// g+hu h+ya gsang ba'i tshig tu sdus shig a la la// swa sti grub

pa mang po tshogs la rol cig a la la// yo gi nI rnal 'byor mang po'i tshogs su sdus shig a la la// hrIM hrIM sngon gyi 'bod pa'i brda skad lags pa a la la// b+h+yo b+h+yo phrin las bcol ba brda skad mang po a la

la// kha kha kha le le b+h+yo zhal du bstab pa lags pa dz+nyA na sid+d+hi b+h+yo/ gnyis su med par sbyor cig sta na sid+d+hi b+h+yo/ skye 'chi med par sgrol cig yak+sha sid+d+hi b+h+yo/ srin po ma lus sgrol cig yak+sha sid+d+hi b+h+yo/ gnod sbyin ma lus
sgrol cig/ thugs dam bskongs shig/ dngos grub stsol cig/ a la la ho// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bcol ba phrin las kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// ye shes chos nyid mnyam
pa la// bya ba byed par mi dmigs kyang// sku gsum phyag rgyar brtag pa'i phyir// phrin las phyag rgya le'u 'di gsungs so// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la// yab lnga'i dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod// lag pa
g.yon pa'i sor mo la// yum lnga'i dpa' mo 'bru lnga dgod// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// g.yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur nang// g.yas kyi mdzub mo bcug nas

ni// snying gar bzhag ste bsgom pa ni// rnam snang dpal gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i thal mo snying gar brkyang// g.yon gyi thal mo sa la gtugs// mi 'khrugs pa yis phyag rgya'o// g.yas kyi thal mo snying gar

brkyang// g.yon gyi thal mo bkan nas brkyang// sbyin pa'i tshul du ston pa ni// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas kyis g.yon mnan nas// snying gar bzhag ste bsgom pa ni// 'od dpag med pa'i

phyag rgya'o// g.yon gyi thal mo snying gar brkyang// g.yas pas skyob pa ltar byed pa// gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las// gung mo mthe'u chung rtse sbyar nas// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu

ltar bkug ste// mthe bong phral nas bsgreng ba ni// rta gdong zhal gyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu ltar bkug nas// bskul zhing 'dren pa ltar byed pa// rig byed

lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rgyab sbyar srin lag bsgreng// mthe bong gung mo so sor sbyar// lu gu rgyud gyi zhags pa'o// lag gnyis mthe bong sbrel ba las// lhag ma lo ma ltar brkyangs te// sta zur

g.yas g.yon brkyang ba ni// khyung chen gshog pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis the bong sbrel nas ni// g.yas kyi sor mo bskum byas nas// g.yon pa brkyang ste thur du btsug/ brkyang bskum phur pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag

pa g.yas g.yon thal mo sbyar// rtse bsnol gdugs phub ltar byas la// dam tshig sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gar bsgyur zhing// kha nas sngags dang tshig zlos pa// glu bro gar gyi phyag rgya'o// lag

pa g.yas pa'i sor mo brkyang// g.yon gyi sor mo phyed sleb sbyar// spyi bor bzhag ste phyags byas pa// spyi gtsug rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas bskul g.yon brkyang nas// lag pa thal sbyar phyag byas

pa// brkyang bskum srin po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon snying gar bsnol// mig gnyis btsums nas phyag byas pa// mi g.yo bsam gtan phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i thal mo snying gar sbyar// g.yon gyi thal

mo smin phrag bsgreng// ma mo 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya'o// gzhogs g.yas sa la bsnyes nas ni// lag gnyis sa la rdebs pa ni// klu 'brug 'bros pa'i phyag rgya'o// rkang gnyis long bu sbyar nas ni// lag gnyis thal

sbyar tsog tsog 'dug/ drang srong tsog bu'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo la// mdangs chen phyung nas lta ba ni// lha mo mdangs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa thal sbyar lus btud nas// gus pa'i sems kyis

bskor ba ni// thal sbyar mi yi phyag rgya'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mnyes pa mchod pa'i le'u la brgyad kyis bstan pa'i tha ma phrin las kha skong phyag rgya'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga
pa'o//// bsgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u rnams las/ kun rdzob cho 'phrul cir bstan yang// skye med dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir// gsang ba mya ngan 'das pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// khams gsum dbang

du sdud pa'i gzhal yas khang// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam cho 'phrul cir yang ston// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// 'gyur med 'jigs spangs seng ge'i

khri gcal ni// dbang phyug mngar bsdus cho 'phrul cir ston yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri rkang bzhi snang bas// rigs

bzhi khrag 'thung cho 'phrul bzhir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// pad+ma le brgan kha dog 'bar ba las// kun tu bzang mo'i cho 'phrul cir ston

yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sprul sku nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba las// thabs dang shes rab cho 'phrul cir yang ston// skye med byang
chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rang sems yi ge hUM gi byin rlabs las// rdo rje'i sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos

phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul chen po las// gar dbang lha yi cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum kyi b+ha gar mya ngan

'das// brjid pa'i dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor las// rdo rje dbyings kyi cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// srin po 'dul

byed rta mgo ljang gu ni// rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gsang ba thugs kyi dpal be'u'i sgrom bu

nas// ye shes sems pa'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum yi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// za byed dur khrod phyag gi gzhal yas nas// ta kr-ita phra men cho

'phrul cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rdzu 'phrul chen po gshog pa'i gzhal yas nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal cho 'phrul cir snang
yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gnon mdzad yongs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las// 'jigs byed khro bo'i cho 'phrul cir snang

yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sku rgyan dpal gyi chas su bstan pa dang// thugs gter gsang yum sku la 'khril ba gnyis// bka' sdod pho nya'i

tshogs su bstan pa gsum// gdul bya'i bye brag so sor cir snang yang// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba mya
ngan 'das pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor pas// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// ro bsregs thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsdus te gsung ba'i

sgrub thabs 'di// phun sum tshogs pa lngar ldan zhing// yid du 'ong bas dam pa btsal// dang po sa blangs byin gyis brlabs// brtags pa'i gnas su ma d+hal bya// 'dom gang gru bzhir khyud kor bcas// steng

du rak+ta'i go ma ye// chags pa'i dam tshig sngags kyis byug/ de nas mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// khrus byas dar ldan rgyan gyis bklub// dur khrod bka' dang mthun pa yis// gsang ba'i thig skud bkal nas

kyang// spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur nas// chags pa chen por mchod pa'i sngags// lan gsum bzlas te gzi ldan du// gyur par dmigs te dgye bar bya// zla gam kha sprod zlum po la'i// dkyil du he zhal gru
gsum la// gru gang kha bskor 'phang du brtsig/ sa bon mgar ba'i so dog gam// yang na snum chen bsreg pa'i sa// nag po sa las he zhal bri// mu la rak+ta zla gam du// 'od phung mtha' skor yug rnams
bsngags// dmar po yon tan dbang du sdud// de yi dbus su bsags pa'i rdzas// dmar po dpal dang ldan pa'i shing// bshul la sogs pa'i snum po brdo// he yi dbus su yongs pas bshams// de yi 'gram

mam steng dag tu// thod pa rnam gnyis hUM dang ldan// 'phro 'du dmigs pa'i rten du gzhag/ mtha' skor me ri dmar po la// phur ba dang ni rdzas rnam bkram// me sngags btab ste gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i

gzungs thag dmar pos bcings// zla gam steng du longs spyod bkram// de nas thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// bam gyi ro yi sa phyogs su// ma mo gom pa drug cu yis// rdo rje'i 'gros su song nas kyang// rdo rje'i
dpung gi sa phyogs su// bcu drug rol pa'i pho nya dgye// bkra shis chen po'i rta bros bskor// phyung nas shul du dmigs pa yang// khro bo rdzas las dmigs gnas gdag/ byang shar mtshams su bshig pa
yang// lu gu rgyud kyi bris bskor te// dur khrod las bdag spyan drangs te// bshigs nas mngon spyod rol bar bsgom// snying ni dran pa'i rten yin pas// he yi steng du gzhag par bya// b+han+d+ha dbang

po lnga yi rten// phral nas zla gam dbus su gzhag/ gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha mo lnga// steng du dbang po lnga yang gzhag/ re khA ya ni nar grol te// rkang lag sgo bzhi rnams su'o// thod skam bar khyams sgal tshigs

te// me ri la ni rgyu phreng ngo// shun gyi g.yab dang rlung gi phyogs// sna tshogs yam shing brdzangs nas gzhag/ de nas bral ba'i sa bon mchog/ de yis 'phrad bu 'brug rus dang// byi la ban glang rnga mo

dang// mkha' lding la sogs 'bras bu lnga'i// gsang dang gnyid la sogs pa yang// mar la sogs pas byugs las stsal// mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad do// pu tsa me/ de yi

'og tu me yi lha// rgyal po bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin// snying po bzlas te g.yogs nas bsdam// bsnyen pa nyi khri bton nas kyang// mchod cing bsnyen pa'i las bya'o// ting 'dzin mchod pas tshim byas nas// de
nas rdzas kyi mchod pas mchod// mtshan gsum dpe yis shes rab kyis// tsit+ta blangs te rus par bcas// phul nas rnam dag dbyings su bstan// mtshan dang rus pa de bzhin te// rna ba rus pa mig dang

lce// sna dang khrag la sogs pa yis// sha dang rkang dang de bzhin te// tshil dang skra la sogs pa dbul// de nas ba su ta yi rdzas// mtshan dang ldan pa blangs te dbul// pho nya mchod pa'i sbyin sreg ste// gtun

khur chen mo snga ma bzhin// de nas bgegs chen 'dul ba'i phyir// rtsed 'jo'i bro yang 'di skad do// ha na ha na pa tsa hUM phaT/ mchog la sogs pa'i shel tshogs ldan// gang yang rung pa bsgral ba'i phyir// snying la

rtsed 'jo thabs kyi bro// lu gu rgyud kyi 'di skad do// aM ku sha dzaH/ de nas dbang po lnga rnams la// rtsed 'jo'i tshul gyis gar byed cing// brjid pa'i stabs kyis 'di ltar ro// s+pho Ta baM/ pA sha hUM/ g+haN+De hoH/ de

dag zhing bcu bsgral ba'i tshig/ dkyil 'khor de yi don yang bshad// 'dom gang gru bzhi khru tshad tsam// zla gam kha yod gsang ba'i mkha'// zlum po spros pa med pa'i don// he ni dbyings phyug gzi ldan
dbyings// yam shing byang chub sems kyi gsung// me ni gnyis med sprul pa yin// dam rdzas lha tshogs mang por bkram// de nas rus pa'i yon tan bshad// 'bras bu lnga ni rigs lnga 'grub// rus sbal glang

chen zil gyis gnon// 'brug ni mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// byi la phra men dngos grub 'du// ban glang stobs kyis bgegs chen 'dul// rnga mo srin po'i rgyal po'i mthu yang phrog/ 'dab chags pho nya mang po'i
mchog/ ming rus sbal ba'i dus su yang// de nas bsreg par bya ba ni// rA ga pU tsa ya t+ya hUM dzaHdzaH// mtshon spyin bsreg pa'i las rnams bya'o// de nas thugs dam gzhung bzhin bskul// 'di yi
dus su dgongs pa yang// pu tra can gyi snod nang du// rus pa btegs pa'i phye ma blugs// dmigs pa gsum las 'byung ba bzhin// nang du blugs te btul la gzhag/ de nas rdo rje lcam dral gyis// bskor te
dbyangs blangs dbus su gzhag/ de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yang// rdo rje go tshags gzhung bzhin spel// phrin las bcol ba snga ma bzhin// yab yum gnyis su med par sbyangs pa las// sems kyi kha dog

dkar po yi ge hrIH// mkha' mnyam spros shing slar yang bsdu// dngos med stong par gyur par dmigs// lha mo glog 'gyu ma dang rol pa las// byang chub sems ni A yu dmar por spro// rus pa mtshan med 'dra ba
bzhin// dra ba mo dang gnyis med rol pa las// byang chub sems ni gnyis med stongs khams gang// bskul zhing don byas 'bar ba 'phro la dmigs// a mo de bas gnyis med mnyes gyur nas// sems kyi kha
dog dmar dkar bsnol ba yang// skar tshogs lta bus rab tu 'khris pas bsgrub// gsungs pas tshim ltar btso ma'i kha dog bzhin// sder mo can gyis dgyes par byang chub sems// rin chen zhun ma lta bu'i sku

sbyangs nas// dngos med byang chub sems su zhu ba las// bde ba'i dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// bsgrub pa de byi mtshan yod pa'i// rA ga pU tsa zhes brjod cing// thal chen 'od du zhu bar dmigs// yaM las rlung
gis btegs nas kyang// gzi ldan gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// rang bzhin med pa'i chos skur gsal// mthar phyin mnyes shing 'gro rgyud sbyang// de yang mi g.yo dbyings su thim// de nas gsang ba'i mdud pa
dgrol// snum la 'phel gyur grub pa'i rdzas// nyung na spangs shing ting 'dzin bskyar// grub na dngos la mtshan mas gdag/ mtshan ldan lag mthil a bsam ste// bros bskor dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// de

nas dngos grub go skabs dbye// sa ma ya pad+ma d+ha ra pU tsa me/ dang por de byi gdab par bya/ de nas gtso dang rim pa bzhin// chad na bar chad chen po 'byung// lhag na rim pa bzhin du dgod// rdo rje slob dpon

yab yum dang// mched kyang dgongs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// de nas lus la rtags bcangs na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// lus kyang dar la bab bcing sra// longs spyod ldan zhing bde skyid 'byung// de
nas lhag ma'i gtor ma btang// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol// yal bar mi gtong ma mo'i rten// glu dang dbyangs dang rnga la sogs// rtse 'jo mang po lugs bzhin bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan
dra las/ thal chen bsgrub pa'i le'u+i ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// log rtog dngos po gzhom pa dang// cho 'phrul mngon du bstan pa'i

phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// bskal pa'i thog thog gsang ba'i le'u// dgongs pa'i rgyu dang mthun par gsungs// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin hUM dmar gsal// de yi
skad cig ting 'dzin las// kha dog lnga yi 'bru bsgoms la// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// kha dog gsum po'i 'bru nyid las// bdag po'i rkyen dang 'tshams pa'i gnas// thug pa med pa'i gzhal

yas khang// chos kyi sku dang mnyam par bskyed// de yi nang du dmigs pa yang// cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i gsung// de las zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// brgyud pas pad+ma he ru ka/ sku bskyed snying po 'di nyid do// pad+ma ma

hA shrI he ru ka/ ha ha hUM dzaH// sa bon sngags kyis gsal bar bsgyur// hUM/ hrIH/ phaT/ A+oM/ A/ hi/ ma/ dzaHdza/ ru lu/ dzas/ g+hu sha ba ga pra be sha/ badzra badzra/ yak+sha badzra hUM b+h+yo/ badzra hUM/ a ra li/ a hi sha dza kra tri/

dIp+da tsakra/ sku bskyed gsal bar gyur pa na// log rtog gzhom phyir 'di gsungs so// thog thog 'bar ba dbab pa'i phyir// hUM// dbang chen rgyal po rdo rje thog thog 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor

ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje'i mtshon me gnam lcags tho lum 'dra// gsang sngags log par lta ba rab tu 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang

pha rol gnyis su yang// gdug pa sel cing dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ma hA tsan+d+ha sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// log rtog dngos po bsgral nas kyang// rab tu rngam pa'i tshig gis bsdang// skrag

cing dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen rnams// thog thog dpal gyis myos gyur te// sems ni bla med gnas su yang// tsakra zhes pa'i sngags dag gis// dbang gi skur bskyed tshangs pa'i

mche ba gtsigs// shangs kyi sgrom nas thog thog 'bebs// A+oM 'khor los lus kyi rnam rtog bcom// AM gis ngag gi nyes pa sbyang// hUM gis sems kyi gzung 'dzin spang// swA yis nga rgyal ri bo bshig/ hA yis

phrag dog gnas su dag/ khams gsum ma lus rgyu drug kun// ye shes mtshon cha thog thog gis// sgrol bar ma gyur gcig kyang med// nan tan thugs rjes 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyi// 'khor ba dong sprug chen po

mdzad// mngon spyod ya mtshan chen po yi// mchog dang tsar+ya 'byor tshogs la// nan tan gyis ni pra be sha/ hUM gis rgyal sras gzhon nu'o// g.yung drung lta bu'i sku yang thob// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings su

de// de nas phung po bshig byas te// lhag ma brgyad la bro brgyad brdung// mgo la lang ka gnon pa'i bro// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i khro bo che// rnam shes ta kr-ita chas brgyad bro// phung po khams dang skye mched

la// zhabs kyi dpal gyi chas brgyad bro// yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed bzhi yi bro// nang khrol ngan song rnams kyi bro// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro// sla bzhi khro bo zil gnon bro// A+oM nA sha ya stam b+ha ya

nan/ yak+sha sum+b+ha ni gan d+ha ri ri sha hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM/ kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni hUM/ rdzogs dang mthar phyin las kyang bya// thog thog mngon par btang ba ni// rdo rje ngur mo'i ting nge

'dzin// gsal nas sngags 'di bzlas par bya// ma hA tsan+da sarba duSh+tan ha na ta ka pa tsa hUM phaT/ dz+wa la raM raM dz+wa la raM/ rak+sha rak+sha hUM raM/ ma hA ru lu sha/ e h+ye hi hUM b+ha ga bA na/ gser la btab ste gtor bar bya// de
yi tshig kyang rab tu brjod// zas su sha chen drang bar bya// las 'di nges par bsgrub par bya// mkha' lding rdzas la dbang btsugs te// chu mig lkugs pa'i klu la gtad// thog thog 'bebs shing dgra bo
'chi// nges 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ rdo rje thog 'bebs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// 'byung po dgra
bgegs tshar gcad phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// pho nya mngag pa'i las 'di gsungs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// las dang thugs las sprul pa yis// ye shes gsang bar bsdus pa

las// 'di rnams dpe kha cig tu go ma la yang snang// rdo rje thugs kyi go la ma// rdo rje khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la byas pa'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las
mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug nas// rdo rje sku yi go la ma// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol

ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i ljags las kyang// rdo rje gsung gi go la ma// pad+ma khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum

sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i lte ba nas// yon tan rdo rje go la ma// rin chen khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams
gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i zhabs las kyang// rdo rje las kyi go ma la// las rab khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag
tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung sku yi 'od zer las// rdo rje las kyi go la ma// dpal dang kham rgya'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer ni// mi yi lus la

dred mo'i mgo// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung sku yi me lce las// phra men las kyi go la ma// dpal dang spyang mo'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer ni// mi yi lus la lcags spyang

mgo/ phra men nyid pas las la brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung zhabs kyi gdan khri las// khrag 'thung las kyi go la ma// dpal dang khyi mo'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od
zer ni// mi yi lus la khyi yi mgo// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i ba spu las// phra men las kyi go la ma// dpal dang long ba'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer
ni// mi yi lus la khyi yi mgo// phra men nyid pas las la brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas las// phra men las kyi go la ma// dpal dang dmus long tshogs su
sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer ni// mi yi lus la dmus long mgo// phra men nyid pas las la brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka'i// dbu yi dkyil 'khor man chad

nas// zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad du// thugs dam ngang las sprul pa yi// rdo rje las kyi go la ma// mngag pa tsam gyis las mdzod cig/ ma ma dzaHdzaHb+h+yo b+h+yo las la b+h+yo/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ pho nya
mngag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// pho nya mngag pa'i le'u 'di
gsungs// ti ra chen po'i gnas nyul ma// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po la// bka' dang dam tshig ma nyams par// bsgrub pa rnams la dngos grub stsol// gang zhig bka' las 'da' byed pa// sgrub pa po la

bar gcod pa'i// ma bdag las kyi nyul ma mo// srid pa gsum la bya ra mdzad// shar nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nam gyi srod la rgyug/ nag mo khrag gi ral pa can// ti ra chen mo kha na thogs// gzi

ldan pad+ma'i sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo thod phreng yin par grags// lho nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nam gyi phyed na rgyug/ nag mo zhag gi ral pa can// ti ra chen mo

khan thogs// gshog pa can gyi sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo skam ma yin par grags// nub nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nam gyi tho rang rgyug/ nag mo dung gi ral pa can// ti

ra chen mo kha na thogs// dra ba mo yi sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo ra ro yin par grags// byang nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nyi ma'i zer la rgyug/ nag mo g.yu yi

ral pa can// ti ra chen mo kha na thogs// sder mo can gyi sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo chang 'thung yin par grags// steng nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nyi ma phyed na rgyug/ nag

mo gser gyi ral pa can// ti ra chen mo kha na thogs// glog 'gyu ma yi sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo phor thogs yin par grags// 'og nas ti ra'i gnas nyul ma// rdo rje nyi ma'i

grib so sdud// nag mo zangs kyi ral pa can// ti ra chen po kha na thogs// the'u gshog ma yi sprul pa ste// nyams pa'i khrag 'thung dbang mo che// srin mo gzhong thogs yin par grags// dus drug ma mo khyed
rnams kyang// sngon gyi thugs dam ji bzhin du// bsgrub pa las kyi bya ra mdzod// gang zhig nyams pa'i khrag la rol// ma nyams rnams la dngos grub stsol// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// dbang
chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ pho nya ti ra'i gnas nyul gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// bdud dang dregs pa bsgral ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra
las// shor ba gzhon nu'i le'u 'di gsungs so// thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// bdud dang dbang phyug rje dregs pa des// 'jig rten khams kun za byed par// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung

gis// shor ba gzhon nu la sogs pa'i// bdud dang gshin dregs pa de// thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas// phung po nyal thabs gan rkyal te// 'dzam gling lho yi gling khams su// ro langs sa gzhir gyur
par bshad// rU tra'i mgo ni lho nub mtshams// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su ste// lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon gdengs// kun kyang thugs pa med par brkyang// de bas 'dzam gling sa 'di kun// bkra shis

ya mtshan thugs rjer ldan// chos dang rdzu 'phrul 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to// rU tra'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gling// snying ni ma ga d+hA yi gnas// dur khrod ming ni bsil ba'i tshal// gzi

ldan ma dang go'u ris bsrungs// mkhas dang snying stobs gnyi gar ldan// rU tra'i mgo ni lho phyogs kyi// dur khrod sing ga'i gling phran de// gshog pa mo dang tso'u ris bsrungs// mthong thos 'phrul dang ldan

pa mnga'// rU tra'i lag g.yas shar lho'i mtshams// dur khrod bal yul yin pa ste// glog 'gyu ma dang puk+kas bsrungs// de na zas dang longs spyod ldan// rU tra'i lag g.yon lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen po
sA la'i yul// sder mo can dang be tAs bsrungs// mthu dang dbang chen gyad kyi gnas// rU tra'i rkang g.yas byang shar mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// dra ba mo dang tsaN+Das bsrungs// sha ki

ni ste me chu 'grub// rU tra'i rkang g.yon nub byang mtshams// dur khrod chen po kha che'i yul// the'u gshog ma dang pra mos bsrungs// de na bde skyid phun sum tshogs// rU tra'i pho mtshan steng phyogs na// dur khrod

chen po u rgyan yul// mgyogs me ma dang g+has mas bsrungs// 'byor ldan tshogs ni dngos grub 'chang// dngos grub thob pa de na mang// rU tra'i nang khrol ma lus kun// dur khrod chen po za hor yul// lang ka

pu ri srin po'i gnas// a mo de dang sma shes bsrungs// srin po srin mo sha za dang// 'byor pa'i longs spyod kun dang ldan// dpal gyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// ta nas btul nas bsgrul ba yi// sa gzhi

dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzam gling 'di// skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa
pos// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// bka' bzhin bskyed nas byin brlabs nas// sngags mchog bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsgral ba'i rgyu dang dam rdzas kun// sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rgyu dang

gzhi// dam tshig dam par srung ba'i rdzas// 'bras bu chen po lnga yin pas// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs dang// tshogs dang tsar+ya'i 'byor tshogs pa// le lo spangs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med par
'bad la bsgral// rnam shes hUM du bsgyur byas te// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// yang dag gnas su bsdu bar bya// de lta'i ta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni// 'khor
bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// srin po yongs sgrol chen po mdzad// sa nas sa yi rim pa bzhin// gong nas gong du yang nas yang// mi ldog dbyings su thim par byas// bdud dang srin po ma lus kun// sngon
gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin// btul nas yang dag sgrol mdzad pa// 'di ni sgrol ba'i phrin las so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ shor ba gzhon nu'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// tshe la
dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nye lam byang chub bstan pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bsgrub pa zab mo'i le'u 'di gsungs/ phun sum

tshogs pa lngar ldan zhing// de yang gsang bar shes par bya// maN+Dal zla gam bye brag kyang// mkhas pas dbyings su shes par bya// de phyir bsgrub pa zab mo'am// nye lam zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar gyur
pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku bskyed cing// gdan lnga rim gyis bkod pa yang// zab mo'i don du shes par bya// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// gzhal yas gdal ba chos kyi
dbyings// nam mkha' lta bu gnas mi dmigs// de lta'i dbus su sku bskyed pa// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang// gnyis su med par gzi dang ldan// rtogs nas gdeng du lon pa ni// zab mo zhes kyang de la

brjod// de nas yum rnams bsgrub pa yang// dra ba can la sogs pa bzhi// spros dang bral ba shes par bya// zab mo zhes ni mkhas pas gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po yin pa'i phyir// sgo srung khro bo mgo dgu

brtsegs// theg chen dgu yi rim pa bzhin// de nyid gsang bar shes par ru// de phyir theg chen nye lam pa// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang// rgyal po 'khor dang ldan pa bzhin// phyi rol long ba rgyab sbrel

yang// chos skur gcig pas tha dad min// de yi phyir rim dmus long rnams// mi 'gyur dbyings su mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das// de phyi dmus long 'khor ba can// phyi rim kham rgya chen mo

drug/ gzi ldan sprul par grags pas na// yungs kar tshul bzhin zlum por bzhugs// 'khor ba dbyings su zlum pa'i tshul// phyi rim spyang mo bsgrub pa ni// zhabs kyi sprul pa yin pas na// pho nyar bzang zhing

mngag par mgyogs// de yang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don du shes par bya// khyi brgyad dgye zhing bsgrub pa yang// gsang ba'i sprul pa yin pa'i phyir// phra men sprul pa shes par bya// sprul pa me 'brug

nag po rnams// yab yum 'du 'bral med pa yi// sprul pa yin par bstan pa yang// yang na srid pa'i rgyal por dmigs// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// phung po lnga nyid gzhal yas khang// tsit+ta dpal
be'u sems kyi rten// dbang chen yab yum phyag rgyar gsal// ma bzhi bu brgyad dbyings phyug bzhi// de yang mtshan med spros dang bral// rnam shes brgyad po gnas su dag/ long ba rgyab sbrel ye nas
gnas// shes pa'i yul brgyad gnas su dag/ dmus long 'khor bar ye nas gnas// zhabs kyi chas brgyad gnas su dag/ lcags kyi spyang mo ye nas gnas// khyi brgyad spyang mo brgyad dang bcas// zhabs kyi
sprul par rab tu grags// de rnams rtsa bar bsdus pa'i phyir// zab mor bsgrub par shes par bya'o// dbyings las ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir// ye shes dbyings su bzhugs pa la// rtags su gzi ldan thugs
kar sbas// zab mo zhes kyang de la bsngags// long ba rgyab sbrel ye shes 'khor// mgo dgu brtsegs pa yan chad kun// 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings su dmigs// gtso bo yab yum ye shes te// ye shes dbyings
la sbyor ba'i phyir// stong pa chen por rab bsgoms na// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig pa dang// log par blta ba gzhom pa'i

phyir// pho nya rnams zhes bshad par bya'o// bdag nyid chen por rab rtogs te// btsal ba med par dbyings gcig na// pho nya zhes kyang de la bya// bya dang byed par mi dmigs shing// 'phro 'du la sogs mi

brtsam na// 'gyed pa zhes kyang de la bya// pho nya'i don drug bshad pa ni// sku dang rngams dang ye shes dang// bsgrub dang sprul pa yig 'bru'o// yang na pho nya gsum du bshad// don dang las dang rigs la
sogs// pho nya rnams ni dgye bar bya// zhes bshad// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nye lam byang chub sems kyi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// klu rgyal

zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// gzhung phyung ba yi ting 'dzin bsgom// hUM las phyag rgya gdan dang bcas// dmar po dbu lnga bcu drug phyag/ gsal bar bsgom pa'i byin rlabs
kyis// klu chen dbang du bsdu ba'o// de ltar phyag na klu rnams bsnams// de ltar gsal ba ma lus kun// g.yas kyi dang por bsnams pa ni// klu chen rgyal rigs dbang bsdus mtha' yas rnams// g.yas kyi
dang 'og dung skyong bsnams// de yi 'og ma 'jog po bsnams// de yi 'og ma nor rgyas bu// 'og ma ma dros bu bsnams so// de 'og sog ma med bsnams shing// 'og ma gzi can 'dzin par grags// de 'og
rigs ldan 'dzin pa'o// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// dang por ba ru Na yang 'dzin// 'og mar ka rko Ta bsnams zhing// 'og ma lta na sdug kyang 'dzin// de 'og stobs bzang rab tu bsnams// 'og ma ba

lang can yang 'dzin// 'og ma pad+ma rab tu bsnams// 'og ma gang ba bzang po ste// de 'og nor bu'i mgrin yang bsnams// klu yi rgyal po de rnams ni// snying gar dbang gi zhabs kyi ni// tsham rngams stong dang
chas pa'i phyir// sku bskyed 'og tu gzhal yas khang// sbrul nag grub pa 'byams klas pa'i// mnyam dang mnyam par dmigs par bya'o// de yi dbus su bsgom pa yang// gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas// hUM

las rdzogs pa'i tshul du bskyed// de nas gsang ba'i bsnyen pa 'bul// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka e ka te ma hA su kha hUM/ nA ga pra be sha dzaHces bya'o// rdzu 'phrul sngags dang phyag

rgya dang// drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe ba// bsgrub pa'i dus su klu yang bsgral// bsnyen pa chos kyi dbyings nas grangs// rdzu 'phrul 'phrog phyir smyon par bzhugs// klu rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// mgrin sngon
la sogs rnam shes ni// gser zhun lta bur gyur nas ni// gzi ldan pad+ma'i dbyings su bslan// gnas kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// sku yi gshog pa mkha' dang mnyam// bar nas gser gyi me

stag bzhin// glog 'gyu'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro// klu yi phung po rdul phran bzhin// yan lag kun kyang rab tu nyams// klu yi cho 'phrul zhi bar gyur// gshog pa khyung gi 'jigs par gyur// bye ma snyed kyi me stag
'phro// bye mas 'jigs zhes de la bsngags// khyung ltar gnas pas klu chen gnon// dbang du bsdus pas klu rgyal 'dul// rdzu 'phrul phrogs pas dngos grub thob// klu'i le'u zhes de la brjod// dkyil 'khor

bsdu ba snga ma bzhin// hUM gi spro bsdus dbyings su thim// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu rgyal 'phrul gyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// sdang ba'i dgra

bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// spyang mo ro bshal le'u 'di// dbu yi dkyil 'khor man chad nas// zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad du// spyang mo ro bshal rbad par bya// dbu lnga
'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// dpal gyi pho nya ro bshal bskul// dbang po lnga po rdul phran bzhin// sdang mig 'bar ba gru gsum nas// dpal gyi pho nya ro bshal bskul// gzugs kyi rnam shes thal bar

rlogs// khro rgyal shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas// dpal gyi pho nya ro bshal bskul// dri yi rnam shes thal bar rlogs// 'bar ba zhal gyi hom lnga nas// dpal gyi pho nya ro bshal bskul// ro yi rnam shes rdul du

rlogs// khro rgyal sku yi ba spu nas// dpal gyi pho nya ro bshal bskul// reg bya thal ba bzhin du rlogs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan mang po nas// dpal gyi pho nya mang po bskul/ dgra srog gcod cing dgra snying

'byin// khro bo rngam pa'i gshog pa nas// dur khrod pho nya ro bshal bskul// mgyogs byed las te myur bar bskul// zhabs brgyad brkyangs te khro brgyad gzir// drag shul stag gi pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal dgra

bgegs 'gugs// rno gdug lcags kyi pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal yid 'phrog byed// rdo rje rol pa'i pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal spyang mo gdong// mche ba bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// dbang gi gzi 'bar pho nya

mo// kha na ro bshal durakhrod 'joms// sbrul nag 'khril ba'i pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal ri lung 'phyang// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyad du med// za byed che ba'i pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal nga ro sgrogs// srid
pa'i lha bran zas su za// shu ken dar gyi pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'od zer 'bar bas stong khams bsreg/ gcan gzan gzig gi pho nya mo// kha na ro bshal gad mos
'debs// sngags pas lan gsum rbad pa dang// zhu glag med par phung bar byed// gdan khri seng ge'i bar bar na// seng ge'i kha nas ro bshal bskul// srid pa gsum yang dbang du sdud// rin

chen khri rkang bar bar na// 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i spyang mo la// kha nas ro bshal 'dur gom mchong// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i bar bar na// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu ma// kha na ro bshal stobs chen 'joms// nyi zla
gza' skar tsog por 'phen// gdan khri pad+ma'i bar bar na// dung gi spyang mo mgo gsum ma// spyan gsum dur khrod gnas su gzigs// kha nas ro bshal rU tra 'joms// rigs gnyis brgyud pa'i bka' nyan

ma// las la bab po pho nya'i tshogs// kha lo kha la lo kha// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ spyang mo ro bshal gyi le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dbang

chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// tshangs dbyangs glu yi le'u gsungs// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu drug ni// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// shar+ng+ha ba dang gar+ng+ha ba// cang ka de'u dang pang ka de'u// glu drug blangs pas don drug

grub// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi dngos grub chen po thob// dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// gsung gi dngos grub chen po thob// sharda ba

yi glu blangs pas// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// gar+d+ha ba yi glu blangs pas// phyogs skyong chen po bcu rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// cang ka de'u'i glu

blangs pas// srid pa'i dbang sdud mthu bo che// pang ga de'u'i glu blangs pas// drag po'i yul bdag dbang du sdud// pad+ma gar gyi bro brdungs pa// bdud bzhi thal bar rlog pa'i bro// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor

'dren pa'i bro// breng nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// sdug bsngal nad sel thugs rje'i bro// dung nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// thugs dam dbyings nas bskul ba'i bro// shar+ng+ha ba yi glu dang sbyar// ye shes rgyal ba'i bro bo

che// gar+d+ha ba yi glu dang sbyar// ma mo 'khrug pa'i bro bo che// cang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// lang+ka bsgral ba'i bro bo che// pang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs pas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
mas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du 'gyur// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu drug gi le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor
gyis// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// ma mo bkol ba'i le'u 'di gsungs// dur khrod chen por mngon sum du// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste// dbus kyi mthing nag gru gsum la// mtha' skor zla
gam brgyad kyis bskor// dbus su yum chen gzi ldan dang// zla gam brgyad la gzhag pa yang// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha la// grub pa'i ma mo brgyad bris te// dur khrod ma mo dgod pa

yang// shar du rdo rje sder mo can// lho ru ma mo glog 'gyu ma// nub tu rdo rje dra ba mo// byang du ma mo de ba gzhag/ shar lho mtshams su dgod pa yang// rdo rje kham rgya chen mo'o// lho nub mtshams su dgod pa

yang// rin chen kham rgya dgod par bya// nub byang mtshams su pad+ma rgya// byang shar mtshams su las kyi rgya// phyi rim bar khyams chen mo la/ zla gam dmar po bcu drug la// phra men bcu drug rim pa bzhin// sgo
bzhir zla gam bzhi bris te// steng du lcags kyu la sogs dgod// de ltar bshams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// gnod sbyin gzugs ni khrag gis bris// snying gar rtogs pas mnan nas su// dgug pa'i brtul
zhugs hUM bzlas pas// gnod sbyin ma 'ongs bar du ni// rbad nas zhag bdun gyis kyang khug/ gnod sbyin kun la ci dgar spyad// rnal 'byor pa yi bran du 'gyur// phra men las la 'khol 'dod na// dkyil
'khor de yi dbus dag tu// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// phra men gzugs ni khrag gis bris// dbang po yan lag phur pas mnan// snying gar rdog pas mnan nas ni// dgug pa'i hUM zhes brtul zhugs
bzlas// gong ma bzhin du bdun gyis 'ong// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// phra men rnams ni cir dgar 'khol// khong gis 'gal na khong dag 'chi// bdag gis 'gal na bdag nyid nyams// ma mo
bsgrub pa'i dus dag tu// nang par mal nas langs nas kyang// yi dam gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// gom gsum spags nas sku gsum dran// bshang gci byed pa'i sa phyogs su// dri chen lag tu blangs nas

kyang// sus ma mthong bar kham gsum bza'// dri chu khyor bar blug nas kyang// sus ma mthong bar thengs gsum btung// phra men chen mo bkol ba'i phyir// shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rkang bzhi sa la

btsugs nas ni// phag skad thengs gsum ngur bar bya// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// dri chen mdun du bzhag nas kyang// khyi skad thengs gsum zug par bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// rta skad 'tsher

ba'i glu skad blangs// phra men rnams la ci dgar spyod// 'di ni ma mo bkol ba'i le'u// dkyil 'khor 'di la bkram pa yang// dbus su bkram pa 'di dag ste// gnyis ldan byang chub sems chen po// 'o ma dang

ni bsres la bzhag/ phyar zhing ma mo snyan dbyangs blangs// phyogs bzhi bdud rtsi bzhi rnams kyis// rim pa bzhin du zla gam la'o// yi ge 'phro 'dus sbyangs nas kyang// phag mo bsten dbyangs blangs shing

phyar// mtha' skor shar lho'i mtshams su ni// rdzas kyi gyo tshal bcu drug la// rak+ta khrag dang bsres pa yis// kha zhes bos la phyar la gzhag/ sgo ma rnams la dgod pa yang// byang bu snag tshas bris
pa la// kha kha le les bos la sbyar// 'di ltar rtogs nas bsgo ba yang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gtor ma cho ga gzhung bzhin gtang// slob ma rak+tas dbang bskur ro// dngos grub brtan phyir

bzlas pa'i las// srod la 'khor gsum bro brdungs la// tho rangs sbyor ba'i las kyang bya// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// dngos grub tu ni rtag 'gyur ro// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ ma mo
bkol ba'i le'u ste sum cu so drug pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// mthu chen lang+ka 'dul ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// srin po gnan phyir 'di gsungs

so// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin dmigs pa yang// cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i hUM// 'phro 'du rdo rjer rab tu dmigs// de las gar gyi skur gsal zhing// dbu lnga bcu drug bsgom pa

yang// snying po sngags kyis khros par bsgom// hrI phaT/ A+oM hUM ru lu raM dzaH/ badzra e A ra li dzaH/ de rnams spro bsdu gsal ba las// skur gyur brtan par gyur pa dang// nyid kyis 'dul bar gzhal 'ches

te// sdigs mdzub nam mkhar phyar ba yang// bskal pa'i me 'bar me lce las// a la la yi thog thog 'khrugs// de yang thugs rje gsang ba'i thog/ klu dang lang+ka'i sring por 'dril// bsgral sngags drag pos

rab tu bsgral// 'dren pa'i snying po tsit+ta phyung// srin mo bzhir ni rnam par sprul/ me sprul rnams su de bzhin te// phung po lnga ni gzhal yas khang// tshogs brgyad dur khrod brgyad du drang// bka' dang mthun pa'i
gzhal yas ni// rgyan dang cha lugs gsungs pa bzhin// de yi nang du dmigs pa yang// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// gsang ba'i rdzas dang mchod par bcas// 'khor lo'i yon tan bsam mi

khyab// mtha' la rtsibs dang gru chad dang// mu khyud bar khyams sgo khyud bcas// spros shing dbyings su bstim byas te// dbyings las 'bar ba'i sku yang bskyed// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin las// hUM du skur

bskyed 'bar ba yis// klu dang lang+ka bcad gtubs te// nyon mongs lnga yang gnan par bya// de ltar byas nas mnan nas kyang// 'khor gyi lha mos bstod pa byas// bsdu bar bya ba'i lung du grags// 'bar ba'i
gzhal yas 'od lta bu// mchod rten chen po bzhi la 'dus// long ba'i tshogs la rim pa bzhin// ngang ngam rang bzhin bdag nyid do// skye ba med pa'i dbyings la bsdu// dkyil 'khor bsdu bar gsungs pa ni//

mchod rten sgo khyud rim pa bzhin// de nas sgrub rdzas bsdu ba yang// sha dri mnan pa'i khrag la bsdu// khrag dang tsan+d+ran snga ma bzhin// las kyi rnam pa bya ba'i phyir// spro ba'i thabs ni 'di dag go/ sku

gsum phyag rgya 'od du 'phro// mtshon cha la sogs snga ma bzhin// las kyi gnan pa bya ba'i phyir// klu dang srin po mnan pa'i thabs// hom khung dag tu gnan pa bya// lang ka'i gnas su gnan pa'i phyir// me lha

gzhung bzhin bsgoms la gzhag/ sbar nas sbyin sreg bya ba yang// rnga yi rol mos drangs te bya'o// mi mthun phyogs ni hom khung bstab// dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir// sgo lnga la sogs dbyings su
bcun par bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ lang+ka mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu so bdun pa'o//// tshe la dbang thog rig 'dzin rnal 'byor pas// thod rgal 'jigs pa'i phrin las kyis// rnal
'byor dgra bgegs gdul ba'i phyir// rgyud las nges pa'i gzhung 'di gsungs// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// rgyu ni hUM dmar spros pa las// 'od kyis dmyal ba'i nyes skyon sbyangs// 'di ni khrag

'thung hUM gi le'u// dmar po hUM gi 'phro 'du las// yi dwags rnams kyi bkres skom 'joms// bde ba chen po'i thugs rje'i le'u// phra men rnga thabs zhes kyang bya// de la nyi ma bdun gyi rab bskor ba// srid

gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba spros// de steng pad+ma kha stong ldan pa las// rdo rje rtse gcig pad+ma'i snying por gnas// de dbus hUM las byol song skye gnas

'joms// 'di ni gsal byed nyi zla 'od kyi lung// pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil// hUM las 'od 'phros mi rnams bag chags sbyangs// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa'i hUM du grags// de steng b+h+rUM las ye

shes gzhal yas khang// rgyal chen phyogs skyong ma lus ka dang gdung// me ri thod phreng sbrul la sogs pas brgyan/ de dbus rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gsal// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lung du grags// de

las hUM gi 'od zer gsal ba dang// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgoms nas// shangs dang khro bo hUM drug sgra bton pas// rgyud drug gnas pa'i 'khor ba rtsad bcad de// spros nas rim pa bzhin du thim byas

nas// khro bor gyur pa'i hUM gi le'u zhes bya'o// hUM las 'bar ba'i sku bskyed gsal ba dang// ljags kyi dkyil du b+h+ruM las rin po che// A+oM la sogs pa'i 'phro 'dus las// dpal chen 'bar ba'i skur gsal

te// khang bu lnga dang ldan par dmigs// de dbus rta mgo ljang gu bsgom// sprul nagastong gi rgyan du mdzes// thod pa tshar gsum brjid par ldan// zhing lpags stod la g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// phyi nang
gshog pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje dra ba mo// 'gro ba ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i yum// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha ma lus bsnams// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra

bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas brgyad khro bo gnon dang sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan// 'khor gyi me 'brug rlung 'brug la sogs ni// rang sngags snying pos phyogs mtshams khyab

par ro// rlung 'brug sngon mo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsgom// long ba rgyab sbrel mang po dmigs pa yang// yang sprul bye ba 'bum dang bcas pa ste// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrugs pa'o// phyi rim dmus long

'khor ba can// sho ri kha yi sgras bskyed cing// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'o// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams ni// dkyil 'khor grwa yi phyogs su gsal// ye shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni

mtshams nas 'gyed// ma lus dgra bgegs mche bas gcod// phyi rim lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams la rbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs pa dang// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pa ste// phyogs bzhi

dbus lngar khang bur ba// rta mgo la sogs rim pa bzhin// de yang chos kyi dbyings su sdud// da ni phur pa'i las byas te// rgya mdud 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// spyi bor pad+ma khrag 'thung ste// zur brgyad long ba

rgyab sbrel tshogs// rgya mdud 'og mar dmus long dmigs// ngos la lcags kyi spyang mo ste// rtse mor khro bo dmigs bya ba// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// da ni bsdu bar bya ba yang// sgo srung spyang mo

nyid la'o// spyang mo zhabs kyi chas brgyad la'o// de yang dur khrod brgyad la 'dus// dur khrod ye shes chen po ste// de yang mi gnas ye shes la'o// me 'brug gshog pa nyid la 'dus// gshog pa sku yi rgyan dang

ldan// de yang tshon sna lnga la 'dus// tshon sna lnga ni dbu rgyan lnga'o// de yang rin chen khang bu ste// de yang sku gsung thugs la 'dus// de nyid chos kyi dbyings la 'dus// dbyings kyang kun gzhi nyid du ste// mi
dmigs chos sku chen por gnas// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ thod rgal 'jigs pa'i le'u ste sum cu so brgyad pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// gnod sbyin phra men
'khor bcas kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses 'gyur na// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// dka' thub smyon thabs 'di gsungs so// sa yi 'og tu mngon sum bya// ngag gi hUM zhes cung zad bzlas// mAng sa
dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang 'phreng klad la lan gsum bskor// de ltar byas na bdag rgyal zhing// nad gtong ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad
du// rigs ma 'tshol bar sbyor bar bya// skye thos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub yin// sbyor ba'i byang sems lce la gzhag/ rang gi dben rigs gang yin par// skye bo
'du 'dzi thag bsrings te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs chen po ni// dbyangs kyang drag tu blang bar bya// bya yi brtul zhugs chen pos ni// khams gsum sgum bur btu bar bya// phag gi brtul zhugs chen pos

ni/ srid gsum khron du brko bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen pos ni// dmyal khams zas su za bar bya// srod dang tho rangs bro brdungs pa// dka' thub smyon pa'i bro brdungs pa// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum
bzlas nas// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor rnams kyang// bdag gi dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// glu dbyangs khyi skad byang du zug/ khyi yi dka' thub smyon pa yin// rta skad nub kyi phyogs su 'tsher// rta yi

dka' thub smyaun pa yin// bya skad nub kyi phyogs su cong// bya yi dka' thub smyon pa yi// phag skad lho yi phyogs su ngur// phag gi dka' thub smyon pa yin// de ltar byas nas brtul zhugs kun// hUM zhes bya ba'i
dbyangs blangs nas// bdag gi lus la zhugs par bya// dus la bab pa'i bros mchod pa// rnge'u chung lan gsum brdung bar bya// de nas dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs ting 'dzin zhugs nas

kyang// glu bro dam tshig dang du blangs// bsgrub pa chen po'i bar gcod pa// brtul zhugs chen pos bsgral nas kyang// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// dka' thub chen po yin pa'i phyir// su dang gtam
yang bsre mi bya// smyon pa'i tshul du mchongs pa yis// gnod sbyin phra men rnams kyang brgyal// nams kyang bdag gis dbang du 'gyur// nyan thos dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sngags kyi dka' thub chen po

yis// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i longs spyod bya// ma spangs par ni dbang du sdud// nan tan drag shul smyon thabs su// su dang phrad par sbyar zhing bsgral// 'di ni dpal gyi thugs dam ste// rgyun mi chad par spyad na
ni// bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// dka' thub bsrungs pas dngos grub thob// 'di la som nyi ji ste za// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ brtul zhugs dka' thub smyon pa'i le'u ste sum cu so dgu
pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// bsgrub mchog gang zhig rtogs 'dod phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// man ngag bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs so// de la dbang gi

rgyal po 'di'i mgo mjug tu/ spyi don bzhis ston te/ gang zhe na/ rgyan gsum gyi don dpe gsum gyi sgo nas bstan pa dang/ rtsis 'go rnam par brgyad kyis ji ltar bsgom pa'i don bstan pa dang/ dkyil 'khor
brgyad kyis che ba rnam pa brgyad mthar phyin par bstan pa dang/ rtogs pa rnam pa bdun gyis re dogs kyi thag gcad pa'o// de la rgyan gyi don dpe gsum gyis bstan pa gang zhe na/ sku rdzogs pa'i

dkyil 'khor thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan du bstan pa dang/ rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad skye ba med pa'i dbyings su bstan pa dang/ de skad gsung pa thams cad b+ha ga maN+Dal man ngag rgya mtsho'i

dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'o// rtsis 'go rnam brgyad kyis ji ltar bsgom pa'i don bstan pa yang/ dang por mnyam pa chen po de bzhin nyid kyi rtsis 'go dang// gsang ba'i dbang phyug yi ge hUM gi rtsis 'go dang/
shes rab thabs su rol pas gzhal yas yum gyi rtsis 'go dang/ khams gsum don mdzad seng ge rtsal gyi rtsis 'go dang/ yon tan tshang bar rdzogs pas rin chen khri'i rtsis 'go dang/ mkha' dbyings dbyings

su dag pa dri med pad+ma'i rtsis 'go dang/ sprul sku 'gro don la 'khod pas nyi zla 'od kyi rtsis 'go dang/ rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pas zhe sdang rdo rje'i rtsis mgo dang brgyad do// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi che ba rnam

pa brgyad mthar phyin pa ni/ dbus rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin/ thod rus rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyis srin po 'dul ba'i che ba mthar phyin/ thugs kar ye
shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyis mkhyen rigs gsal ba'i che ba mthar phyin/ za byed dur khrod phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyis thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i che ba mthar phyin/ gshog pa khams gsum rnam rgyal

dkyil 'khor gyis klu chen zil gyis mnan pa'i che ba mthar phyin/ zhabs brgyad khro bo brgyad mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sa bcu zil gyis mnan pa'i che ba mthar phyin// gzi ldan thugs kar sbas pa'i che bas

gnas lhun gyis grub pa'i che ba mthar phyin/ lhun grub sku la rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis yon tan rdzogs pa'i che ba mthar phyin pa ste brgyad do// rtogs pa bdun gyis re dogs kyi dmigs pa bsal ba ni/

gong ma ltar gong gis rtogs pa ni dz+nyA na tsit+ta dz+wa la ye shes su rtogs pa'o// bud+d+ha tsit+ta dz+wa las sangs rgyas su rtogs pa'o// bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+wa las byang chub tu rtogs pa'o// gong ma ltar ma rtogs te dngos su bzung na ni/

rak+sha tsit+ta dz+wa las srin por rtogs pa'o// yak+sha tsit+ta dz+wa las gnod sbyin du rtogs pa'o// karmA tsit+ta dz+wa las srin por rtogs pa'o// na ra ka tsit+ta dz+wa las dmyal bar rtogs pa'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/
man ngag bsdus pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// ro sbyor bdud rtsir bya ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan+t+ra las// sgrub thabs gsang ba 'di gsungs
so// dang por phun sum tshogs ldan nas// yid du 'ong ba'i dgon gnas su// bslang dang byin gyis brlab pa dang// mtshams la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// man d+hal 'dom gang gru bzhi

ste// bka' dang mthun pa'i chag chag gdab// thig bzhi gdab pa'i mtha' skor la// rU tra rnam gsum bsnol te gnas// dbus su zla gam bzhi pa ste// de'i dbus mthing nag gru gsum pa'o// kha bzhi pa la sbyin

sreg pa'o// mtha' skor 'bar ba'i 'od kyis so// mthun pa'i dam rdzas gnas pa'i phyir// drug gnyis ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mtshan mas btab ste hUM zhes bskor// brtul zhugs chen pos khros pa ni// gar

gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bro// brdungs pa tsam gyis las rnams 'grub// phud nyul chen mos las mdzad nges// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgom nas// gtsug gi rta mgo ljang gu las// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po

ste// hUM zhes du mar brjod cing brdung// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// zhabs las sprul pa'i khyi brgyad kyis// bag chags gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// ku ku ra zhes
rbad cing brdung// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gshog pa rdo rjes gtams pa las// gzung 'dzin gnas su dag bya'i phyir// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// dza:zhes brjod cing mgyogs par
ro// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// mi dmigs sku yi sbrul mgo las// phag gi brtul zhugs chen pos ni// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM dang bcas par

brdung// chas brgyad las kyi spyang mor dmigs// tho bas dbye ba sder mo nyid// ngan song gnas kyi gdul sbyang bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgyar bcas par dbye// rdzogs nas ma d+hal nyid du grags// rten ni dug

gsum nyid du rten// lnga ni zla gam nyid du ste// snyigs ma bar khyams gra bzhi la// rtse mo ma tang ka nyid la'o// sgo zur la ni brtag pa rnams// sgo ni nang rol rdo rje ste// phyag mtshan bcu phrug gnyis la'o// yan

lag bar du ba su ta// 'od la rak+ta khrag dang bcas// shun chen bla re nyid du'o// rdzi ma skra dang kha spu rnams// mchod pa'i phyir na gtor ba'o// sa la dbang ba'i b+han+d+ha la// phye mar rak+tar bcas pa rnams// spyos

sam yang na brdzis pa la// steng nas bcings te rgyas btab dang// sku gsum thod pa shar phyogs su// rak+ta chang dang sbyar ba la// steng nas rin chen rdo rjes rgya yis btab// gling gsum pa ni lho phyogs te// rak+ta

'o mar sbyar ba la// steng nas rin chen rgya yis btab// dbang du sdud pa'i b+han+da ru// rak+ta sbrang rtsi mar la sogs// steng nas pad+mas rgya yis btab// gling bzhi rgya gram byang phyogs der// rak+ta chu dang cha bsnyams
nas// steng nas las kyi rgyas btab bo// rdzogs nas ting 'dzin tshogs su stsal// mtshams dang srung ba'i go cha'o// phyag rgya bskyed dang 'phro 'du dang// drod tshad dbab dang thugs rje dbab// tshe
gnas bstim dang lnga pa'o// yang nas yang du bsnyen pa bya// phrin las skabs dang sbyar nas bcol// dbang dang dam tshig mi bza' ste// zhi ba la sogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'phro 'du rim gyis bsnyen pas

sbyang// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang// cho ga gsum gyis snang mdzad sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// hUM du gyur nas rtse lnga 'bar// bskul dang don byas mi

bskyod sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// skye med dbying nas dngos med sku// swA las rin chen zur brgyad 'phro// bskul dang don byas 'byung ldan nyid// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid du'o// skye med
dbyings nas dngos med sku// AM las pad+mar gsal ba dang// bskul dang don byas snang mtha' yas// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// hA las rgya gram 'bar 'phro
ba// bskul dang don byas don yod grub// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// 'phro 'du gsal dang las su rung// dngos grub thob nas mya ngan 'das// mang du 'phel phyir bsnyen pa sbyang// grub nas dngos

grub gsol ba dang// brtan par bya phyir bdud rtsi'i snod// yum gyi gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sngags dang ldan pas dbang bskur te// gnas lnga dag tu thim par bya// de nas rgya bshig mdud pa dgrol/ bkra shis
mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// dar la babs pas bskul ba'i dbyangs// pra be sha zhes mdud pa grol// cha gcig 'phags pa mchod phyir 'bul// cha gcig slob dpon nyid la'o// gcig ni yongs la sbyin par
gsungs// de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod// de ni spyi bos blangs nas kyang// bkra shis tshigs su bcad par gsungs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yang// gzugs brnyan nyid 'dra nyid la

dbul// tsit+ta la sogs rang bzhin rdzas// rang bzhin mchod pa nyid du'o// rna ba sgra yi mchod pa yis// glog 'gyu nyid de dbyings su thim// de ni a mo de ba ste// spros pa med pa'i ngang la'o// mig ni rdo rje sder

mo ste// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i dbyings su gzhag/ lce ni rdo rje dra ba mo// mi 'gyur dbyings su yang dag nyid// rang bzhin mchod pa rdzogs par ldan// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor 'dra ba la// yongs su bsngo

bar bya ba ni// pho ba shar phyogs bar khyams la// dbyangs dang bcas pas dbul ba ni// rdo rje kham rgya chen mo la// phul bas gzi ldan dbyings su thim// grod pa lho phyogs nyid nas ni// rin chen kham rgya chen
mo la// dbyangs dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin// phul bas gzi ldan dbyings su thim// gnye ma nub nas snga ma bzhin// ma chags pad+ma'i kham rgya la// phul bas gzi ldan b+ha ga la// lang ka byang nas
