rim pa bzhin// don rab lhun grub kham rgya la// dbyangs kyis bstod nas mnyes par bya'o// gzi ldan la ni 'du 'phro'i tshul// sul mang shar lho'i mtshams su ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la mchod// dbyangs

dang ldan pas ye shes dang// sgyu ma ye shes lho nub ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la mchod// khyab pa ye shes kham rgya'o// dbyangs dang tshig ldan snga ma'i ngang// sgal tshigs phyogs bzhi gru chad la// long ba'i tshogs
la dbul ba dang// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i tshig dag gis// ye shes lnga yi ngang la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor yan lag bar bar nas// dmus long tshogs la dbul ba yang// ne'u seg dbyangs dang ldan pa

yis// phul bas ye shes lnga yi dbyings la sbyor// gsang ba'i chu bo nang sgo nas// dbu dgu bar du brtsegs pa la// dbyangs kyis mnyes par snga ma bzhin// me ri la ni ba su ta// spyang mo brgyad la mchod pa

yang// dbyangs tshig ldan pas dbyings la thim// khrag gi lce yi bar bar nas// za byed ye shes ku ku ra// brgyad la dbyangs kyis mchod pa yang// ma skyes dbyings nas thim par bya// bsdu ba'i thabs ni 'di
dag gsungs// dbyings las cho 'phrul rab spros te// mtha' bskor za byed ye shes kyi// spyang mo mgo dgu brtsegs pa'o// dbu dgu nyid kyang dmus long ste// dmus long long ba'i tshogs la bsdus// long ba

kham rgya chen mo la'o// de gnyis gtso bo yab yum la'o// yum yang dpal be'u thugs la bsdus// dpal be'u skye med dbyings su ste// brjod pa med pa'i ngang la thim// bdag dang ma d+hal ji bzhin te// bdag

nyid ma d+hal nyid la spro// ma d+hal zla gam nyid la ste// zla gam gzi ldan yum gyi ngang// yang na bdag nyid chen po ni// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su thim// ma d+hal ye shes lnga la bsdu// dam rdzas gsang ba'i b+ha ga

la// yongs su bsdu zhing bsdu ba rnams// skye ba med pa'i ngang la gzhag/ cung zad skye med bsgom nas kyang// gong ma bzhin du rim par bsdu// dbang bskur ba dang 'byung ba dang// tshe dang dbang dang dngos grub
rnams// bzod par gsol dang smon lam gdab// gtong ma gtor ba gzhung bzhin bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ ro sbyor bdud rtsi'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig

'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// mtha' gnyis don la slong ba'i bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ sha rI ram bsgrub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// mi 'gal tsam du spyad bya ba// gsang ba'i
rdzas mchog spros nas kyang// las su bya ba'i rnam grangs ni// grub pa'i rtags su bsgrubs nas ni// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i spyod dang ldan pa ni// 'bras bu thob pa'i rdzas mchog ste// rgyu 'bras

lnga nyid skye med a mr-i ta// mtha' gnyis don la slong ba'i bdud rtsi bsgrub// de yang dang por rab brtags te// bzhed dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la// ma d+hal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum brko bar

bya// 'phang du khru gang kha khyer la// lcags kyu mda' gzhu thod par bcas// steng du khru byed zur gsum brko// he zhal mtshon rtsi nag po bkye// gru gsum brkos pa'i phug gsum du// sa bon yi ge raM yang
bris// dkyil du rang rtags a yang bri// phyogs mtshams sor bzhi'i thog dag tu// 'dren byed snying pos bskor la gzhag/ dmar po snum chen brdos las brdzangs// mtho bzhi brtan par gzug par bya// rgya

shugs tsan+dan la sogs pa// bu ram sbrang rtsi bsres la gzhag/ yam shing sna tshogs tsher ma can// yang na dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir// tsher ma med par mkhas pas bsngags// steng 'og shun gyi bla rer bre// 'og
tu sha chen lang ling dang// zhing chen ras ros rim pa bzhin// dngos grub ma nyams g.yang gzhi ni// rlung gi phyogs su gzug par bya// rdzas la sogs pa mang du bsag/ me sngags btab ste gzhag par

bya// gzhung dang mthun pa'i phrin las bya// rdzas mchog yod pa'i sa phyogs der// gdul sbyang las ni rim pa bzhin// bkro'am yang na bsgrub kyang rung// sna tshogs bcos pa'i ras kyis dkris// bsngags pa'i
dkyil du gzhag bya ste// thog thag yam shing brdzangs te gzhag/ ting 'dzin gsal bas rim pa bzhin// spang nas mchod pa dbul ba ni// rak+ta dmar la sogs pas mchod// snum chen gsur gyis spos me

btang// mnyes pa'i mchod pa dam pa'o// bsgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// zhi ba la sogs phrin las ni// mnan bzlog gnyis drug bskyang la 'bad// ma d+hal de bzhin rdzogs pa dang// dngos grub bsdu ba snga

ma bzhin// de nas lhad dag ma shor bar// rnam grangs su ni dbye bar bya// sha ri ram dang lder so dang// mchod rten dag tu gyur na sngags// ya mtshan rtags dag 'byung bar nges// 'chi med bdud rtsi rnam lngar
bsgrub// rnam grangs gnyis med bsre dang ni// brtags nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang// bcag dang gcal ba'i las rnams ni// thabs la mkhas pas rim pa bzhin// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod du blug/ thig

bzhi btab pa'i dbus su gzhag/ gsung gi yig 'bru hrIHzhes bya// khrag 'thung phyag rgyar gyur par bsgom// gzi ldan thugs las mngon byung ste// gnyis med 'phro 'dus sbyang ba'o// dkar dang 'dril ba'i rang
bzhin las// hUM bzhis gsal nas rim pa bzhin// 'phro 'dus rgyas 'debs la sogs pa// rim pa bzhin du bskyed par bya// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// ye shes zer gyis rnam rtog
sbyang// bde ba'i 'bru mchog cha bzhin gsal// de las lha mo bzhi yi rgya// gnyis su med pa'i rol pa las// yig 'brur bcas pa'i sprul pa yis// snod bcud bcas pa'i mtshan ma sbyang// de ltar 'phro 'du
gsal ba'i las// bskul dang don byas rim pa bzhin// ting 'dzin rtse gcig bsgom par bya// skye med dbyings su lhan ner gzhag/ de nas bdud rtsi dam pa 'di// gsal zhing dag pa'i 'byor pa lag tu
blang// dbyangs dang tshig gis bstim pa'i las bya'o// mnyes nas sku gsum dngos grub 'thob// bcu drug phyag rgya'i rim par bskor// dga' ba'i gad mo ha ha he hes 'debs// gnyis med rtog pa'i glu bro
blang// thabs la mkhas pa'i dpa' bo yis// rtags dang ldan pa'i thig les gdab// sku gsum dngos grub thob par dmigs// de nas byin brlab dbang bskur rim pa bzhin// gtor ma gtong ba'i bya byed

rnams// snang ba nyid nas gnyis med bsgom pas ni// skye med ngang la lhan ne gzhag par bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ sha rI ram sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'o//// tshe
la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// chos sku gnyis med mnyam pa las// 'dzin rtog dngos po'i mtha' bsal zhing// zhing las nas 'gyur gsungs pa bzhin// gdeng dang ldan nas tha dad med// sa
bon las ni 'bras bu'i tshul// rtogs pa'i rlung du 'dris pas gang// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// snang mdzad las gyur kun tu gzigs// byang chub sems dpa' nyid la rdzogs// mi bskyod la sogs

shar du ste// rin chen 'gyur ba lho nyid do// mtha' yas la sogs nub tu'o// don yod byang gi phyogs su gyur// 'byung lnga yum gyi gnas 'gyur ba// sa bon las ni myu gu'i tshul// bzang las 'gyur ba gzi dang
ldan// spyan las 'gyur ba glog 'gyur te// mA ma kI ni 'dra bar 'gyur// na bza' dkar ni sder mo can// sgrol las gyur pa gshog pa mo// yab yum bcu ni rab sbyar te// dgyes pa'i dbyings su gyur pa
las// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i gzhi// rta mgo ljang gu yin par grags// dbu lnga ye shes lnga yi dbyings// sems dpa' brgyad sbyar dmus long tshogs// sems ma las bsgyur rgyab sbrel ni// sems
dpa' sems ma ldan sbyor bas// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i rgyu// mkha' spros ba yi 'od zer ni// sprul pa yin par spyang mo brgyad// dbyings su 'dren pas ye shes khyi// lcags kyu la sogs sgo ma
bzhi// gyur pas dbu dgu rab tu brtsegs// sprul sku thub drug las sprul pa// kham rgya drug tu sprul pa yin// gnas ni ma nor chos kyi dbyings su don rtogs nas// dbyings las ye shes rol pas
ni// gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u zhes bya// zhi ba mi g.yo chos sku las// khro bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ston pa'i bka' dang mi 'gal bar// phyi rabs rnal 'byor skal rab la// nges pa'i lung du
brtsam pa ste// rtogs na the tshom med par 'grub// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ gzhi gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dbang
chen bsdus pa'i ta na tra las// man ngag lung gi brgyud pa'i lung// sa bon las ni 'bras bu bzhin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las// yang che dbang gi dkyil 'khor brgyud// dur khrod 'bar ba'i

gzhal yas nas// lha chen 'khor bcas bsgral ba'i phyir// rgyal mtshan lnga dang ka bar bcas// 'phan dang za rang bla re rnams// khams gsum dbang sdud yum gyi b+ha gar brgyud// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri bzhi

yang// 'khor ba thabs kyis 'dul ba dang// srin po rU tra bsgral ba yang// khyad par gzhal yas dpag pa'i phyir// khrag 'thung chen po'i sku bzhin brgyud// dur khrod ma mo bdun rnams kyang// snang byed nyi ma

bdun du brgyud// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// thabs mi rtsal 'phags seng ger brgyud// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs par brgyud// zhe sdang khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku// ngag gi
dbang phyug nyid du brgyud// kro d+hI shwa rI la sogs kun// gzi ldan gsang ba'i yum nyid de// rigs la dbang rnams mi bza' bar// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir// khrag 'thung lnga po dbu lngar

brgyud// khro bo chen po mthu chen brgyad// bsgral ba zhabs kyi gdan du brgyud// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan par dmigs// rgyan gyi bye brag mang po rnams// rdo rje rin chen las

byung ba'i// gshog pa dag tu rnam par brgyud// sgo ba khro bo yab yum brgyad// dbu dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// 'jigs dang chas pa nyid du brgyud// rgyas 'debs la sogs lha mo ni// kham rgya chen mo

drug tu brgyud pa ste// sprul pa yang sprul bsam yas la// long ba'i tshogs kyi cha byad du// brgyud pa yin zhes 'dren pas bstan// phra men bcu drug thabs kyis brgyud// phyag rgya bcu drug thabs kyi dkyil 'khor

du// lcags kyu rdo rje la sogs pa'i// phyag mtshan bcu drug nyid du brgyud// gsang ba bas cher gsang ba yi// yang gsang thugs la gab pa ste// 'di ni man ngag brgyud pa'i lung// rjes su rnal 'byor rnams
kyis spyod// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ man ngag brgyud pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bzhi pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra

las// khrag 'thung chen po hUM gi le'u// lta ba chen po 'di gsungs so// hUM las 'byung lnga yum gyi dbyings// gzhal yas hUM nyid b+ha ga'i klong// 'dus byas ma byas rnam par dang// hUM las khrag 'thung khri bzhir

'bar// spros med thig ler gnas pa'i phyir// ma bcos lhun gyis grub par gnas// ma tshogs hUM gi dbang phyug ma// seng ge lta bu'i sgra sgrogs shing// sgra nyid sgra mthar stong pa'i phyir// stong nyid ye shes rnam

par dag/ hUM las pad+ma kha stong ldan// gsang ba'i b+ha gar lhun gyis grub// hUM/ nyi zla zung du brtsegs pa yang// shes rab thabs su 'brel pa yis// phyag rgya yod pa'i dkyil 'khor che// hUM las zhe sdang rdo rje'i

sku// 'byung byed chen por gyur pas nas// skye med dbyings su rnam par dag/ sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus kun// ye shes thugs kyi rang bzhin te// thig le hUM gi bdag nyid che// hUM las rgyan gyi bye brag

rnams// dbyings las ye shes 'jug pa'i phyir// dbyings nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan// hUM las 'bar ba'i skur gyur pa// chos skur gcig pur sbyor ba'i don// hUM las dbu lngar snang ba ni// ye shes lnga nyid

dbyings la 'phyo// hUM las spyan lnga bgrod pa yang// dbang po yul la rnam par dag/ hUM las ljags lngar 'bar ba yang// dbang po ro la sbyor ba'o// hUM las shangs lnga'i 'tshub ma yang// dbang po dri ma rnam par
dag/ hUM las snyan lnga'i gsan pa yang// ma bkag bsgral ba ci bder sbyor// hUM las zhal lngar gdangs pa yang// srid gsum dbyings su za ba'o// hUM las rta mgo ljang gu yang// chags pas dbang du bsdus

nas ni// ma chags dbyings la ye shes rol// e ma ya mtshan dbang gi sku// sna tshogs cir yang ston mod kyang// spros med thig le rnam dag pas// 'di ni rnam dag hUM le'u// thams cad stong pa'i dbyings su
blta'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ khrag 'thung hUM gi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe lnga pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul ba dang// ngan song gnas
nas 'don pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// bskyed rdzogs chen po'i le'u 'di gsungs// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i sa bon sngags// e yaM sogs las rim pa bzhin// gzhal yas khang du bsgom

par bya// rin chen rgyan la sogs pas mdzes// de yi nang du dmigs pa ni// tsakra la sogs 'khor lo che// rtsibs dang rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang// lte ba bar khyams sgo khyud dang// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
ldan// lte ba zlum por gyur pa la// dpa' bo hUM las rdo rje che// de las phyag rgya bskyed pa yis// zhe sdang rgyal po rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo'i mdun gyi drang por ni/ dpa' bo A+oM las 'khor lo

che// de la phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// gti mug rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yas su lta ba'i 'khor lo las// dpa' bo swA las rin po che// de la phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// nga rgyal rgyal po rnam par bsgom// rgyab

kyi 'khor lo bsam pa yang// dpa' bo A+oM las pad+ma che// de las phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// 'dod chags rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yon gyi rtsibs la dmigs pa ni// dpa' bo hA las rgya gram ste// de las

phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// phrag dog rgyal po rnam par bsgom// dpa' bo 'bru lngas 'gyur ba'i sku// yab yum phyag rgyar gsal ba las// byang chub sems kyi sa bon ni// dbang chen pad+ma gar gyi sku// rdzogs pa
chen por bsgom pa yang// dpa' bo 'bru lngas bskyed pa yang// rtags su dbu lngar rab tu bstan// hUM las kun tu thal ba'i dbu// 'dod khams dbang du sdud pa'o// oM las dri za gnon pa'i dbu// swA las
grul bum dbang du sdud// AM las klu yang dbang du sdud// hA las gnod sbyin dbang du sdud pa'o// thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i zhabs// khro bo brgyad la khyab par sbyor// gzi ldan yum dang sprul pa'i
'khor// dbang chen sku la yongs su rdzogs// bskyed rdzogs le'u zhes de la bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ bskyed rdzogs chen po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig

'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// rgyud drug gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// dmar 'byin rak+ta'i le'u 'di gsungs so// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin skad cig mas// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i

skur bsgyur bar// hUM zhes pas ni rdzogs par ro// dbu lnga pa la phyag bcu drug/ dbu la dkyil 'khor lnga yang rdzogs// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha thogs// zhabs brgyad dur khrod brgyad la sbyor// phyag rgya de ltar

gsal ba dang// gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// spyi bor dzaHlas lcags kyu yis// dbyings la ye shes 'jug tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// kha yi raM las 'od 'phros 'dus// dzaHyis lcags kyus

drangs pa dang// rdo la lcags ni 'du tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// snying gar yaM las 'od 'phro 'dus// rlung gi 'khor lo zur drug pa'i// 'khor los rab tu gcod tshul du// pha rol snying rtsa gcad

pa'i phyir// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba dang// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// rta mchog 'bar ba'i
shangs lnga las// rlung gis mi la spyang ku'i gdong// mche bas bdud kyi snying rtsa gcod// rna ba sbrul gyi 'dzul khung nas// sbrul gyi mi la spyang ku'i gdong// kha rlangs sprin gyi dkyil 'khor

nas// 'od kyi mi la 'ja' tshon gdong// ral pa khrag gi zar bu las// khrag gi mi la spyang ku'i gdong// spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba las// zangs kyi mi la spyang ku'i gdong// kha la ro sha la rbad/ gung gi dun

dun rbad/ gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba dang// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa yis// pho nya yid mgyogs rlung bas
myur// lcags kyi mi la mkha' gshog can// phyag rgya bcu drug 'bar ba la// lcags kyi mi mo brgyad sprul pa// lcags gshog khyung gi 'dab ma can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// la la byan lag mgo bo

la// lus ni lcags kyi spyang mor sprul// la la khyung gi mgo bo la// lus ni zangs kyi wa mor sprul// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni dre'u nag rkang gsum mo// la la khwa yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang

gcig pa// la la chun lag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi spyang mor sprul// la la chu bya'i mgo bo la// lus ni bcu drug tshang mar sprul// la la bzhad kyi mgo bo la// lus ni byu ru'i seng ger sprul// la la kang+ka'i
mgo bo la// lus ni lcags dre'u rkang gcig po// la la 'ug pa'i mgo bo la// lus ni dung phag dkar mor sprul// la la pu shud mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul// la la mthing ril mgo bo

la// lus ni dre'u nag rkang gsum po// la la skyin gyi mgo bo la// lus ni byi la rtsal bo chen// la la bya rgod mgo bo la// lus ni gser stag ser po sprul// gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i
sems can rnams// dmyal khams bcu drug kha brims te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'di la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// dmar po 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las

mdzod// bdag phyag rgyar gsal bar byas la/ gcod pa dang byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'bum bzlas/ las grub pa la the tshom med/ rdo rje sder mo can gyi gsang sngags kyis drang ngo// dbang chen bsdus pa'i
tan tra las/ dmar 'byin gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bdun pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// 'byung po dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// chos kyi
pho nya'i le'u 'di gsungs// bskul pa'i las dag rbad pa'i phyir// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer ni// dpa' mchog drag shul stag gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// stag mgo dmar po dbu
lnga me ltar 'bar// stag lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dri za dbang sdud gdon
bgegs thal bar rlaugs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// lcags mgo sngon mo dbu lnga me ltar
'bar// lcags lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar lhor khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// drang srong dbang sdus dgra bgegs thal bar

rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje dmar po'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// rdo rje'i lag pa zhe sdang
glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gshin rje dbang sdud dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer

'phros pa ni// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril pa'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// sbrul mgo nag po'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// sbrul lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig
mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho nub khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// srin po dbang sdud dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dbang gi bse khrab gzi
'bar bgrad pa'i chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// bse mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// bse lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// nub
phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// klu srin dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// za byed chen po ting 'dzin mche ba'i chas// khro bo yab

yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// za byed mche ba'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// mche ba'i lag pa zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// nub phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka'
nyan ma// rlung lha dbang sdud dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gzi mdangs shu ken sprul pa dar gyi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// dar mgo

dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// dar lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// byang phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gnod sbyin dbang sdud gdon
bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gcan gzan rgyal po gdug pa gzig gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// gzig mgo dmar mo dbu

lnga me ltar 'bar// gzig lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// byang shar khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dbang ldan dbang sdud gdon bgegs thal
bar rlogs// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa'i dpung 'joms ma// za byed mche bas gdug pa'i dpung yang 'joms// nga rgyal bsnyems pas pha rol zil gyis gnon// tug chom 'brug sgras srin
po'i thod rus 'joms// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa srid pa dbang du sdud// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ phrin las dus la bab po gshegs su gsol// ma ma bgyis pas ma mo bskul// dzaHdzaHbgyis pas

mkha' 'gro rbad// he he bgyis pas phra men dgye// hrIHhrIHbgyis pas rta mgrin mngag/ b+h+yo b+h+yo bgyis pas dbang phyug bod// dbyangs su tshangs pa'i glu drug blangs// las su dgra bgegs ma lus bsgral// rtags

su gsang ba'i rnge'u chung brdung// dpal gyi phrin las dus la bab// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ glo rdeg chas kyi pho nya mngag pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal

'byor gyis// rdo rje che mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// bkra shis gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas mchog tu// phun sum tshogs dang ldan byas nas// bkra

shis ma d+hal zlum po la// 'dom gang tshad dang ldan par bya// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la// stegs bu zla gam re re bkod// phyogs bzhir zla gam bzhi pa la// gshog pa mo la sogs pa bzhi// steng du b+han+d+ha bzhi
dang bcas// mtshams kyi zla gam bzhi po la// za byed la sogs yum bzhi yang// b+han+da bzhi la rdo rjes mtshan// shin tu brtags te bkod par bya// dbus kyi lta ba zlum po la// yum mchog gzi ldan pad+ma

can// zla gam kha sprod thod par bcas// snying po sngags dang bcas par dgod// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog mi mnga' yang// bdud dang gshin rje gdul ba dang// tshe dang bsod nams brtan pa'i phyir// rdo rje'i ra
bas kun tu bskor// rnal 'byor gang zhig skal yod pa// dkyil 'khor de yis don yang bshad// rdzas la dngos grub gsol ba gdab// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob pa'i phyir// tshe bum b+han+da srub med la// mgul
chings gsang ba'i ras kyis dkri// nang du dpa' bo sman dang bcas// snying po yum gyi skur bskyed cing// gsang ba'i bsnyen pa dgu 'bum dbul// bum par bsdu zhing dbyings su thim// sbyor ba'i byang chub
sems dang bcas// mkha' la spros shing dbyings su bsdu// de las sems kyis skur bsgom pas// tshon gang sku yis stong gsum gang// tshe gnas 'phrul gyi dgongs pa che// spel ba'i cho ga yin par gsungs//

rnal 'byor yab yum sbyor ba'i sems// dmar po hrIHdang ldan spros nas// gzi ldan thugs kar thim byas te// gnyis su med par gyur pa ni// bstim pa'i cho ga yin par gsungs// sbyor ba'i sems la 'phro 'du na//

khams gsum gang nas 'dus pa dang// gzi ldan lte ba'i gzhal yas su// thim gyur rgya gram gtams pas bcad// bdud dang mu stegs gang gis kyang// 'di la mthong bar mi nus pas// sba ba'i chos gang yin par gsungs//

sbyor ba'i byang chub sems kyi sprin// dzaHdzaHsprin phung 'phro 'du las// klu dang srin po 'khor bcas kyi// tshe dang gzi brjid bkug nas kyang// bum pa gzi ldan thugs kar bsdu// 'di ni 'gugs pa'i cho gar gsungs//

sbyor ba'i byang sems hUM dkar spro// de la rtse gsum rdo lcags kyu// tshe nyams ldeg pa'i sbyor ba yis// lus ngag yid gsum brlabs nas ni// sku gsung thugs su gsal ba dang// nr-i yang hUM du byin brlabs te//
shin tu gang ngam rgyas pa ni// gso ba'i cho ga yin par gsungs// thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang// mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa yin// dbang du bsdu ba'i cho ga yin// cir snang ci srid byang chub sems//

de las phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor che// g.yo dang mi g.yo sna tshogs kun// mi nub ldan pa'i A yu sems// dmar po dbang bsdus rgyas btab pa// rgyas gdab cho ga yin par gsungs// thams cad ma lus gzi ldan yum//

dkyil 'khor bum par bcas pa kun// mi dmigs gzi ldan mkha' la thim// tshon gang gsal ba'i sku bskyed nas// mu tig nas tsam phyag na bsnams// rkang pa 'di gnyis dpyad dgos// de nyid ye shes phyag na bsnams//

gnyis su med par gyur pa dang// skye med chos kun rtogs pa ni// gnas kyi cho ga yin par gsungs// so sor pho nya gtang ba yang// spel ba'i dus na gshog pa mo// bstim pa'i dus na dra ba can// sba ba'i dus na sder mo can//

dgug pa'i dus na glog 'gyu ma// gso ba'i dus na mgo brnyan can// dbang du bsdu ba dmar mo'i tshogs// rgyas 'debs dus na gsang yum bzhi// bsgrub pa chen po rdzogs pa dang// dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur dang//
smon lam gdab dang pra la sogs// phrin las bcol dang gtor ma gtang// gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du bya// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ bkra shis tshe yi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa'o////
tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal
'byor rtogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// lta ba byang chub sems kyi le'u 'di gsungs// ting 'dzin thabs kyi brgyud pa'i bye brag la// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim
pa cir snang ba// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// gzhal yas yid bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yang// skyon med yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su
blta// me ri dmar po phyogs bzhi 'phro ba yang// stong khams yongs su bsregs pa'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// me 'brug dmar mo nag mor snang pa yang// zhe sdang gdug
pa'i dgra bgegs gdul ba dang// gnyan po gzhan ma med pa'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// 'phan dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang// bla re rgyal mtshan la sogs mang po
kun// chos kyi ru mtshon chen po 'phyar ba yis// bdud bzhi bsnyal mgo gnan pa'i phyir// gdug pa'i gnyen po gzhan med pas// pha rol zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su
blta// rin chen khri rkang phyogs bzhir gsal ba yang// sprin med nyi bdun gsal ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// gser gyi seng ge nyir shu bzhir snang ba// stobs kyi

dpag tshad gzhan las dpag pa'i phyir// theg pa'i ba dan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// theg pa phra mo 'dul ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// pad+ma stong dang ldan par snang ba yang// sna

tshogs 'byung zhing skye ba'i gzhi dang ldan// nyes pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i mthu yod pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// ye shes rin chen nyi zla'i 'od snang bas// 'jig rten yongs su sgron ltar

'bar ba dang// stong gsum mun nag sel ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// zhe sdang rdo rje phyag rgya'i skur gsal ba// rgyal ba mang po'i thugs kyi dngos gzhi ste// gcig las
'dod dgur sgyur ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// rmad byung pad+ma gar gyi skur gsal bas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdu ba dang// ngan song gnas su stong pa'i mthu

ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu bstan pa ni// klu yi rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul phrog pa dang// thugs rje chags pas 'gro ba bsgral ba'i mthu ldan pas// yab

yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa ni// rdzu 'phrul la sogs gang yang thogs pa med// myur ba'i shugs ldan mkha' la dbyings phyug ma// thugs rje kun la snyoms pa'i
mthu ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// bcu drug phyag na mtshon cha bsnams pa yang// phra men bcu drug dbyings la rol ba dang// mi mthun gnyen pos 'dul ba'i mthu
ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// sku la tshar gsum phreng dang ldan pa ni// dug gsum tshogs la zhen pa bzlog pa dang// dug gsum dbyings su sgrol ba'i mthu yod pas// yab yum

gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// mnyen lcug sbrul gyi chun por snang ba yang// sku la zhe sdang gdug pa mi mnga' yang// mi mthun dregs pa gzhil bar bya ba dang// klu dbang 'khor gyis dbang bskur mthu
ldan pas// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// zhabs kyis khro brgyad zil gnon gtang ba yang// sa bcu 'das shing pha rol phyin rdzogs te// dbang bcu cig char rdzogs pa'i mthu ldan pas// yab

yum gnyis med byang chub sems su blta// phyag rgya chen po gcig tu ma nges te// 'khor gyi pho nya yang sprul mang po dang// dbang gi sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos kyang// log rtog 'dul phyir rnam par sprul pa

ni// sku gsung nyid las g.yos pa med pa ni// thams cad ma lus spros med thig le che// 'byung ba lnga la sogs pas bsdus pa kun// ye nas spros med byang chub sems su blta// lta ba 'di la gang zhig bsgom pa

ni// da lta nyid nas skal ba byang chub mnyam// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ lta ba byang chub sems kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// nye bar
bsgrub pa'i man ngag tu// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// sbyor ba'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// phyi rabs skal ba ldan pa yis// ma nyams brtson pas spyad byas nas// the tshom med cing nges par

'grub// lus dang ngag yid phyag rgya che// dbyings nas gsang ba'i yum bskyed pa// snying po 'bru dang bcas pas so// mnyam pas mnyam pa'i phyag rgya gsal// gnyis su med par sbyar ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i rtse

mor A+oM ser po// ye shes lnga yi sa bon bsam// rdo rje rtse lngar gyur par dmigs// de dkyil AHlas zla ba ste// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul lo// gzi ldan gsang bar e gru gsum// de dkyil ma las nyi ma

ste// de steng pad+ma'i baM las brtag/ shes rab phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul lo// sku bskyed phyag rgya gsal ba dang// so sor gsang ba'i brda mtshon te// bstod cing bskul dang ldan byas nas// A+oM dang mUM gyi 'phro 'du

las// cho ga gsum gyi byin rlabs las// pra be sha zhes sgo phye ste// 'dab brgyad pad+ma nyi mar bcas// de dbus gsang ba'i rdo rje dbul// hUM gis gsor zhing ha yis bskyod// yang nas yang du bskyod pa ni// sku
gsung dbyings su bskul ba'o// hUM ni yab kyi byang chub sems// go ro tsa na'i dbyings nas bton// srog chags gsang ba'i sbubs su sbyang// ljags kyi dbang por bskyil ba dang// n+wa sa'i

dbyings nas klad par bskul// tshor ba nyams su myong nas ni// bsgal ba'i rtsad du brgyud nas kyang// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam du sbyang// b+ha ga gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yang nas yang du spro zhing bsdu// nyi

ma zla ba pad+ma dang// rdo rje la sogs 'dren pa dang// sbyor ba'i byang chub rab spros pas// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// mtha' yas sems can don yang bya// slar 'dus phyag rgya'i skur 'gyur

ba// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang po// de yang yab yum sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni lce la gzhag/ rdzas las tshe yi dngos grub gsol// 'di ni sbyor ba'i lung du grags// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer

las// slar yang yum gyi dbyings su thim// de las phyag rgya'i skur bsgom la// dong tse tsam gyis zla dkyil du// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang dmar// yung 'bru tsam gyi go mnabs pa// g.yas pas yid bzhin
nor bu bsnams// g.yon pas rin chen za ma tog/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal ba ltar// sprul pas bdag gzhan don byas pa// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// sbyor ba chen pos bskyed pa'o// rdzogs nas
mthol bshags bzod par gsol// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rngom brjid ni// skye

med thabs kyi phyag rgya che// 'di ni dpa' bo chen po'i sku// khro bo rngom brjid rgyal po'i le'u// blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ phyi rabs skal ldan don phyir gsungs// sku las rngam pa bzhir grags pa// nam
mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya des// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngam// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan mchog rngam// tsham rngams chen po'i stongs thabs rngam// gsung las rngam pa bzhir grags pa// hom lngar

'brel ba'i zhal rngam/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngam/ skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems rngam/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngam// thugs kyi rngam bzhir grags pa/ ting 'dzin nam mkha'i

rgyan gyi skar tshogs lta bu rngam// phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi rlabs lta bu rngam// yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing nags tshal lta bu rngam// mdzad pa'i rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs lta bu rngam// yon tan gyi rngam bzhir
grags pa/ rU tra bcom pa'i gnas rngam/ lha chen mnan pa'i gdan rngam/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing rngam/ rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngam/ sku yi brjid pa bzhir grags pa/ sku che yan lag rags
pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid che/ gsung gi brjid pa bzhir grags pas/ gdangs che
stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig nyung the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid che/ gsal bas mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs kyi brjid pa bzhir grags la/ thugs
rjes thugs dam mthar phyin brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul ba brjid che/ ma bkag sa ler mkhyen pas brjid che/ sna tshogs cing yang ston pas brjid che/ yon tan brjid pa bzhir grags pa/ med la
zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig las 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par mdzad pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos pas brjid che// phrin las brjid pa bzhir grags pa/
phrin las rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ mi bsnyengs nyams bag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun ring mi bsnyengs brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas

brjid che/ de ltar dbang chen he ru ka'i/ yon tan sum cu rtsa drug gis// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su sbyar// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por sbyar// dbyings las ye shes chen po ste// ngan 'gro mtho ris skyas
btags pas// dmyal tshogs dong sprug chen por mdzad// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang// 'di ni rdul cha bskyed du med// srid gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum dus gcig dbyings
su thim// thig le chos skur yi gnas pas// dbang chen zhes kyang 'di la bsngags// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ khro bo rngom brjid rgyal po'i le'u ste lnga bcu nga gnyis pa'o//// tshe la

dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// tshe dang dbang thang spel ba'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// gzi byin tshe yi le'u 'di gsungs so// dang por phun sum tshogs ldan nas// bka' dang mthun

pa'i dgon gnas su// man d+hal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum tshad du ni// khru gang gru gsum 'phang du brtsig/ ngos su zla gam bzhi pa la// bar khyams sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// me dpung 'bar

bas mtha' bskor zhing// shin tu mdzes dang ldan par bri// la k+Sha phun sum tshogs pa yang// gzi ldan mtshan dang ldan par bri// thod pa ma gas khyad par can// lcang lo 'bar bas brgyan pa lnga// dbus dang

phyogs bzhi zla gam la'o// sman dang dza gad rgun chang ngam// mngar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma sogs// ji tsam 'byor ba'i yo byad rnams// gong ma'i snod rnams rab tu dgang// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ tshe dang
gzi brjid spel ba'i phyir// thabs la mkhas pas 'di skad gsungs// sbyang dang spel dang bsgom pa dang// yig 'bru spro dang bsdu ba dang// rigs kyi pho nya gtang ba dang// bsnyen pa'i grangs dang

rgyas gdab dang// phra dang rig pas mngon sum bsdu// blta bas lhan ner gsal ba'o// de la sbyang bar bya ba yang// sngags dang phyag rgya pho nya dang// chos nyid dag pa'i ngang gis so// spel ba'i don dang rang

bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mkha' ltar khyab// 'di ni spel ba'i lung du gsungs// bsgom par bya ba 'di dag ste// snod bcud yum gyi dbyings su bsgom// snang srid

phyag rgya'i tshogs su bsgom// 'di ni bsgom pa'i lung du gsungs// yig 'bru spro bar bya ba ni// A yu dmar po dbang gi sku// bsnyen pa'i sa bon nyid du spro// 'di ni spro ba'i lung du gsungs// bskul dang don

byas 'dus pa dang// gzi dang ldan pa'i dpal be'u na// sems dpa'i sku dang ldan par bya// rigs kyi pho nya dgye ba ni// shar nas rdo rje'i pho nya mo// gshog pa'i lus la pho nya'i gdong// lho nas rdo rje pho nya

mo// gshog pa'i lus la rin chen gdong// nub nas rdo rje pho nya mo// gshog pa'i lus la sprul gyi gdong// byang nas rdo rje'i pho nya mo// the'u gshog lus la sprul pa'i gdong// dbus nas mgyogs pa'i pho nya
mo// ba man lus la 'khor lo'i gdong// rgyan dang cha lugs smos par mthun// bsnyen pa'i grangs ni 'di dag gi/ A yu sems kyi rang bzhin ni// gdod nas ma skyes nam mkha' bzhin// bun ne ma bkag ci
bder yan// rtogs nas zhag gcig drug stong bzla// de ltar rtags nas grangs rdzogs pa// 'di ni bsnyen pa'i lung du gsungs// mkhas ldan chen pos rgyas gdab pa// thams cad mnyam nyid chos sku
la// gcig tu bsdus nas gzi ldan rgya// thugs kar rdo rje rgya gram gyis// 'gyur ba med par bstim la gdab// 'di ni rgyas btab lung du gsungs// pra la dbab par bya ba ni// rin chen me tog bor nas
kyang// gang la bab pa'i tshe dbang bskur// 'di ni phra dbab lung du gsungs// rig pas skur gsal bya ba dang// blta ba thams cad sangs rgyas pa'o// 'di ni mngon sum lung du gsungs// de nas bskul cing
don bya ba// bdag nyid dpal gyi thugs ka nas// lcags kyu zhags pa'i pho nya rnams// tshe dang gzi mdangs phrog phyir bskul// lcags kyus bskul bas gshin rje 'dzin// zhags pas bsdams pas 'byung po
'dul// sgrog gis thams cad sdom par byed// dril bus lus sems myos par byed// tshe la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gang na gnas pa thams cad kun// bkug nas rnam shes A yur dmigs// 'phro
'dus don byas slar 'dus dang// A lu skye med dang po'i gnas// sa nas chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// tshe dang gzi brjid 'phel rgyas shing// sdug bsngal bde bar byin rlobs pas// gzi byin le'u

'di yang sngags// de nas rdzas dang lag cha dang// sman la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams// mkhas ldan chen pos 'di ltar ro// sna tshogs mtshan mar snang ba yi// rdzas dang lag cha'i mtshan ma kun// so so'i mtshan

nyid mngon sum yang// sgyu ma lta bur mngon byas te// sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol// ye shes nyid la ye shes thim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya che// 'di ni byang chub sems kyi rgya// ma btab bzhin du yongs la
gsal// skye shi med pa'i chos skur dmigs// 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs su 'gyur// 'gyur ba med pa'i sku bsnyes pas// gzi byin tshe yi le'u'o// zhes gsungs so// dmar chen bsdus pa'i tan tra
las// gzi byin tshe'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched du/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ phun sum tshogs pa

brgyad kyi le'u 'di gsungs// de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa bca' ba dang// dus phun sum tshogs pa 'du ba dang/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ rdzas phun sum tshogs pa

btsal ba dang/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bsags pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa bsar ba dang/ phrin las phun sum tshogs pa spyad pa dang/ dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa bsdu ba'o// de ltar phun

sum tshogs pa brgyad dang ldan par bya dgos te/ tan tra ma mo las kyang/ bsgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// gnas ma brtags dang dus las yol// 'khor dang mi ldan rdzas ma rnyed// yo byad ma tshang ting 'dzin
g.yel// phrin las ma 'grub dngos grub yal// 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i skyon brgyad yin// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa po dang// don las yid ches ma gyur kyang// thos pa'i sems ni rtse gcig

gis// bsgrim nas phun sum tshogs byas na// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yal mi 'gyur// 'di la the tshom ci ste za// zhes sungs so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// phun sum tshogs pa brgyad kyi le'u ste lnga bcu
bzhi pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phun sum tshogs pa brgyad dang ldan byas nas// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched du// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// khyad par

dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs// de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ ye rgya spyi yi dbang dang// khyad par rim pa'i dbang ngo// ye rgya spyi yi dbang ni rgyud las 'di skad do// rgyal thabs spyi blug theg chen ma ti'i
dbang// bskur ro tsam gyis thob pa'o// khyad par rim pa'i dbang la yang// thabs gang gis dbang ba dang// don chen ci la dbang ba dang// dbang gi dngos gzhi bstan pa dang/ dbang gi grangs
bstan pa dang// dbang rtags ci 'chang ba bstan pa dang/ dbang ba yul ci la bsgyur bstan pa dang/ dbang gi tshad bstan pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'i dus bstan pa dang// dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan pa

dang/ dbang gi khyad par bstan pa dang/ dbang gi man ngag bstan pa dang/ dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'o// de lta bas na phyi nang gsang ba yi// theg pa'i rim pa ci snyed gsungs mod kyi// de yi nang nas 'bras
bu theg rgyal bsngags// 'bras bu theg rgyal nang nas dbang lung gces// shes bzhinadabang med rloms sems can// kha cig yam ma brla dang gsob 'dra bas// don dang mthun pa'i skyes bu dbang chen
la// rtags dang ldan pas dbang bskur shin tu rigs// dbang med kha cig rang dbang zos gyur cing// thug thub khong yangs shes thos gtsor bzhag nas// che bzhi med bzhin yod pa'i las spyod pa// ngan song
gsum gyi sa bon de yin pas// srid par 'khyams shing chos lam ring bar snang// bka' la brten nas dbang med bka' rkun la// dbang lung tshad mar brgyud pa'i skyes bu yis// bskur yang mi thob bong
bu'i spyod pa bzhin// thob par mi 'gyur chags par mi 'gyur ro// dbang gi khyad par bsten pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phun sum tshogs pa brgyad

dang ldan byas nas// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched du// dbang gi khyad par rim par bskur nas kyang// 'da' ga thugs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// bsdam par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// srog gi phyir
yang mi 'da' 'o// sna tshogs dngos por snang ba yang// dngos po med pa'i skur gsal bas// rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da'o// sgra mtha' sna tshogs grags pa yang// smra ba med pa'i gsung yin pas// rig pa'i
don las mi 'da'o// bstan du med pa'i bsam pa ni// de yi thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de las 'da' bar mi bya'o// sku sung thugs las ma g.yos kyang// che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung// 'od yang zad med
'phel med pa// yon tan dam tshig yin par grags// 'di las 'da' bar mi bya'o// btsal ba med pa'i las gang yin// de nyid thabs kyi spyod mchog pas// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// lnga po 'di

la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor skal ldan dam pa'o// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// byang chub sems dang sha rnams dang// khrag dang dri chu dri chen pa// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa 'di// bde gshegs lnga
yi thugs dam ste// bsgrub pa gnas pas mi spang zhing// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// brtul zhugs chen po'i dam tshig ni// dka' thub sdom la gnas pa'i phyi// bdud rtsi dam rdzas rkyen bcas
la// thogs pa med pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// spang len med pa'i rol pa bya// de las 'da' bar mi bya'o// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// lha dang rdzas dang tshe la sogs// snying pa yig 'brur bcas pa

rnams/ gnyis su med par rtogs byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su gzhag/ de las 'da' bar mi bya'o// spyad pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// pad+ma can dang dung can dang// ba glang can dang ri mo can// mi

mo mig ring la sogs la// phrad par gyur pa sbyar ba yin// mthong ba tsam gyi dam tshig ste// dbang po yul du shes mtshon bya// de las 'da' gar mi bya'o// grub par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nyon mongs lnga po

gnas su dag/ sku lnga ye shes lngar sbyar cing// thams cad lha yi phyag rgyar gsal// 'di las 'da' bar mi bya'o// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'khor ba'i chos lnga ma spangs par// spyad pas grol te mya ngan
'das// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dus// 'di las 'da' bar mi bya'o// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig ni// ta na ga Na la sogs spyad pa yang// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams kyi bka'// ma byin par yang blang ba dang// mi dbang par yang spyod pa dang// lha dang slob dpon mched la sogs// de la rdzun gyi tshig smra zhing// brlang po'i tshigs kyis zhes bgam ba// de las 'da'

bar mi bya'o// glu bro gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// dbyings nyid rtogs pa'i sa gzhi la// b+hud+d+ha khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dkar sku yi dam tshig go/ me long gsal ba'i sa

gzhi la// rdo rje khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa yis// 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig go/ mnyam pa chen po'i sa gzhi la// rin chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// nga rgyal gnas su 'joms

pa ste// yon tan lhun grubs dam tshig bro// so sor r+t+rog pa'i sa gzhi la// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// 'dod chags gnas su 'joms pa ste// sgrar mtha' gsung gi dam tshig go/ nan tan chen po'i sa gzhi

la// karma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// phrag dog gnas su 'joms pa ste// phrin las 'da' dka'i dam tshig go/ stong nyid ye shes sa gzhi la// dbang chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su 'joms pa

ste// sku lnga lhun sbyor dam tshig go/ dbyings phyug lnga yi sa gzhi la// ye shes drug gi bro brdungs shing// dug lnga 'joms pa'i glu blangs pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i gzhung bskams nas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting
bskams te// sku gsung thugs su rgyas btab pas// bde ba chen po'i sar gnas te// dmyal tshogs me dpung gnas su bsad// 'di ni dpal gyi bro bo che// thos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa
'byang// brdung ba tsam gyis thugs dam bskang// 'di ni gru bro'i dam tshig ste// 'di las 'da' bar mi bya'o// thams cad chos sku gdal ba che// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// 'da' dka' thugs kyi

dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched du// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// man ngag sbas pa'i le'u 'di

gsungs// pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang// gdan dang 'byug bar bcas pa rnams// dbang chen rim gyis bskyed pa yi// 'byung ba lnga yi yi ge hUM la sbas// rigs bzhi sbas pa'i he ru ka/ rin chen khri rkang

bzhi la sbas// ma tshogs dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// 'degs pa'i seng ge'i gdan du sbas// ma bdun gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni// gsang ba'i nyi ma bdun du bas// gdan khri pad+mar brtsegs pa yang// shes rab yum

gyi rang bzhin te// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar sbas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yang// man ngag gsang bar brgyud pa ni// gar gyi dbang phyug sku la sbas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// dbu lnga'i gzhal
yas nyid la sbas// gsung dbyangs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbu yi rta mgo ljang gur sbas// skye med ye shes sems dpa' ni// thugs ka'i dpal gyi le'ur sbas// dur khrod phra men bcu drug ni// 'jigs

pa'i phyag mtshan bcu drug nyid la sbas// gdul bya phyag gi bye brag bcu drug ni// ta kr-i bcu drug ngo bo nyid la sbas// cho gnas gsang ba'i yum chen gzi ldan ma// gsang mchog thugs kyi rdo rje nyid la

sbas// sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po kun// chos sku dngos por mi mthong bas// dmus long 'khor ba'i tshogs su sbas// bka' nyan las kyi pho nya kun// dbyings la rtogs pa mi mnga' bas// khyi dang spyang

ku'i tshogs su sbas// sgo srung yab yum brgyad rnams kyang// sprul sku dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir// mgo dgu rkang gcig nyid du sbas// me 'brug rlung 'brug la sogs kun// sgra nyid sgra mthar stong pa'i
phyir// stong ba chen po nyid la sbas// de ltar gang zhig rtogs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bya ba de nyid yin// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// man ngag sbas pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun
pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched du// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ yang dag don gyi rnam grangs le'u 'di gsungs so// de yang
gang dang gang zhes ma nor bar rtogs pa'i blta ba yang dag pa dang/ ma bgrod par phyin pa'i sa yang dag pa dang/ ma bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub yang dag pa dang/ gnyis su mi 'byed pa'i spyod pa
yang dag pa dang/ bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig yang dag pa dang/ 'bad pa min pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag pa dang/ bris pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa dang/ bsgom du med pa'i lha yang dag pa dang/

bskur ba med pa'i dbang yang dag pa dang/ ma song bar phyin pa'i gnas yang dag pa dang/ brjod du med pa'i tshig yang dag pa dang bcu gcig tu bka' stsal to// de la ma nor bar rtogs pa'i blta ba yang dag

pa ni/ rgyud las/ blta ba 'di la gang gnas pa/ rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang ces 'byung// ma bgrod par phyin pa'i sa yang dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ kun tu 'od kyi sa las 'das nas ni// pad+ma can du gyur pa
na ces 'byung// ma bsgrubs par grub pa'i dngos grub yang dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ ngang la gnas pa dngos grub yin/ klong du gyur pas bsgrubs thabs so// zhais 'byung/ gnyis su mi 'byed pa'i spyod pa yang

dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ bla med theg par rab nges na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// de ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs zhes 'byung// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig yang dag

pa ni/ rgyud las/ gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang// 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni// bde gshegs lnga'i rang bzhin pas// bsrung du med pa'i sdom pa can// zhes 'byung/ 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus yang

dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ mi len byang chub spyod pa la// byed pa med pa las yin te// mi btsal bzhag pa brtson 'grus so// zhes 'byung// bri ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa ni// rgyud las/ 'byung ba yum

gyi gzhal yas na// snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin// bri bar bya ba ming yang med// ces 'byung/ bsgom du med pa'i lha yang dag pa ni// rgyud las/ bdag nyid chen po'i don rtogs nas// sangs rgyas

kun gyi nying sha can// bsgom pas gzhan nas mi rnyed do// zhes 'byung/ bskur ba med pa'i dbang yang dag pa ni// rgyud las/ dbyings dang ye shes don rtogs na// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen yin// rdo rje
dril bu rig pas bzung// zhes 'byung// ma song bar phyin pa'i gnas yang dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ khams gsum yum gyi b+ha ga las// gang ltar song yang gnas kyi mchog/ ces 'byung/ brjod du med pa'i tshig

yang dag pa ni/ rgyud las/ mtshan ma ming du btags pa yang// mtshan ma med pa'i chos yin pas// tshig tu brjod pa'i tha snyad bral// zhes 'byung// don de lta bas na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ don de

ltar yid ches nas/ rtogs pa klung du gyur nas bsgom pa ni/ b+hud+ha tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// dz+nyA na tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// bA+o b+hi tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// don 'di la yid ma ches shing/ yin ma yin zhe'am/ 'di

lta bu'i lta bas gtan la mi phebs zhes skur pa 'debs shing rtogs pa klung du ma gyur na ni/ karma tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// rak+sha tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// nA ga tsit+ta dz+wa la yin no// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// yang
dag don gyi rnam grangs kyi le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don sbad du// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ rmad byung

byang chub sems kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// 'bar ba'i dbu lnga rmad du byung ba ni// ye shes lnga dang yum lnga dbang po sbyor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du lhan ne bsgom// 'bar ba'i rta mgo rmad du byung ba ni// lang+ka la
sogs he ru gsum du snang// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i ral pa rmad du byung ba ni// dbyings las ma g.yos chos sku 'bar ba las// khro bo mun dza'i cod paN bye ba

'bum// sprul sku'i 'gro don sgrol bar lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i spyan lnga rmad du byung ba ni// dbang po yul dang gnyis med sbyor ba yin// yin dang ma yin rnam pa'i bye brag rnams// cig char bcad nas

dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i shangs lnga rmad du byung ba ni// dbang po yul dang gnyis med sbyor ba yin// bsrung ba chos kyi bye brag so so yang// tshor ba nyams su myong shing tshims gyur nas// skye
'gag med pa'i ngang la lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i snyan lnga rmad du byung ba ni// gsan pa ma 'gags sgra mtha' so so yang// de nyid sgra mthar stong pas chos kyi sku// med pa zad mi shes pa lhan ner

bsgom// 'bar ba'i zhal lnga rmad du byung ba ni// hom lngar 'brel bas rgyud lnga bsreg pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du nyid du snang mod kyi// gar yang ma 'phros dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i ljags lnga

rmad du byung ba ni// bden pa'i don ston gsung rab mang po 'chad// sde snod rgyud la rmongs pa'i mi mnga' ba'i// le'u brgan chags pas 'gro ba sgrol bar bsgom// 'bar ba'i ag tshoms rmad du byung ba ni// chos

sku mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo las// gzugs sku 'ja' tshon lta bur sprul par bsgom// 'bar ba'i tshems lnga rmad du byung ba ni// 'khor ba rtsad gcod ye shes chen po lngas// skye med don rtogs dbyings su gzhug

pa'i phyir// ma g.yos chos kyi dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sprul gyi zhags pa dang// khro chen snying 'byin rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ thod rlon khrag dang rdo rje lu gu

rgyud// rdo rje lcags kyu dang ni rnge'u chung 'dzin// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar rdo rje kha T+wAM sgrol// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ so so'i phyag mtshan dngos su

gsal ba yang// snang tsam ny-id na rang bzhin med pas na// stong pa chen po'i thig le sa ler bsgom// 'bar ba'i sku rgyan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa can// thod rlon sprul dang glang chen
stag la sogs// rngom brjid ldan pa'i cha lugs cir ston pa// nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i zhabs brgyad rmad du byung ba ni// phyin ci log gi dngos po 'joms pas na// mtshan

ma sna tshogs mtshan ma med byas pas// so so'i na bza' go cha'i ci 'dra yang// ye shes dbyings la sbyor ba nyid du bsgom// 'bar ba'i gdan khri rmad du byung ba ni// gzhan gyi dngos grub bdag gir bya ba

dang// mnyam pa chen po'i don la dgong pa'i phyir// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su sbyor bar bsgom// 'bar ba'i gzhal yas rmad du byung ba ni// sna tshogs mang po rgyun dang bkram pa yang// nam mkha'i mtha'
dang dbyer med stong bas na// spros med thig le byang chub sems su bsgom// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ rmad du byung byang chub sems kyi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig

'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u 'di gsungs// bden pa bzhi yis lam mtshon te// sa dang sa yi rim pa

bzhin// bgrod nas phyin par 'dod pa gang// ldongs pas nam mkha' bsnyegs pa ltar// phyin pa'i gnas su khyab par yang// gnas las 'phos pa med pas na// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta bar bya// rten cing
'brel bas bcas pa yis// phyi nang 'bras bu rgyu bcas kun// lugs dang lugs las bzlog pa la// sa yi rim par 'dod pa dag/ smig rgyu bzhin du chur dmigs te// phrad par ma gyur phyin mi 'gyur// 'on
kyang ma bgrod sang gzhag pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta bar bya// dmigs su med pas dmigs bya bas// de nyid dmigs pa chen po ste// mtshams ming du bcas pa yang// mtshon pa tshul du bcas so
zhes// thams cad dmigs pa'i yul 'das pas// bla med go 'phang bgrod pa yang// ma bgrod phyin pas bla na med// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta// dag pa'i don nyid rang gis rig rtogs pas// bran dang jo

bo lta bu'i tshul gyis kyang// sangs rgyas sa yi go rim btsal bar 'dod// phyi nang dag pa'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa yis// mtho ris lta yi gnas thob gang yin pa// lta ba 'di yi lung du lhan ne ba// rgya mtsho bzhin du
g.yos pa med par blta// de nyid bzhi dang ldan par bsgom pa dang// gang la mi rtog ci la mi chags te// me long bzhin du rig pa mngon sum phul// 'bras bu ma nor lam du tshol ba
yis// goms pa'i mthu med 'phags lam ring na yang// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta bar bya// byin rlabs chen pos sangs rgyas khyad par can// thams cad lha yin pas na mngon sum pas// rig pa dang ni
goms par bcas pa yin// sa dang sa yi rim par bgrod pa yang// theg mchog 'di yi ngang la ye gnas pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du zab mor blta// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum yin pas na// dug lnga

nyid kyang ye nas sangs rgyas las// sdug bsngal chu bor 'byung ba'i 'gro ba rnams// sgrol dang sbyor ba'i phrin las zab mo yis// zhing bcu gnas su sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas kyang// lta ba 'di yi ngang du sangs rgyas

pas// lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du lhun gyis gnas// sna tshogs kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// de nyid ma skyes pas ni yum gyi mkha'// snang la rang bzhin med pas chos kyi dbyings// de yang dbyer med 'bras bu sku

gsung thugs// btsal dang bral ba'i sa la bgrod pa dang// lta ba 'di yi ngang la rgya mtsho bzhin// rgya mtsho chen por chu bo kun 'bab ltar// theg pa'i rgyal po kun tu bzang po 'di// bde mchog lhun gyis grub

pa'i man ngag pas// mig dang mtshan ma'i spyod yul ma yin te// dbye ba med pa'i ngang du rdzogs sangs rgyas// lta ba rgya mtsho'i gting ltar ye nas dag/ de bas lta ba rgya mtsho bzhin du blta// g+hu h+ya sa ma ya

yi thugs ka nas// skal ldan 'ga' yi rkyen du gsungs pa 'di// snod med phal gyi spyod yul ma yin pas// chu srin dang ni nor bu rin chen tshul// rgya mtsho'i gtig gi rdo ltar khar dbyung min// rmongs shing 'chal
pas gal te khar byung na// rang rgyud ngan song gsum du nges 'khyams pas// gdeng dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'i thugs la brnag/ dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u ste drug cu
pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi rtsa ni// sems dang kun gzhir ldan pa'i phyir// gtan la dbab pa'i le'u 'di

gsungs// de yang chos rnams rtsa ba kun gzhi nyid la 'dus// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur ye shes lngar snang ba// de lta'i don la mnyam par bzhag pas na// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur ba yang de nyid yin// ye shes lnga
nyid de la tshang bas na// ye shes lnga po gcig tu 'dus rigs bya// sems dang kun gzhi rtsa ba'i don rtogs na// ye nas sangs rgyas pas na bcos med par// dang por sa nyid non pa mkhas pas
gsungs// gnas skabs de na blta mthar yod med thug/ sems kyi rang bzhin ji ltar yod pa dang// sems la mtshan ma yod med rtogs par bya// sems de nyid la lta bas ji ltar blta bar
bya// sems nyid snang ba yin nam mi snang ba// sems de sangs rgyas yin nam sangs rgyas min// sems las gud na sangs rgyas yod dam med// de yang cir bzhag blta bas zin bya dgos// de ltar rtogs nas
gdeng du gyur pa na// 'dus byas dge rtsa mi dgag nus tshad bya// 'on kyang chos kun rang bzhin sems la 'dus// de la bsam zhing bsgom med ngang la bzhags pa na// cir snang ji srid mtshan med dbyings
gcig pas// 'du 'bral med pa'i chos nyid ye sangs rgyas// don de ma brjod pa na mang rtsal yang// lhun grub sa de da lta nyid nas non// de lta'i don rtogs nyams su gsal na yang// chos kun sgo dang mi
'gal bstan pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin gsum ldan gol ba'i sgo bkag nas// drod chen gsum gyis sangs rgyas dgongs pa myong// de bas ting 'dzin rnams pa gsum bsgoms pas// 'bras bu pha rol phyin drug
rang bzhin rdzogs// rang sems nam mkha' ma g.yos ngang la gzhag/ 'on kyang dran zhing rtog pa ci byung bas// chos nyid ma g.yos rtogs pas ma bcad pas// ngang gis ma bcos yong gis 'od gsal zhes// snga
rabs mkhas ldan rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// yid dang sems gsal byed nyid ting 'dzin te// yo ga gsum don gnas skabs de la gsal// de lta bas na snyan khung yang brgyud nas// sems nyid sangs

rgyas don du shes par bya// de lta'i don ston skyes bu yang rab la// ci la mi brtse g.yon gyi rnam grangs dbul// 'on kyang bya btsal med pa'i don rtogs nas// ye nas bdag nyid rnam par dag ces bya// de na
'dzin chags bde sdug ci byung yang// tshogs gnyis dus gcig rdzogs par dam bca'o// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mtshan ma rnam par dag/ chos nyid mngon du gyur na ce yon rgyun mi 'chad// sgrib pa gnyis
byang tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas na// phyi nang bzhed dang mthun par sa rnams non// 'dir ni bde gshegs dgongs spyod zab mo yin// sems dpa' phal gyi spyod yul ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mnyam
pa'i don rtogs kyang// 'gro ba sems can rnams kyis ma rtogs pas// gdod nas zhen pa'i bag chags sbyang dka'o// sa dang sa yi 'dod stongs khyad yod gsungs// mnyam par rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis

med gsal dus na// sangs rgyas che yon lhun gyis grub nges so// stong dang rang bzhin med cing ma skyes khyad par ni// yod med rtag chad bya btsal la sogs pa// thams cad lhun gyis grub par ye gnas pa//
rgyu dang 'bras bu cir snang ci srid kyang// bud+d+ha nyag gcig sku yi rgyan du snang// de nyid ma bkag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshul// gong 'og la sogs skyon yon gnyis po dag/ rtogs dang ma rtogs
re rtsol gnas pa yis// rgyu 'bras so sor gsal ba smra na yang// blta spyod mnyam pa'i don du shes bya dgos// blta spyod ye nas 'du 'bral med bzhin du// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i spyod yul cir snang
yang// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs gang yang med// gnas skabs de na thams cad tshogs 'brel yang// de tsam nyid la dgongs pa chos nyid kun// don du ye shes chen po'i sems la 'dus// sems ni
ye nas ngang gis ma bcos pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa thams cad bral// de ltar bral ba'i byang chub bde chen ni// bgrod pa'i sa dang lta ba'i gzugs med pas// mtshan mar btags pa'i skyon yon ma
lus dag/ theg rgyal yangs rtses the tshom gegs bsal zhing// blang med dngos grub chen pos la bzlas pa// de bas dbu ma'i lta ba cha phra ba// thams cad ma lus dbang du rab 'dus te// gzhan las dpag
pa'i don ni 'di gsungs so// mdo sde la sogs phyi nang yul dag pas// dag pa'i mtshan ma tsam du gnas pa dang// rnal 'byor spyod pas chos rnams sems su 'dus// mtha' gnyis ngang gis gsal zhes smra ba
yang// nyams rtogs lta ba gud na yang med do// gzhan na yod par 'dod pa bag chags skyon yin no// de bas bsgom chos so sor cir snang yang// ltung ba'i spyod yul 'khrul ba nyid snang yin// sangs rgyas

sems can sgyu ma smig rgyu'i tshul// ye shes skye 'gags med pas nam mkha' bzhin// de yi dus na 'das te mthong ba med// de yang mi snang nyid na skyon yin pa// 'khrul ba yin pas btub pa ma yin no// mthong

dang ma mthong snang la rang bzhin med// dgongs spyod zab mo'i man ngag thams cad ni// rang rig ye shes mngon sum snang dus na// dag pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas mthong zhes bya// de ltar ye shes sangs rgyas
mthong ba'i tshe// bag chags med cing mthong yul 'das pa ste// byar med snang med ma btsal bzhagan pa yin// dmigs pa'i yul med chos lam bag chags spang// mthong tshor bde ba'i lam nyid mu med gdal

ba'i dbyings// 'gre'u log spyi'u tshugs ye shes dbyings mi g.yo// de yang gtan tshigs mdo sde zab mo'i nang// de lta'i don la sangs rgyas sbyong mi mdzad// chos rnams thams cad rig pa'i ye shes snang// des
'brel phan chad gdod nas ma skyes te// rgyu dang 'bras bur btags pa yang ye med// 'di ltar rig na skye dgag gnyis med lhun gyis grub// don la mnyam par bzhag pa'i skyon chen ni// lung dang 'gal zhing
don dang 'phrad mi 'gyur// don la nges blo khyab par btag ba ni// mi 'gal ye shes rang bzhin dag pa ste// rig pas gsal nas thams cad gnyis su med// byang chub snying por rgyu 'bras lhun
grub po// de yi dus na drod gsum man ngag rdzogs// snang dang mi snang rtag chad la sogs pa// shes rab zab mos nges pa'i gting brtol te// phyi nang the tshom blta ba'i phugs gtib bo// 'di yi don la
gsang thub sran che zhing// tshig dang don du 'bral pas thag chod na// rig 'dzin rdo rje g.yung drung lhun gyis 'grub// dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal// g.yo sgyu med pas gtsug gi nor bu
bzhin// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ kun gzhi gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi don ched
du// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// sbyin sreg mchod sbyin gyi le'u 'di gsungs// dang por phun sum tshogs ldan nas// maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la// thig bzhi gdabs pas le tshe dgu// dbus su gru

gsum 'bar ba'o// sbo yi tshad ni khru gang la// 'phang du kha khyer mkhyud gang ngo// kha dog mdzes pa'i tshon rtsi lnga// le tshe brgyad la rim pa bzhin// dbus su mthing nag yig 'brur bcas// rgyan dang gdags pa

la sogs pa// mtshan dang ldan pa'i yam shing dang// dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han+da rnams// he yi dbus su sngags la gdab// dpal dang ma mo mchod pa'i rdzas// byang chub sems dang rdo rje chu// zil dang rak+ta sha

la sogs// rim bzhin dgram pa'i sa phyogs ni// dbus su byang chub sems chen po// shar gyi gling la rdo rje chu// zil mngar rak+ta lho yi phyogs// sha ni nub kyi phyogs su dbul// dri la sogs pa byang du
dgod// shA khrag gtor ma la sogs kun// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor thog thag tu// pho nya'i rim pa bzhin du dgod// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// 'dzab la sogs pa ma rdzogs tshe// bcu gcig phrin las

gzhung bzhin 'bad// bsnyen pa nyi khri rdzogs pa dang// dpal dang ma mo mchod pa'i phyir// sbyin sreg gzhung bzhin brtson par 'bad// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la// byang chub sems kyi chod pa yis// mchod

sbyin bsreg pa'i las bya'o// rdo rje chu na gzi ldan la'o// zil mngar lho yi phyogs su ste// sha chen nub kyi phyogs su dbul// dri la sogs pa byang du dbul// yum bzhi la yang de bzhin te// mchod sbyin bsreg

pa'i las bya'o// sha khrag gtor ma la sogs pa// pho nya rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// mchod sbyin bsreg pa'i las bya'o// bsnyen pa chos kyi dbyings nas drangs// bsgrub pa gnyis med mnyam par bzhag/ skabs
su las ni bcu gcig brtsam// zhag grangs su ni grangs pa dang// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor lugs bzhin dbyung// de nas gtor ma la sogs te// lhag ma bskyang zhing pho nya bsnyen// las kyi go
rim ma nor bar// mchod sbyin bsreg pa'i las la 'bad// de nas rjes dang lag cha dang// dkyil 'khor lha dang bye brag rnams// rim pa bzhin du mtha' nas spro// bsnyul dang don byas slar 'dus
nas// bdag dang bcas pa rab tu zhu// rim pa bzhin du dbus su bstim// tshon rtsi dang ni sol ba dang// gzhan yang lhag ma ci yod rnams// gru gsum yum gyi mkha' la bstim// de nas bshags dang sbyang ba

dang// glu bro la sogs longs spyod rnams// ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro dang// pho nya ma mo bsten pa'i phyir// chas rab ldan pas 'bad la bya'o// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/ sbyin sreg mchod sbyin gyi le'u
ste drug cu re gnyis pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes pa'i phyir// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// rdo rje glu yi le'u 'di

gsungs// cho ga gsum dang ting 'dzin bcas pa yis// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po'i nga rgyal bskyed// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu 'di blang// A+oM// gtsug tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan snang
mdzad che// yum dang gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor lo snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hUM dpral bar rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan rdo rje sems// yab yum gnyis
med sbyor ba las// rdo rje snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// swA las rin chen zur drug 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan 'byung ldan che// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba lam// rin chen
snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// A las pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar// cho ga gsum ldan snang mtha' yas// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// de
la rang bzhin med par dmigs// hA las rdo rje rgya gram dang// cho ga gsum ldan don yod grub// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// rgya gram snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// sku

gsung thugs yon phrin las lnga// rigs lnga dpal gyi glu blangs la// gsang ba yum gyi bro brdungs shing// dpa' bo 'bru lngas dbang bskur bas// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i sku// lus pa med pa chos kyi

dbyings// hrIHrta mgrin gtsug na nor bu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan ha ya g+h+rI// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// nor bu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par gsal// hUM// g.yas pa brgyad na
lcags kyu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan phra men ma// gtso bo gnyis med sbyor ba las// lcags kyu snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// g.yon pa brgyad na mtshon cha
'bar// cho ga gsum ldan badzra ste// gtso bo gnyis med sbyor ba las// mtshon cha snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// kruM zhabs brgyad 'bar ba'i chas brgyad 'bar// cho ga gsum
ldan yum gyi mkha'// gtso dang gnyis med 'khril pa las// chas brgyad snying gi dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// phaT/ sku gsung thugs las rnam sprul pa'i// sgo skyong khro bo mgo dgu

brtsegs// kham rgya ma dang long ba'i tshogs// dmus long dang ni khyi spyang rnams// dbang chen sku la rab tu 'bar// cho ga gsum ldan sprul pa'i tshogs// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// 'khor rnams snying gi

dbus su bsgom// de la rang bzhin med par dmigs// 'di ni ye shes brgyan gyi glu// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// bdag nyid phyag rgya rtag mchog 'bar// A+oM/ 'khor

lo ye shes can rnams kyis// 'khor lo rdo rje bsgom byas na// de nyid chos sku nam mkha' che ho// hUM// ye shes rdo rje can rnams ni// rdo rje rdo rje bsgom byas nas// de nyid chos dbyings ngang la rdzogs ho// rin

chen ye shes can rnams ni// rin chen rdo rje bsgom byas nas// de nyid longs spyod lhun gyis grub ho// pad+ma ye shes can rnams ni// pad+ma rdo rjer bsgom byas na// de nyid brtan par 'gyur ba med ho// rgya gram rdo

rje can rnams ni// rgya gram rdo rje bsgom byas nas// de nyid sprul sku ngo mtshar che ho// rgyan nyid ye shes glu blangs pas// bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang// thams cad sku ste dngos med sku// stong ba chen po'i
ngang la bzhag ho// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o//// tshe la dbang thob rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i

tshe// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las// zil non drag po'i le'u 'di gsungs// A+oM nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya/ nA sha stam+b+ha ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ gr-ih+NA ba la hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na/
bid+yArA dza nan nan/ skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// 'bar ba chen pos bdag bskyed la// dbu lnga bcu drug phyag rgya ldan// ting 'dzin brgyad kyis byin brlabs pas// dmar po zhabs brgyad ldan pa

yis// bag chags mi ldan gnan pa'i phyir// tsham rngams chen pos 'di skad do// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston cing// nga rgyal mthu bsnyengs bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i de ba
brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang chen gnon// zhabs brgyad ting 'dzin brgyad kyi chas dang ldan// bka' dang dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i phyir// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing
sgal tshigs 'joms// nyon mongs nyam thag 'bod sgrog dir ri ri/ zhes brjod la/ gdul bya'i zhabs gcig shar du bgrad pas/ dpa' bo stag gi chas dang ldan pas/ hU~M ka ra la bol nub par gzir bas/

tsham rngams chen pos nyam nga bar bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig shar lho mtshams su bgrad pas/ rno dug zlog byed rgya bye'u chas dang ldan pas/ Ar+ya a tsa la bol nub par gzir bas tsham rngams chen pos nyam
nga bar bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig lho phyogs su bgrad pas/ shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas dang ldan pas ya man ta ka la bol nub par gzir bas tsham rngams chen pos ldan par
bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig lho nub tu bgrad pas/ dbang gi bse khrab chas dang ldan pas/ nI la daN+Da la bol nub par gzir bas/ tsham rngams chen pos nyams par bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig nub

tu bgrad pas/ dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i chas dang ldan pas// pad+ma kuN+Da li la bol nub par gzir bas/ tsham rngams chen pos nyam nga bar byas so// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig nub byang du
bgrad pas// dmar gsal mche ba'i rdzas dang ldan pas// taki rA dza la bol nub par gzir bas/ tsham rngams chen pos nyam nga bar bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang phyogs su bgrad pas// shu ken chu
ris dar gyi chas dang ldan pas// a mr-i ta kuN+Da li la bol nub par gzir bas/ tsham rngam chen pos nyams par bya'o// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang shar mtshams su bgrad pas/ gcan gzan gzig gi chas

dang ldan pas// ma hA ba la la bol nub par gzir bas// tsham rngams chen phos nyam nga bar byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM kAr pra be sha ya phaT nan/ Ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha ya phaT nan/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be

sha ya phaT nan/ ni la daN+Da pra be sha la phaT nan/ pad+ma kuN+Da li pra be sha ya phaT nan/ ta ki rA dza pra be sha ya phaT nan/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li pra be sha la phaT nan/ ma hA ba la pra be sha ya phaT nan/ de ltar gnon cing

gzir ba yang// don du dbyings dang ye shes la// rtags ni thabs dang shes rab bo// phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// zil gnon drag po'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun bskams te// sngon gyi
rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// zhi bas thams cad tshim par mdzod/ rgyas pas ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// dbang gis dbang du ma 'dus med// mngon spyod byin gyis brlab pa ni// thabs la mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod
kyis// bsad cing mnan pa ma lus kun// phra mo'i skur bskyed bskur don byas// slar 'dus chos kyi dbyings su thim// dmigs pa med par chos skur bsgom// dbang chen bsdus pa'i tan tra las/
zil gnon drag po'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// rdzogs so// dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i dbang chen tan tra 'di// phyi rabs rnal 'byor 'ga' yi spyod yul ma gtogs pa// ming tsam rnal 'byor

kun gyi thun mong min// yon tan gtan du nub par mi bya'i phyir// yang dbang gter du sbas shing 'ga' dang 'ga' la brgyud// pad+ma dbang chen la sbyir le'u bdun cu bzhugs pa las/ 'di la le'u drug cu rtsa

bzhi las mi gsungs te le'u drug tsam ma 'dus so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tA sha ya byA ka ra Na/ ma hA yo ga gu h+ya saM b+ho da/ yo ka tsar+ya b+hu mi shrI badzra mA la a b+hi d+hA na pra ha la

li d+ha ga ma tan+t+ra sarba hri da ya ma he sha sa mu dA ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa lung bstan pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gsang ba rnam par bye ba rnal 'byor spyod pa'i

sa// dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par brjod pa/ rta mchog rol ba'i lung rgyud thams cad kyi snying po/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad

du bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nyid kyi khyad par las rnam

par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la phyogs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rtag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje zhe sdang dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ye shes dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje

chags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dam tshig dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po

dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje chos dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje phyag dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje blo gros dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje dang/ byang chub chen po rdo

rje kun tu dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang gdug pa 'dul ba la phyogs pa ni/ gshin rje mthar byed dang/ shes rab mthar byed dang/
chos mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang/ 'dus pa rnams lhan cig tu bzhugs pa ni/ dper na til gyi gang bu kha bye ba bzhin du bzhugs
so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos// chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs so// de yi byin gyis brlabs las// ba spu'i bu ga nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma 'phros pas rdo rje snying po la phog par gyur to/ de'i tshe rdo rje snying po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lta rdzas kyi
mchod pa mang pos mchod nas/ 'di skad ces bskul to// rnam par rtog bral gdod nas skye med dbyings// ma bcos mtha' yas ye shes chen por gsal// smra bsam yul 'das mtha' dag 'od gsal
zhing// dmigs med yul bral snying rjes yongs la khyab// mkha' dang stong pa'i cho 'phrul gsal mdzad cing// dri med thugs rje'i 'od mdangs gsal ba yis// thugs kyi rtags ston 'od zer rgyal ba'i
sku// rnam gsum sems dpa' gsang sngags 'od phreng tshogs// chags pa'i skyon bral ye shes lnga yi mdangs// sku gsung ye shes rnam lnga'i dgongs pa rnams// bdag gzhan 'bras bu thob phyir bshad du

gsol// zhes glus bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa ston pa ni/ gzungs kyi rgyal mo nam mkha'i rdo rje ma dang/ sa rdo rje ma dang/ chu rdo rje ma

dang/ me rdo rje ma dang/ rlung rdo rje ma la 'khril bar gyur te/ gzungs kyi byang chub chen mo/ 'das pa'i rdo rje dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i rdo rje dang/ da ltar byung ba'i rdo rje dang/ ma byon pa'i rdo rje dang/ gzugs rdo rje ma

dang/ sgra rdo rje ma dang/ dri rdo rje ma dang/ ro rdo rje ma dang/ gzhan gzugs kyi las mdzad ma/ 'dzin byed rdo rje ma dang/ 'ching byed rdo rje ma dang/ sdom mdzad rdo rje ma dang/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje ma rnams bton te/

lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi ro bde ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad nas/ nyid kyi thugs las gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen byung ste/ zhal gsum ni sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar dmar pad+ma'i mdangs can/

phyag drug pad+ma'i sdong bu dang/ bum pa dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum dang/ dpal be'u dang/ mda' dang/ gzhu 'dzin par gyur te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang/ chos dbyings me long

mnyam nyid dang// so sor kun rtog bya ba grub// bdag dang gzhan gyi phyir spyod pa// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang// phrin bsgrub mchod dang ting 'dzin rgya// gzhi lam 'bras bu rdo rje'i bdag/ gsang
sngags pa yis bshad kyis nyon// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nyid las sku'i tshogs yongs su gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'di ched du brjod do// spyi gtsug 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// sangs rgyas rnam snang rang byung sku// kang ka
ri sha shel ltar dag/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje'i sku// ting nge 'dzin gyis 'di skad gsungs// dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// phung po khams sogs rnam spang

shing// gzung dang 'dzin pa las sgrol zhing// chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can// zhes gsungs so// thugs kar nyi ma'i gdan steng su// sangs rgyas mi bskyod rang byung sku// mthing ga sa gnon phyag rgya
can// kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas// phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med// nam mkha' lta bur

brtag dka' ba'i// bdag med byang chub sems zhes bya// zhes gsungs so// mgrin pa pad+ma 'dab brgyad las// sangs rgyas snang mtha' rang byung sku// pad+ma rA ga mnyam bzhag rgya// ye shes sgron 'bar ngang nas
gsungs// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// dngos po med cing bsgoms pa'ang med// nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis// ngo bo zhes ni rab tu bshad// ces gsungs so// lte ba rin chen zur brgyad
las// sangs rgyas rin 'byung rang byung sku// 'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od 'dra// sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyag rgya can// bdag med rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas 'di dag gsungs// chos
rnams thams cad dgos med cing// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// bdag med chos las yang dag byung// byang chub tshul ni bstan pa'o//// zhes gsungs so// gsang gnas rdo rje rgya gram

la// sangs rgyas don grub rang byung sku// sbyin gtong in+t+ra nI li'i mdog/ zil gnon rdo rje'i ngang nas gsungs// chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing// gdod nas dag pas mkha' dang mnyam// byang chub med
cing mngon rtog med// byang chub sems ni yin par bshad// ces gsungs so// e ma ho// zhes gsungs pas thams cad kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyis khyab par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i

dbyings phyug mas 'di gsungs so// snod bcud snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu ngang gis stong// de nyid ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// chos rnams yongs kyi 'byung gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas spyan
gyis 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin 'od gsal sems nyid 'di// med las yod snang sgyu mar snang// me long lta bur rang gsal bas// yongs la khyab par de 'gyur ro// de nas mA ma kI sa 'di gsungs
so// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'i don// rang bzhin bang gis mnyam pa nyid// de nas gos dkar mos 'di gsungs

so// stong nyid ye shes snying po ni/ phyogs gzhan rang sar rtogs pa'i blos// so so'i rang gzhung nges rtogs nas// kun tu rtogs par rab shes byos// de nas dam tshig sgrol mas 'di gsungs so// chos rnams
yongs su rdzogs pa'i don// dbyar med ngang du gnas pa ni// bya ba thams cad 'grub pa ste// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// a ho zhes brjod pas// 'chad pa'i skyes bu nyid dgyes par gyur
to// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las// byang chub mchog tu sems nges par bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das theg pa thams cad rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'di skad ces gsungs so// ye nyid ji bzhin lhun grub ni// nam mkha' dang ni nyi ma bzhin// yangs shing rgya che 'od gsal ba// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i rang bzhin
can// srid rtsa bdag las lhan cig byung// kun tu brtags pa'i rtog pas bslad// dge sdig las gsum bag chags can// nyon mongs lnga yis rnam par bskyed// snod bcud gnyis las ma gtogs
pa'i// 'gro ba gzhan na mi mnga' ste// las dang longs spyod so sor snang// gcig las drug rigs bsam las 'das// thog mtha'i don las gol nas su// phyi nang rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor// byang chub
sems kyi snang ba 'di// de yang snang yang sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rje'i ye shes chen por bskyed pa'i gzhi 'di skad du ces gsungs

so// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dmyal ba yang// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal te// de la gzhi dang rtsa ba med// chos sku nyid pas gzhan mi mnga'// ji ltar tha dad snang gyur pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan gyi
gzigs// mngon shes drug gi yul du snang// las dang thugs rjes 'brel ba'i stobs// mun pa'i nang du 'khor ba kun// ma rtogs 'chal ba rgyang 'phen pa// dmangs rigs dang ni rigs ma des// rigs

chad pa dang 'du shes can// log par rtog pa'i mu stegs pa// rang bzhin dbang phyug rgyur 'dod dang// rdul phran ngo bo nyid gyur smra// byed pa rig byed rtag par blta// tshe la snga phyi med 'dod cing// yon tan

las 'bras chad par 'dod// chos dang gang zag bdag tu 'dzin// rdul phran smra ba nyan thos can// phyi nang rten cing 'brel ba dang// lugs 'byung de ldog rang sangs rgyas// don dam blo yi dang stong zhing// kun
rdzob skyu ma snang ba des// dbye gzhi la sogs rnam pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' phal chen te// dag pa ye shes chos nyid du// rigs gsum mgon la spyod pa blta// 'og spyod gong la blta ba

yis// u pa ya zhes de ltar snang// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis// rdo rje dbyings kyi rnal 'byor blta// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dag la// bden par dbyer med ma hA yin// rtsol bral dbyer med shin tu
rdzogs// 'dir ni sprul sku dam pa yis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// 'og tu gyur dang steng na spyod// mtho dman theg pa'i gtan tshigs ni// khyad par che la gcig pa'i tshul// kun brtags 'khor
