ba'i rang bzhin ni// gzhan dbang de bzhin gshegs pa ste// yongs su grub pa chos kyi sku// rgyu bdun 'dod pas 'bras bu 'phags// rang sems mngon sum lha skur 'bebs// rjes kyi shes pa lha skur

rtogs// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga ni// mu bzhi mtha' bral chos kyi dbyings// gcig dang du mar de ma grub// rang byung ye shes rdo rje ste// kun tu bzang po yab tu snang// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa// rten
cing 'brel ba'i bde chen sras// sprul pa'i longs spyod rgyun mi chad// ces gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ blta ba rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom lda 'das kyis

'od zer 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// dam pa'i rgyud lung man ngag mdzod// lta spyod ting 'dzin gdeng ldan la// rang bzhin sbyangs pa khyad par snod// bden smra mi bslu bka'

bzhin bya// lta spyod mi bslu don ldan nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni// stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin bsgom// gnyis pa kun snang nam mkha'i ngang// snying rje'i yul gyis

khyab pa'i phyir// mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa non te// rab tu brtan pa'i ye shes la/ de nas phra mo'i a 'phro 'du// spros shing bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med// de las bdag
nyid chen po ni// thams cad rdzogs par bskyed bya'o// rgyas btab byin brlab dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// thog mar yab yum rnam gnyis mkha'// rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis

brlab// gnyis med 'khril bar dgyes pa las// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga la/ spro bsdus dbyings su 'khyil ba las// dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur// e las nam mkha' yaM las rlung// baM las rgya mtsho suM
las gser// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang// dbyibs dang kha dog bsam yas mchog/ 'khor lo gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// gdan dang rgyan bcas yongs su grub// rten 'byung nam mkha' yi ge
a// 'phel 'grib med par gnas pa las// gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du las// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du 'bar// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// spro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa

las// thugs mchog bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar// de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal lo// gzugs dang rnam shes tshor ba dang// 'du shes 'du byed phung po'i sku// nam mkha' sa chu me rlung dbyings// rdo rje skyil

krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa dang nam mkha' spyan ras phyag/ sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// byams pa sgrib sel kun bzang 'jam// me tog spos dang mar me dri// phyi nang sems dpa'i ngo bo ste// rang gi

rigs su nges par gsal// srid thub 'dzin dang rnam par rgyal// shAkya seng+ge rnam par gnon// rnam par snang byed chos kyi rgyal// kun tu bzang po bzang mo dang// gshin rje stobs chen rta mgrin dang// bdud
rtsi lcags kyu zhags pa dang// sgrog dang dril bu 'dzin pa nyid// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lhun gyis grub// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga'i mdog/ 'od zer bye ba phrag rnams 'gyed// ces gsungs so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// thig bzhi btab pa'i pho brang du// dbus su mi bskyod yab yum 'khril// de yi phyag na rdo rje
bsnams// brgya byin phyogs su rnam snang mdzad// de yi phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// gshin rje la ni dkon mchog dpal// de yi phyag na rin chen bsnams// nub tu 'od dpag med pa bri// de yi phyag na pad+ma

bsnams// gnod sbyin phyogs su gdon mi za// de yi phyag na rgya gram 'dzin// me yi phyogs su dbyings phyug ma// bden bral phyogs su mA ma kI// rlung gi phyogs su gos dkar mo// dbang ldan mtshams su sgrol

ma nyid// shar gyi sgor ni gshin rje la// lhor ni stobs chen nub tu rta// byang chub bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam par bsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor shin tu bsdus pa
zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dus gsum bde gshegs sku 'dus pa/ bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad bsgom// gsung ni thams cad mtshon pas na// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas bsgom// thams cad ma lus
kun 'dus pa// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs su bsgom// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las// sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs

'di dag ched du brjod do/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i i/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ A+oM ma hA shUn+ya

tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM r+d+harma d+hA tu badzraswa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM/ b+h+rUM b+hi sha b+hi shud+d+he dz+nyA na maN+Da la b+h+rUM/ oM dzi na dzika muM d+hA twI shwa ri/ hU~M badzra d+h+r-i ka laM dwe Sha ra ti/ srI rat+na d+h+r-ika mAMmo ha ra ti/ AM a

ro li ka/ pyaM rA ga ra ti/ ha bra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShiM hi rA dza ya/ hU~M lA s+ye/ tri a gar+b+hA ya/ trAM mA le/ hri ha hU~M pad+ma pAd ma/ hrI gi rti/ dz+nyIM ku ru pA Na hri/ AM nir ti/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ dza d+hU pa/ th+l+hiM ni s+sa raM b+hA ya/ hU~M

puSh+pa/ hU~M sa rA dza ya/ baM di pa/ muM shrI aM rA gA la/ ho gan+b+he/ A+oM muM ni kriM/ A+oM mu ni hU~M/ oM mu ni sruM/ A+oM mu ni braM/ A+oM mu ni k+ShaM/ A+oM mu ne ye swA hA/ A+oM badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ oM badzra b+ha drA A+oM/ hU~M ya mAn ta kr-i ha hU~M phaT/ dza badzra

kro d+hI/ hU~M pra dz+nyA na ta kr-i ta phaT/ hU~M rat+na kro d+hI/ hU~M pad+mAn ta kr-i ta phaT/ paM pad+ma kro d+hI/ hU~M big+h+nAM ta kro ta phaT/ ho karma kro d+hI/ A+oM ma hA shU n+ya ta badzra swA b+hA wa At+na ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa AtA ko\u0f85haM/

oM ma hA sa mi tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa A tu ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA kr-i nuSh+ta na dz+nyA na badzra swab+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa A tA ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba thA
ga ta wA k+ma badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA was At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA su kha bo d+hI tsit+ta dz+nyA na d+hA tu a/ zhes gsungs so/ dbang chen
'dus pa'i tan tra las/ gsung gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// nyi zla 'bru lnga'i 'od zer

las// sgyur ba'i phyag rgya rnams par bsgyur// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bur bcas// rin chen myu gu ral gri dang// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje dang// klu shing chos kyi 'khor lo dang// ut+pal rin

chen snye ma 'dzin// me long phreng ba pi wang gar// me tog bdug pa mar me dang// dri chab 'thor bas dgyes par rol/ pi wang go cha gseg par dang// chos kyi po ti rin chen sgrom// me chu mnyam gzhag 'od zer

'phro// thod dbyug rdo rje sprul zhags rgya// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos// rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa// las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis// kun nas rgyas btab

lta bur gnas// gang yang 'di ni las gang gis// de 'bras ji lta bzhin du 'gyur// chos med rang bzhin med pa nyid// rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas// stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa// sangs rgyas zhing

ni rnam sbyong ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ni// yongs su dag par mdzad pa'i las// de'i rang bzhin rang bzhin med// phyag rgya chen mo zhes ni brjod// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs 'dzin pa// srog

shing dbang po myong ba dang// za byed kun tu rgyu ba dang// klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang// lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal// phung po rnam shes ma lus kun// 'di don shes nas gzung bar bya// byed
pa can gyi rlung 'di yang// rnam shes khams dang 'dres nas su// dbang po'i srang nas thon 'gyur te// yul rnams kun la 'jug pas na// snang dang mched dang thob pa dang// nye bar thob par byed pa
dang// yul can gzhan la log pa na// yul la dngos por su zhig 'dzin// rnam shes nang du 'jug pa yang// rlung la dngos por ma grub pas// sems la dngos por su zhig 'dzin// yul sems rab tu rtogs

gyur na// gdab ltas pad+ma dbang gi lha// ji ltar sprad kyang skyon med pas// dbang chen zhes kyang de la bya// gang zag nye lam bsgrub 'dod pas// gnas khang shin tu mun nag sar// rdo rje gtsug tor lta stangs

kyi// nges pa kho na 'grub pa ste// de ltar ji ltar bsgom zhe na// zhabs kyis rdo rje bca' ba dang// phyag gnyis khu tshur sta zur mnan// spyan gnyis ri rab nang du sba// lce rtse gyen gtad zhal yang gdangs// srog

gi rtsa nas ye shes rlung// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gar 'don// 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i 'od la blta// nges par thog 'gyur the tshom med// ces gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ thugs yongs su rnam
par dag pa'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal ba 'di gsungs so// dmigs pa phra ba'i rig pa ni// gtso bo'i bsnyen pa 'bum du

bya// 'khor rnams la ni khri yin te// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya// dur khrod dang ni khang khyim dang// ri bo dben gnas sa phyogs su// sa dang bar snang nam mkha' brtab// 'bru lnga phra bkod sor mo

yis// dbang gi phung ba sor bzhi pas// gdab par bya zhing me yis sbyang// las dang bya ba ting 'dzin sbyang// de na gnas pa'i 'byung po la// 'tsho byed bskrad la thal mo brdab// sa la lan gsum sngags kyis

sbyang// oM badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la a na lArka hU~M phaT/ oM ung+ga ts+tsha ta/ oM ung+ga ts+tsha ta/ sarba b+hu ta gra ha At+ma/ oM AHhU~M/ badzra sa twa A be sha te hU~M phaT/ gseg ma mgal dum spun pa dang// ba tsha gyo mo spang pa yi// mnyam zhing

me long ltar 'jam pa// rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i sgud pa yis// rab tu mnyam gyur gru bzhi pa// sku gdung nyi shu lnga yang sba// sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi// dpa' bo 'bru lngas bskrad

par bya// tshangs thig btab nas thig skud la// zhal bsil chu yis gsang bar bya// A+oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba su d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni maN+Dal hU~M/ shar lho nub byang la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha phyed nas// nor
'khrul med pa'i dgongs ldan gdab// rin chen 'bru dang rdul tshon dang// dur khrod rdzas kyis bri bar bya// sku gsung thugs rten dgod pa dag/ rol mo rgyan rnams dri bar bya// rab tu mdzes pa kho

nar bya// phyogs mtshams phur bus gdab par bya// khro bo'i rkang stabs bskor ba dang// dra ba ra bas bcings sogs pa// mtshams kyi rim pas bsrung bar bya// bum pa rgyud dbyibs tshad ldan du// byug bdug

bskrad rlabs rdzas kyis dgang// sman 'bru snying po rin chen lnga// dri dang me tog dpag bsam shing// byin brlab las bum rnams rgyal dang// lha grangs mnyam par dgod par bya// rang gnas dri yi thig le
las// bskyed drang mchod sogs lhag gnas bya// sngags brjod me tog dor nas ni// lha gnas dong nas rang bzhin mthong// sku khrul rab tu gsol bar bya// me dang nyung dkar khro bo yis// rab tu sbyar zhig

nyon mongs sel// A+oM sarba a bar Na shud+d+ha sarba pA paM bi shud d+ha badzra hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rdzas mchod de// rang gi ming sngags dag gis dbul// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta bu Sh+ta bU dza me g+ha sa mu dra sba ra Na sa

ma ya shri ye AHhU~M/ chos dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis// cho ga ji bzhin rab tu gnas// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ las rnams bya ba mang po dag/ gtor ma'i rdzas mchog snod bzang por// bshams te kun la

dbul bar bya// A+oM prat+ma d+he pa tA sarba in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka nA ga ga na d+ha rba kum+b+hA N+Da/ yak+Sha d+hU ta ga NAH/ ta thA pre ta un+ma da ta pi shA tsi a pa smA ra DA ki nI graha bi g+hAM ma tr-i ga NAH sarba ta thA a nu ne ma ra be g+h+ra ha/ oM

dzo b+ha k+Sha ma hA te dza ma nu b+h+yA nAM bi hi sa ka mu drA ma n+t+ra a d+hi do b+h+ya sh+tsa/ pra hA na k+Sha tra ma nuSh+ya i maM ba liM pra ti gr-i h+Nan+tu/ sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tshan+tu mes dA sa ma ne Shu ka ra me Shu/ sa tas ha la b+ha ban+tu tsa/ d+ha na d+ha na su ba su pa ra

nany+tsa/ da dan tu ma ma to Shi ta i ti u pa trA Na ro Sha Ni/ sa dwA nA ma nA sha yan+tu tsa AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje'i snod dang ldan pa rnams// dad chus sems kyi dri ma bkru// gos gtsang gon la gtsang khang byung// ras kyi

yol pas gcad par bya// gdong bsal spyan ras dgab par bya// oM tsak+Shu tsakU sa man+ta tsak+tsu mai tri sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ skud pa legs pa tshad ldan la// bsang dang rdo rje'i mdud pa gsum// me

tog gtor zhing dpung g.yon bcings// oM lo tsa ni ya tha twad taM saM pra taM mi b+ha bi shud d+he raM rat+na tra yA ya sid+d+hi na ni da da shA ya swA hA/ so shing bzang pa'i phur bu de// byin brlab lag gtad slob mas dor/ oM pra ti

badzra sa man+t+ra i gwa ri AHhU~M swA hA/ phyogs bltas dur ba'i sngas gdan gyis// nyal nas ji ltar mthong ba smra// go bde'i rnam pa bla mas bshad// zhi ba'i las kyi sdig sgrib rnams/ bgegs rnams zhi ba don du
bsreg/ gos bzang bgos pa'i shik+Sha yis// thal sbyar 'jug par gsol ba btab// gnang ba sbyin zhing yi dam lhas// thugs rjes gzung bar gsol ba gdab// dam tshig chu byin gsang ba

bsgrag/ ye shes lha yi byin rlabs dbab// A+oM teSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha A be shwa ya hU~M/ badzra sa twa hi ma he'i d+yA rA dzA ya b+h+yo ma he phaT/ dkyil 'khor mchod ni bstan par bya// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rang gnas

mthong// slar yang dbang bskur gsol gdab bskur// bum pa mi bskyod rdo rje chu// mgo thog rnam shes phung por bskur// oM ma hA sa ma ya I shAr taM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi swA hA/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri

ye AHhU~M/ dbu rgyan cod paN bzang po yis// yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom// A+oM sarba ta tha ga ta rat+na mu ku Ta pu dzA ya a d+hi Sh+Tha yA mi AHhU~M/ rdo rje ye shes lnga rdzogs pa'i// 'od dpag med pa lag g.yas

sbyin// kun bzang brtul zhugs rdo rje longs// dngos grub bzang po za bar gyis// A badzra pA Ni a b+hi ShIny+tsa hU~M/ dril bu ral gri don grub ni// lag pa g.yon pa don yod grub// A+oM d+hA tu a b+hi shIny+tsa hU~M/ rnam par

snang mdzad ngo bo de// rang bzhin sal bar gyur pa dang// rdo rje'i ming gi dbang yang bskur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par bsgom// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta che ge mo badzra sa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi swA hA/ de yis rdo rje slob

dpon dang// nyan dang 'chad dang phrin las dang// rdo rje rgyal po 'grub pa yi// dbang mchog 'dod la tshim par bya// gzungs ma bstan pa zhu ba'i phyir// gdol ba mo dang khrus mkhan 'ong// sme sha can dang gar
mkhan ma// ro sreg mo dang bram ze mo// 'grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor bas// bdag nyid ro gcig gnas par bya// rin chen pad+ma de bzhin las// 'khor lo'i rigs su shes par bya// rdo rje'i rigs su brjod

pa de'o// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// chung ma mna' ma'am sgyug mo dang// lugs las ldog par shes pa yin// sems dang ngag lus srog dang ni// thur sel dbu ma'i rlung zhes bya// sa chu me rlung nam mkha'

dang// nam mkha' chen por rab shes nas// mngar skyur kha ba lan tshwa ro// bska ba tsha ba dngos grub ste// de dag shes nas rang bzhin med// de la dngos grub blang bar bya// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral

dang// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so// ba dang be'u bya dang byi'u// bung ba me tog las shes te// rang bzhin bde ba blang bya zhing// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul// shin tu chags bral chags chen
pos// bde ba chen po blang bar bya// rang lus srog dang rgyal srid dang// gces pa'i rnam pas mnes par bya// 'di dang phyi mar bde ldan pa'i// yon tan brjod las 'das par 'gyur// gang yin bgegs la

gtor mas mchod// rtag tu dam tshig la gnas bya// uts+tshiSh+ta k+She tra lA la ye h+ye hi tsakra uts+tshiSh+tA su b+ho dza naM bi ba pi ba b+ha k+ShU b+ha k+Sha sarba sid+d+hi m+me phra yats+tsha me AHhU~M phaT swA hA// zhes sungs so// dbang chen
'dus pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyes pa chen po 'di gsungs so// o~M bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku// rdo

rje'i gsung dbyangs drug cur sgrob// mi rtog thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs// yon tan ma lus re ba skong// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub pa// rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// a ho// hU~M dri med rnam dag zhi ba
las// spros pa thams cad rab zhi ba'i// ye shes tshogs mchog mnga' brnyes pa// rang bzhin dag pas chos kyi sku// thugs rjes sdug bsngal sel mdzad pa// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs gzugs kyi sku// las
dang nyon mongs shes bya yi// dri ma spangs pa'i skur sprul pa// gsung mchog sku gsum dag pa la// lus ngag sems kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje chen pos gzung ba dang// ye shes snang ba gsal bar
mdzod// a ho// oM chos dbyings skye ba med pa las// thugs rje'i dbang gis skur bzhengs pa// dbang mchog rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// rab tu mi rtog dngos med
pa// thugs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las// bstod cing las bcol ba'i gus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa 'dul
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te las ma dag ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// kun tu bkod pa'i bskal ba la// mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu
la// thar pa nag po dan phag gnyis// gsang don yan lag rab zhus pa// ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na// dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te// rnal 'byor de nyid dam pa'i

lam// de nyid la ni so sor gol// gtam tshig zhe gcod de nyid nyams// dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro sogs// rdo rje'i sngags kyi rnam smin phog/ srul nas smad 'tshong ma yi bu// dug shing ral gyi gdong nag
tu// sha za ma yi dur khrod bdag/ lha srin yongs kyi 'khor gyis bskor// lha yi sde dpon ka ru dang// srin po lang ka mgrin bcu dang// lha klu mi rnams lam log spyod// ngan song gsum du 'khor ba
las// thugs rje'i zhing du de gzigs te// bde gshegs bka' bgros bcang pa yis// zhi bas phan par ma gyur te// de bzhin gshegs kun khro bor gyur// sha rus khrag la longs spyod cing// dug gsum ma

lus khong du zos// oM sarba pA ba ka ra he ta pa bi shwa ma tra ru tra hU~M phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta sa byi shwa kha tong kha ru tra hU~M phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta pa byi shwa a sha ru dra hU~M phaT/ hri pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta

badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha grI pa hU~M phaT/ tri thum b+h+rAM dza/ te dza/ ba tri yaM bu dza/ ya da sho dza/ ga na dza/ ga ga na gra tsi ti tsi ti dza/ ma ma chu ga dza/ mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de dag snam nas bton nas ni// sgrib sbyang bshags te srog

snying phul// 'khor rnams bran du 'khol nas ni// dkyil 'khor skyong bar khas blangs te// thal ba'i dbang por lung bstan nas// 'dir ni bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// srog sngags 'di dag dngos por phul/ shog her ni shog he ma du ma ril

shog der shog 'dir shog 'dir duM 'dir duM/ tsi ta baM tsi rbad/ trag ra ka thun b+h+yo// tra ga rak+sha khaM khaM/ puM buM ga na ti ta shag A+oM rak+sha sha ra ti/ ma hA kA la kA la ya sto ya phaT/ ya

sto ya khug khug ni ga ta ya ga ta ya be dze be dze brungs phyung rtsad chod/ trag rak+sha thums/ kha dum rbad rbad dza dza/ ces srog las dang bcas pa phul lo// de yi cho ga 'di yin no// brug khung nag po gru gsum

nang// bar bu lcags kyi khad sgrom 'bar// mda' dang gsil byed mtshon cha la// phu rung chas gos nag por shes// ru tra kA la gri gug thod// beng dang bcas pa bzlas pa brtsam/ slob dpon chos grogs pha bu

dang// yul dpon btsun chen nye ba dang// mig dang don snying za na 'grub// sprang po dbyug pa thogs pa ngan// blang byed khri tshos 'brel ba dang// lus ngag sems kyi las su ni// bskor ba bzlas brjod ting

'dzin yin// bsnyen pa thabs kyis bskor bar bya// rbad bsang shes rab me dang mtshungs// sbyin bsreg thal ba phyar ram nan// dam tshig la sdang smos ci dgos// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan trar las// ru tra
bsgrub pa khro bo'i gleng gzhi bcas pa stai le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo thams cad rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad do// bde ba

chen po gar dbang phyug/ pad+ma rA ga kun tu zhal// dbu lnga mgo lnga gshog pa bzha// shar du rol pa'i phyag mtshan ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang// lho ru rol pa'i phyag mtshan

ni// thod khrag rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con rde'u chung// nub kyi phyag bzhir bsnams pa ni// me yi zhags pa khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub me 'bar kha T+wAM 'khrol// byang gi phyag bzhir bsnams pa ni// rdo rje dgu lnga
gsum gcig brdeg/ zhabs brgyad khro brdzis rgyan dang ldan/ sku yi dbang chen 'di gsungs so// srog dang rtsol ba'i bdag nyid can// 'jug gnas ldang bas phyi dang nang// de gnyis 'brel ba'i bdag nyid
can// de nyid kho na ngo bor gsal// tshogs chen yongs 'dus gar gyi dbang// dbu lnga dmar po rta mgo lnga// phyag ni bcu drug gshog pa bzhi// zhabs brgyad rngom brjid du khrod pa rgyan// g.yas

kyi phyag brgyad bsnams pa ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// rdo rje lcags kyu sprul zhags dang// 'khor lo rin chen zur brgyad dang// ral gri rdo rje lu gu rgyud// pad+ma yu 'dzin thod khrag bkang// khro snying gshin

rje'i dbyug pa dang// rgya gram rdo rje be con dang// me phreng tri shul khyung gi khra// gsung gi dbang chen 'di gsungs so// srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang// mnyam du gnas dang khyab par byed// ldang shing rgyu ba rnam

par rgyu// yang dag rab tu nges par rgyu// pad+ma gsang ba dbang chen sku// pad+ma gsang ba'i skur byung bas// dbu lnga dmar po gshog pa bzhi// zhabs bar bcu drug phyag rgya che// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags

dang// cang te'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag/ rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang// rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba dang// rdo rje lcags kyu lu gu rgyud// thod rlon stobs dang khro brgyad snying// me yi zhags pa khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub

me 'bar kha T+wAM 'khrol// thugs kyi dpal chen 'di gsungs so// snying ga gsang ba lkog ma dang// lte ba dang ni tshigs rnams la// rgyas dang rnam par rgyas pa dang// myong ltung mdza' ba'i rtsa la gnas// mig dang

rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang skye mched la// rlung gi cha dang sna dang ni// bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin par gnas// shes rab rta mgrin dbang gi sku// dbu gsum rta mgo ljang gu ni// ral pa dmar po gyen

du 'khyil// lcags sgrog ral gri dgra sta g.yas// lcags sgrog gshol dang tho ba g.yon// brkyang bskum chu bdag nyid steng bgrad// e ka dmar nag dur khrod chas// kha T+wAM thod rlon dmar bkang stob// phra men
byo la pu shud mgo/ dmar nag bskal ba'i me 'bar ba// lcags kyu phur pa 'dzin cing 'debs// rtsa ba'i lha bzhi 'di gsungs so// bag chags nyon mongs rlung ngo bo// dbang po gnyis dang mnyam sbyor

'jug/ srog rlung nya 'dra dang por 'pho// gnyis pa thur sel rus sbal 'dra// gsum pa gyen rgyu phag rgod 'dra// drug pa khyab byed seng ge 'pho// lnga yang mnyam gnas mi yi gzugs// drug pa las rlung sa khams

mig/ bdun pa rna bar rus sbal chu// brgyad pa rtsa rlung sna bug me// dgu par lha sbyin rlung khams ro// bcu pa gzhu rgyab lus khams can// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku 'dra ba// rab tu skye bar de yis bya// pad+mas

gar gyi dbang phyug ni// zhal gsum phyag bar+g+rad zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar dang dmar nag ljang nag zhal// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu ni// gyen du kha gdangs rta skad 'tsher/ !/ kha T+wAM ral gri rde'u chung
dang// dgra sta g.yas kyi phyag na 'dzin// ye shes mda' dang dbyings kyi gzhu// mdung thur gser gyi zhags pa g.yon// spyi gtsug ye shes khyung chen rdzogs// thugs la rdo rje gtum po
'bar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang mo ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa rdo rje yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa bdud rtsi yab la stob// drag po gsum sbas 'di gsungs so// lus kyi srog rnams
gsum 'dzin cing// rdung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// shel dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas// dbang po'i lam nas byung nas ni// yul rnams la ni 'jug par byed// snang ba gsum du gyur nas ni// rang
bzhin rtog bcas brgyad cu pa'o// yongs la 'char zhing 'jug pa ni// rta mchog rA ga'i mdog ldan pa// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gnas// dmar dang dkar ba mthing ga'i gzugs// rta mgo ljang gu

'khrul mar 'gyur// dang po rdo rje b+han dmar 'phyar// bar gnyis lu gu rgyud bsnams// tha ma rdo rje phur bu 'dril// khro gnyer ma ni 'bar 'dra 'khri// mo yi rtags ldan byang chub sems// mthar byed rta yis 'di
dag gsungs// thog mar lo bcu lon pa'i dus// rgyags pas myos pas gzhu rgyal za// lo bcus de yis lha sbyin za// lo bcus rgyags rlung rtsangs ma za// lo bcu btang bzung rus spal za// rlung dang btang
bzung nus stobs mtshungs// gnod pa med pa'i lo bcu yin// bcu gzhan rgyags myos btang bzung za// bcu bas myos chu tshe 'phel bya// bcu gzhan myos pa'i rlung za byed// me rlung btang bzung longs spyod

'phel// me chu rlung rgyas chu rlung 'dres// de ltar lo bcu gzhan du phyin// chu bzhi 'bras bu bzhin du 'gyur// rang sems thig le rol pa'i sku// g.yas dkar g.yon sde dbus dmar ba// rta mgo ljang gu rta skad

'tsher// rdo rje ral gri lcags sgrog dang// thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa rnams// zhabs bzhi rigs bzhi klu'i stengs na// ngo bo nyid kyi yum dang 'khril// thig le rol pas 'di gsungs so// mthar ni mi gnas
'pho ba yis// mi shigs 'chi ba 'od gsal byed// snang ba gsum dang rlung mnyam pas// bar dor dngangs shing lus rnams len// zhal gsum dkar dmar baiDUr+ya// sku gsung thugs kyi khyung gsum

rdzogs// zhing dbyug ral gri rtse dgu dang// lto 'gro'i zhags ba g.yon pa ste// be con mgo gnyis rdo rje bsnams// ye shes chen pos 'di gsungs so// rlung dang rnam shes 'dres pa'i las// ji ltar lha yi sku
rnams ni// yongs su gsal bar bskyed pa yi// bya ba kun yang 'grub par byed// dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal gsum mdog/ rdo rje rin chen dbyug pa g.yas// khro 'dzum ma chags pad+ma g.yon// bde ba chen pos
'di gsungs so// bde chen pad+ma'i gsang sbubs su// sa yi rlung chen rnam par rgyu// byang chub sems kyi thig le 'di// bde ba chen gyi ye shes thob// dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// zhal ni de
bzhin mtshungs pa la// pad+ma ral gri gtun shing g.yas// dril bu dgra twa me yi zhags// 'phags pa rta mgrin 'di gsungs so// yi ge oM ni sku yin te// AHzhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur// hU~M ni mi rtog ye

shes thugs// rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'grub pa yin// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba'i mdog/ muny+dza'i gseb nas ljang zhur can// gyen du kha gdangs hrIHsgra 'byin// g.yas
rdor g.yon pa dung phor 'dzin// tha mas thabs shes mda' gzhu can// gsang ba'i yum bzhi 'khor du gnas// gri gug thod pa g.yas g.yon 'dzin// rta mgrin lha lngas 'di gsungs so// rlung lnga la ni
dbang thob nas// de las sems gsum skye ba dang// ma dag pa yi sgyu ma 'grub// bsam gtan gnyis kyi 'od gsal du// de nyid mngon du byed pa ste// dag pa'i sgyu ma'ang grub pa yin// g.yas dkar dbus

dmar g.yon mthing ljang// sangs rgyas 'odakyi gong bu na// rdo rje kha T+wAM sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu b+han dmar lcags sgrog g.yon// e ka tsa ti dmar nag 'khril// kha T+wAM thod pa zhal gsum 'dren// kun tu kha

sbyor 'di gsungs so// la las rang srog 'dzin pa dang// dri chu khu ba thur du sel// zas dang btung ba 'ju ba dang// gtam sogs sgra ni 'byung ba dang// 'gro dang ldog pa'i las chen de// srog thur me gyen khyab
pa'i las// dmar po pad+ma sdigs mdzub g.yon// khyung chen dkar gsal thugs la rdzogs// klu rnams 'dul mdzad rgyan du che// nA ga gnod 'dul 'di gsungs so// rgyu ba gzung 'dzin rnam rgyu sgra// yang dag

dril ba rab rgyu'o// nges par rgyu ba reg bya ste// dbang po rab tu las kyi bdag/ hrIHsgra rdo rje'i skur rdzogs pa// dbu gsum de bzhin phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje pad+ma rgyu ma dang// dung chen rnge'u chus kha T+wAM 'khrol// dmar
skya rdo rje thod can yum// dpal chen 'bar bas 'di gsungs so// rten ni zung du 'jug la gnas// rdo rje'i bzlas pas las bzhi 'grub// khyab byed rnal 'byor bar ma dor// rang bzhin 'od gsal nyams su

myong// hrIHlas skyes pa'i phyag rgya che// dkar dang dmar dang ljang sngon zhal// dang po kha T+wAM rnge'u chung 'dzin// bar gnyis snying 'dren phyag byas pa// mtha' gnyis zhing dbyug b+han+d+ha 'dzin// rta mgrin gtum pos

'di gsungs so// rdo rje spyan la sogs pa yi// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan// de kun zag pa yod med pa// gnas skabs dang ni mthar thug go/ stong nyid ye shes khyab pa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag bzhi brkyang
bskum zhabs// g.yas pa thod dbyug sdigs mdzub me// chos 'khor skyon med pad+ma 'dzin// brkyang bskum zhabs dang ldan pa yi// dpa' bo gcig pas 'di gsungs so// phung po khams ni lnga

'grub byed// yul lnga'i rang bzhin kun dang ldan// dmar po pad+ma g.yon dril bu// dmar po gri gug thod pa 'dzin// yab yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs// pad+ma khro rgyal 'di gsungs so// chu ni zhe sdang rdo rje

la// sa ni nga rgyal rin po che// me ni chos rje 'od dpag med// rlung ni rta mchog ka sha tu las// rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad kun tu gsal// dmar po gri gug thod pa can// 'jigs
byed dpal gyis 'di gsungs so// chos dbyings srog la mnyam nyid thur// sor rtog gyen la me mnyam grub// khyab pa me long ye shes so// rA ga'i mdog 'dra dbyug pa can// sdigs mdzub mdzad pas 'di

gsungs so// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yi// chos kyi lha mos mchod par byed// zhal gsum pa la 'jigs 'jigs blta// rdo rje dung dmar dbyug pa dang// zhags pa mdzub mo rigs lnga'i khyung// khyung gshog ma

yis 'di gsungs so// sa chu me rlung rnam pa bzhi// phyi rol ston dpyid dbyar rgun rgyu// zla ba nyin zhag bcas pa la// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar ba
bzang po 'di// bcom ldan chags pa chen po'o// g.yon pa dag ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlungagi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pas// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// bcom ldan las rab chen po rab// gnyis pa las ni

'gyur ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal yin no// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni chu

yi dkyil 'khor te// bcom ldan rdo rje brtan pa'o// khams kun las ni yang dag byung// rten dang brten par bzung ba ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar gyur// gtso la

'khor du snang ba ni// gyen la me ste gseg la rlung// thur du chu la thad kar sa// grangs ni shes rab nyin mtshan thabs// nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar 'gyur// zhal gsum dkar sngo dmar ba la// g.yas pa

gsum na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM cad te'u la// me dpung zhags pa thod khrag g.yon// gzi ldan rdo rje thod khrag 'khril// pad+ma don yod 'di gsungs so// 'dzin pa dkar la sel byed ser// mnyam gnas
ljang nag gyen ni dmar// khyab pa nam mkha' sngo bsangs te// yan lag rtsa ba'i rjes su 'brang// zhal gcig pa la mdangs kyang bzang// g.yas pa rdo rje gdengs pa la// g.yon pa pad sdong thod par
bcas// pad+ma gsang chung 'di gsungs so// de dag kun gyi dgos pa yang// rlung gis de nyid 'jug 'gyur zhing// rdo rje yi ni bzlas pa 'grub// rdzogs pa'i rim bsgoms 'phral nad
'joms// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du byed// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las// dbang chen sku'i ngo bo gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi tshogs rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// rdo rje dbyings dang rta mgrin dbang// ye shes sems
dpa' gzi ldan ma// 'gro 'dul khams gsum rnam par rgyal// hU~M mdzad dus gsum byang chub sems// khams rgya drug dang long ba brgyad// dmus long drug cu lcags spyang brgyad// ye shes khyi bcu sgo ba
bzhi// me rlung 'brug rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde chen pho brang rnam snang dang// mi bskyod rin chen snang mtha' yas// don grub yab yum la sogs pa// sku mdog phyag rgya gdan rgyan bzhugs// theg pa'i

'gros ldan rta mgo lnga// dmar po gri khrod srin po 'joms// rdo rje rin chen khyung gshog sprul// a mo d+he ba glog 'gyu ma// dkar ser dmar ljang gru gsum klong// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// thod pa

rta mgo sman bla dang// snang mtha' don grub skur snang ngo// phyag rgya bcu drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon// bdud dpung spa bkong thal bar byed// thugs kyi ye shes kha sbyor ba// dmar po 'khor lo za ma tog/ dmar skya

nor bu za ma tog/ phyag rgya ye shes sngags dang bcas// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya'au// dpa' bo stag chas hU~M chen bcom// rgya bye'u lcags kyis mi g.yo ba// rdo rje'i gshog pa gshin rje'i gshed// bse khrab sngon
po dbyug sngon can// sprul nag pad+ma 'khyil pa ste// mche ba 'dod pa'i rgyal po la// shu ken dar gyis bdud rtsi 'khyil// gcan gzan gzig gis stobs chen mnan// sa stobs dbang ldan sbas pas

rol// gnyis med byang sems lhun gyis grub// de bzhin rdor rin pad grub gsang// dkar ser sngo dmar ljang gu nag/ zangs gri thod pa rgyu phreng snying// rang sngags brjod pa thod pa'i gnas// dmus long drug

cu bco lnga phyogs// lcags kyu phur pa kha dog rigs// mgo brnyan sprul pa ce spyang brgyad// mthing nag gri gug thod pa khrag/ lcags spyang brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// rang gi brgyad dang ye shes bcu// sngags las

grub pa'i me dpung klong// mgo dgu rkang gcig lcags kyu dkar// 'od gshog brgyad ldan zhags pa sngo// ye shes drug drug lcags sgrog dmar// gsang ba gsum ldan dril bu ljang// thod khrag sngags sgrub sgo
bzhir gnas// me rlung 'brug brgyad phyogs bcur khyab// dur khrod sprul pa kun dang rol// dkyil 'khor brgyad rnams yongs su gsal// mi thod sbrul dang dur khrod rgyan// zur gsum logs

gsum kham rgya drug/ rigs mdog thod pa gri gug bcas// thod khyams long ba dmus long rnams// g.yu 'brug lcags rta ba glang dang// chu srin la ni chibs su mdzad// le brgan se ral sprul dang rlung// sku la

na bza' rab tu gyon// me dpung khyung sder sbrul zhags snying// dmus long spyir yang sprul par mdzad// ye shes sgron ma phyogs mthun mtshams// me dpung lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcur

bcas// shar du mgo dgu rkang gcig nag/ s+t+wa re lcags kyu g.yon dang bcas// lho ru mgo brgyad rdo rje phur// nub tu mgo drug phur pa gtor// byang du mgo gsum snying drug za// me 'brug dmar po me dang
sprul// rlung 'brug sngon po rlung thod sprul// rang sngags skur byung 'khor du gnas// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis

pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ mUM lAM pyAM tAM maM dza/ A+oM pad+ma n+ta kr-i ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya

grI ba hrI \u0f7fdza/ oM badzra dz+nyA na satwa hU~M/ oM ha ha ru lu hU~M phaT/ A+oM badzra pA sha hU~M/ sA+o Ta baM/ aM ku sha dza/ g+ha N+De ho/ oM badzra kro ta A be AHhU~M dza/ A+oM ka ti ka taM baM dza/ A+oM a ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka Te hU~M phaT/ A+oM pad+ma shrI he

ru ka hU~M phaT/ b+hud+d+ha badzra oM/ satwa badzra hU~M/ rat+na badzra traM/ d+harma badzra hrIH/ karma badzra hA/ gu Na badzra phaT/ oM shwa rI khA hi hU~M/ shwa rI khA hi trAM/ shwa rI khA hi hrIH/ shwa rI khA hi ho/ shwa rI khI khA hi hA/ A+oM shwa rI hU~M/ shrI khA hi trAM/ shrI

khA hi hrIH/ shrI khA hi hA/ A+oM dIp+ta tsakra shwa na mu kha khur mor kha hU~M phaT/ ku ru ku ru yak+sha hU~M phaT/ ku ku ra tsa kha long kha hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M trAM trAM phaT/ hU~M hrIHhrIHphaT/ hU~M hA hA phaT/ A+oM dzi na laM te tsa ra ma/ yak+sha ku pa

na tsa hU~M phaT/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags so// A+oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+ta na/ ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ sku'i sngags so// oM pad+ma b+ha ta si ti ha he tsakra b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ gsung gi bsnyen sngags so// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ e A ra li hU~M hrIHdza/ thugs kyi bsnyen
sngags so// A+oM hrIHhrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ yon tan gyi bsnyen sngags so// A+oM hri dim da ri ha ya grI wa e ka dzA Ti hu lu hu lu hU~M dza dza/ phrin
las kyi bsnyen sngags so// gsang sngags lnga po 'di dag la// gang gis bsnyen pa bskyal ba de// rig 'dzin sa la gdon mi za// bdud dang 'byung po smos ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das pa de nyid yin// dbang
chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo'i phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs so// rigs lnga spyi yi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje dbyings

kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// spyi gtsug rgyal ba'i tshul phyag 'tshal// rtag dong zhal gyi phyag rgya yis// rta mgrin brkyang bskum srin pa'i phyag/ rig byed lcags kyus phyag rgya yis// sems dpa' bsam gtan mi

g.yo'i phyag/ lu gu rgyud kyi 'gro ba 'dul// ma mo 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan// rnam par rgyal ba khyung gshog rdzogs// klu 'brug 'bros pa'i rgya dang bcas// brkyangabaskum phung ba hU~M mdzad 'dren// drang srong

tsog pu'i tshul phyag 'tshal// lha mo 'dzum mdangs gzi dang ldan// dam tshig sbyor ba'i tshul phyag bya// klu bro gar phyag pad+ma dbang// thal sbyar mi yi phyag kyang 'tshal// sbrul nag zhags pa sprul pa rnams// dam

tshig sbyor ba'i tshul du bya// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad dang du blang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// thog mar shes pa dam pa ste// de yang lung dang man ngag shes// mi 'khrugs sbyor ba'i rgyu btsal nas// brda' skad tshogs la mkhas pa'i ging// las dang phyag rgya len shes

na/ mang po'i don du bye ba rung/ dgyes pa bskyed dang thugs dang 'thad// mchod stob rdul phyag 'khor du bcas// ting 'dzin mchog dang bkra shis shing// yid 'ong nyams dga' la sogs par// dus dang 'tsho
ba la sogs bsgrub// rigs dang yo byad mtshan ma dang// lang tsho man ngag gdan pa'i dus// bza' ba bca' ba btung ba bgo/ rab tu 'bad pas gnod bral ba'i// dag pa'i rdzas kyang ldab tu bya// ma dag

dam tshig skong yo byad// go cha sogs dgod dud pa dang// 'byung bzhi'i khams kyi bcud dang bcas// brda' yi bye brag sgra sgrog pa// mchod dam skyo ba sel bar byed// sgrub pa sku dang gsung thugs rten// bkra

shis dag pa sgrub mchog zhing// de dag dang po bzhi ru nges// dkon mchog mgon po snying rje bgegs// mdo bzhi thabs kyi bar chad mchod// rgyal po khro bo'i stangs stabs dang// dam sri sgo byang ma traM

mnan// rgyan bsdebs me khrag stong pas bsrung// dkyil 'khor byug pa tshon thig gi/ rdo rje dril bu sku rdzas dgod// bla re bza' btung rgyan gyis bskon// rang bzhin med la goms pa yis// ci yang 'byung ba'i

cho 'phrul du// gnas rdzas 'khor sogs rab tu gnas// sri mnan 'dres dang ma 'dres la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan yang drang// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// sha d+ha ba

dang g+har d+ha ba// lcang ka de'u bang de'u// 'khor ba spyi nas 'dren pa'i bro// sdug bsngal nad med thugs rje'i bro// thugs kyi dbyings nas bskul ba'i bro/ ye shes rgyan gyi bro bo che// ma mo mkha'
'gro 'khrugs pa'i bro// lang+ka srin po bsgral ba'i bros// bdud bzhi ma lus 'joms pa dang// 'das dang ma 'das dngos grub thob/ dngos grub bzang po'i mtshan ma la// nyams len bar chad gsal zhing
blang// spyod lam rgyun gyis rnal 'byor pas// ma nyams blta ba'i gdeng dang ldan// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ bsgrub pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad gsungs so// bla ma dang ni mched lcam la// lus ngag yid kyis gus par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yi

dam lha dang gsang ba'i bcud// mi spang snod ngan spel mi bya// 'di ni sku gsung thugs kyi dam// gzungs ma mtshan ldan dang du blang// zhing bcu yal bar dor mi bya// khyad par rdzas la blang bar bya// bcud

'thig snod ngan ngag 'khyal dang// tshig rtsub lta ngan zhe yang bcad// glang po mi rta bya khyi dang// dri chen dri chu byang chub sems// mAM sa pad+ma rak+ta rnams// dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po yin// nyon mongs lnga nyid rnam

dag pas// spang bar bya ba'i rgyu yang med// rang gi phung po lhar shes nas// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas logs na med// yon tan mtha' dag ldan gyur na// bsgrub cing dang du yongs kyis blang// rgyal blon phal pa

lha srin ldang// nad mang nor 'bri tshe thung bas// myur du gso ba'i las la 'bad// mchod pa sna tshogs gtor bskang bas// rtsa ba la ni gsum yin te// yan lag rgyun du bskang ba dang// rtsa ba nyams pa'i rnal
'byor bas// bskal pa gcig gnyis gsum bar du// rdo rje'i dmyal bar sems rgyun 'tshig/ yan lag nyams na ngan 'gror ltung// tshe 'dir bsam pa 'grub pa dang// phyi mar sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// de phyir

rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrung// khyad par sgrub pa byed pa'i tshe// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba yis// ston pa'i bka' bzhin bsrung bar bya// de bas ma yi ngag ltar nyon// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las// dam tshig gi
le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtul zhugs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// khyung chen brtul zhugs lta 'phang bcad// glang chen lta bur spyod

pa dor// wa ltar chos dang mi mthun dor// gyi ling lta bur brtson 'grus myur// khyi phag lta bur gtsang sme spang// bu chung lta bur blang dor bral// smyon pa lta bur 'jigs med spyad// bung ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi
blang// drang srong spyod pas brtson 'grus bsgrub// bu bzhin ma yi ngag la spyad// dka' ba thams cad dang du blang// bgegs dang 'byung po thog brdzis bya// lus ngag yid gsum lha skur

sbyar// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum khron tu brko bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// bdud rtsi zas su za bar bya// rdo rje rta yi brtul zhugs kyis// rta skad thengs gsum 'bod par

bya// dpal gyi rta skad chen po yis// yang dag sku gsum dbyings nas bskul// ma mo'i brda' skad sbran pa yis// brda' skad klong rdol las la rbad// rnal 'byor gsang ba brda' skad kyis// mnyam dang bskul

dang rtags tsam 'dzin// sha rul dong du bcug pa la// sha sbrang shin tu 'du ba dang// sbyang dang lug bzhin bred pa dang// khyi dang phag bzhin rbad par 'gro// dpal gyi pheM brdabs hU~M sgra las// bsgrub pa'i

dbyangs dang tshangs pa yis// zhing khams ri rab rtse la blangs// gsum zhes bya ba dgu yi chos// lta ba spyod dang bsgom pa dang// 'bras bu bzhin du gar gyur pa// rbad pas thal ba bzhin du rlog/ lha srin thams
cad dbang du sdus// dpal gyi sku dang gnyis su med// 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yin// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las// spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis nam mkha' dngas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// sngags la rgyu 'bras thams cad kyang// chos rnams rgyu 'bras mi bslu bas// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// gar gyi
dbang phyug skur gsal ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// thams cad gcig tu bsdus pas na// rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// de yi thugs kar kun rdzob nas// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas na// zag

pa med pa'i 'phro 'du 'gyed// rin chen g.yu yi chu mig la// yid bzhin bdud rtsi babs pa las// skal ldan gang zhig bsgrub pa ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// chos nyid skye med rgya mtsho bzhin// mi skye

mi 'gag mi g.yo dang// dwangs shing rtog med rgya mtsho'i dbyings// rgyu ma'i phyag rgya gsal ba ni// dpal chen yum ni chos kyi sku// ngo bo nyid kyis gnyis su med// dngos po'i tshul gyis sbyor zhing 'khril// 'phro

'du byang sems 'od zer ni// gsang yum pho nya'i tshogs la sogs// dngos po sprul sku spyir snang mod// don 'dus chos dbyings rgya mtsho 'dra// de la spros kyang 'phel 'grib med// lta ba rgya mtsho'i rin chen

bzhin// de bsdus nyung zhing 'grib pa med// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar dbyings su thim// 'di rtogs rnal 'byor skal bar ldan// spyod pa mkha' la sprin tshogs lding// ji ltar bltas kyang dbyings na yin// nam
mkha' bya bzhin ltung gnas med// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// nges pa'i don rtogs gnas rab bgrod// ces gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba g.yu'i chu mig gi
le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pU dza sna tshogs gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// dkar ser dmar ljang lha

mo yis// spyan shangs thugs la dbul bar bya// tshad med bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur// A+oM nA maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ duSh+pe/ d+hU ye/ A lo ke gan+d+he/ pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje lha mo gzugs mdzes

ma// rin chen lha mo dpal 'phreng can// pad+ma'i lha mo gling bu'i sgra// las kyi lha mo gar mkhan ma// ye shes bzhi dang mnyam par rol// A+oM AHhU~M/ lA s+ye hU~M/ mA le trAM/ git+ti hrIH/ nir ti a/ 'khor lo rin chen

mun pa sel// glang po rin chen stobs dang ldan// blon po rin chen dam chos skyong// btsun mo rin chen dbyings dang ldan// rta mchog rin chen rdzu 'phrul shugs// nor bu rin chen phongs pa sel// dmag dpon

rin chen bdud ba zhi 'dul// rgyal srid mchod pa bla na med// rat+na pU dzA me g+ha hU~M/ dpal ldan pad+ma lcang lo ru/ glang po mi rta bya khyi'i sha/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer 'phro// dam rdzas lha yi mchod pa

'dis// mngon par shes pa lnga thob byed// oM ba liM ta te dzo ba liM ta ba la ba ti g+hu h+ya sa ma ye swA hA/ dpal gyi zhal bu pho brang du// rang byung rnam dag bdud rtsi lnga// rin chen rnam snang chos kyi dbyings// byang

sems zhe sdang me long thugs// mAM sa mnyam nyid rin chen rigs// pad+ma rak+ta 'od dpag med// dri chu chen po bya ba grub// dug lnga ye shes lngar rtogs byed// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ zhing gi chos

dbyings rnam par dag/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul du// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya thos kyi longs spyod rnams// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// ye shes la yang ye shes rol// chos nyid

la yang chos nyid bzhes// kun tu bzang pos mnyes gyur cig/ namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo b+hi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba tha khaM udwa ga te s+phar Na hi maM ga ga ma khaM swA hA/ bdag rtog phung khams spyod yul rnams// ye shes lha
dang gnyis med pas// dgyes par rol pa'i mchod pa 'di// gnyis med blang dor med par bzhes// 'khor ba ma rig mun pa las// stobs chen yongs sgral sha dang khrag/ dgyes par rol pa'i dam rdzas
kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skong// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las mchod sbyin dam pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las sna tshogs gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// gang gi tshe nyams tshe yar ba// drod tshad ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor rtsibs drug gang rung yang// bum pa zhal zas rdzas bshams te// gzi

ldan ma dang kham rgya drug/ gshog pa'i ma mo bzhi bskyed nas// tshe bskul bsgrub dang gug pa dang// gzung dang bstim dang spa ba dang// dbang bskur dngos grub blang ba dang// rgyas btab lha dang tshe tshad

mnyam// A+oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ri mi ta A udz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ sarba saM skA' ra pa ri shud+d+hI d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang gi las kyis tshe

'phog pas// dngos grub chen po blta ba gcad// rin chen ga'u rin chen blangs// mchod sbyin srad pa chen po bya// gzhal yas khang du b+h+rUM las bskyed// rdo rje rol mo'i gar gyis khyer// dri zhim dag gi chu yis
bkru// bar do'i shes pa brten la dgug/ ngan song sbyong ba'i bro yis sbyong// skyabs gsol sems ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug/ lha dang rig pa mkha' la gzhug/ dgra dang bgegs kyi shes pa bstim// dug

gsum 'khor ba'i chu las bsgral// lha dang mchod pa'i dam rdzas bskyed// las ngan sdig sgrib me la sbyang// thal ba sku gdung mchod pa'i rten// gshed lcags ldang pa med par mnan// longs spyod bdag nyid

rol ba yin// A+oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-I h+Na gr-I h+Na hU~M/ b+h+r-I h+NA pa ya gr-I h+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho// b+ha ga wA na/ bid+ya ra dzA ya hU~M/ hrI las byung ba dmar mo'i sku// gri gug thod pa phyag

na bsnams// ne'u le'u rkyal ba mchan na bsnams// rdo rje'i sngags chu bdag nyid btung// zas nor 'dod pas mchog tu sngags// A+oM dzam+b+ha mo hi hi thi hri da ya ma bar pa ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ A+oM dz+haM be mo he thi bi ni ri ha ma ma ba su buSh+tiM ku ru hring dza/ gnod
sbyin mo ni nor 'khyil ma// mon nag spyan dmar g.yas pa na/ rin chen bum pa thugs ka na// g.yon pa ne'u le rin chen skyugs// gos nor zas kyi bdag mo yin// changs bu lan bdun gsum du ni// khyims

dang skye rags gtsang ma'i sa// A+oM tad+ya thA a na le kuN+Da li b+ha na bi sha tsi na ye swA hA/ A+oM na mo khra mo khri ye swA hA/ A+oM na ma khri kha mu ma hA khra mo ma hA tsi na ye swA hA/ ltas ngan 'di yang bsgrub khang dang// rtol mo rog

mo la mdzer can// srin po'i lag pa 'phar sbyang lce// rdzas sna gsum gyi ril bu bya// gtor ma dus drug rang nyid kyang// tsha ba'i zas sogs sha chang bza'// stag g.yag skyes pa bud med zhon// mdun du mi la

brid pa'i sku// mi smra mi 'phro mi yur zhing// lha bsnyen gong du song pas bzlas// rdzas med grub par mi 'gyur ro// shan ni pa sin tra sa ma ya dza/ shad ne ma sen ta ma ra ya phaT/ mA ra ya dza/ che ge mo'i tsit+ta la
chums// thums ling// rbad su ling/ shang shan rgyug rgyug/ rbud rbud sa ma ya phaT dza/ gang gi rkang lag reng byed pa// snag tsha nang du mtshon rtse brdar// rab po 'khor lo rab gnas bri// dbang gi

skur bsgom bzlas pas 'grub// A+oM na tra mu la ni swA hA/ ma ma sarba du khra/ mu kha staM b+ha ya/ has ta b+han thA yas thad b+han d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ rdo rje go cha gon byed pa// rim pa bzhi pa'i 'khor lo

la// rdo rje rdo rje'i ga logs bri// ka dang ka yi ya ta can// 'chang la bsrung ba'i ming gis bskor// sngags bcas rdo rje phyed pa bzlog/ bris na btags na srung pa'i mchog/ rdo rje'i go cha bla na med// A+oM kru yi wa

khar lce ma ra thaM suM 'byung kla gtsang ni rnam pa dug rnams bzlog/ yul khams rab tu srung byed pa// rin chen rdza yi ga'u ru// dkar gsum mngar ba'i rnam pa dang// ye shes lnga dang 'ja' tshon lnga// sku dag srin

mo'i 'o ma dang// sngags kyi 'bru gu rmu yi dkar// de ni ser ba'i gdong du gtad// sir ba'i khal rta mgo bcad de// ril bu sngags rdzas rgyas btab nas// gshed kyi thod pa steng du skyon// seng sgo ser ba'i srang

yang bcad// drod kyi dpag bsam gzhu bya ste// drag pa'i mda' la btsan bya'i sgro// srin gyi rnga mas rgyud sbyar te// gdong bzlog mde'u rtse gnam du gtad// bdag nyid rtag dong oM tshugs bsgom// oM ka dza ti pho

nyar mngag/ drag po'i rdzas sna tshogs tshad la// bsnyen cing gdong du gdab par bya// A+oM tad+ya tha tsa ti tsa ti/ gu gu ti/ sha ra sha ra shur shur/ ma li ma li/ kyi la kyi la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ su pra ti dza ya/ mi li mi li/ ma ma ru

lu ru lu/ hU~M b+h+yo hU~M phaT ta ra/ oM na ga she du ma pa she/ nan ti sa ma ya/ shAkya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM 'brug thog phyir ruM swA hA/ zhing bcu bsgral ba'i las bya na// rin chen dbang gi gzhong pa ru// pad+ma rak+ta mtshal chen

dang// ze ma ka la bir 'dra'i snying// 'dod chags rang gshed thod pa ru// khrag dug snying sna mang po'i snying// bya mo nag mo'i gri snying nang// don po leb rgan kha yang bcad// mdun du muM las byang chub

ma// dmar ser gri dang b+han d+ha bsnams// ma mo nag mo dun b+h+yo// ma mo dun ting ma las la dun b+h+yo// trag rak+sha dza mun ti snying shad shad nr-i dza dun b+h+yo// 'ur skam me sha raM kha kha ha ha gra ta hri dza dza/ tsa thun mA ra

ya thun sod/ shag thun mA ra ya thun sod/ ru ru rag mo mA ra ya thun sod/ ma ma mug ti g+h+ri na thun sod/ ma ma sha thun ti thun son/ ma ma thun thun mA ra ya thun sod/ shag shag mthun mug shag thun sod/ ma ma

rag mo ma ti dza dza/ rak+sha ru ru tsa mun ti kI la ya rbad rbad/ trag rak+sha tsa mu na ti kI la ya rbad rbad/ ma ma snying khar ga nr-i dza/ pa la nis ni mugs mugs/ rag mo ni he he dza/ thum ri li rbad rbad/ trag rak+sha mu tra
snying kha rag mo dun byo// srid gsum par du sdud pa yi// bdag nyid dmar mo nyid du bsam// mda' dang lcags kyu gzhu dang ni// ut+pal 'dzin ma bsam la bzlas// oM ku ru ku l+le hrIHswA hA/

'bum khri bye ba bdun 'bum gyis// phyug bdag lha min rgyal po dang// skye dgu'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur// dam la mi gnas bsgral ba'i zhing// pho mo thod pa dmar nag tu// khrag dug snying sna'i rdzas la
'dod// dang por bcu pa bsgrims te grangs// gzer ram khong khrag yod gyur na// dgos pa'i sngags byang 'bru gcig dbyung// bcu gnyis dag tu gtor ba'o// bla dgas dag ni byung gyur na// bcu gsum dag

tu rbad b+h+yo bzlog/ shan dmar glo dmar rtags byung na// dgu pa gtor la 'bru gcig dbyung// khyi nag ma mo bzlog gyur na// lnga dang drug pa mtha' brtul dbyung// bdun du gtor ba man ngag yin// thog mar
'bru bzhi 'khor lo'i sngags// bcun yin bcu pas cho 'phrul 'jil// lnga ru gtor ba man ngag yin// mun ltar gtibs pa'i ma mo dmar// lcags klu zhags thogs sngags 'di yin// mu rak+sha dza mun ti kha la
b+h+yo rbad/ rlung sems srog rtsol ldan pa yis// srid gsum sems can las la spyod// srid pa'i bar dor gnas pa kun// pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung gis// rigs drug bkug la rten la bstim// skyabs gsol

sems bskyed sa la bzhag/ dkyil 'khor gzhug pa gnyis pa ste// bsnyen par snang ba bya ba dang// nye bsnyen dang ni bsgrub pa dang// sgrub chen thob nas sku gsum gyi// sa la bzhag pa bdun pa ste// bag chags

las ngan byang ba'i sngags// ngan song rigs drug gzhom par bya// A+oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hU~M phaT/ A+oM sarba du rga sarba ga me sarba kle sha he tuM hU~M phaT/ A+oM par bid kharga ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ tshon sna lnga ldan srad

bul/ rdo rje gsum gdab mdud pa'i rgya// ye shes lha bstim bo'o zhu nas// skyabs 'gro gsol gdab lus la gdags// gro ga shing shun dri ldan chus// yi dam sngags dang phyag rgya bris// rab tu gnas te gang

yin la/ btags na gdon bgegs 'joms par nus// sprin med dwangs pa'i chos dbyings su// tshe yi phyag rgya bzhi bc-ings nas// de'i tshe thub dang mi thub pa'i// bar chad nges par brtag par bya// tshe bslu tshe
bskyed la sogs pas// rnal 'byor tshe srog brtan par gzung// rang rig bsgom la gzhol ba yis// mdun gyis dmigs pa 'gul gyur na// hU~M gi sgra dang sems su bcas// yi dam lha yi thugs kar
'gro// dang po zhi ba'i dus nyid du// shar du kha bltas nam mkha'i gnas// bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// mdog dkar bdud rtsi lhung bzed bsnams// spyan drangs mchod pa phul nas ni// bdun po rnam
dag mnyes bsams nas// g.yas kyi rlung gis dngos grub bskul// g.yon gyi rlung gis blangs nas ni// rang gi thugs la bstim pa dang// shin tu brtan par bya ba dang// mi g.yo 'chi med thob

pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs dang bcas// oM A yu She sa ra ha ga ra ri sha ra ri hU~M phaT swA hA/ A+oM a ma ra Ni dzI wan ti ye swA hA/ A+oM ma hA a ma ra A yur dz+nyA na b+h+rUM hU~M/ A+oM a ma ra Ni dzI wan ti swA hA// gang
gi chung tshe 'phel byed pa// spu med bya yi sgro dang ni// byang chub 'phel ba'i dpag bsam shing// ro dang ldan pa'i gser mdog dang// za byed phra mo'i sder mo dang// rab tu gces sogs rdzas bcangs
te// gnam gta' chos kyi dbyings su sba// bar gta' lha srin srog la bcun// sa gta' srid kyi sa gzhi gzung// 'jam pa po dang ri dwags rgyal/ dza mi ka sogs brtag par bya// rgyal bsen sa bdag gcud

la bor// med btsal yod gso shi 'phrog cod// bya gdon mngal kha la sogs pas// sra'u gso ba bla na med// 'go ba'i lha lnga bsten par bya// A+oM A yur+dz+nyA na b+h+rUM swA hA/ zla ba zhag la sogs pa yi// keg dang
bcas pa'i gtor ma yis// gdon chen bco lnga mchod par bya// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// rnam smin 'du ba gnod pa'i gdon// tshogs dang 'tsho byed sngags kyis gzhom// rje'u rigs lag g.yas rgyal rigs mgo/ bram ze lag g.yon dmangs rigs

g.yas// gdol ba rkang pa g.yon nas 'jug/ rgyal rigs rus te rje'u rigs lpags// dmangs rigs spu ste bram ze khrag/ gdol pa sha la zhugs pa dang// snying dang glo ba srog rtsa mchin// dbang po klad pa chu
ba rnams// rang gi rtags kyis ston par byed// rgyal rigs lce thibs sa yi dug/ bram ze chu dug grang zhing 'dar// rje'u rigs me ni tsha zhing bsreg/ dmangs rigs yang zhing g.yo ba rlung// gdol ba reg

mthong kha rlangs can// gzer zhing za 'phrug myos par byed// rgyal rigs rgyal po rtag tu gnod// rje'u rigs klu btsan rtag tu gnod// dmangs rigs dam sri rnams dang bsdang// bram ze srin mo'i tshogs dang
bcas// gdol pa mdze 'dre rtag tu gnod// ma mos byad du 'jug pa dang// rgyal pos sna 'dren glo bur btsan// the brang dam sri nyen langs gcod// lus snyoms chu la brtag pa yang// g.ya' med snod du nyi
shar dus// nad gzhi kha dog sgo nas brtag/ 'bur long ga go la yi mdog/ mu tra'i mdog ni nad med rtags// mar khu 'o ma chu rtsa rams// mkhris rlung bad kan 'dus pa'i nad// de sogs brtags pas mdog
rnams gsal// gzugs la gdon brtag phyogs bzhi dbus// khang sa zhing sa dur sa dang// mchin pa snying gro mkhal ma dang// rgyal po rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs// ston dpyid dbyar dgun la

sogs brtag/ khrag la bzang ngan dus dang ni// thub dang mi thub brtag pa dang// dmar ser kham pa nag po'i dus// dang po ngan la bar ma 'bring// tha ma bzang na chu ser rgyas// dang po bza' 'brid tha ma

ngan// chu ser gting du zhen pa dang// skyo bo dmar po rma khar bcug/ dril lam 'byar gyis dbye bar bya// tshangs pa'i mkhar dang bdud kyi mkhar// gnod sbyin mkhar dang srin po'i mkhar// ma mo'i mkhar dang
srog gi mkhar// srin po'i mkhar shor spang bar bya// g.yas pa dkar ste g.yon pa sla// sha spu rus dug dka' bar 'gyur// dbang po gsal byed chu bur mig/ gdon gnod pa dang zhag zla lo// 'bras bu smin
dang mtsho rdol dang// rnam smin rigs dang byad ka dang/ ku re mnol phyir re 'dod dang// dmigs bsal sngags chun sngags dred dang// gdon tsabs mchod pa'i mig sprin brtag/ lus kyi sha mtshan dod pa

dang// ngag gi sgra skad skye ba dang// sems kyi rmi lam sna tshogs rnams// gang yin rab tu gzung bar bya// rnam par smin pa'i las byung na// bsod nams tshogs dang stong nyid bsgom// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i du

ba las// sman dang sna tshogs rdzas kyi gso// seng ldeng mu zi rgyal blon bsre// klu bdud nag po bshal sman dang// phol dang sha bkra la sogs par// 'bru spu shun sha tshil gsum dang// dug bzhi khrag gnyis la

sogs bdug/ spyad dug sbyang tsher gla rtsi btsod// snag tsha ra dug long rdol dang// gu gul dri chen ti tsa dang// ka ra bi ra ga pur dang// tsan+dan mu zi ldong ros dang// mar dkar ra gzhob la sogs byug/ bdud

rtsi mar khu a ru ra/ pi pi ling dang rnam pa gsum// mdze nad nag po klu bdud nag/ btsan dug gu gul mu zi nag/ shu dag nag po rnam pa drug/ ma ma gi ram mchog ris dang// bod te'u rma bya ra las khrag/ tha

kar sro ma gu gul dkar// za 'bru sug ma yu mo mde'u// byang ba tsha srin sdig sngo sngo// ka ka ru ni rnam pa lnga// seng ldeng rgya do rdo rgyus 'gron// lto ru gtang bar yang dag bshad// yan lag zha grum la sogs

pa// sman gyi sbyor bas gzhom bar bya// 'phral yi rkyen dbang gyur pa las// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba gdab// nA ga rA tsa mA ra ya phaT/ phu me rA tsa mA ga ya phaT/ sa khrag rA tsa mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma shu shu nA ga tsa

tri thun zer rbad/ ra tsa 'dri la thib ra rA tsa thang thang shi shi rbad// ma ma yaM tri du me mA ra ya rbad// nag mo shu shu mA ra ya rbad// nA ga tsi tra dun nan/ nA ga tsa tra phur nan/ mA ra ya rbad/ sa daM so mA ra ya rbad/ tsakra ru
tri rbad/ nA ga rA tsa mA ra ya ba shad khug dza/ ru ru sa dur khug dza/ nA ga yum thums ri li rbad dza/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'joms pa'i 'khor lo 'di gsungs
so// smug nag gru gsum gnam sgo bca'// mu khyud gru chad bar khyams sgo// dkyil 'khor dbus su phur pa gnyis// gnam sgo la yang phur pa gnyis// ro ras gro ga shing shun la// bya rog mgo rtsa khrag dug

gis// sngags grangs mnyam pa'i re mig la// nyi shu rtsa gcig drag sngags dgod// phur ba'i sngags kyis klu la gzir// zhag grangs thems nas srog rtsa bcad// drag po'i me la sbyin sreg bya// gdug pa gsum
dang sdong zlar bcas// dbang chen rngam pa'i zhal du 'bul// dpal gyi zhabs 'og dag tu mnan// klu yi gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// las kyi khyung nag khros pa

ni// rdo rje rgya gram phyag na gsor// klu gnyan sa bdag zhal du gsol// de'i sku gzugs bris nas ni// nu mar rdzas kyi thum pos brgyan// sprul pa rigs lnga'i khyung lnga 'gyed// de yi drag sngags 'di dag

yin// A+oM ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT/ nA ga srog tshig nan rbad// lus rdul bun nA ga mA ra ya rbad sod/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la shi shi rdul bun nA ga mA ra ya rbad sod/ A+oM nA ga shi nan/ nA ga ber/ nA ga chings/ nA ga

sngoms/ nA ga sod/ nA ga go la ya/ nA ga rA tsa chings/ nA ga rA tsa hU~M/ nA ga rA tsa phaT/ nA ga shu shu nan/ nA ga byer nA ga snying la srog rbad/ pra ti sa ma ya/ nA ga snying tshal pa dum bu rbad/ A+oM sid thA thag ru Ta bi

shad de na nan/ nA ga thams/ nyi ma sa lan na klad pa nan// tsit+ta g+hu min na// kun shig tsit+ta sU tra bzlog byer/ nA ga bzlog nA ga shig nA ga nan/ nA ga mgo la nan/ nA ga byer byer/ mA ra ya phaT rbad sod/ ya

ma shu shu sod/ nag po shu shu mgo la nan/ sa dam nag pos khrag mA ra ya rbad/ na ma sham tri rak+sha mA ra ya rbad/ tsakraM du tri su mi mA ra ya rbad/ rA tsa thad thad shi shi rbad/ traM ril thums kyi ma tang khug shel rA tsa mA
ra ya rbad/ ces gsungs so/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ mdze nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// dgos pa'i longs spyod tshang ba ni// 'byor ldan yo byad tshogs yin te// dgyes ldan lha dang skal ldan mi// de bzhin yang dag shes par ldan// tshe 'dzin dza

gad dza ti dang// zla rgyas zla phrom 'jam des dang// me tog tsi dang kun tu rgyug/ 'jam snying byi la se dang ni/ kun 'byor 'brang rgyas 'byor tshogs rnams// sgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag ldan// A tsar+ya rdo rje slob
dpon yin// gu ru ta ra mkhas pas bshad// ru pa ma ri'i rtse mo yin// ma tang la ko so mang yul// pha lam ka ni grong khyer yin// su med grong du bshad pa'o// ka lo ka ni yod pa'i ming// sha ring

ga ga ma skal yod shes// tse tra kam ni skal med brjod// phur na ma ni snod ldan ma// sa ri bya ni snod ngan te// ga ya ni zhes rgyal rigs la/ ra gam rje'u rigs zhes ni bshad// bi ra rgya ni dmangs rigs

so// ram sa ka ri bram zer bshad// bi rad+hu pe gdol ba can// sa mud traM ni rgyal por brjod// tsa bam rig ngan zhes ni bshad// sham raM sme sha can du brjod// b+ha ba tsag trI ga lbags mkhan// khad kaM ro sreg

ma ru bshad// pa sha zhags 'bar ma ru bshad// ku ma ri ni nyin mor bshad// ka nya mtshan mo rab tu grags// ta pa nyi ma phyed du bshad// ta pi mtshams kyi cha ru bshad// rti tre bzang po'i dus su bshad// pra ti

dus ngan spangs par gyis// hi ra ni ni me tog brjod// sha ru naM ni yongs su brjod// sha ku ni ka mar mer brjod// sha pra ti ta lha bshos la// mA la tri ni gri ru brjod// kri ti ma ti sgra yin te/ sha ki ka ni gos su

bshad// ga ni bshad par yongs su grags// ru shaM ri ni khu mar shes// ga nam sha chen du ni bshad// tsan tra na me khrag tu bshad// me ga ma traM can du brjod/ ku ta raM ni 'dod yon sbyong// tsa tuM ro drug za ba

bo// saM b+ho nga kaM chang 'thung ngam// bi tuM sha ru mngon par brjod// na mi ni pa kraM ni thod// ku laM mi yi rus las brgyan// sha khams bzang ba zhes ni brjod// A raM ro ni zhim par bshad// a k+ShaM raM ni ro mi

zhim// ba ko la mud dam glu len// mi kra gar zhes bya bar bshad// shab ta tshol chos sku ni bshad// mi gam mi smra bar ni brjod// ba ri traM ni sngags zhes bshad// d+ha ri da ra dkyil 'khor te// ba tra pa ni gral

la 'dug/ ka pa tse tra byin rlabs kyis// ma la ki ni dgongs pa'o// ka ma ku tri phrin las te// pha ri bu ni smon lam mo// nye sa ra ni gdong du brjod// pa TaM dpral ba zhes su bshad// ma la smin mar yang dag

bshad// ko pa ba ya mig tu shes// pad+ma kar ni ka ni sna// pa la 'khol ni mchu ru shes// a na d+ha na ni so ru brjod// bi sha mgrin pa ru ni grags// haM bo phra ba ru ni bshad// a gu sha ni dpung par brjod// pa

hi ru ni lag par bshad// pa ra ar ga ke sa ra// sen mor shes ni yang dag bshad// g+he saM rje ngar du ni bshad// shi la pha len bu mor bshad// dza ti pa li sked yin nam sked par brjod// ma ta nam ni lte bar

brjod// pad+ma dza lam gsang ba'i gnas// ga dam pa nyams brla gnyis so// cha ga na nam rkang par brjod// sha ta ku su smad lam stan// sha ba ta pu zhes bya bar brjod// pad+ma nr-i ni zhi ba'i yum// ha ti Ni ni rgyas
pa'i yum// shan tri ni ni dbang gi yum// tsan tri Ni ni drag pa'i yum// ba ra sgeg mo ro 'bebs na// sa ni pa tra mtshan ldan ma// paM su traM ni dbang gnyis sbyor// a 'bras me zhes bya ba dang// rgu

'bru glang po che la sogs// sa la si ni rta yin te// ni lo ne rgyas bya zhes bya// a ka ru ni khyi ru brjod// suM b+haM zhing ni bzang por bshad// d+ha ni rta ni gsang bar bshad// sa ra bar ta 'tshol ba bshad// mi raM pa

mi'i ro ru brjod// ba ha ra ga gad pa zhes// biSh+Na ya phag ces brjod par bya// sa la sha ni nya zhes brjod// ni naM ra skyes su ni brjod// ma dang a haM 'dab chags sha'o// sh+ya n+ya srog ces bya bar brjod// na naM ni

ni rnam shes brjod// a bi na baM rgod par bshad// ru tri raM ni 'phya bar brjod// b+ha ha naM ri chu ru bshad// a 'dzam ba ni me zhes brjod// ni tsi da dur ra nu brjod// rang na chags pa zhes ni bshad// sa k+ShaM yan

lag rab tu bshad// shu baM bzang po zhes ni bshad// ba Da kaM ni nyon zhes brjod// g+hi taM laM du bshad pa dang// na ga raM ni bdag lus brjod// na la ni lu laM stobs med// go bag Sh+Na laM thams cad rdzogs// sa
ga raM ni rgas par bshad// byo ma ga naM pha rol dpung// ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjod// ho ni tshims pa ru ni bshad// ma ga dog pa ru ni brjod// u tsi lhag ma zhes bya bshad// b+ha ni li gtor gtor ma

bshos// u tre pa kra lha phud sbyor// ma ni phu ri lhag phud mchod// ma he ni ni ral gur gyis// staM b+ha nan ni gtor gzhong gnon// o tri ba ni dkyil 'khor bsdus// a tri sam la rdzogs rim bsgom// ba yang su

ni rlung sgrar gzung// tha ba bi ra 'di lta ste// ma ni pu ri gang zhe na// ko Ta k+Sha ni srog 'dzin pa// ko ta bar ni thur du sel// ka ta gyen du rgyu ba ste// go ta ba sha me dang mnyam// ko te ra ga khyab byed te// ko tak+Sha

ni rgyu ba la// ko la ba ko la ni rgyu// ko la bag sha yang dag dang// ko la ba shu rab tu ma// ko la ra tha nges par rgyu// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra las/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgras bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa thams cad 'joms par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// khru gang sor ni bcu gnyis pa// dkar zhing zlum
pa zhi ba la// khru do zabs su de phyed ser// dmar po zla ba phyed pa dbang// gsod pa sor ni nyi shu pa// gru gsum sa gzhi nag por bya// dri zhim dkar ser dmar po dang// dug dang khrag dang dur sol

byug/ 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// rgya gram rim pa bzhin du bri// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang drag/ shar byang nub dang lho ru blta// dgang gzar dbyibs dang tshad ldan pa// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang// zur
gsum rnams su ldan par bya// blug gzar rdo rje phye pas mtshan// dge slong rgyal po bud med dbang// bshan pa las byung shing dang mes// pil ba u dum wa ra la// mar dang sbrang rtsis lpags pa

la// 'o ma sbos chus byug pa dbul// rtsa ba rtse mo dang bral ba// 'o ma zhos spangs ser po dang// nags kyi lcug ma dmar po la// dpal kha'i mar dang dmar pos byug/ kha la tshor ma can gyi shing// gas dang

srog chags dag gis zos// dur khrod ro bsreg khrag dug byug/ 'bras chen nas dang 'o ma zho// sbrang rtsi mar nag mi sha dang// khrag dang lan tshwa skye tshe dbul// tsan+da na me tog dkar po dang// ser po dmar

dang thang chu nag/ bdud rtsi rus pa dang bcas pas/ ba glang lci ba rtsa ba'i cha// nim pa ro skyur tsha rog dri// bong bu'i spangs la rab tu bya// tshes gcig zhi la bco lnga rgyas// bcu bdun dbang la nyi shu dgu// drag
po srod zhi snga dro rgyas// dgong dbang nyin mtshan gung la bsad// dbyar dgun ston dpyid dus shes bya// dkar po rin chen dmar nag pos// gcer bu rab tu bya ba dag/ dkar 'jams dmar dang ro ras

bting// byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dga'// nya phyis dung phor rin chen gser// zangs gzhong thod pa'i nang du bsham// byang chub sems bsgom rgyal rigs dang// smad 'tshor gdol pa'i me bor te/ pad+ma
dbang chen 'khor bcas la// mchod pa mnyes par phul nas ni// gang la dmigs pa'i las bcol te// gshegs te smon lam gdab par bya// A+oM/ theg chen byang chub mchog la rtag tu zhugs pa dang// zab

mo'i chos ni rtag tu nyan pa dang// rdo rje slob dpon bzang dang 'grogs pa dang// lus kyi sgrib skyong bskyed pa'i rim bsgom zhing// ngag gi dri ma bral phyir gsang sngags bgrang// sems kyi log lta zhi nas rdzogs

rim bsgom// rdo rje btsun mo'i khu brtag tu 'thung// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// rmad byung gtor mas thugs dam yongs su bskang// dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa'i skal bar ldan// skye zhing skye ba

tshe rabs thams cad du// sems can don byed bdag don yongs rdzogs shog/ A+oM ma hA b+ha smi ku ru hU~M sarba sid+d+hi hU~M sbA hA/ A+oM badzra d+hu pe hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+nyA na dz+wa la hU~M/ A+oM a na la ma hA su tra dz+wa sarba b+ha smi ku ru badzra

duSh+ta na hU~M phaT/ A+oM ma hA sarba ku ru hU~M/ sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swA hA/ A+oM sarba yadz+nyA ya swA hA/ A+oM a pra ti ha ta badzra la swA hA/ A+oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ A+oM badzra buSh+be hU~M/ A+oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ A+oM ma hA bi gA ya swA hA/

A+oM AHhU~M sarba lo ke d+hU pe bU dza swA hA/ A+oM sarba lo ke puSh+pe pU dza swA hA/ A+oM sarba lo ke dI pa bU dza swA hA/ A+oM sarba gan+d+he pU dza swA hA/ A+oM sarba lo ke ne bi d+ye bU dza swA hA/ A+oM sarba lo ke shab+ta pU dza swA hA/ A+oM dza la ka ma la lA

bye hU~M/ mA le t+yaM/ gI taM hrIM/ nIn+ti a/ A+oM sarba pA paM ma ma ka s+ya ku ru shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ A+oM sarba pA baM ma ma ka s+ya ku ru pu Sh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ A+oM sarba pA paM ma ma ka s+ya ku ru ba shang ku ru swA hA/ A+oM sarba pA

paM ma ma ka s+ya ku ru mA ra ya phaT/ kun gzhi rnam dag hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes lnga yi me sbar na// ye shes bsod nams tshogs rdzogs so// b+ha ga yangs pa'i thab khung du// phung po lnga
yi bdag nyid la// mar dang zar bu'i bya thabs kyis// bsnyen pa phul ba'i las byas nas// nam yang 'du 'bral med pa yis// gsang ba'i sbyin bsreg 'grub pa yis// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan tra

las// sbyin sreg gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams rab tu dga' zhing gus pa dang bcas pas// phye ma phur ma dang/ gdug dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan dang/ pad+ma dang/ ba na d+hu
ka dang/ ut+pa la sogs pa dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos la sogs pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ tshim pa dang/ yid ngal sos ba'i mchod pa mang pos mchod
nas// gsol ba/ mgon po bdag cag 'dus pa yis// rgyud 'di bzung zhing bcang ba dang// ji ltar bshad cing bstan par bya// gus pas nam yang mi spang ngo// zhes zhus pa dang// ston pas bka' stsal
ba// gang gis bskal par sbyang dka' ba// nges pa'i blo ldan can la ste// drang don nges pa'i don du bshad// ji bzhin ji bzhin ma yin pa// dgongs pa dgongs min rnam pa drug/ gsang sngags don gyi rgyud
bshad bya// yi dam nyid du nges par zung// de ltar mi ldan skal med la// 'phyar ba g.yeng bas byin gyur na// dur khrod dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams// 'dus nas sha za srog la 'bebs// zhes gsungs
pas// 'khor der 'dus pa thams cad kyang// bde ba chen po'i don mngon du byas// sku gsum dbyer med lhun grub kyi ngang du bzhugs par gyur to// dgongs pa de mngon du gyur nas// byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyang// bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das nyid sku gsung thugs// lhun grub stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/

mjug rjes su yi rangs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang chen 'dus la rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bod kyi lo tsA ba sba sang shi ta dang/ ngan
lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang// cog ros bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o////

rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tA \u0f85 sha ya kro d+ha sa ma dza su ga ta sA mA n+yo d+ba da na ke sha lo hi ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa/ bde

gshegs spyi dril rta mgrin rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud ces bya ba dpal pad+ma dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ye shes rig pa rang snang gi ston pa

de nyid// gdul bya'i ngo snang la tha dad par snang ba las// dpal pad+ma dbang byed du snang bar mdzad nas// shes bya rang snang gi gnas nas gdul bya dngos snang gi gnas tha dad par snang ba las/ shes bya rang

snang gi 'khor dang// gdul bya ngo snang gi 'khor mang pos kyang yongs su bskor// shes bya rang snang gi bstan pa nang du bstan pa rdzogs nas// gdul bya'i ngor snang ba'i bstan pa nam mkha'i mtha' la/ chos nyid

kyi dgongs pa'i khyad par la longs spyod cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos can mtshan ma'i dngos po dang// chos nyid skye ba med pa so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med na yang// don dam par ni

chos thams cad stong gsal nam mkha' lta bu la sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dri ma med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yang/ kun rdzob tu chos thams cad dngos po dang mtshan mar snang ste// de

dag kun kyang gsog lta bu/ gsob lta bu/ ya ma brla lta bu/ snying po med pa lta bur shar ba las/ cir yang ma yin pa'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang snang du btub la/ cir yang snang ba'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang 'gyur
tu btub la/ cir yang 'gyur ba'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang bsgrub tu btubs la// cir yang bsgrub tub tub pa'i chos nyid ni// cir yang grub par gzigs so// de yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i

chos thams cad gtan la dbab par bya na rigs pa rnam pa bzhir gzigs so// spyir rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la// ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni// chos nyid kyi rig pa dang/ 'bras

bu'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang// rgyu'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni ltos pa'i rigs pa dang// rigs pa nyid dri ma med par byas te sgrub pa ni 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa bzhir

gzigs so// 'di rnams kyi sel ba rnam pa bzhir gzigs so// ngo bo nyid la the tshom za ba ni chos nyid kyi rigs pas sel lo// byed pa la the tsom za ba ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pas sel lo// mngon par sgrub

pa ni the tshom za ba ni ltos pa'i rig pas sel lo// rigs pa la the tshom za ba ni 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pas sel lo// 'di rnams kyi yul dang mtshan la gzigs pa ni/ chos nyid kyi dngos gzhi la dri ma med
cing// dngos bzhi ma log na chos nyid kyi rigs par gzhag go/ byed pa la dri ma med cing dngos gzhi ma log na bya ba byed pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ dngos por bsgrub pa'i dri ma med cing dngos

gzhi ma log na ltos pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ rigs pa'i dngos gzhi la dri ma med cing dngos gzhi ma log na 'thad par bsgrub pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ de la chos nyid kyi dngos gzhi la dri ma yod pa ni/ me

shel la tsha ba'i reg pa yod pa lta bu'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni/ ri dwags me'i gtsang spra can la me tsha ba'i dngos gzhi log pa lta bu'o// bya ba byed pa'i dngos gzhi la dri ma yod pa ni btsan dug gis sems

can 'chi ba lta bu'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni rma bya lta bu'o// ltos pa'i dngos gzhi la/ dri ma yod pa ni blo dman pa'i sa bon ma go ba'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni sa bon skye ba'i bas la mkhas pa lta

bu'o// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi dri ma yod pa ni chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la rmongs pa'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni/ so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis dpyad pas mi dmigs pa'i shes rab tu gyur

pa kho na'o// rigs pa 'di bzhi thal ba la gzigs pa ni// chos nyid kyi rigs pa sgrub pa thal drags na/ dngos po thams cad las mi ldog ste/ mtha' rang bzhin rgyur lta bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa'i rigs

pa thal drags na// byed pa po dang rtsod pa po thams cad las mi rdog ste/ mtha' byed pa po rgyur smra bar 'gyur ro// ltos pa'i rigs pa thal drags na/ dbang thams cad las mi ldog ste/ mtha' dbang phyug rgyur smra
bar 'gyur ro// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa thal drags na/ rigs pa gnas skabs thams cad du dri ma med par mi 'gyur te/ mthar mngon pa'i nga rgyal tu 'gyur ro// 'di rnams gzhi'i sgrub byed la gzigs

so// dngos por smra ba rnams dngos por bsgrub na// chos nyid kyi rigs pas lta ba bsgrub ste// 'du shes kyi byad par du byas pa'i blos dmigs pa dang/ tshor bas khyad par du byas pa'i blo la snang ba dang/ shes

rab dri ma med pa'i khyad par du byas pa'i blos rtogs pa'o// de yang so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab bo// bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni// mtshan bcas bskyed pa'i r-im pa dang/
mtshan med rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang/ sa dang lam dang 'bras bu'i bya ba byed do// ltos pa'i rigs pas ni sa las dge sdig la ltos pas 'bras bu mthong ris ngan song bsgrub pa dang// bsod nams ye shes kyi
tshogs la ltos pas chos sku dang zugs sku bsgrub pa'o// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum dang// rjes su dpag pas/ chos thams cad gtan 'bebs par bsgrub pa ni/ rang gzhung bsgrub pa dang/
gzhan gzhung dgag pa'o// de yang yod par bsgrub pa dang/ yin par bsgrub pas chad pa sel te/ med pa dgag pa dang ma yin pa dgag pas rtag pa sel lo// mtha' thams cad las grol ba'i
chos nyid rnam par dag pa la gzigs nas cang mi gsung/ rnam par mi gsung/ yongs su mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe yum ral gcig mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ 'di skad ces
gsol te/ 'jig rten sa dang lam gnas pa'i// blo rtog dpyad pas ma 'ongs pa'i// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni// lus ngag yid las bya dang bral// tshogs gnyis bsags las ma byung ba'i// sems nyid rnal
ma'i don 'di ni// kun gyis rtogs par dka' bas na// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa 'dir// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// bya ba byed pa'i las la 'khod// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar byas
nas// dkon mchog gsum lam kun spyod pas// 'khor ba 'das par sbyor ba'o// ltos pa chos kyi las can 'bras// sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun bsgrub nas// dri med mngon par kun sangs rgyas// 'khor 'das

kun gyi rtog bya ba'i// sems nyid 'og gsal rtsa ba can/ dngos grub log rtog gang las skyes// dug lnga ji ltar lam du blang// dbang chen spyi dril bsgom pa dang// lha yi rnam dag rdos bcas grol// gtor ma
rak+ta bdud rtsi gtong// dug gsum dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcad// las bzhi'i sbyin sreg las rnams 'grub// klu gnyan sa bdag gnod pa brtag/ lpags pa sha rus nad rnams gtong// thun mong dngos grub
las tshogs bsgrub// lam lnga sa bcu ji ltar bgrod// rig 'dzin rnam bzhi khyad par can// sbyor ba'i yan lag rnam drug bsgom// bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba rnams// rje btsun 'bangs ltar bskyang du
gsol// lha rjes gcong nad bsal du gsol// slob dpon shes bya bslab du gsol// dge legs las 'bras rtsal du gsol// bla mas man ngag bstan du gsol// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen pos
shod// ded dpon rin chen sbyin du gsol/ dpa' bos g.yul ngo bzlog tu gsol// yid bzhin gter chen dbyung du gsol// nyi zla'i 'od zer spro ru gsol// mun pa'i sgron me sbar du gsol// chos kyi 'khor
lo bskor du gsol// 'dul ba'i dus bab bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes sgron mes chos kyi dbyings su shar ba'i dgongs pas gzigs nas 'gro ba'i ched
du 'di gsungs so// smon lam las 'phro sad pa dang// lus dang skal bar ldan pa dang// dad ldan brtson 'grus che ba dang// shes rab rtogs pa ldan pa yi// sgrub po rten gyi gang zag rnams// sems nyid ma
bcos rnal ma'i don// kun gyis rtogs par dka' bas na// rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa'i don// blo rab 'ga' yis rtogs par 'gyur// bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal ba yis// bsod nams
tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// ye shes tshogs mchog brnyes byed pa// rnal 'byor blo 'bring rnams kyis ni// 'di la yang dag 'bad par bya// ye shes bsgrub pas 'jig
rten bkol// rnal 'byor tha mas dngos grub thob// rang 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor la// rim par bshad kyis skal ldan nyon// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang che bde gshegs spyi dril las// gleng gzhi gleng
bslang rngog ma le brgan gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chos// rnam par byang pa mya ngan 'das// rtsa ba sems kyi chos nyid
'dus// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ma mdzad ma bcos lhun gyis grub// byang chub chen por ye gnas pas// byed rtsol bya ba kun dang bral// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// rang gi ngang gis
ma bcos bzhin// yongs kyi 'od gsal chen po la// sems nyid yid bzhin rin po che// khams gsum sems can ma lus pa// rang la gnas yang ma mthong ste// 'o ma mar dang 'dra bar mtshungs// de nyid
mkhas ldan mar du 'byin// kye sems kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// 'od gsal chen por gnas pa la// rgyud ni sems can gnas pa dang// snang lam bar dor 'byung ba dang// 'bras bu rang ngo shes las
zin// 'di gsum gang gis brtag 'gyur ba// gsang ba yang gsang bla na med// skal dang ldan pas thud la nyon// sems can rgyud la gnas pa ni// sgo nga'i nang gi bye'u phrug bzhin// kun gzhi gzugs med

khams su snang// de nyid rtsa ba gti mug yin// yid kyi gzugs kyi khams su snang// de nyid zhe sdang rtsa ba can// sgo nga 'dod pa'i khams su snang// de yang rtsa ba 'dod chags nyid// dug gsum rtsa ba byang chub

sems// kun gzhi dge sdig gsog pa'i snod// rin chen sna bdun bang mdzod du// nyon mongs lnga yi byan mo ni// 'khor los sgyur rgyal btsun mo yin// yid kyi kun rtsal g.yang pa ba yang nyid la// kun tu rgyu ba'i

chang bas btsal// sgo lnga khye'u pho mo mdzes// kun la bskyed cing mched par byed// 'di dag gcig tu 'dres pa ni// chu dang lan tshwa 'o ma'am// sgog pa chu dang lan tshwa ltar// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa
la// nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin du gnas// bar dor gcer bur byung ba ni// sems ni pha ma'i gos dang bral// dge sdig bag chags las kyis bsgos// sngon nas gzhan bar gnas pa yan// shi nas snang ba
ldang gyur pa// gnyid log sad dang brgyal sangs ltar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar gyur ba// 'od kyi nus pas kun gsal byed// sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// dpag tshad bye ba'i 'od
kyis 'gengs// 'od gsal las kyi bag chags dbang// sngon du gang mos dbang bsgyur nas// las dbang mi gtang dran pa yis// gzungs thag kun tu 'bral med bya// sdig pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa
rnams// ngan song gsum du gnas par 'gyur// zhe sdang 'dod chags gti mug dbang// dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gros 'byung// dge ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sems// 'dod chags mi la chags pa dang// zhe
