sdang lha ma yin du gnas// gti mug lha yi longs spyod ldan// de dag sgo lnga'i bag chags dbang// 'dod pa can du 'gro ba'o// yid dbang btsan sa gzugs kyi khams// 'od gsal lha yi lus dang ldan// kun
gzhir 'dzin pa gzugs med pa// yi gzugs bye brag bzhi dang ldan// 'bras bu ra bas zin pa yang// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// yul du snang ba bem stong du// sems su snang ba rig pa

stong// stong nyid rig pa'i ngo bo can// stong nyid chen po'i chos skur bzhugs// rang bzhin ma bsgribs 'od gsal ba// gzugs sku sgyu lus rnam par snang// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gti mug mi

rtog chos kyi sku// rtog pa'i spros pa nye bar zhi// zhe sdang gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs// mun pa bral ba'i nyi ma shar// 'dod chags snying rje'i yul du snang// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren// sems
rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin// zhes gsungs so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen rngog ma le brgan bde gshegs spyi dril gyi rgyud las/ sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas dbang chen pad+ma'i rgyal pos gsungs pa/ rtsa ba sku gsung thugs rnams dang// spyad pa dang blang mi spang shes// bsgrub par bya ba lnga lnga pa'o// bsrung dang nyams skong skyon yon
rnams// dngos grub lo tog smin pa'i sa// thams cad kun gyis bsrung bar bya// yi dam lha ni spang mi bya// rang sems spang du ga la btub// bla ma rang gi spyo bor 'khur// rgyud lung man ngag ster bar

'gyur// rdo rje ming srid chos kyi spun// 'di dang phyi mar mi 'bral 'grogs// ma nor rtsa ba rgyu yi sngags// skye bar byed pa rkyen gyi sngags// skul bar byed pa las kyi sngags// zhag dang zla ba lo rgyun bya// yab kyi

sku ni phyag rgya che// yum dang mi 'bral dam tshig rgya// 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya la// chos nyid zhi ba chos kyi rgya// srog chags bsad nas zhing bcu bsgral// gzungs ma sbyar nas gsang dbang bskur// ma byin pa
blangs dngos grub bsgrub// tshig btsun sngags bzlas bgegs dpung gzhom// rgyun du smras nas snod ngan gsang// 'di lnga rnal 'byor bas spyad dang// snod ngan kun la gsang ba'i phyir/ lus kyi

brda' yis dngos pos mtshon// ngag gis brda' yis smra ba dang// yid kyi brda' yis mtshon pa ni// bsgrub pa thams cad mtshon par bya// dri chen bza' dang dri chu btung// byang sems sha chen rak+ta bza'// mi

rta ba glang bya khyi'i sha/ zas mchog bdud rtsi'i gtor ma yang// rak+ta 'thung zhing za ba'o// gti mug chos dbyings ye shes ni// mi rtog byol song kun gyis rtogs// zhe sdang me long ye shes ni// gsal bas tsha grang

dmyal bar sbyong// 'dod chags sor rtog ye shes ni// de bas mi dang yi dwags spyod// nga rgyal mnyam nyid ye shes ni// sran tshugs lha rnams rgyud la ldan// phrag dog bya grub ye shes ni// lta ngan sel byed lha ma
yin// 'di dag ye shes rnam pa lnga// mi spang rnal 'byor sems dang bsre// phung po rigs lnga 'byung lnga yum// rnam shes de yul dbang po dus// yid chos nyon mongs rigs sogs rnams// thams cad ma lus
rigs lngar 'dus// kun 'dus bde gshegs spyi dril nas// dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ rlung dang sems su 'dres pas na// rlung gi 'phro 'du ma lus pa// dbang chen pho nyas 'gugs dang 'dren// phyogs bcur

bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// dus bzhir gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// kun kyang rigs lnga pad+ma'i sku// rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya// lus kyi bya ba ma lus dang// ngag gi smra brjod thams cad
dang// sems kyi bsam pa mang po rnams// don du gnyer nas bsrung bar bya'o// rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kun// nyams par gyur na gang nyams pa// gtor ma tshogs 'khor lhag ma dang// sbyin sreg dag
gis bskang bar bya// ma bskangs rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro// ngan song sdug bsngal bzod par dka'// ma nyams bsrung bar gang byed pa// bde sbyin yon tan bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen
bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ gzhi 'dzin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// rgyud lnga lam du klong la 'di gsungs so// nga ni gti mug

gnyid la dga'// rmi lam lam du klong bar byed// nga ni zhe sdang lam la dga'// zhing bcu bsgral nas sgrol bar byed// nga ni nga rgyal ri bo che// lta ba mtho la ting 'dzin gsal// nga ni 'dod chags chos la

dga'// yum la sbyor zhing gsang dbang bskur// nga ni kun la phrag dog pas// lta ngan thams cad mi shong ngo// gzhi dang rgyu dang lam dang ni// 'bras bu nyid ni khyed la bshad// gti mug gti mug ces bya
ba// ma rig ma shes ma go'o// kun nas snang ba snang ba yang// mi rtog don la gnas par bya// gnyid dang 'dra ba'i mi rtog med// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// mi rtog 'dod na

gnyid 'di log/ rtog mi mnyam nyid sgyu ma ltos// dgug dang log dang byang ba dang// 'byongs na chos rnams rmi lam nyid// ma rig mun pa sha chang drod// ngal dub drag pos 'byung bzhi 'dus// dpral bar pad+ma

'dab bzhi la// gnyid 'gugs sngags kyis 'gugs par byed// oM A nu d+ha ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ gnyid du song ba shi dang mtshungs// rmi lam srid par bar ma do// gnyid sad skye ba lha yi sku// rnal 'byor can gyis

bsgom par bya// sems ni gnyid la zin gyur na// brag la 'dzegs dang g.yang la skyur// chu la mchongs dang rbab la 'gril// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal byang ste// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la// rmi lam gnyid kyi
bsam gtan yin// chos rnams nyams su myang bar bya// 'byongs na lcebs kyang 'chi ba med// mtshon zug dug 'thung g.yul 'gyed pa// thams cad rang gi sems la sbyangs// ma 'byongs par du sbyang bar
bya// ye nas 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// rmi lam yin par shes gyur na// rnal 'byor gti mug 'byongs pa yin// de phyir rmi lam gnyid du shes// sems can bde ba thun gcig na// kun gzhi'i nang du

yid thim pa// chos kyi sku la gnas par bya// yid kyi rgyu ba mang po kun// gzugs kyi sku ru ldang bar 'gyur// gzugs su chos sgra dbyer med pa// ngo bo nyid skur rab tu gnas// skyes bu gnyid log sangs rgyas

so// skyes bu gnyid log pas rmi lam gyi sangs rgyas ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhe sdang gzhi rgyu lam 'bras can// skyon dang yon tan khyed la bshad// 'khor 'das chos rnams ma lus pa// ye nas 'od
gsal ma bcos pa// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// zhe sdang nam mkha'i sprin ltar dengs// de nyid rnal 'byor lha yin pas// lha 'di med na sangs rgyas med// zhe sdang med pa'i sngon rol na// sangs
rgyas sems can ga la yod// yid kyi rnam shes kun khyab po// rang byung ye shes rgyu gcig pa// 'khor 'das byed pa'i mkhan po khyod// rtsad bcad khungs ni khyod nyid yin// kun bzang khyod las thams cad

byung// khyod kyis khyod nyid shes par gyis// 'gugs dang sbyangs dang sgo bkag nas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par sbyangs// dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi dgra dang// rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra dang// mched dang
lcam dral sgos dgra dang// dam med dam log 'dus par yong// dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// yongs la gnod dang ngan song chud// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dgug/ brod bskyed sbyang bar bya
ba'o// bsgral bar bya ba'i spyi mgrin snying// ste ba gsang ba rkang pa'i mthil// a nr-i su tri pre du dang// A+oM dang AHhU~M swA hA lam// 'od 'phros rigs drug gnas stongs nas// phyogs bcu dus
gsum rgyal ba mnyes// ma dang mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang// gsung dang thugs dang sku ru 'gyur// rigs lnga rgyal ba'i sku la thim// srid pa gsum gyis dpyas phyung nas// ngan song gsum gyi sgo yang

bkag/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skya ling btab// phung po mchod yul bsod nams tshogs// dam bskangs lha mnyes ye shes tshogs// chos sku dri ma med pa dang// gzugs sku longs spyad rdzogs sprul dang// zab dang

rgya che'i sku gnyis so// thos 'gyur ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// ma bskul log pa'i bstan par grags// sangs rgyas chos rnams nub 'gyur pas// sku gsum 'gro ba'i lam dang bral// 'khor ba'i gnas su zag par

'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'phel// ngan song gnas ngan len pa stongs// gsang sngags rmad byung che ba rdzogs// theg chen zab mo'i lta ba rtogs// rmad byung spyod pa khyad par 'phags// theg pa kun
nas rab gsungs pa'i// mtshams med las ngan byed pa rnams// mnar med dmyal bar skye ba rnams// gsang sngags gsang ba'i theg pa la// rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa rnams// rdo rje dmyal bar skye 'gyur
bas// las ngan rgyun lam bcad nas ni// las ngan ngan song gsum las sgrol// rang gis ma bsags tshogs gnyis rdzogs// sku gsum 'bras bur rdzogs 'gyur bas// khyed kyis zhe sdang can rnams

sgrol// de'i phyir na rgyu rang grol gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// nyung dkar lan tshwa byi brun bsres// sngags ni lan dgu bzlas la gdab/ pra du sad/ na ra sad/ tsit+ta na le sad/ du sha sad/ pre dur

sad/ thibs mug sad/ bya la byed na spu na phaT/ ra lug la ni nyung dkar dang// byang ba dang ni chang phud do// dgra la byed na gzugs la'o// gnas ngan 'khor ba nas mya ngan 'das par sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin to// nga rgyal gzhi rgyu las 'bras can// skyon dang yon tan nyid kyi rdzogs// mngon par mtho bas lta ba rtogs// nga rgyal chen po bdun dang ldan// rang nyid che bas rnam par bsgyings// pha rol zil
gzhon ting 'dzin gsal// sems nyid ye shes 'od gsal bas// ma rig mun pa la bsgrib tu med// chos rnams sems kyi cho 'phrul pas// sems las log na bsgom du med// rab ni lta ba lam du

khyer// 'bring dang tha mas bsgom par bya// gzung 'dzin gnyis su rang dag lta// rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad// rang sems rtag par ther thug pas// phya yis de yi byed pa byas// las dang rgyu 'bras med par
'dod// chad par blta pas log pa'i lam// chos dang gang zag bdag 'dzin na// mos pa chung ba'i nyan thos yin// chos khams phyogs gcig bdag med na// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang sangs
rgyas// 'khor 'das rang sems tsam du 'dod// kun rdzob don dam gnyis su 'byed// theg chen sems tsam dbu ma bas// theg chen rang gi gzhung rnams bsgrub// ye shes mu bzhi bral ba dang// snang ba sku la
grag pa gsung// dran rtog thugs kyi lta ba ni// rigs gsum kun 'dus kri ya ba// mar bzhin spyod pa yar bzhin blta// rigs bzhi 'byin pa u pa ya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po la// sku gsum rdzogs pa

yo ga ba// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// thabs dang shes rab ma hA pa// rang sems yid gzugs chos la 'jug/ gnyis sbyar bde sras a nu ba// snang ba chos sku chen po la// bcos bslad bral ba a ti

pa// bsam brjod mtha' bral ye shes 'khyil// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bras med// ji ltar snang ba bde chen sras// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// kun gzhi sems kyi me long nyid// ye nas zhi gnas chen
por gnas// yid kyi dran rtog mang po rnams// lhag mthong chen por rang gsal bas// zhi gnas lhag mthong gnyis su med// ye shes bum nang mar me gsal// rnam rtog rlung gi sa gal bskyod// ma bcos

gnyug ma rang sor zhog/ gang gi rnam rtog mtshan ma can// snang srid snod bcud lha ru gsal// dngos por snang ba gzugs kyi sku// stong gsal chos sku dri ma med// snang srid gnyis med ngo bo nyid// lta sgom sku

bzhi rdzogs sangs rgyas// lta sgom don du mi gnyer ba// 'khor bar 'khyams par byed pa yin// phyi yi yul la blta ba dang// nang gi sems la bsgom pa ni// sku bzhi 'du 'bral med pa yi// A+oM hrI sa ti sa ma ti

b+ha la A+oM/ nga rgyal lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te// 'dod chags gzhi rgyu da lam 'bras dang// skyon dang yon tan ldan pa yis// gang gi 'dod chags spong byed pa// de la lus kyi bde ba med// bde ba
chen po 'dod pa yis// de rgyu 'dod chags yin shes bya// bud med la brten bde chen po// sems can kun rnams spyod gyur pa// tha mal zhen pa spang ba yis// bde chen gar gyis rol pas bya// brtags shing

byin brlabs bsnyen bsgrub bzhis// bde rtogs nyams su blang bar bya/ rgyal mo ma dang srid mo bu// tsha mo sru mo bran g.yog mo// che ba'i bag dang ldan gyur zhing// bkur por lci bas rgyal mo 'dra// rang nyid

rgyal po'i tshul bzhin sbyar// dbang 'phrog ma dang 'dra ba la// lus bskyed de la pha ltar sbyar/ brtse ba'i sems ldan srid mo la// rang nyid ming po lta bar byar// lus kyi dum bu las chad pa'i// bu mo lta bu la

yang sbyar// brgyud pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i// tsha mo la ni zhang ltar sbyar// nye ba'i yul dang 'brel ba yod// sru mo la ni sbyar bar bya// mngag pa'i las rnams byed pa pa yi// bran mo la yang sbyar

bar bya// bya ba'i las rnams byed gyur pa// g.yog mo dag la sbyar ba rnams// thams cad chung mar shes par bya// spyi bor A+oM la mgrin par AH// snying gar hU~M ste lte bar swA// gsang bar hA yi 'phro 'du

las// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyis// rigs kyi yum rnams spyan drang bstim// sangs rgyas yum du bsgom par bya// bdag nyid dbang chen phyag rgya che// hU~M dang a las byung ba yis// rdo rje pad+ma bsgom

par bya// yum gyi dri sgra brtag bya zhing// tsaN+Da lI'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba dbab cing gzung bar bya// bsten pa bya ba'i rim pa'o// chags pa'i brda yis bskul byas nas// zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar

bya// dung gi phur pa 'debs pa yis// mchog bde dbab cing gzung bar bya// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba'o// pad+ma b+han d+ha thod pa'i nad// rdo rje chen po rab bcu gnas// bde bral bde ba gzung bar bya// bsgrub pa

bya ba'i rim pa'o// rdo rje thod sbyor man ngag gnyis// rdo rje dung khrag dkrug par bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes la// yid ni brtan par nang du bzung// rang rdzas thig le mkhar phebs nas// sangs rgyas byang

chub sems dpa' mchod// d+hU pa dzaH/ pun+pe hU~M/ dA+e ba baM/ g+haN+De ho/ lA s+ye hU~M/ mA me trAM/ gIr ti hrIH/ nir ti a/ pU dza ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu da s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ rang dang slob ma'i lce yi ni// thig le dkar
dmar bza' bar bya// dngos grub yum gyi mkha' nas blang// byang sems thig le gsang dbang bskur// bsgrub pa chen po'i rim pa'o// bde ba mchog bde bde bral che// lhan cig skyes dga' nyams su
blangs// zung 'jug sku ni thob gyur pa// yab yum 'du 'bral med par gnas// 'dod chags bde ba spang ba ni// zung 'jug sku yang spang ba yin// 'dod chags ye shes chen po 'thob// thabs lam yon tan
ldan pa yis// rig 'dzin dngos grub 'thob pa ni// tshe 'di nyi zla dag dang mnyam// mkha' spyod gnas su gshegs gyur pa// mkha' 'gro'i gtso mchog he ru ku// rje btsun dbang phyug chen po 'gyur// 'dod

chags kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ phrag dog bzhi dang rgyu lam 'bras// skyon dang yon tan rnams kyis bshad// rang nyid zhen pa ngan pa nyid// gzhan rnams shong bar ma gyur

pa// gzhan smod rang gi che ba ni// phrag dog 'byung ba'i gzhi yin no// rang sems kun nas mi shor bas// sems las phrag dog 'byung ba'i rgyu// shan 'byed pa dang la bzla bas// lta ngan thams cad spang bar
bya// yid ni so sor rtog pa yis// shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun// ma 'dres so sor shan yang 'byed// 'khor ba phyal ba rgyang 'phen gnyis// mu stegs rtag pa chad pa gnyis// nyan thos

bden pa rnam pa bzhi// rang rgyal rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang// dbu ma kun rdzob don dam dang// kri ya lha rigs gsum gsum dang// u ba ya ni rigs bzhi dang// yo ga de kho na nyid bzhi// ma hA bzhi dang khro
bo dang// a nu yab yum bde chen sras// rdzogs chen thig le nyag gcig rnams// ma 'dres gzha' tshon skar ltar gsal// yongs su rdzogs par la bzla na// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ma lus rang
sems nyid la rdzogs// sems las log na chos med pas// chos sku snang ba 'khrul ba gsum// sems nyid ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thob 'dod na// rang gi sems las btsal bar
bya// rang sems nyid las ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob 'dod na// bya long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// de phyir rang sems chos skur ltos// rang sems ye nas sangs rgyas pa// rgyas par ma
shes ma rig pa// dmus long nam mkha' spar mos 'dzin// ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas shes na// dri med gser bzo'i rgyan dang mtshungs// sku gsum dbyer med thig le gcig/ bsam brjod bral bas chos
skur gnas// 'khor 'das dbyer med de kho na// phrag dog don ni ma rtogs na// so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis// chos rnams ma 'dres 'byed mi shes// mi dmigs pa yi shes rab kyis// chos rnams yongs
su rdzogs mi shes// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ma shes nas// gnyis 'dzin mtha' las grol mi 'gyur// gzung 'dzin mdud pa 'khrol mi srid// 'khor ba'i chu bo mi sgrol bas// khams gsum grong khyer 'khyams

pa yin// theg pa che chung khyad par dang// gzung 'dzin gnyis snang thams cad dang// lta ngan gzhan pa ma lus rnams// thams cad shes par 'gyur ba'o// kun la phrag dog pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen
bde gshegs 'dus pa rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ dug lnga lam du slong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bde gshegs rgyal ba yis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gsungs so// kun nas nyon mongs
'khor ba'i chos// rnam byang mya ngan 'das par snang// yid 'jug bsam pa'i gzugs can 'dis// 'khor 'das bya ba ma lus bsgrub// yid ni rang bzhin ji lta bar// shes bar 'dod na rgyud 'di nyon// de

skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// rigs gnyis lung gi rgyud pas na// pad+ma dbang gi bka' stsal to// rgyud 'di shes par 'dod pa yis// lus ngag yid gsum btud de nyon// mo ha ka dang dwe Sha ka/ mA na ka dang
rA ga can// mat+sa t+ya iraShA ka// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chos// thams cad 'di las byung bas na// 'di don yid la dril te rtog/ gti mug byal song rnam mang po// phyi yi rgya mtsho'i kha na

gnas// zhe sdang dmyal khams bco brgyad po// rdo rje gdan 'og tsha grang gnas// nga rgyal lha yi 'jig rten rnams// ri rab phyir rtse nam mkhar gnas// phrag dog lha ma yin gyi gnas// ri rab khong seng dag na
gnas// ser sna dmyal ba yi dwags gnas// grong khyer ser skya dag na gnas// gling bzhi'i mi rnams 'dod chags can// rab 'bring thams cad dbang po rno// gti mug rtag pa rnam par snang// stug po bkod

par sa bcur gnas// rdo rje mi bskyod zhe sdang las// rdo rje 'chang du rnam par snang// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ba nyid// rdo rje nyi ma dkon mchog dpal// 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas nyid// tshe dpag med pa

snang bar mdzad// phrag dog don yod grub pa'i sku// gdon mi za ba rta mchog nyid// nang sems nam mkha' lta bu 'di// glo bur sprin rnams 'byung ba yang// bde gshegs sangs rgyas rnam snang las// sku yi bde

chen byung bar 'gyur// gsum mchog snang mtha' tshe dpag med// tshogs chen yongs 'dus 'byung bar 'gyur// thugs mchog mi bskyod rdo rje 'chang// pad+ma gsang bar 'byung bar 'gyur// yon tan rin 'byung tshe
dpag med// rin chen rta mchog 'byung bar 'gyur// phrin las rta mchog don yon grub// phrin las rta mchog 'byung bar 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rta mchog
'byung// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// pad+ma dbang chen mtha' yas spro// 'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// mya ngan 'das par gtan la 'bebs// rnam byang mya ngan 'das par snang// las sgrib med par ye

sangs rgyas// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par gtan la pheb pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di dag rang gi sems snang ba// gti mug can la snang ba yang// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag la// gti mug blo yi ngan

gtad do// zhe sdang can la snang ba yang// srog mthu dag tu snang ba'o// 'dod chags can la snang ba yang// dbang du sdud par snang ba'o// nga rgyal can la snang ba yang// thog dang sor bar snang ba'o// phrag dog
can la snang ba yang// sngags pa nang 'gras phyir bzlog snang// thun mong dngos grub las tshogs rnams// bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'brel ba yang// thams cad 'di las 'byung ba yin// yid kyi rnam shes kun

khyab bo// gang bsam snang ba yid bzhin no// ma rtogs 'khor bar snang ba yang// yid kyis bskyed nas snang bar zad// rtogs pa'i mya ngan 'das pa yang// rang gis rang rtogs nyid du zad// 'khor bar snang
ba ma rig pa// sangs rgyas nyid du ma shes 'khrul// snod dang bcud du snang ba yang// snang zhen gnyis su snang bar zad// 'das pa snang ba'i rnal 'byor la// rang sems chos skur shes gyur

pa// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur snang// sems can yid kyi rnam shes can// 'di la dran pa sna tshogs 'char// yum gyi tshogs la 'jug 'gyur pas// yid dang chos su 'dres gyur
pa// dbyings dang ye shes gzhan na med// nam mkha' nyi ma shar ba ltar// dbyer med stong gsal gang yin pa// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// rnal 'byor lam la gnas gyur na// thos bsam
bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa yi// dgongs pa sems la brtag par bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dgongs pa/ rta mgrin rngog ma le brgan
gyi rgyud las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i chos dang rnam par byang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dug lngar 'dus pa ste le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku

gsung thugs yon phrin las rnams/ gcig tu rdzogs sangs rgyas pa yi/ bde gshegs thams cad spyir dril ba// dbang chen pad+ma'i sku la gnas// sku ni rab tu bsgom gyur na// skye med chos sku zhi ba las// ye
shes sgyu lus longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje sprul pa'i skur shar ba// de yi zhugs gnas gzhal yas gnas// lha nyid rang sems bde ba yi// cha shas dum bur gnas pa las// 'byung chen lnga las skur grub
pa// gcig las sku gsung thugs yon las// ma lus rdzogs par snang ba las// dbab drang bstim dang mchod 'bul bzlas// bstod nas 'dod don bcol bar bya// chos rnams gdod nas ma bskyed

pas// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i byang chub sems// mtshan ma'i dngos por ma grub pa// ye nas chos sku chen por gnas// chos dbyings spros med nam mkha' las// ye shes nyi ma rang shar ba// cis kyang ma bsgribs
'od gsal ba// ye shes sgyu lus longs skur bsgom// sems can kun gyi sems nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin pas// rtsa ba yid kyi rnam shes nyid// yi ge sprul pa'i sku ru bsgom// chos rnams stong

gsal nam mkha' nyid// chos dbyings yum gyi b+ha ga las// thams cad 'degs pa'i stobs po che// rlung nag 'tshubs mar 'khyil ba snang// chu nyid khrag las grub pa yi// rgya mtsho zab cing rgya yang che// ri rab

rus ba las grub pa'i// steng na dur khrod brgya gnas pa// snod bcud zad mdzad dbyings su thim// bskal ba'i me ni ye shes 'bar// ye shes lnga yi gzhal yas khang// ma skyes lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// dur
khrod brgyad kyis rab mdzes pa// bde gshegs dus gsum sangs rgyas gnas// lhun grub yid bzhin gnas kyi mchog/ chos dbyings ma gtogs gnas gzhan med// 'dzin pa'i sems dang
gzung ba'i yul// thabs dang shes rab skyon dang bral// thams cad dngos por blta bas na// nga yi sems ni yi ger shar// dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pas na// thugs kyi phyag mtshan lta bur byung// kha dog
dbyibs legs kun yid 'ong// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir snang// ye shes dri med g.yas ni dkar// pad+ma chags med dbus ni dmar// las mdzad g.yon pa ljang ba nyid// kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku// shes

rab ral gris ma lus gcod// rnge'u chung sgra yis rmad byung sgrogs// dbyings kyi gzhu la ye shes mda'// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung// rgyud drug 'khor ba 'ching ba'i zhags// tshad med bsdu ba rdzu
'phrul gyi// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab bzhugs// sku ni mthing nag dbyug tho dang// sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams pa'o// gsung dmar rdo rje lcags kyu dang// sprul gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// thugs ni

mthing nag rdo rje dang// thod pa phyag bsnams dkrug pa'o// yon tan che mchog sa nu gser// rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa nyid// phrin las ljang nag rdo rje dang// sdigs mdzub bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// dbu yi

rta mgo phrin las bzhi// sku gsung thugs kyi khyung gsum rdzogs// 'dod pa'i khro mo ral gcig ma// rdo rje thod pa g.yon nas 'khril// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// byi la bu shud la sogs pa/ lcags

kyus 'dren cing phur bus 'debs// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bya'o// A+oM pan+mAn+ta kr-i ta hrI ta ha hU~M phaTaH/ A+oM ya mAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M/ A+oM badzra he ru ka hU~M/ A+oM shrI he ru ka dzA la raM hU~M/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M/ oM

e ka dza ti hU~M/ A+oM badzra pa tsa la mu kha hU~M/ A+oM badzra bak+Sha ti mu kha hU~M/ A+oM hU~M/ A+oM trAM/ A+oM hrIH/ A+oM hA/ ji ltar mi dbang chos mthun par// dang por snyan gsan dbab par bya// dbyings nas bzhengs su gsol ba

dang// spyan drang brtan par bzhugs pa dang// phyag 'tshal mchod par rol nas ni// rnal 'byor bzlas pa bya ba yang// spro bsdu rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o// sa ni brtan zug chu ni 'bab// me 'bar rlung 'thor nam

mkhar stong// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag lhun// dang por dmigs pa brtan pa yis// bsgom pa zab mo rab tu bya// chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa// glal dang sprid btab khar mi gcad// gsal la 'bar ba'i sgron
ma yis// gnyid 'thibs rmugs pa med par bya// 'byung chen 'thor rlung drag po yis// dgra bgegs nad rnams gtor bar bya// nad dang gdon dang bag chags sgrib// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin dengs par
bya// sngags kyi yi ge nyal nas dkar// zhi bar 'dod na ShIn+taM gdags// sngags rnams langs par gyur na rgyas// mjug tu puSh+tiM gdags par bya// 'khor bar gyur na dbang du ste// pa shang ku rus

mdzes par spras// 'khrugs pa drag po nyid yin pas// a b+hi tsar+Ya'i rgyan gyis mdzes// lhun grub ma bcos ye nas gnas// A+oM pad+ma krod+ha krod+hI shwarI badzra kI la ya/ ma hA yak+Sha/ karma raM raM hU~M phaT/ dz+wa la raM hU~M phaT/
khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// ma lus rlung dang sems la brten// ji ltar gnas bzhin bzlas pa yang// rnal 'byor can la dgos pas 'bad// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med
pa// rlung dang sems du 'dres nas gnas// pho dang mo dang ma ning dang// thod rgal rlung la bskyor bar bya// zag bcas 'khor ba zag med 'dam// sems can lha srin sangs rgyas nyid// bag chags rlung dang

las kyi rlung// ye shes rlung las thams cad 'byung// rlung gi rta la sems kyi mi// zhon nas tshogs pa gcig pa dang// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa dang// rnal 'byor rtog can sgraul bar bya// phyi rol snang ba thams

cad kun// sems las byung ba yin pas na// nang du sems la bsdu bar bya// mi smra ba yi yi ge A+oM// nang gi sems nyid snang ba ni// phyi yi yul la 'jug pas na// yul gyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir// drag po

khros pa'i khro bo hU~M// yul sems gnyis su snang ba yang// blo dang dngos po bsres pas na// gnyis su med par snang bar bya// skye med a ni khong na gnas// ma bcos don gyi rnal ma la// rig pa'i blo yis sbyor
'dod na// sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgrub pa'i// rgyud la dad pa rab tu bskyed// ces gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ sku bskyed pa ste le'u drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// rang sems snang ba nyams drug las// lus la rtags drug khro bo'i sku// des mtshon phyi rol rgyan drug 'char// yon tan mngon shes drug dang

ldan// nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par gnas// 'di ltar gang gis shes nas grol// sku gsung phrin las mdzad pa'i zhal// phyag drug 'gro drug pha rol drug/ zhabs ni tshad me rdzu 'phrul ston// glang chen zhing lpags
gos su gyon// thod pa sbrul dang rgyu mas mtshan// thal ba zhags dang rak+ta btab// rtags rnams don du rdzogs par byed// bcom ldan rta mchog ye shes lnga// thabs chen gar dgu lus la rdzogs// yum chen
ral gcig chos kyi dbyings// shes rab skye ba med par sbyor// ma 'gags sprul sku gnyis su snang// sku gsum ye shes lngar 'grub gnas// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma leb
rgan gyi rgyud las/ sku rgyan rnam dag gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas dbang chen rta yi mchog/ rtogs pa blta ba'i gtor ma 'di// rgya che ba yi rtogs pas bcad// de nyid nyams su lon

par bya// 'byung lnga bum gyi gtor dbang mkha'// shes pas ma zin dus bzhi'i rdzas// rigs drug ye nas mgron gyi lha// rang bzhin lha zhes tshims pa'i mchog/ chos can mtshan mar snang ba kun// ye nas chos

nyid mtshan ma med// chos can chos nyid dbyer med pas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug yi dam lha// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams// ye nas snang srid snod dang bcud// lta ba'i

gtor ma chen por gnas// mtshan ma las kyi gtor ma yang// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// zan dang khur ba bu ram dang// sran ma bcos pa lta bu dang// 'bras dang gro dang til dkar dang// bra bo me tog ser
por gnas// nas mar de bzhin me tog dang// til nag sran ma nag po dang// thams can lhun gyis grub gnas pas// thams cad rdzas su snang ba nyid// 'o ma zho dang mar du bcas// sbrang rtsi gser gyi mdog
dang ldan// bu ram smug pos brgyan pa dang// ba dang 'bri gnag rdzas dang bcas// rigs kyi sems can kha dog las// 'byung ba gtor ma nyid du gnas// sems can ma lus sha khrag lus// klad pa rkang dang

sha khrag dang// thams cad gtor mar gnas pa'o// de nyid ye nas kun gnas pa// sha lnga bdud rtsi chen po yang// mi sha glang po rta bya khyi// 'di dag kha zas chen po ste// rdzas su yang dag bsags te dbul// phyi
snod nang bcud rdzas 'di kun// mtshan ma rdzas kyi gtor mar gnas// gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor bas// ye shes lha rnams rab mchod bya// rig pa byin rlabs gtor ma bshad// phyi nang gsang ba de
kho na// 'thor byed rlung nag kun 'bud pas// spyod pa rlung g.yob me la brten// sreg byed bskal pa lta bu yi// ting 'dzin rlabs chen me ru 'bar// rab 'jigs thod pas 'degs pa ni// rnam gsum 'bar

ba brjid pa'i steng// lhan d+ha 'khor yug mdzes la che// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi dbus 'bar// rdzas ni 'dod yon rnam pa drug/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya chos su snang ba yang// ye nas kun la khyab

pa'o// A+oM ba liM ta te dzo ba liM ta ba la ba te g+hu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA/ b+h+rUM las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang// rab mdzes sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// 'byung lnga'i snod ni kun gyi gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing
khams yin// bcud ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa nas// ye nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// de las ma gtogs gzhan med pa'o// khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma 'di// rgyu mchog
tshogs kyi 'khor lo mchod// bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa gang byed kyang// 'dzin pa'i gtor ma chen por bshad// b+h+rUM skyes lha yi khang pa la// rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan bsgom// gtor ma bde'u gtso

bo thabs shes so// mtheb skyu 'khor tshogs sprul pa'i tshogs// yab yum ling+ka b+ha gar sbyar// dri med bdud rtsi byang chub sems// dpa' bo ro dang yang dag ldan// slob mar gtor mas dbang bskur bya// dus
gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sku// sku yi byin rlabs lus la zhugs// bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas// na tsha sdug bsngal sbyang du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// gsung gi byin rlabs
ngag la zhugs// rmad byung gsung sgras dbang bskur bas// sgra skad kun la dbang bsgyur shog/ dus gsum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// thugs kyi byin rlabs sems la zhugs// skye shi med pa'i dbang

bskur bas// sku gsum rtogs pa 'bar bar mdzod// A+oM sarba ta thA ga tA ya/ d+harma kA ya/ saM b+ho ga kA ya/ nirmA Na kA ya/ la liM ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ spyir na sangs rgyas rigs lnga yi// phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab
kyang// gtor ma'i phrin las las rab mchog/ dpal gyi gtor ma skung na nyal// sha khrag gtor ma 'ben du bcam// zhal zas gtor ma bdud rtsir bsngo// sprul pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyab// dam tshig gtor
ma bskyed par bya// gzhal yas lha yi dkyil 'khor tshogs// ye shes lha mo 'gugs par bya// lha dang 'dod yon rigs lnga'i chu// gta' gtor rgyun gtor gtor dbang bskur// gnyis med gtor ma dbul
bar bya// lha la lha thim dbul ba dang// dbyings la ye shes thim pa dang// ye shes la yang ye shes rol// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim// bdud rtsi rang lus lha ru gsal// gtor ma gtang bar bya ba
ni/ bsgrub pa gta' yi gtor ma yang// chos kyi dbyings su gtang ba dang// las bzhi sbyin sreg bya ba dang// mi zad longs spyod gter du sba// yun du gtor ma bsgrub byas nas// tshugs par bskyal nas
gshegs pa dang// gtor snod mnan la bro yis sbyang// gtor ma'i las rnams rdzogs par bya// sha khrag dmar las bsgrub pa ni// gang la bsrung na gnyer du gtad// sdang gnod kun la zor du
'phang// thams cad ma lus gnan par bya// sprul pa gang la gda' 'dod par// 'das dang 'jig rten yongs la bsdo// tshad med thugs rje'i gtor ma 'di// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dbang gi rgyal po

chen po las// trAM las 'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung// trAM rat+na dre lo kya// maitri ka ru Na// su kha sa ma ye/ a nr-i su tri pre du ba ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhes sku'i mchod pa gtor ma'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta
mchog rta mgrin la// don dam rang bzhin rak+ta ni// 'khor 'das kun la khyab par gnas// chos dbyings mtshan ma'i spros pa bral// rnam par rtog pa'i blos ma bslad// rang bzhin ma bcos sar
gnas pa// chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhir grub ni// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bzhugs pa// bcos ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje
snying// btsun mo'i b+ha ga'i nang na bzhugs// ma rtogs khams su sems can rnams// der gnas de las 'byung ba ni// gzhan min de las 'phrul ba'o// ma rtogs 'khrul ba'i rak+ta ni// kun rdzob snod dang

bcud du shar// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga// yum lnga'i rak+tar snang ba dang// 'byung ba lnga yi rak+ta 'dzag/ khrag zhun phyogs bzhi dbus lnga nas// yum gyi pad+ma rak+ta thig/ thams cad ma lus rak+tar snang// sems

can kun la gnas pa yi// chags pa'i rak+ta'i rgya mtsho ni/ khrag gi chu yis gling bzhi 'degs// khrag gis gso byed ste ba'i bcud// khrag gis kun ngoms srog bcud 'dzin// mtshan ma rdzas kyi rak+ta ni// byin

brlab lha la dbul bar bya// phyi yi rak+ta mtshal la sogs// 'byung ba dmar por snang ba dang// nang gi rak+ta sems can kun// sna tshogs pa yi khrag rnams sbyar// gsang ba'i rak+ta chen po ni// 'bras bu lnga bsgral

bud med khrag/ de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings// mthar 'dzin lta ngan brlag par mdzad// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ming sring rnams// rak+ta rtogs par gyur nas shom// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// rak+ta

bskyed cing spro ba yang// b+han+d+ha pad+ma'i zhal bu nang// pad+ma rak+ta sna tshogs khrag/ bdud rtsi chu yi dpa' bor sbyar// ma dang mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i rdzas// lhar gsal thugs las yi ge ram// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs

'khrugs// rak+ta mU la ka dz+wa la maN+Da la hU~M/ khams gsum snod bcud rak+ta dgug/ raM las spro bar bya ba'i 'od// mchod pa phul nas thugs dam bskul// sdod bcud rak+ta kun bsdus thim// rba rlabs 'phyo ba

dmar la 'khrugs// rak+ta raM s+pha ra Na phaT/ rak+ta khaM saM ha ra Na hU~M/ don rtags ldan pa'i rak+ta dbul// 'khor yug snod kyi gzhal yas na// khrag mtsho dmar nag 'khyil ba'i bcud// rkang chen rdo rje rtse lnga'i

skyogs// dang po snang srid rak+tas khengs// gnyis pa rag gi snod du 'dus// gsum pa rba rlabs 'khrugs pa'o// khaM raM stong khams rak+tas khengs// khaM raM sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros gsol// kha raM mchod mnyes

dngos grub ster// bdud rtsi sman dang bsres pa dbul// rak+ta dz+wa la mU la ka kha raM khA hi/ don rtogs rak+tas kun sangs rgyas// rigs lnga rgyal ba yab dang yum// ye shes lnga po lhan cig skyes// gnyis med chos
kyi dbyings na bzhugs// gsung rak+ta'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang mchog rgyal po yis// lta ba rang gnas bdud rtsi gsungs// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po lnga// phung po lnga yi

rgyal ba mchod// bsgom pa nyams blang bdud rtsi blang// ched kyi dam tshig bdud rtsi bsgom// stong pa'i ngang las las kyi lha// ljang nag rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// g.yo ba'i rlung dang 'bar ba'i me// thod pa'i steng

na b+han+d+ha'i snod// nyi ma zla ba'i kha bcad pa'i// nam mkha' rdo rje rtse lnga bsgom// gsung gi cho ga bya ba ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i yig 'bru las// thugs kyi phyag mtshan rnam lngar 'gyur// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i lha sku

bsgom// ye ges bdud rtsi dgug par bya// rta yi rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcas// lu gu rgyud kyi phreng thag bzung// 'od 'phros 'og min sku lnga gnyis// nam mkhar spyan drangs 'od du zhu// ye shes bdud rtsi chen por

dgug/ na ba'i sman la 'chi ba'i gsos// oM AHhU~M/ sarba pany+tsa ma mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha/ gnyis su med pa'i bdud rtsi las// rnal 'byor pa yi sor mo lnga// ye nas rigs lngar gnas pas gtor// rnal 'byor pa'i chag
nyams skong// sgrub pa po yi bar gcod sel// bsgrub pa'i gnas khang bkra shis mdzad// mched lcam lta ba yo ba srong// ma dang mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas mnyes// dam nyams dam sri bgegs mtshams

chod// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams gsang bar bya// A+oM badzra yak+sha kro d+ha hU~M ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM d+harma mr-i ta bi shud+d+he hU~M phaT/ drin len gsang nan mchod pa 'dren/ bdud rtsi phyag bsnams 'dzab brjod pas// byin rlabs
bsgom pa'i bar yang gdags// theg dman spyod pa zil mnan phyir// sman gyi che ba'i yon tan brjod// rnam rtog ngan pas rgyud bcings pa// sman la bshags pa rab tu bya// bsgrubs pas las la 'bras smin

pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dgos grub blang// drin la lan gyis blan pa'i phyir// gsang nan sbreng mchod dbul bar bya// tshogs bsag sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab// ngas ni ma
'ongs phyi rabs la// dgongs pa'i gol sa gcad pa'i phyir// khyed la legs par bshad par bya// bdag gzhan don du rab tu nyon// ye nas lus khams bdud rtsi lnga// rgyal ba rigs lngar gnas pa
yin// dgongs pa 'dzab la brten byas nas// lcags la ngar btab bzhin du 'gyur// rang lus bdud rtsi chen por gnas// dri chen rnam snang chos kyi dbyings// byang sems mi bskyod me long bzhin// sha chen

rin 'byung mnyam pa nyid// rak+ta snang mtha' so sor rtog/ dri chu don grub bya ba grub// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi lnga// lus pa med par ye sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus dang// yi dam bla mar
bcas pa dang// grub thob rdo rje ming sring sogs// dus gsum pha ma'i tshogs la dbul// ye nas bdud rtsi rnam dag pa// mchog dang thun mong grub rdzas la// ma rig ma rtogs log par
bzung// don dang 'gal ba bzod par gsol// bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho nas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// mtheb srin rtse sbyar e yi gzugs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// srid gsum
ma lus sems can gyi// sha yi mchod pa 'di bzhes la// ma rig gti mug gsal ba dang// gzugs med 'khor ba stongs nas kyang// mi rtog dngos grub bdag la stsol// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad
kyi// khrag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes la// 'dod chags zhen pa bcad pa dang// 'dod khams 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub stsol// stong gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// rus pa'i mchod
pa 'di bzhes la// gzugs khams 'khor ba rgyun chod la// gsang ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/ dug gsum rgyu rnams gtan nas byung// bde gsal mi rtog shar bar mdzod// khams gsum 'khor ba dong

nas sprugs// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol/ chos kyi spun gyis bsdus pa yis// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral rnams// 'phral gyi rkyen bgegs bzlog pa dang// yun gyi sgrib pa sbyong ba dang// sku dang gsung
dang thugs rnams kun// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mdzod// thugs bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan rta mgrin gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don dgongs nas// che ba'i rang bzhin

bstan pa'i phyir// nyid la bstod pa 'gro don gsungs// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang nas// snying po byang chub dgongs pa las// thugs rje chen po'i skur ston pa// snang ba

mtha' yas tshe dpag med// sprul sku'i byang sems spyan ras gzigs// 'dul phyir sku khros rta mgrin dpal// thugs rjes byon la phyag 'tshal bstod// stong nyid ye shes mtshan ma bral// me long ye shes 'gag
med gnas// stong gsal skye ba med pa'i ngang// stong rig chos sku chen po las// gzugs sku longs spyod rdzogs par bstan/ mtha' dbus mi phyed mnyam pa nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin so sor rtog/ sa bcu
longs spyod rdzogs skur bstan// rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can la// ji ltar mos pas mthun 'dul ba// mdzad pa mthar phyin sprul pa'i sku// dbang chen sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma skyes a ni kun gyi
srog/ 'gag med ka tshogs rnam par sprul// zab dang rgya che'i chos rnams kun// A li kA li'i tshogs las sprul// 'khor 'das gtan la 'bebs byed pa// rmad byung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// ma skyes lus la
dgyes pas te// bem stong chos nyid dbyings su dgyes// ma rtogs sems la chags pas ru// thugs rje chen pos 'gro la chags// yul sems gnyis med las mdzad ka/ bdag gzhan gnyis

med phrin las mdzad// he ru ka dpal khro bo'i gtso// pad+ma'i rgyal po'i khro bo'i sku// ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrog pa// dbang chen gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma skyes sems kyi dkyil 'khor nas// chos rnams rtsa ba
gtan la 'bebs// kun gzhi sems kyi pho brang du// las dang bag chags gting nas grol// yul sems gnyis su 'dzin pa'i yid// phyi nang gzung 'dzin rnam par grol// gti mug mi 'byed rtog dang

bral// zhe sdang 'od gsal chen por 'bar// 'dod chags bde ba chen por shar// nga rgyal lta sgom ri bos gnon// phrag dog lta ngan shong mi byed// dbang chen thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni yid bzhin

rin po che// kun gyi 'dod pa ma lus skong// phye ni lha yi dpag bsam shing// na bza' zhal zas rtsol ba bral// khyod ni bum pa bzang po'i gter// bdud rtsi chen po'i chu bo 'bebs// khyod ni stong nyid nam
mkha'i mdzod// sku dang ye shes dkor gyi bdag/ theg mchog bstan pa'i sa gzhi las// zhi gnas chu yis kun tu tshim// lhag mthong ye shes bag chags bsregs// 'thor byed rlung gi 'khor lo yis// stong
gsum 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor lhar// 'gro drug mun pa kun sel ba// dbang chen yon tan phyag 'tshal bstod// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis sgeg pa'i gang mdzad la// 'dod chags
dbang phyug 'dul bar mdzod// khyod ni dpa' bo chen po ste// lha min pa su ka ra 'dul bar mdzod// 'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa'i sku// khyab 'jug chen po 'dul bar mdzod// sku yi gar gyis sku yi gar
mdzod la// bdag gi lus la gar rnams 'char bar mdzod// rgod pa'i nyams kyis ha ha bzhad pa ni// gzhon nu smin drug rta skad drag pos btul// gshe ba'i gar gyis hi hi gshe ba ni// tshogs kyi bdag po

glang po'i sna can btul// rngam pa'i gar gyis hring hring za byed rngam// sgra gcan rA hu la ni rngam pas btul// gsung gi gar gyis gsung gi gar mdzod la// bdag gi ngag la sngags su 'char bar mdzod// snying

rje'i gar gyis thugs rje'i rol par mdzad// brgya byin glang chen zhon pa sgrol bar mdzod// ngo mtshar gar gyis ngo mtshar bskyed par mdzad// klu chen se sha ra tsa bsgral bar mdzod// zhi ba'i gar gyis zhi ba 'dus
mdzad pa// me lta drang srong chen po sgro 'bar mdzod// thugs kyi gar gyis thugs kyi gar mdzod la// bdag gi sems la nyams rnams 'char bar mdzod// bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ gar dgu'i phrin
las mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// lha mchog khyod la bdag gis bstod pa yis// sems la nyams kyi snang ba nang du 'char// lus la gar gyi snang ba phyi ru 'char// ngag la sngags kyi snang ba 'char

bar byed// yul la mthong snang snang ba 'char ba dang// bag chags rmi lam snang ba rmi bar mdzod// ces phyis 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa la mchod cing bstod pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang
chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ mchod bstod kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// rnal 'byor dbang

phyug chen po yis// yang gsang rmad byung dgongs pa la// bsnyen pa thems par gyur pa na// chos sku snying po byang chub sems// de nyid shes pa spros dang bral// sa thob sbyong yul gzhal yas nas// dgongs pa lta

can longs spyod rdzogs// mos spyod 'gro la snang gyur ba// grub pa chos kyi phung po can// rgyal ba sku gsum dag dang mnyam// rnal 'byor rab kyi dgongs par gsungs// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
dang// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// thugs dam rgyud nas bskul ba ni// rnal 'byor 'bring gi dgongs pa yin// lus ni lha sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// ngag ni bzlas pa'i gsang sngags
can// thugs ni yang dag don du blta// rtags tsam 'dzin par rab gnas pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rab tu 'bad nas bsgom pa yang// rnal 'byor tha ma'i dgongs pa yin// de dag rnal 'byor

brda skad gsungs// ma ltar byams la sring ltar gdung// ma mo mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// pheM pheM hri yi sgra dag la// thal mo'i sgra dang rnge'u chung sgra// rkang gi gling bu thod pa'i rnga// cang te'u sgra rnams bsgrags pa

dang// zhing gi g.yab mos g.yab pa ni// dang po brda yang sprad bar bya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro chen mo dang// rdo rje zhe sdang srog la rngams// rin chen nga rgyal sha za

mo// pad+ma 'dod chags khrag 'thung ma// las kyi phrin las chen po rnams// nam mkha' bar snang sprin bzhin du// klong rdol bya nag 'bab pa ltar// gti mug sha yi sa gzhi la// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho
'khyil// zhe sdang rus pa'i ri rab la// mi rtog bde gsal nyams skye zhing// khams gsum gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// sgrol phyir 'gyings shing rngams pa yis// rab tu gnas su 'byung ba ni// bar du klong
rdol byon pa yin// dug gsum gtor mas tshim pa dang// bdud rtsi chen pos tshim pa dang// rak+ta dmar gyis dgyes pa ni// mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam 'gro// dgra dang bgegs rnams rab 'gugs
pa// dper na skyes bu btson bzung bzhin// rang dbang med par 'gugs pa ni// rmad byung dkyil 'khor nang du drang// rlung gi stobs kyis 'ong ba ni// tha mal las la bkye ba'o// bdag gi rnal
'byor bsam gtan can// rta skad thengs gcig bsgrags pa yis// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// nyams chag bskangs par gyur nas ni// thun mong grub chen brgyad

la sogs// mchog gi sku gsung rang gsal ba// g.yar dam can la dngos grub ster// rta skad thengs gnyis bsgrags pa yis// rje mo blon mo ma sring dang// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro

rnal 'byor ma// dam la gnas pa thams cad kyang// tshar bcad rjes su phrin las mdzad// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ drag dbang rgyas dang zhi bar byed// rta skad thengs gsum bsgrags pa yi// mos pa
chung ba'i nyan thos la// bden pa bzhi yi chos kyang ston// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang rgyal la// rten 'brel bcu gnyis chos bshad de// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' la// kun rdzob don dam chos kyang
gsungs// bya ba las kyi kri ya la// rig gsum mgon por rnam par snang// u pa ya la rigs bzhi nyid// lta ba spyod pa ston pa dang// yo ga rigs lnga mngon byang chub// kun rig rnam snang chen por

gsungs// rnal 'byor che la thabs chen snang// rjes su rnal 'byor yab yum che// shin tu rnal 'byor chos kyi sku// rgyud lung man ngag snang ba'o// rta skad thengs gsum dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas
sangs rgyas rta yi mchog/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang// dus bzhir gshegs pa'i bde gshegs kyis// dbang chen las la sbyar nas gsungs// drag po'i gnas nas sa blang la// gang gnong sa blang

bsres nas kyang// dkyil 'khor dkyil du mthing nag e// zla gam rnam gsum dmar po'am// zlum po zhi ba dkar la yang// gru bzhi ser po rgyas pa la// sgo dang rdo rje ra ba dang// me dpung dur khrod brgyad

dang bcas// khrag sna dug sna'i phu bas bri// bya rog gang ga'i sgro sogs nang// mi rkang mtshon gyi skud pa can// ro ras zhing lpags gro shog la// klu gnyan sa bdag srog rtsa gcad// sbrul dang sdig pa sbal bas

brgyad// nA ga tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad// su mi tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ sa khrag tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcad pa'i phyir// ling+ga ming rus sngags dang ldan// sha truM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo tsita mA ra ya

rbad// gdug pa'i bgegs ni pho mo la// gang yon gzugs bris sngags kyis gzir// sarba bi g+ha nAn srog mA ra ya rbad/ e sarba big nan mA ra ya rbad// ming rus rkang gi phur pa dang// seng ldeng dag las byas
pa dang// lcags kyi phur pa dag gis gdab// gla ba'i phur pas gdab par bya// sa nA ga tri sha truM mA ra ya kI li kI la ya rbad// rdo rje phur pas btab byas nas// lus rnams kun la gzer bar

bya// mthing nag gru gsum nang du yang// ro shing tsher ma can gzer nas// yugs sa bshan pa'i me blangs nas// me lha dbang gi rgyal po'i zhal// mi rkang zar bu chen po'i nang// dug khrag ril bur ling+ga

bcug/ sha khrag sna tshogs mchod pa 'bul// nyung dkar yungs nag rdo phye dang// gri ma dung mtshon chas thun du brab// raM r+dz+wa la raM mAM sa rak+ta kha raM khA hi/ sa sa sha ri shag ti tIk+ShA che ge mo mA ra ya thun b+h+yo// lha khang

rming bar mtshon bcas dang// byin ldan gdung gi pu ri'i 'og/ rab gnas ldan pa'i mchod rten dang// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang// rgya gram lam dang zam pa'i sna// lha klu btsan 'gong dur khrod

gnas// shing gcig drung dang 'gyu ba'i srang// de ru gang rnyed thod par mnan// nya dang sram dang khyi sbyang dang// wa sogs gcan gzan thod par mnan// nA ga pa tri sha truM staM b+ha ya laM nan// srog la 'khor lo
bskor ba ni// gdug pa gsum la srog rtsa gcad// gnod pa'i bgegs la srog rtsa gcad// sdang ba dgra la srog rtsa gcad// de dag drag po'i las rnams kyis// dpal gyi 'phreg sngags zab mo ste// gsang ba

chung ba 'di dag go/ A+oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ta rul bi rul sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ga/ dz+wa li ta bi s+phu Ta ling+ga/ an+TAT+Ta hA sa/ sa DA a To pa TaM kA ra/ badzra khu ra ni r+g+gA ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+hA ta la ni shwA sa mA ru to tik+Shap+ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/

b+hI Sha Ni aT+rA T+Ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi tA ba la ba rA krA ma/ ar+ya ga NA b+hI ta b+hu ta ga NA d+h+yu yaM ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ h+ya grI wa/ khA da khA da ba ra man+t+rAn/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ pa ra mu drA na/ sid+d+hi m+me di sha A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra

bi sha tsI dI na/ sarba gra he Sh+wa pra ti ta to b+ha ba/ badzra daM Sh+ta kiny+tsa rA ya si/ i dan du Sh+ta gri ha Na/ du Sh+ta sarbaM pA/ dU na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ marda marda/ pA Ta ya bA' Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma sa g+hi a nu dz+nyA taM

karma ku ru shI g+h+raM/ ha ya grI wA ya phaT/ badzra ye phaT/ badzra gA trA ya phaT/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra daM Sh+tA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ khu ra ni r+g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra ma n+t+ra binA sha nA ya phaT/ sarba tri lo kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya

phaT/ sarba karmi ShA pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badzra ku la san+t+ra sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swa hA/ gang la dmigs pa 'joms par byed// khyad par klu yi dug rnams sel// dug rnams ma lus thams cad

kun// 'byin par byed pa'i gsal sngags so// namaHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAn/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+hA na/ bi nA ya
kA nan/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka dzA ya phaT/ lha srin bgegs dang sa bla 'di// gdug pa'i bgegs rnams ma lus pa// lus dang ngag sems la dmigs na// bgegs rnams gsod pa'i

mchog yin no/ A+oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA yA wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM pa d+mAn+ta kr-i ta/ ts+tshin+d+ha

ts+tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dIp+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ A+oM pad+mAn+takr-i ta hrIH/ aM b+hur+b+ha baHphaT/ A+oM pad+mAn+tA kr-i ta badzra rA dza hU~M/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// phur pa lus la gdab par bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas bzung byas

nas// phur ba ngag la gdab par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// phur pa sems la gdab par bya// sdang ba'i dgra bo ma lus pa'i// lus ngag sems la gdab bya na// de ma thag tu myur du 'gro// 'byung
bzhi 'thibs nas tshe srog bral// gal te gso bar 'dod pa na// gang so de la btab par bya// dril bu'i sgras brgyal sangs ba ltar// 'chi ba de yang langs par 'gyur// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa/
pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ gdug pa gsum dang dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas phyogs dus sangs rgyas kyis// gsung gi las mdzad rta yi
mgrin// mthar byed chen po dpal gyi dpal// las bzhi'i s+yin sreg rab tu gsungs// dkyil 'khor zlum zhing dkar ba la// 'khor los rab tu brgyan par bya// gru bzhi gser gyi mdog can la// rin chen

'bar bas 'tshon par bya// zla gam dmar po gyur pa la// pad+ma lcags sgrog bri bar bya// gru gsum kha dog nag po la// ral gri mtshon cha sna tshogs brgyan// gru gsum zla gam zlum po la// gru bzhi rgyas pa lhun

gyis grub// ba lu dang ni glang ma dang// 'om bu shugs pa zhi ba'i shing// skyer pa dang ni gla ba'i shing// seng ldeng rgyas pa'i hom du bya// seng ldeng dang ni mdzo mo shing// kha dog dmar ba dbang gi hom// shel

shing nag po dri can dang// a ka ru ni drag po'i shing// thams cad tshang bar gyur pa na// lhun gyis grub pa'i shing zhes bya// 'bras chan nas dkar til dkar dang// 'o ma zho yi gtor ma zhi// bra bo'i zan dang
khur ba dang// ba ser 'o ma'i gtor ma rgyas// ram bu'i zan dang nas dmar dang// ba dmar 'o mas gtor ma dbang// sha dang khrag dang dug dang ni// til nag gtor ma drag po la// thams cad ma lus tshang

ba ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i gtor ma yin// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// zhi ba'i phur bu zlum po bya// gser ram ra gan ser po'i shing// rgyas pa'i phur pa gru bzhi bya// zangs sam dmar po'i shing
rnams la// dbang gi phur bu zla gam bya// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// drag po'i phur pa zur gsum bya// mgo zlum sked pa gru bzhi la// zla gam zur gsum lhun gyis grub// dung can ma

dang phyal pa dang// lcug phran ma dang ban glang can// pad+ma gcig dang sdong gcig ma// me reg ma dang ri dwags can// phrin las bzhi la so sor bya// kun dag tshang na lhun gyis grub// dngul dkar stag ma'i shing
rnams la// zhi ba'i dgang gzar blug gzar dang// gser dang ra gan shing sar rgyas// zangs sam seng ldeng dmar po la// dbang gi sbyin sreg gsar bu bya// lcags sam ma mi rkang gzar bu ni// drag por yang

dag gsungs pa la// phrin las bzhi yi dbyibs ldan pas// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzar bu yin// zhi bar 'dod na zlum po'i zhal// dang ba'i sems dang rab ldan pa// rgyas pa'i khro zhal gru bzhi la// dga' ba'i

sems kyi ting 'dzin bya// dbang gi rta gdong zla gam zhal// chags pa'i sems kyis mchod par bya// drag po khro zhal gru gsum nyid// khros pa'i sems kyi ting 'dzin bya// kun tsang zhal ni khro zhal gsum// rta

mgo nyid la lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i me ni dge slong ngam// bram ze gtsang ma dag las byung// rgyas pa rgyal po 'gyur ba dang// 'byor pa can las blang ba'o// dbang gi smad 'tshong bud med dang// 'gro ba bzang

mo dag las blangs// drag po yugs sa pho mo dang// bshan pa dag las blang ba'i me// kun ka tshang bar gang gyur pa// de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i me// spyan sprin dkar po zhi ba nyid// rta gdong dpral ba zhur po

las// sangs rgyas lta stangs sna rtse la// yang na stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings// rgyas pa'i mig sprin ser po la// rta mgo phrum phrum ser por gnas// mi yi lta stangs sa gzhi nyid// yang na thang dkar ri la
blta/ dbang gi mig sprin dmar po la/ rta mgo rngog ma le brgan te// bud med lta stangs bar snang la// yang na zur mig 'phred la blta// drag po'i mig 'bras mthing nag la// rta mgo ljang gur gnas pa

nyid// khros nas sdang mig bzlog pa ste// yang na gdug par mig 'gyur bya// lhun gyis grub pa'i lta stangs ni// rta gdong gzi mig khra bor blta// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba
yin// rgyas pa'i sems kyis dga' ba la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba yin// dga' ba'i sems kyis chags pa la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba yin// drug po'i sems kyis btang snyoms la// gnyen dang

bshes la bya ba yin// byams pa'i sems ni bu yin la// snying rje ba ni pha dang ma// dga' bar rang gi chung ma nyid// btang snyoms byang chub dag la dgod// sdug bsngal can la byams pa la// phongs pa rnams la
snying rje bas// gnyen bshes rnams la dga' bar bya// dmu rgod can la btang snyoms nyid// thams cad tshang na lhun gyis grub// dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dang ston// phrin las bzhi dang lhun

gyis grub// sa yi rlung dang chu yi rlung// me yi rlung dang rlung gi rlung// las bzhi so sor rgyu ba dang// lhun gyis grub par gnas pa yin// me tog dkar ser dmar dang nag/ du ba 'khor lo rin chen pad// ral

gri rgya gram 'bar ba ni// las bzhi grub dang lhun gyis grub// snga dro phyi dro gong ma gnyis// phyi dro phyi dro 'og ma gnyis// dgong dang srod dang tho rangs langs// las bzhi lhun gyis grub par bya// gti mug nga rgyal
'dod chags dang// zhe sdang nyon mongs thams cad kyang// las bzhi dang ni lhun gyis grub// ye nas byas pa med par gnas// dgra bgegs la sogs zhi ba dang// dpal dang 'byor pa rgyas pa dang// yul
khams pho mo dbang 'dus dang// dgra bgegs bcom dang gnas su shis// thams cad tshang bar lhun grub nas// phr-in las brtsam pa'i dgos pa gsungs// yon tan las bzlog skyon du 'gyur// me long lto

rgyab log pa bzhin// shar na lus 'phags zla gam dbyibs// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'degs// lho na 'dzam gling sog kha'i dbyibs// gru gsum me ni kun la snyoms// nub na ba glang zlum po chu// phyi yi

rgya mtsho lcags ri'i nang// byang na gru bzhi sgra mi snyan// sa yi dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas// dbus kyi ri rab lhun po nyid// thams cad rin chen lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i tshe na nub tu blta// rgyas pa byed na byang du
blta// dbang gi las la shar du blta// drag po'i dus na lto ru blta// dbus ni kun gnas lhun gyis grub// sum mdo zla gam lto ba zlum// ro stod gru bzhir gnas pa dang// lkog ma dpral ba gru gsum

ste// lus la kun tshang lhun gyis grub// b+ha ga phyi mtshams gru bzhi la// sna rtse gru gsum bya rog gdong// skye gnas zla gam dag tu gnas// sna tshogs 'dus pa zlum po nyid// b+ha gar kun tshang lhun gyis

grub// kun gzhi zhi ba yid ni rgyas// nyon mongs dbang la sgo lnga drag/ tshogs brgyad lhun gyis grub pa ni// de kho na nyid ces kyang bya// stong pa zhi la gnas rgyas pa// chags pa dbang la 'jig pa drag/ thams

cad tshang bar ye gnas pa// lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'o// byol song zhi la mi rnams dbang// lha rnams rgyal dang yi dwags dang// dmyal ba drag por gnas pa la// 'gro ba kun la lhun gyis grub// yA ni zhi

ba ma ni rgyas// baM ni dbang la drag po e// yi ge bzhi yi dbyibs ldan par// e baM ma yA lhun gyis grub// dpa' bo chen po'i yi ge ni// a dang bI ra hU~M kha la// las bzhi'i zhi rgyas dbang drag dang// kun tshang
lhun gyis grub pas na// phung po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud// lha bu'i bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub pas// bzhi bcom drug ldan mtha' las 'dud// de nas

bcom ldan pad+ma dbang gi rgyal pos// sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag phyung ngo// shAn+tiM ku ru oM AHhU~M swAhA/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA b+h+rUM/ pa shaM ku ru A+oM hrIH/ mA ra ya hA hU~M dza dza/

shAn+tiM puSh+tiM ba shaM mA ra ya/ A+oM AHhU~M swA hA/ 'di ni dus gsum gshegs pa dang// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba yi// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang du sdud dang drag pos gsod// lhun gyis grub par gyur

pa yis// las kyi rnam grangs gang byed kyang// bcom ldan dbang chen rta mgrin gyis// pad+ma bde gshegs spyi dril gyis// g.yo dang mi g.yo thams cad rnams// 'grub par byed pa'i rtsa ba yin// sbyin sreg byed

pa'i sngon du ni// rang lus srung bar byed pa'i sngags// A+oM pad+man+ta kr-ita/ pi shA tsi par+Na sha ba rI sarba pra shA ma rA ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor byed dam sbyin sreg gam// nad ngan ro sogs bsreg gyur kyang// chu la 'di

sngags 'thungs pa na// nad rnams thams cad mi 'byung ngo// rkang gnyis rkang bzhi thams cad kyi// gdon rnams thams cad med par byed pa yin// A+oM sho tra thi ha hu lu hu lu yaM TaM pa ti tho hu lu ta trai sa twa tho hu lu

hu lu/ ta trai wa gats+tsha hu lu hu lu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// 'thab mo kha ngan rgya 'dre dang// gdon lhas 'jigs 'byung thams cad zhi// me tog gang rnyed sngags bzlas te// chu yi rgyun la bskur ba

na// thams cad zhi bar gdon mi za// grong khyer tshig par gyur pa na// me la kha blta sa chu snyim pa bdun// sngags te gtor na me tshig thar// rkang gnyis rkang bzhi'i 'chi ba la// 'bras bu'i phub mas sbyin sreg

bya// 'chi ba las ni zhi bar 'gyur// mthar ni shAn+ti ka zhes sbyar// thams cad zhi ba'i gsang sngags so// oM a ma ra Ni dzIban+ti swA hA// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di la ni// bzlas na nad rnams med pa dang// 'di la

rtag tu bzlas pa na// tshe zad pa yang rgyal bar 'gyur// til mar sbyin sreg byas pa na// nad rnams 'byin cing zhi gyur nas// tshe dang dbang thang rgyas par byed// puSh+ta ka'i sngags mthar sbyar// oM ka sngags sor bzhag

she ku she sa nad twaM shu bya wa Sh+ma ni/ ma ma tad tha ta/ sa na dang ya ha/ p+pan se we bad dzin swA hA// mig 'gul zhi nas gang mthong ba// dga' zhing rgyas par gyur pa ste// gang la yid kyis dmigs bzlas

na// thams cad bdag dag rgyas par 'gyur// A+oM sor bzhag dzaM b+he mu he da ya ma wa ti na hU~M swA hA// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// tho rangs dus na lan bdun du// chu la sngags nas gdong bkrus na// 'gro ba
kun dga' dbang du 'gyur// skar ma rgyal la pad+ma ni// dkar po kun+da'i dregs pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad sngags mig bskus na// bud med thams cad yid 'phrog byed// 'dres ma sran ma'i me tog

ni// tsan+dan dkar po'i chur spangs nas// skar ma rgyal la brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags la thig le byas pa na// rgyal po la sogs dbang du sdud// ba sha ka'i sngags mthar sbyar// A+oM pad+mA n+ta kr-ita/ mo ha ga ya/ an d+ha

ya/ sang ku ya/ uts+tsha ta ya/ b+he te sha ya/ mA ra ya// dzi wa tsit+ta rbad/ ling+ga gtub nas bsreg byas na// gang la dmigs pa gsod par byed// drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ mthar ni a b+hi tsar+ya sbyar// A+oM

pad+mA na kr-i ta shIn+taM/ ha ya gr-I wa phuSh+tA ka/ pad+ma pad+ma ba shaM ba shaM kaM pad+ma kro d+ha a b+hi tsa r+ya: sarba sid+d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las

'grub// yang gsang pad+ma chen po bshad// phrin las 'di dag rim pa yang// sngags ni thams cad nyid na yang// tshar gcod pa dang rjes gzung phyir// dang pos drag la gnyis pas dbang// rjes bzung rgyas dang
zhi ba ni// phrin las kun gyi rim par gsungs// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rdzog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ phrin las bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

mdze nad rgyun gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// srid pa'i klu ni phyogasabazhi'i mtsho// gnas pa'i klu yang ma dros mtsho// chags klu chu mig brag do nang// rigs bzhi'i klu ni
phyogs bzhir gnas// lha klu gnod sbyin byol song mi// klu rigs ser po 'khor dang bcas// rgyal rigs zhugs pa'i nad rtags ni// sha chen mdog dam nag la ham// gnyid che glal mang rmyang snying
'dod// rkang lag skrangs shing tshigs kyang 'khol// mig mi gsal la mgo yang na// sdong zla klu bdud klu btsan dang// pe dkar dam sri mtsho sman yin// 'dug gnas lung pa shar du bltas// phu ni lho nub
mtshams su zug/ chu mig mgo gsum shing rtsi dang// ni'u sing 'dam rdzab can la gnas// nen ni ci las langs zhe na// sngags pa dag gis mnan par bya// zhugs dus lo bdun ma lon par// rang gzhan mi
tshor de sos min// rje'u rigs gnod rtags sha mdog sngo// ham chags mgo gzhogs g.yon pa 'phrigs// dbung pa g.yon la brin pa dang// sna bug g.yon pa mi bde zhing// spro thung sems dkar rgol snying

'dod// sha ro dang ni bas ldag g.yon// spong zla gnyan bzed klu btsan yin// rmi lam chu dang 'dam gseb nyal// slob dpon bris sku lder tsho dang// 'thab mo byed pa rmi ba yin// zhing pa nya 'dra rdzi bo dran// rdo
shing ba cag pa'i sa nas 'bras// rang gis mi tshor lo gsum sdod// mkhas pas brtags na sos par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa'i rtags// gzhog g.yas rtsa dang khrag la zin// sha

mdog sngo dmar smin ma byi// rtsa 'khyug lus 'khol mkhal ma dang// tshang rar sha ro 'byung ba dang/ snying mi dga' zhing 'gro snying 'dod// sdong zla klu btsan klu srin dang// sa srin dam sri gnod pa yin// gnod pa

chu mig mgo gsum dang// gad pa shar shur shing rkang gcig/ lu ma gya gyu rnams la gnas// nyen ni thab dang gzhob la langs// rmi ltas rta dang bud med chu// khyi dang bya dang 'thab mo rmi// zhugs nas lo ni phyed

dang gnyis// rang gzhan tshor de gso bar sla// dmangs rigs sha mdog sngo la ham// nad rnams 'gyur zhing 'gyur zhing 'ong// mi nad sna dgu yong bar byed// chung sri rde'u nad 'jug pa yin// sdong zla klu dang
gnyan dang sman// dam sri dkor bdag bcas pa gnod// gnod pa zhang nye ma sru'i sa// yul phu zam pa lung gsum mdo// nyen ni mtshan 'gros dmar las langs// rmi ltas char 'babs rdzas bskyur nga// ri
gzar kha nas rbab 'dril rmi// lo ni phyed dang gsum lon nas// rang gzhan tshor te gsos kyang sos// lo brgyad tshun chod nam yang sos/ gdol pa klu yi nad rtags ni// sha mdog ser la spos pa dang// ro

rgyab na zhing snying yang na// ro stod brgyangs shing ro smad 'byar// tshigs rnams 'khol zhing rkang lag phra// sdong zla yul lha mgon klu dang// klu mo dkar mo bsdengs nas gnod// gnod pa phung khar rnying pa

dang// lha khang mchod rten rgya gram lam// ban+de gdung chad srung ma gnod// rten ni mi gtsang thab gzhob dang// 'thab mo dme dang mkhon las langs// rmi lam g.yang sar phyin pa dang// khang zam 'grims shing
lhung ba dang// khang khyim dud pas khengs pa rmi// zin nas lo gcig lon dus na// bdag gzhan gnyis kas tshor ba de// gnyis na sos te lo gsum na// mdze shur 'gro bas gso mi bya// 'byung lnga 'khor lo'i
'jug pa ni// sbubs kha rlung la dmangs rigs 'jug/ lte ba me 'khor rdo rigs 'jug/ rgyungs pa sa 'khor rgyal rigs 'jug/ klad pa chu 'khor bram ze 'jug/ gdol ba de rnams kun la'o// sha nad theb pa
bzang ngan ni// dpral sha 'jum 'dus bram zes ngan// sog sha dbyings 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// lag gnyis bcud 'dus rje rigs ngan// snag chen brang 'dus dmangs rigs ngan// chu bar theb pa bzang

ngan ni// ltag chu gnang 'dus bram ze ngan// skyid khung bzhi 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// mtheb chung zur rtse rje rigs ngan// rting chu khar 'dus dmangs rigs ngan// nya gnad thebs pa bzang ngan ni// byin pa'i nywa
khar dmangs rigs ngan// gnyan gong gnad 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// gru mo bzhi gnas rje rigs ngan// sog pa mgo gnas bram ze ngan// rtsa gnad thebs pa bzang ngan ni// mthe bong rgyal

rigs 'thab par ngan// rkang bol rgyas ba'i rtsa bdun dmangs// sgyid khung spyi bdud rjes rigs la// rtse'u mgo bcu drug bram ze bdun// gdong rtsa chu lnga don snying gnad// kun gyis zin par ngan pa yin// de

dag kun tshang gdol pa'i nad// 'tsho bar dka' ba'i nad kyis thebs// nang ni mig la brtag pa ni// shing gi me tog rtse mor smin// nad rnams mig na 'char ba de// chu'am chang gis byad bkrus la// ser pos

mig khebs mkhris nad rgyas// de ni rgyal rigs nad yin no// klad khrag chu pho khrag nad rje'u// mig chu chu ser bram ze'i nad// dmar ser spris ma bad kan dmangs// mig 'bras gting mtsho dol pa can// rtsa

la gram pa rnam smin nad// nag po mthong byed don snying 'grams// rnam par smin pa'i nad dngos bzung// nad rigs dngos dang 'khor dbye ba// gru khung rgya la rigs rje'u rigs bsdongs// snying gar rje rigs
rgyal rigs bsdongs// klad pa bram ze gdol ba'i 'khor// gsang gnas dmangs su bram ze bsdongs// de tshe kun tshang gdol dang dmangs// tri la brtag pa mi 'gyur bzung// dud pa khyi tri nag mo gnod// chu

yi dri 'dra klu gnod che// tshil chen dri 'dra gnod rtsub ste// gdon phrad dri chu'i dri lta bu// gshin dri gdon chen rnam smin nad// sha yi mdog la brtag pa ni// smug nag gdon chen 'gyur ldog che// sha 'gul

dkor bdag nag mo la// sha skam rnam par smin pa'i nad// sha spos rkang pa gdon thub rtags// sha ro dag la brtag pa yang// yas chags rkyen gyis byung ba'i nad// mas chags rnam par smin pa'i nad// phyed

mar byung na gdon gzhan che// rma mdog dbye ba'i brtag pa ni// dmar la chu ser gdon zhen che// sngo skya ham pa nag mo dkor// rkang pa rgyu khung rnam smin nad// 'jug pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa yang// rigs kyi

ma sru zhang nyes 'jug/ brko rlog shing gnyan rkyen gyis 'jug/ klu dang thug phrad go bur 'jug/ ku re rkyal ka rngam 'dod 'jug/ 'byung ba bzhi po log men brtag/ dgun dang nam langs sa yi dus// dbyar dang

dros pa chu yi dus// ston dang phyi dro me yi dus// dpyid dang dgongs ka rlung gi dus// lo dang zla ba zhag dus dang// za ma shin tu nye ba'i dus// mi rigs 'byung ba brtag pa yin// rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug pa

ste// lci zhing 'thibs pa'i dug nad ni// rgyal blon sha bkra rgyang glu len// bram ze lag g.yon grang ba chu// go ldog yan lag mig mi bde// mthe bong bus gong sna phrag 'phrigs// rmi ltas chus khyer 'dam du
byings// rje'u rigs lag g.yas tsha ba med// dmar zhing dgong la chu bur dang// tsha brab sha bkra me lce ris// ro smad mdun smad na ba yin// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas yang zhing g.yo// gdol

pa rkang g.yon nag la gel// sha rus sbu dug brtag pa ni// sha dug pad+ma rdo rje nyams// ming tsha zil chen gor sho shor// rus dug skad phra 'dzer lung khrag/ glo bstud so sen bkrag rnams shor// spu dug mgo skra

smin ma dang// gro ba sa shu dbyibs rnams shor// dug gsum tshang ba rnam smin nad// gso dka' zin pa ngan pa ni// mkhar bzhi ri bo'i mthongs dang lnga// rgya mtsho gnyis dang ro dkyil brgyad// nags kyi gtsug
dang spu rigs bcu// thugs dkyil srid lte bcu gnyis pa// ri rab khung dang bcu gsum yin// tshang dang ma tshang mkhas pas brtag/ zin pa bzang ba'i rtags mtshan ni// sha 'phrigs rtsa 'phrigs za 'phrugs

dang// shu ba bas ldag skam mig dang// mig 'phul sna g.ya' me dbal ris// mgo 'khor sna khrag chu ser 'ong// ser ka gas shing rma rnying dang// rkang pa sbrid cing rtsa rnams khol// glal 'od rmyang 'dod snying

mi dga'// rkang sha mkhal na ngu snying 'dod// byad ni g.ya' shing tsha tshag byed// lus rnams 'khru zhing spro ba dang// ro stod rgyas shing gzer ba dang// sha mdangs bar na sha ro yod// mkhas pas brtags la gso

bar bya// don snying dag la zin pa ni// glo ba sna rdog zhom pa dang// glo bur sna yi gong rnams shor// dbugs thung khrag skyug glo rdol 'chi// snying la ro stod brgyangs shing na// spro thung mi dran smyo bar byed// mchin
pa lce la 'brum dmar yong// lce 'thon tha ma sha ror 'gyur// mkhal ma rkang bol skrang med 'dar// gzhogs g.yas drod chung yan lag zha// mtsher pa rna ba g.yas pa 'on// mchu skrangs kha skam byin pa
'dar// mkhris pas mchu gas lus po skrangs// byad skrangs mig dang lus mdog ser// gso bya legs nyes brtag pa ni// bems dang shin tu bems pa dang// dib pa shin tu dib pa dang// kha dog can dang kha
dog bral// 'khor lo drug la bzhugs pa dang// snying po bzhi la zhugs pa dang// rtse mo gsum la zin pa dang// nam mkha'i mthongs nas babs pa dang// rgya mtsho'i gting nas rdol pa dang// gnad la lcags

gzer thebs pa dang// nag po khro chu'i gzer thebs dang// kha dog lnga ru bstan pa dang// de dag rung dang mi rung brtag/ spang bar bya ba'i dmigs brtag pa// rgya mtsho chen po lung 'gyur zhing// chu bran mtha'
nas g.yos pa dang// gangs ri dkar por zhu gyur nas// ri bo'i sul la gas pa byung// glo ba'i gnad la thebs pa dang// stod kyi dang ka 'gags pa dang// rgyal po'i dkor mdzod bcom pa dang// rkun po
phugs su zhugs pa dang// gnye ma dag la zhugs pa dang// rgyal po'i pho brang btab pa dang// 'di dag mkhas pas spang bar bya// nad kyi smin lugs brtag pa ni// rus smin zha sgur gso bar
rung// lo mang lon nas gso bar dka'// sha la smin pa skya bo dang// dmar 'gyur ser 'dus 'tsho ba yin// chu ser nag po smin pa dang// tshogs dang rgyas par gyur na ngan// chu ba la zhugs gso dka'
dang// de yi sos rtags thub pa dang// dmangs rnams grong sprang 'khyams pa dang// tshigs bzhi mkhar nas phab pa dang// 'bras bu gnad nas thebs pa'o// de nas mig rtags rgyas par bshad// blta dus
gtor ma sbyin pa dang// bden bdar bskyed rdzogs bsgom par bya// byang chub sems kyis kun khyab bya// gdon btsan bar du kha bltas te// ba lu shug pa'i me bus te// mig la klu sman dud pas bdug/ mig

gi tha ma thur du bzlog/ gyen la bzlog ste g.yas g.yon bsgyur// ha re dag tu thub tshad sdad// mkhas pa dag gis legs par brtag/ mig la brtag pa rnam pa bzhi// 'grim rtsa'i brtag pa dang po ste// gnyis

pa klu rigs bzhi bo brtag/ gdol pa kun khyab brtag pa gsum// bzhi pa las kyi rnam smin no// 'grim rtsa'i brtags pa la bzhi ste// shar na yan lag rtsa dang ni// lhor ni srid pa'i rtsa yin la// de bzhin

nub na bad mkhris rtsa// byang na don snying rtsa yang gnas// yan lag rtsa zhes bstan pa yang// mig gi gra phug g.yas na 'char// nad gzhi'i rtsa la gram ma gram// rtsa bar byung na rtsa la gram// sked par byung na mgo
phyogs de// rtse mo grol ni sla ba yin// srid pa'i rtsa la lo grangs brtag/ mig gi ya lcibs dag nas 'char// nag thig gcig byung lo gcig lon// de bzhin nag thig re lo re// g.yas su rgyal po dam sri
g.yon// rbod gtong 'brel gzhi brtag par bya// bad mkhris gra phug g.yon nas 'char// 'di la gdon rnams yang bzung ste// mig sprin dkar nag mtshams su ni// rgyal rigs me tog 'di ltar

'char// mdung shing bkri 'dra rtse mo ni// sog khar byung ba rgyal rigs la// lag sor bkram 'dra byung na 'khor// rje rigs me tog dkar nag mtshams// klad khrag chu la pho ba 'dra// 'khor ni dmar ser mdog
tu yang// bram ze'i me tog dkar nag mtshams// ser pos khebs pa 'ong ba ste// g.yas pa gtso la g.yon byung 'khor// dmangs kyi me tog dkar po ste// nag po'i thig le khyab 'brum dngos// nag la rtsub pa

'khor du bshad// don snying rtsa yi rim pa yang// mig gi grwa phug 'og nas 'char// nad gzhi rgyas sam ma rgyas blta// gdon gzhan che na rtsa bar 'gyur// sked par byung na rtsub pa yin// rtse mor byung na phra ba
yin// klu rigs bzhi yi brtag pa ni// phyi dang nang gi phyogs su bshad// mig la rnam pa gnyis yin te// mig gi phyi dang mig gi nang// dang po phyi yi rtags brtag pa// dbyibs ni nag la 'brum
bu 'byung// de ni gdol bas nges par gzung// zur gsum song ba dmangs kyis so// dmar ser song na rje'u rigs// then dang chu 'dzag bram ze'i rigs// yo dang bzlog pa rgyal po'i rigs// de byung mig la
bab pa'i rtags// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du brtag/ las las gyur pa spang bar bya// mig gi nang nas bltas pa ni// lus kyi phyi nang mtshan nyid gsal// nad gdon kun kyang gsal bar ston// mig sprin

dkar la rtsa ris brtag/ rtsa ni g.yas nas zug gyur na// sha ro sha mtshan g.yas na yod// rtsa ris g.yon nas zug gyur na// sha ro sha mtshan g.yon na yod// ri rab rtse nas 'bab pa 'dra// ro stod yan lag nad

gzhi rgyas// rgya mtsho'i gting nas phyung skyes 'dra// sked pa man chad nad kyang rgyas// gang na gnas pa de ltar blta// mig sprin dag la rtsa ris ni// kha dog dkar po sprul 'khyus 'dra// rgyal rigs nad kyis zin
pa'i rtags// kha dog ser po nya gzugs 'dra// bram ze'i nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog dmar po sprul gyi gzugs// rje'u rigs nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog nag po sbal pa'i gzugs// dmangs
rigs nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog sngo nag sdig pa'i gzugs// gdol pa'i rigs kyis bzung ba'i rtags/ mgo dang yan lag lus po rdzogs// go rim bzhin du shes par bya// phyogs la brtag par bya

ba yang// pho g.yas mo ni g.yon nas brtag/ grwa phug gnyis ni shar nub gnyis// ya phebs ma phebs lho byang gnyis// gzhan rnams mtshams su shes par bya// ri mo'i rnam pa brtag pa ni// shar du rgyal rigs

ri mo dkar// dkar ser 'dra ba sprul pa yin// thig le nas 'bras zhing sa gnod// sog 'dra byu na du ras nas// nyung dkar 'dra byung gtad 'dre yin// bre 'dra byung na khang sa nas// mdung 'dra shing bcad sa
nas gnod// thig le dkar po gcig byung na// zhugs nas lo gcig len pa ste// de bzhin gnyis gsum bzhi lnga drug/ bdun nam brgyad thal mi mngon no// thig le shar du byung ba'i phyir// gzhogs ni g.yas

la thebs nas yod// sha ro kha dog dkar ser te// byin pa brla shar thebs na thub// mchan khung thebs na mi tub po// rje'u rigs nad kyis thebs pa'i rtags// mig gi lho yi phyogs su 'char// thig le ser po

sran leb tsam// rje'u rigs sprul pa dang bcas zin/ zhing sa nas ni gnod pa na// thig le ser po nas 'dra 'ong// sog pa 'dra na dur sa nas// nyung dkar gtad 'dre bre 'dra khang// mdung 'dra shing bcad sa
nas gnod// thig le ser po gcig byung na// de ni zhugs nas lo gcig lon// gnyis gsum bzhi la drug bdun dang// brad par thal nas mi mngon no// thig le lho yi phyogs byung
bas// gzhogs g.yon nad kyis thebs nas yod// sha ro khog pa skya bab ste// rkang mthil mi thub de min sla// bram zes zin rtags nub phyogs 'char// thig le dmar po nas sog bre// nyung dkar mdung 'dra

zhing sa dur// khang pa rbad 'dre shing bcad sa nas gnod// dmar po gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga// brgyad du thal nas de mi gsal// nub tu byung nas sha ro rgyab// kha dog 'bu ni so dmar 'dra// ltag khung byung

na mi thub ste// gzhan du byung na thub par gsungs// dmangs rigs zin rtags byang phyogs 'char// thig le sngon po byung ba na// zhing sa khang sa dur sa dang// rbad 'dre shing bcad chos mthun sbyar// lo

grangs thig le'i grangs la brtsi// brgyad du thal nas yal nas 'gro// byang du byung ba'i gnad ka yis// dpral ba snying gar thebs pa na// de ni thub ste gzhan mi thub// gdol pa mig gi 'bras bu 'char// thig

le nag po gcig 'char te// nas 'dra bre 'dra sog pa 'dra// nyung dkar mdung shing gnod pa'i rigs// lo grangs grangs dang sbyar te thal// 'bras bu dag la byung ba yis// rdo rje mi ldang de mi thub// mo chags mi

skye gdol nag po// lus gzhan dag la thebs na thub// sprul pa 'khor gyis zin pa na// shar lho rgyal rigs 'khor gyi rtags// sbrul dkar 'khyug 'dra glo la zin// glo 'tshubs mi bde sna zhom yong// lho nub

rje'u rigs 'khor gyi rtags// lcong mo mjug rdum snying la zin// snying na dran nyams brjed nas che// nub byang bram ze'i 'khor gyi rtags/ spal nag rab tu chas pa ni// rna ba mi gsal gzhogs na zhing// mkhal
ma rab tu na ba dang// byang shar dmangs rigs 'khor gyi rtags// sdig pa rwa brgyad 'dra ba 'char// mchin pa la zin khra snying 'dod// mchin nad dang ni mig mi gsal// gdol pa kun khyab rtags brtag
pa// mthong ba'i dug dang reg pa'i dug/ kha rlangs la sogs yod pa ste// gdol ba 'khor 'khol rtags rnams 'tshol// spyi rtags kun dang ldan par bshad// rnam par smin pa'i nad rtags ni// lus rnams

kun la nad rgyas pa// rgya mtsho chu gnyer 'khrugs pa 'dra// bar snang sprin gyis g.yogs pa 'dra// 'khor lo ral dang me tog nyams// nyi gdung ser bu mi bzod de// drag tu mchi ma 'dzag pa dang// mig gi

dbyibs kyang steng steng po// 'bras bu zhu bar gyur pa ni// snying ni rab tu zad pa'i rtags// rkun po phugs su zhugs pa yin// 'bras bu smin pa zhes bya ba// chu ser nag po rgyas pa yin// cis kyang mi phan rnam
smin las// gso ru mi rung spang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ gdug pa gsum gyi gnod pa brtag pa ste le'u bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze nad gso ba 'di gsungs so// dang por brtag par bya ba'i rdzas// mu zi gla rtsi shu dag nag/ gu gul dkar nag lnga snyoms te// grib bskams bsrubs ma de

rnams cha// rgya tsha ril ma tsam dang bcas// snod gtsang dri chu bar mar sbang// dri chu 'khor mi sman chu 'thung// khrag dang chu ser chu ngan gyi// mdog la brtag pa man ngag yin// yang ni shu dag dkar nag

gnyis// gla rtsi mu zi khral khrol rnams// bdun phul chu nang khu ba 'don// lto stong btang la zhag gnyis brtag/ sbrid dang na tsha med par brtag/ yang na ru rta dan rog pa// gnyis dang gsum ni chang du blug/ grub
gzhug btang la gos drod nyal// tsha grang nad bzhi gang yin brtag/ mdze nad tshabs chung chu ser ni// ma rgyas pa la lto bshal bya// byug pa sbang ma'i zan bsten la/ a bar gnyis dang dan rog

gsum// shu dag nag po lcum rtsa bsnyam// gu gul dkar nag zhib btags la// ma nu'i thang gis 'phul la gtang// mnan gzhel lcag dang dbyung ba dang// rjes gcod byas la lto sbyang ngo// mdze nad tshabs che

rtsa shal bya// sha ba pho mo sbrad sogs bya// phye ma pad+ma rdog po bcu// sdig srin rgya tshwa sug smail rnams// thun re cha bsnyam phye ma ni// lcam pa'i thang gis phul la gtang// lcag tu chab tsha mang du gtang// tsha dug yos

dug zug rngug zhom// yang na pad+me mar la 'dul// sdig srin sug smel thun re la// rgya tshwa lug ril pi ling bdun// glang mkhris thun gcig go bo'i brun// cha gsum tho rangs gtang bar bya// rjes ni tshod dang

sbyar la bcad// thang sbyor pad+ma nyi shu gcig/ sdig srin rgya tshwa sug smel rnams// lcam pa'i thang la bsdus la gtang// khrag 'joms dom mkhris chang sbyar bcas// chu ser rang gar 'bab tu gzhug/ mdze nad bco

brgyad 'joms pa'i stan// a bar rdog po nyi shu btab// btsan du sran ma nyi shu btab// dri chus 'dam btags mdog nag tu// gu gul nag po sha ril ces// bi bi ling ni nyi shu dang// nag 'tsher gla rtsi btsan
dug phyed// gi wang chu nas ril bu 'don// zhag lngar gnyis gnyis gsum sbyar gtang// de nas rgyun du ril bu dgu// zla ba 'phel 'grib bsnon 'bring sbyar// sman log a bar dri chus bcos// tshabs che gla

rtsi'i lca mda' yin// yang na gu gul nag po dang// grub thob dri chen ril bu las// yang na chu ser skems pa ni/ seng ldeng spyir bzhur khu ba gnyis// mu zi ser po gla rtsi dang// ba bla sbrang rtsi chu ser

skems// yang na chu ser 'don par bya// mu zi rgya tshil btsan dug dang// chos sman gu gul shu dag nag/ dri chen dri chu mi phag zhun// bsdus te bsku ba dug slong rdzas// dri chu gla rtsi byang ba dang// sbru

ma chu rtsas dbyung bar bya// btsan dug mu zi ldong ros dang// gu gul dri chu mi phag zhun// dug rnams sdud pa'i rdzas mchog yin// che chung 'don pa'i gnad du shes// yang na dri chen sbyor ba ni// mi khyi phag pa spyang

ki'i brun// rdza yi nang du dri chus mnan// tshig ma'i dud pas bdug pa dang// dwangs ma lto ru gtang ba dang// skyo mas gnas rnams bsrung bar bya// shu ba sha ro la sogs 'joms// klu rnams thul dang nad don

rtags// rdzas 'dis nges par byed pa yin/ yang na bdud rtsi drug sbyor ni// a bar ha lung nag po dang// gla rtsi gu gul nag po dang// pi pi ling dang gi hang gtang// 'di dus dri chu bsten par bya// sman nad mi

ldang gdon choms 'ju// rdza yi snod du dri chu bsags// dang po'i them bu 'bo bar bya// gong ma btsags la bar ba bdug gdu yang// lhag ma sna nas klad par drangs// byin rlabs yod pas gso bar bya// zhabs

kyi lhag ma skabs su don// yang na lag pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyir don khong bstud sna la drangs// 'dzu dang bde dang myur du 'byin// 'bras bu gsum dang phab tu sbyar// sbrang rtsi'i dri chu lcags kyi snod// ltor btung
snar brngub drug sbyor ni// yon tan thams cad mthun par bshad// ril bu lo dus bsten pa yis// ma sos rus la zhugs pa yin// sngon 'gro rtsa bshal gtang bar bya// dngos gzhi rus sbal pho mo'i rus// ru

rta phag rgod mche ba dang// rma bya'i sgro dang gi hang sngags// gla rtsi'i chu la ril bu bya// khye sus re re za bar bya// bdud rtsi ril bu za zhing bsrung// ril bu yun ring bsten byas kyang// lus kyi nad ro ma thon

na// nad dang gdon gyi ro 'don pa// byang ba sum cu btul byas nas/ rgya tshwa lug gi ril gyi tshad// sug sme thun gnyis mtsham dkar dang// tshwa la thun ni re re la// gu gul nag po mtheb rdog tsam// sdig pa

srin po thun re yin// zla gsum nang re nas phyed sman// rang gi dri chu bar bas 'phul// tshod dang sbyar la thun bskyed de// zas ngan mi za bsrung bar bya// sman sbyor rang nyams tshod dang bstun// 'di la sngon 'gro

rjes gcod med// nad dang gdon ro rtsa lam 'don// na tsha yod pa'i sha ro la'o// na tsha med pa'i sha ro la// de la sman gyis byug par bya// khab kyi sa gtsags la kha phru gdab// de gnyis byug rdzas rgya tshwa
