dang// rgyam tshwa ru rta byi tang ka/ gu gul dkar nag kha ru tshwa// mu zi dkar nag btsan dug dang// rgya tshil thar nu gla rtsi dang// nus pa can gyi dri chen rnams// dang por bsnyams la lde gur bya// dri chus bskus la
mar gyis byug/ rma rnying gso la mi sha dang// nya sha mi rkang lha ba can// glu mnye sbal ba'i tshil bu bcas// zho dang sbyar la lums su gzhug/ rnag dbyung btsan dug thal ba dang// mgron bu dngul

zangs thal ba lnga// ka ra chu rtsa dom mkhris kyi/ byug pa rma rnying nang du gzhug/ gso byed smin gyis tshe bsring ba// a bar skam thags 'dam thags bya// so ma ra tsa gi hang dang// thal kar rdo rje gla rtsi dang// gu

gul dkar nag seng ldeng khrag/ ril bu dgu pa rdzogs par za// myu du 'chi ba'ang tshe bsring nus// rnag mdze skems pa'i rin chen sman// snod ni rdza ma me thub nang// gser srang bzhi la sum cha gsum// lcags

phye dngul phye zho gnyis la// mu tig chang dang ba yi chu// zangs dang gser phye sum chas g.yogs// kha bcad sol mes btso bar bya// rbod rbod tas tas nem nem byed// thams cad zangs la thim gyur te// dngos

po mi mngon lcid kyis gsal// chu ser dkar po 'joms pa ni// seng ldeng khrag dang gu gul dkar// thal kar rdo rje so ma ra// zangs thal mu zi tsan dan dmar// mdzo mo shing rnams 'ju stobs sbyar// nag po

la ni sbrang rtsi sbyar// ril bu byas la gtang bar bya// mdze nad thams cad skem par byed// rdo rje bzhin du 'joms pa'o// shu ba glo bur byung ba la// chos shing re lcag krad rnying dang// dres ma sug pa sgong thog

dang// mu zi tshil chen rgya tshil dang// ra ru'i gzhob dang cod zhi'i thal// sgog skams tshwa dang pa yag dang// dud pa dmar nag byug par bya// sman gyi dam tshig bstan pa ni// tshwa dang bud med rul sum skyur// sngo

dang sgog phyogs chags pa spangs// me nyi lus ngag rtsol ba spang// 'phyags su mi gzhug sbrang rtsi bsten// spyod lam dam tshig bsrung ba gces// de nas ril bu'i tshod bzung ste// ril bu dgu las mang du
gtang// bde'am mi bde brtag par byed// yang na gcig la blta ba dang// yar bsnon mar 'phri tshod gzung bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ klu gnyan sa bdag
gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang chen pad+ma yis// sri'u gso dang mtshon cha bsrung// yul khams bsrung dang pra dbab dang// char pa dbab par bya ba dang// srog la bar bu bskor ba
dang// gdug pa klu la gtad pa dang// thog dang ser bas yul mkhar 'joms// 'gro ba dbang sdud 'byor pa 'phel// lha srin gdug pa nad bzlog bsrung// ngo mtshar sprul pa'i rol mo bshad// sri bu gso

bar gsungs pa yang// sngags dang rdzas kyis skye ba dang// mo gsham dag tu mi 'gyur dang// bus pa chags par gyur pa dang// lte ba bsgyur bar bya byed rnams// sbrum ma bu ni mi 'chor te// bcing grol lam ni
be par 'gyur// bgegs rnams bsad cing bsrung 'gyur ro// mtshon cha bsrung bar bya ba yang// shing shun 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// rgyab tu yi ge btseg mas bsrung// yul khams thun

sngags bsnyen pa dang// gta' ni bsdam par bya ba dang// sprin phung gtor nas 'brug kyang gzhil// klu la dam tshig bcol ba dang// thang la phab nas ri la bskyon// bdag gi thog lhung gzhan du bzlog/ lam
ni bstan par bya ba dang// dbus nas gta' bsdams gtor phud gzug/ sra 'bebs maN+Dal bya ba dang// pra brtan chas su gzhug par bya// mchod pas don rnams 'grub pa dang// sngags kyi bzlas pas dbab

pa dang// nyal nas rmi lam ston pa dang// rtag tu brtson par bya ba'o// sha za mo bsgrub bya ba dang// gtsang mar legs par gnas pa dang// mtshan mo nyal nas brtag pa dang// g.yo 'gul sngags dang chu la
dbab// gzhan la dbab bar bya ba'o// de nas pad+ma gar gyi dbang// gdod nas las kyi rnam par smin// 'byung ba'i rkyen dang gdon gyis gtses// sngon du las kyis mi 'brel ba// rang gi bu bsad rnam smin
'phog/ gzhan gyi chung 'tshe nad dkrug dang// sems can kun gyi bu la yang// gnod pa byas pas de mi phrad// pho mo ma ning rigs can dang// las dang bsod nams ma 'brel bas// bu dang bu mo chu ngur

nyams// dur khrod gnas nyams song ba'o// 'byung ba tsha grang 'thab pa yis// mi chags ma rungs byed pa dang// dper na me chu 'gal ba bzhin// lhan cig dag tu mi gnas so// pha ma grang ba che ba yis// sa
bon drod med gnyis 'dzom bas// dgun gyi 'khyags pa lta bur gyur// gal te chags chen bud med la// khyo mang bred dang na chung la// ma snyoms ches pas srid rtsa nyams// rang gnas 'byung ba rkyen dbang

gis// bus pa chags par mi 'gyur bas// 'byung ba'i dgra la 'dzem par bya// spyir na lha srin chung 'tshe'i gdon// mngal nas chags par mi byed dang// chags pa ma rungs pa ru byed// skyes nas de la rnam par
'tshe// gdon che rnams kyis gtses gyur pa// rgyal pos khyer na ngud mo byed/ bsen mos 'khru skyug sbyang ba dang// sa bdag skam nas 'gro 'gyur ba// rbad 'dre gdon bgegs bus pa'i gdon// kha zas mi

'phrod pa rnams// mi yi 'o ma rengs pa 'thung// ma zhu bo ba'i me drod nyams/ nyams pas brang mchin 'bab gyur pas// pad+ma dbang chen ma yin pa// 'di la skyabs pa'i lha gzhan med// 'di la skyabs su 'gro

bar bya// de nas dbang mchog rta yi sku/ pu tra myu gu thon gyur pa// 'gro ba bskyab par bya bas na// skyabs pa chen pos rab tu gsungs// A+oM pad+mA r+g+ha kr-i ta na mo a t+yid t+ya/ ka ra ta ti d+hi pa ki bi ti/ na ba sha tsha che
ge la skye bar gyur cig swA hA// nA ga ge sar sa bon nad// gla gor zho sha rnam pa gnyis// sbrang rtsis sprus pa 'o mar sbyar// blud de 'bras dang lhan cig zos// bud med mo gsham yin gyur

kyang// de la bu ni skye bar 'gyur// rgya tshwa rgyam tshwa thal tshwa dang// shing tshwa kha ru tshwa dang ni// ka ra sbrang rtsi mar sbyar nas// zla mtshan byung nas khrus byas pa'i// bud med la ni blud pa na// mo gsham la yang bu

skye'o// a sho kan+d+ha'i rtsa ba dang// 'o ma srang ni nyi shu brgyad// bskol nas mar dang lhan cig blud// nges par mo gsham bu yang skye// bus pa chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas lte ba bsgyur bya na// bdag nyid

bsgom par bya ba ni// khro bo ldeng rje smug po'i sku// shin tu che ba 'gying bag can// shel gyi 'khor ba 'dom gang thogs// yum ni lha mo dkar mo nyid// g.yu yi smin ma can du bsgom// pho nyal g.yas la mo nyal

g.yon// bud med lto ba'i shar lho nub// gang du gsang ba'i sngags gdab bya// A+oM ra ca a pa nA ya swA hA/ A+oM tra naa panA ya swA hA/ A+oM rA tsa dza ya pa nA ya swA hA/ A+oM a kA la mr-itU a pa nA ya swA hA/ lan ni bdun

bdun gdab par bya// lte ba'i steng gi g.yas su bskor// sbrum ma bu ni mi 'chor phyir// tshon skud lnga la sngags btab nas// bud med sked par dkris pa yang// nub re la ni brgya brgya bzlas// A+oM kaM ka ma la ma

sdom// tri tri ma la ma sdom// shon ma lam sdom// laM khaM raM yaM tiSh+Tha lhan// sbrum mar gyur pa lam bde'i phyir// bcings pa dag la grol byed na// e na ban ni kwa ka gang gti/ ra mo pa tsa ta/ pi pa to ro te pa ni/ yaM

wa shad+h+ya b+ha ba to gor wa ni// lan bdun mngon par sngags pa yi// chu ni khyor ba gang yong ba// pho nyas sbrum ma la blud na// bu ni bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// lto ba 'gyur zhing bu chags pa dang// bde bar sbrum

ma'i bu skye ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bgegs rnams bsad cing bsrung// dur khrod lha mos bsrung ba dang// skyob par byed pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// rtag tu ma yis bzlas par bya// a ma ba sa pA kaM ba su

jo mo phe DI du ba su/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// gong du bsnyen pa ma byas byang// rtag tu ma yis 'di bzlas na// 'jigs pa thams cad 'geg par byed// rdo rje dri chus thig le bya// phyir rgol thams cad
rmongs par byed// log par phyogs par ldang bar byed// bcings pas bzlas na bcings ba grol// sma ba 'dod na me 'jigs thob// sri'u gso ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta yi rgyal po yis// mtshon cha

bsrung bar bya ba gsungs// shing shun dag la bri ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa// mtshal gyi rtsi bas la 'bru re bri// dbus su gang bsrung ming dang rus// A+oM ta na yan te nyags phaT/ sil sil phaT

swA hA/ de yi rgyab tu sngags 'di ni// yi ge brtsegs mar bri bar bya// A+oM ra tsa ya bas gan d+ha ha ni swA hA// g.yas su yungs kar stong du bzlas// g.yon du gla rtsi stong du bzlas// dbus su 'khor lo
rnam par gnas// le brgan dar du legs bris nas// tshal bu rta yi rngams bcings// skyes pa'i dbung g.yas bud med g.yon// dmag dpung dkrug kyang thub par 'gyur// mtshon cha bsrung bar 'dod pa'i ting

nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang gi rgyal po dpal// yul khams bsrung bar bya ba'i nang// nyung dkar nyung nag thal chen dang// drag po'i rdzas la bzlas pa bya/ phaT tsa gi tsig gi g+hu he mu le/ sha sha g+hu g+hu he he pri ri hu

yu hu yu/ yu nan/ phur tsi te nan/ badzra phur tsi te nan/ rad na phur tsi te nan/ rad na phur tsi te nan/ ma hA phur tsi ti nan/ big nan/ pu tsi te nan/ dar po phur pa bcu byas la// sngags bri bzlas nyung thum po
gdags// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus rnams su// mtho brtsig gta' yang bsdam par bya// de nas sprin gor 'bru gzhil nas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phyag rgya bcas// rtar mgrin rgyal po'i nga rgyal

gyis// dmigs nas sngags ni gdab par bya// A+oM nA ga she du ma pa she/ ni ti tiSh+ta sa ma ya shAkya hU~M phaT/ sdigs pa'i mdzub mos gtor bar bya// ting 'dzin bsam pa brtan pos bshig/ de nas klu la dam rtsal

ba// gsang ba'i sngags kyis gdab par bya// oM ta ki ca lis ma ya/ sa la ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM nA ga sa dz+wa ti ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM ku le mA mA sha sha ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM ku ti di ku ti bi ri ti u yu u yu/ i ri ti swA hA/ A+oM dung dung

hu sa te kha rang rgyal rtse// sa man nyungs rtse nan gyis gnon swA hA// klu rnams rta yi rgyal po yi// spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas pas// dam las mi 'di bsam gtan las// 'das na 'tshig byed sngags yin

no// thang la 'bab na ri la bskyon// sdigs mdzub sha mi sna bug nas// bzung nas 'phang bar bya ba yang// bsam gtan sngar gyi dgongs pas bya// A+oM b+ha ri sha ya shu shu mu mu ti ti/ bi ri ti/ hu yu hu yu hU~M phaT/

bdag gi thog tu lhung gyur na// gnam chu nyid la sngags te gtor// gnam sa stong bzlog dgongs pa bya// khro bo chen po'i gar gyis bzlog/ A+oM badzra ga ru Da ya swA hA/ b+ha gi tsit+ta bi tsa te/ shu lu phu shu lu gu lu/ sha

sha shu shu ti ti dz+wa la ti/ hu ya hu ya/ hu ru hu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ ti swA hA/ phyag gi mthil du bya khyung 'gyed// klu yi rigs rnams thams cad kun// ma lus pa ni gtan nas 'joms// gnyan po gnyis su gyur

pa'o// lam bstan ri sna yul 'jom du// lha srin 'byung po lo za rnams// rang rang gnas su bsgyur bya ba// mdzes pa'i sa phyogs nyid du bstan// A+oM na mo bud+ha ya/ na mo su ru su ru ki li mi li ye swA hA/ pa baM
karma ri pa/ e the'u the tha ku hU~M phaT/ rdo ba sngon po rab mdzes la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris pa la// mtshams pa'i rdo rje phyed pas mtshan// gcig ni ba blas bri bar bya// gcig ni yung bas bri
bar bya// 'og mthil bzhag la rdo sgrom ste// 'khor lo kha sbyar khong seng nang// bsrung pa'i thun rnams rab blugs nas// dbus kyi phur pa gnyis dang bcas// yul gyi dbus su sbas gyur na// chu
'khyags thams cad gcod par byed// rnal 'byor pa yis brtson par 'bad// yul khams thams cad srung bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta yi rgyal po mchog/ gang kyi dbang phyug khams gsum

dbang// gtsang ma'i gnas su nyer 'dug nas// maN+Dal rab tu mdzes pa la// dri dang me tog ldan par bya// bum pa dri yis rab bkang nas// sngags nas me long khrus byas nas// shin tu sbyangs pa'i ras gyon

nas// tsan+dan dkar pos khyugs byas nas// me tog zhim pos brgyad pa yi// khye'u bu mo dbang du bzhag/ de ni khyim gyi chos ma gos// lha bu legs ldan dri med la// mchod pa gtsang ma mang pos mchod// ji ltar

bsam pa dgos pa rnams// mi bslu bar ni ston par byed// lta bu dri med zla ba yis// ston byed sbags ni bzlas par bya// A+oM tad+ya thA/ sar sar/ se re se re/ so ro so ro/ mi ro man ta/ ta pra ti ka sha a be sha

a be sha she la sha ku ta su tA ya na mo// bdag gi dgos pa'i bsam pa la// bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don// da ge dang mi dge gang yin pa// de kun kho na nyid du smra// dgong ga rang gi mgo lag bkrus// byi

dor byas pa'i maN+Dal la// lha bu legs ldan dri med de// mchod pa chen po byas pa ni// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas de// mi smra ba ni thub par nyal// ji ltar bsam pa'i rmi lam ston// drag tu bzlas

brjod byas nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa yis// dngos po rnams ni gtam du smra// sha za mo ni bsgrub pa na// pa ru ra yi shing dang ni// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung 'dug/ 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas brjod

bya// mi smra thub pas dngos grub myur// 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa ni// gtam rnams dag la smra bar byed// A+oM sha ba na pi sha tsi ni mu na DI swA hA// gzhan yang legs par khrus byas te// ras gtsang gyon nas

dgon par gnas// khri phrag gcig tu bzlas brjod bya// phyis kyang de ni dngos grub 'gyur// mtshan mo spos la gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad ni mngon par bzlas// rang gi gdong pa rkang ba la/ spos dang

mar sbyar bsku byug bya// nyal nas bdag la rmi lam du// dge dang mi dge'i gtam smra'o// g.yo zhing skul byed bsgrub pa ni// dgon par khrus byas gtsang mar gnas// A+oM na maHsatwA nAM/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA bo d+hi sa twA

nA na/ tad+ya thA/ A+oM tsa le tsu le dun ti ma hA wa t+yis tayawa te ni/ ka thA ka thA/ ya ya swA hA/ khri phrag gcig tu bzlas byas nas// me long ngam ni ral gri'am// mar me'am zhi chu yi snod// gang du

sngags pas gtam ma smra'o// chu la brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// sngags nas kha gdong bkrus nas ni// thub pa mnyam nas rmi lam du// dge dang mi dge gtam smra'o// bra mtho cho ga thams cad las// gzhan la 'bebs

par 'dod pa na// khye'u bu mo thams cad la// khrus dang gtsang sbras dbab par bya// rang nyid 'bebs na nyal bar rmi// dge dang mi dge'i gtam smra bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta yi rgyal po
mchog/ gar dbang char 'bebs sbyar sgro bas// ngo mtshar gru char dbab pa ni// khams gsum sa yi don du gsungs// rdzas byas bsgom nas bzlas pa bya// dkyil 'khor gsum du char pa 'bebs// gtsang ma'i
gnas su phyag dar byas// mda' gang gru bzhi rnam lngas byug/ klu yod gnas nas chu blangs te// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// rams rngog bum pa'i nang du blugs// sbal khog thod pa kha sbub

nas// sbal gzugs gtor mas gang bar bya// dkar dmar klu sman pa'o dang// bag zan ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad// ting 'dzin pad+ma dbang gi sku// thugs kar phyag na rdo rje spyi bor khyung// bum tsho sbal khog

gzhal yas khang/ klu rgyal gtor ma ri rab nas// dam tshig ye shes klu bskul nas// mtsho rlangs sprin char 'dod par 'phel// ril bu re la brgya rtsa brgyad// gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas par bya// A+oM nA ga

gug hU~M/ nA ga le le/ dum pa le le/ nA ga rA tsa hU~M phaT// sha chang sgog btsong spang ba dang// dkar gsum za ba klu yi dam// yi dam klu dang 'byung po la// gtor ma rnam gsum gtang bar bya// gtsang mar gnas

bca' chu gtor gtang// klu rnams dgyes pa'i chos yang 'don// de nas char ba dbab par bya// 'bebs par 'dod na sngags 'di gdags// A+oM g+hi li g+hi li/ b+ha ra sha yA b+ha ra sha yA/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ phaT

phaT phaT swA hA/ hU~M hU~M sab sab/ hU~M hU~M sib sib/ de la bzlas pa byas nas su// klu rnams mnas bsgag sngags 'di bzlas// A+o tsa ta tsa ta/ bi tsa ta ga la ta ga la ta/ sa tsa ra tsi ta swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas par

byas nas ni// klu yi gtor ma sngags 'dis dbul// A+oM nA ga rA tsa swA hA/ oM nA' ga hU~M swA hA/ A+oM nA ga b+ha na yak+Sha ra b+ha na ha ra ha ra hU/ kha kha ba liM ta hU~M phaT/ A+oM nan du nA' ga rA tsa ya/ ba

liM ta kha kha khA hi/ khA hi ba liM ta hU~M phaT// drag por 'dod dam 'jam bor 'dod// bzlas pa drag 'jam bzlas par bya// 'brug dang bcas par dbab 'dod na// A+oM ta shi mu ki tsi/ she sa tsha pa li hU~M phaT/ na mo b+ha ga wa te rat+na ya/ ta thA
a ne/ li bi shi ta/ be ra be ra daM daM thibs swA hA/ de ni 'brug bskul ba'i sngags yin pas// me 'brug b+h+ring gi ri ti dang// rlung 'brug ka la sha yi sgrogs// gal te phebs par ma gyur na// klu
gnas chu mig gnas phyin nas// gcig ni ku la gtor ma 'bul// gcig ni ril bu sngags bzlas shing// gsum gsum bzhi bzhi chu mig brdeg/ khams gsum dbang sdud sngags 'di dgas/ thum thum chem

chem badzra kha phyir phaT// gal te rlung gis sprin gtor nas// char pa 'ong bar ma gyur na// bum pa ri rab gzhal yas khang// bum par rlung zed kun tshud bsam// oM ti ti ti la na na/ char ya chur ya ni tis ta
lhan// rdo rje rgya gram kha bcad bsam// rlung zhi char pa 'bebs par byed// des kyang ma phebs sbogs chog ni// dkar gtor sngags bzlas chu mig sbubs// A+oM nAg a li mi li shi su bas dun swA hA/ sngags
rnams dril la chu mig bsub// zhi bas spogs chog dbab pa'o// thod ngan sna tshogs sngo khu dang// sha sna bsres la sngags thabs bsub// drag por dbab par bya'o// A+oM nA ga chu bi nA ga shar shar phob
phob// des ni gdon mi za bar 'bebs// ngo mtshar gru char 'bebs 'dod na// seng ldeng glang ma'i phur pa la// rta mgrin bskyed bu gu gul 'dug/ char 'bebs sngags bris las byas nas// gang 'dod klu yi

gnas su gdab// me long rten la ril bu brdog/ mi 'bebs phyogs su me long rgyab// oM g+hi li pa ri sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho// phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes klu'i tshogs la zhi ba dang drag pos char yongs su zhus
nas dbab pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan rta yi mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo lcam dral gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa la// par bu nag po'i cho ga gsungs// sngon 'gro dkyil 'khor ling+ga
dang// par bu rtsa ba'i drag sngags dang// mgon po 'bod cing dgra bo dgug/ ma mgon rbad dang gsang las bya// rtags byung las mjug bsdu ba'o// dang por dben pa'i gnas song nas// gza' skar phur

bu lag pa la// spang skong bshags dang chu gtor dang// 'jig rten lha 'dre ma nyes brdar// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi stegs bu'i steng// de dbus gru gsum brus pa'i nang// dgra bo'i ming rus khrag chen bri// de
mtha' sngags kyis bskor bar bya// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa yi// par bu nang du sngags bris la// phyi rol khrag chen btsan dug dang// ro sol byug la 'brug khung bcad// gru gsum me ri rtsang dmar

bskor// ling+ga'i tha ma bskor ba dang// par bu'i nang du bri ba'i sngags// A+oM pa Ni ru kritab+hi shi do ri nan/ rak+ta te dzo ni dza ya na/ sarba nin ro ti ni ba ya nan// sngags de bri bar bya ba'o// de nas phyi yi srung ma
yang// tshangs pa brgya byin mgon po rnams// chu gtor rgyun mi chad par mchod// dgra bo'i bdun rgyud gcad pa'i phyir// ma nyes dbang gzug gtad bcol bya// sla nga'i nang du me yi ni// sha khrag

snying gis gtor ma bya/ sngags 'di zhag gcig bzlas te 'bod// ma mgon gnyis la bstab par bya// A+oM shrI ma hA kA la ru si ni ru ya bi ra shis/ rag mo tri ki ni khA hi ba liM hU~M/ mgon nag bang dang thod pa

bsnams// lha mo ral gri thod pa nag/ rta dang drel nag zhon pa 'bod// sha khrag gtor ma rgyun du sbyin// A+oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du bo ni gu Na hri da hU~M/ A+oM ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me hU~M b+h+yo dza dza/ bzlas pa 'di ni

rgyun du drangs// de nas dgra srog snying po brangs// dgra bo nr-i sha ru si ru tri A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ khri bzlas nyung dkar lag tu thogs// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing phyogs bzhi ru// zhing lpags g.yab mos 'dul bar

bya// mgon po lha mo rbad cing bskul// mgon nag rbad la nyung dkar brab// A+oM ma hA kA la kro ta rU pa rmugs// nag po nr-i thums yam b+h+yo// ha srog chums// rbad ni sa ba nr-i thum thum rbad rbad/ nyi ma zlos te

mgon po rbad/ A+oM ru ru nag mo yak+sha te tsa snying thum ril/ kha thums sha rbad/ thum ril rbad/ shas ta ti kho tri ma ma thum yaM ril gaM bu naM thun/ yan shan rbad rbad// nyung nag sngags la lha mo rbad// skabs su dgra

srog snying po drangs// yungs kar nyung nag ske tshe la// sngags nas ming gzugs dag la brab// mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// snying dang lus sems dbye bar bya// A+oM tsag shu ti liM yaM 'bu ni thum rbad/ A+oM shu ru ki ma

pu ti yaM trug thum kha rbad/ oM mang kha ro la kro to bin du ma yaM thum rbad/ A+oM shan taM dun tig sha pi ru tis ma thum rbad/ A+oM b+hi ri gu ru ni rag ku tha yaM thum rbad/ ni Di ta tsa ti thims sa ma ya hur b+har yaM thum rbad/

A+oM tang ku re mar ya yug ti shig trig mun thum rbad// stong stong bzlas shing stong tshigs mchod// mgon po lha mo bskul zhing rbad// dgra srog drangs la zhing lpags brdul// zla phyed zhag dgu zhag bdun
gyis// bar bu tsag tsag chom chom yong// slar yang rbad sngags bzlas shing brdeg/ de nas ming gzugs gtor mar bcug/ byang shar mtshams su gtang bar bya// de ni gang gis byas pa des// phyag na rdo rje
lus srog 'byed// sangs rgyas bstan 'jig smos ci dgos/ dpal mgon po dang lha mos sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i dgra srog 'bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rta'i rgyal pos/
klu bdun nag po bskul ba'i las// gnyen po bsgrub cing klu bdud 'bod// rbad phyi bsgrub dang gsang phyir gtad// zlog thebs 'byams sogs man ngag rnams// ma nor sngags 'chang rnams la bshad// dang

por pad+ma dbang gi lha// rta gdong steng na bya khyung gnas// khyung sngags rta la btags nas bzlas// klu gnyan sa bdag gnyen por che// oM ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT/ de nas dben pa'i gnas phyin

la// sbal nag lto bar ling+ga la// bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor byas nas// bar ma rbad dang tha mar 'bod// sbrul dang sdig pas mu khyud bskor// klu bdud nag po 'bod par byed// A+oM nA du na hi li nA ga

'dus// 'bod pas klu rtags mang po 'byung// de nas rbad sngags 'bum du bya// a shing nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga kro tI shwa rI ya tri shaM rbad bu/ ku rak+sha tis tsa pa tsa lam bam/ sha truM mA ra Na dza dza hU~M/ klu bdud

nag por dgra la rbad/ bsad sngags 'di la khri yis 'grub// nag po'i tsi tsa rgyas/ trag thum snying la gul gul/ myag myag rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan dgra bo'i srog la shan/ thur thur dgra bo'i tsit+ta sod swA hA/
rgyal rigs bram ze dmangs rigs gdol// de nas gtad pa bya ba yin// byang bltas byang shar 'khyil lkugs gtad// dmangs rigs gdol ba'i klu la gtad// sngon thog sbyor bas ldog pa la// thug phrad

gtad dus 'gro rjes byibs// khyung sngags rma bya rus sbal dang// rin chen lnga khri shA ri ram// sbyor ba steng 'og yi ge bsnyams// ma 'dresaming dang dgra rdzas mchog/ thugs phrad gtong bar kha ru dang// rtsi sman
byug dang dri mi gtang// rlangs pa ma shor cho mi brjod// khyung ngam rta mgrin bsal ba yis// 'khor lo gtad la pho brang gdab// mi blta lam bcad rjes bsub bskor// gnas su sbos kyi glang po bdug/ dgra
bsad ldog dbyung sngon ma bri// 'byung ba kha bsgyur gser dang sbrag/ thebs na klu la gtang rag gtang// klu la rin chen byin par bya/ 'byams na 'gugs par bya ba yang// chu mig kun tu gtad dmag

drang// 'gor bas spogs pa'i cho ga yang/ bskyar nas gtang bar bya ba'o// stong nyid blta ba rgyab tu gzhag/ yi dam lha yi sku dang 'grogs// gsang sngags chu bo rgyun mi gcad// rdzas rnams lus dang 'bral mi

bya// sangs rgyas bstan srung rnal 'byor pa// pha tshan chen po dgra langs na// rtsa rgyud bcad par bya ba yin// gti mug klu yi ngan gtad kyis// dgra bo pha tshan can brlag par byed pa sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung
bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rje btsun bcom ldan 'das// dbang gi thog ser dbab par gsungs// skyes bus gzhu ni khengs par 'gengs// mda'i 'phang gnas su skyol bar bya// mde'us gnad la
'bigs bar byed// tshig chad song dam// 'dod pa 'grub nas gtang rag gtang// dus su ngar yang gdags par bya// ting 'dzin gsal gtsang rnal 'byor pa// dben gnas gnyen por dbang btsug la// dkyil
'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su pad+ma rta mgrin sku// bka' sdod rtsibs bzhi gdong mo bzhi// hrIHyig ma ra tsa sha las// stag dred ba glang chu srin bskyed// stag dom glang nya snying khrag

bcas// ra khyi bya mi snying khrag rten// snel gri'i thod par khrag dug kun// nyung dkar lha phral sngags kyis brab// oM rag mo rag mo snying tsa la b+h+yo// A+oM phag mo yag mo dgu bo'i snying la b+h+yo// A+oM tsab mo tsab

mo// khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo// A+oM rag mo rag mo snying kha rag mo la b+h+yo/ de bskyed drang bstim gtor ma dang// rak+ta sman gyis mchod pa bya// thun la rgyu rtsal bsnyen pas 'bod// A+oM badzra lang ting lang ting bra ma ya

dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A+oM badzra lam b+hA+o d+ha/ a shu me badzra sun spri hU~M dza/ A+oM ga trag mi dza badzra yak+sha kring kring dz+wa la raM dza/ A+oM ki liM spri ka li ho ba ya hU~M dza/ ming sring grogs mdza' btsas ma rnga// rmos byed yur ma yur ba

dang// chu chen 'khyags pa ri nyil snang// thog ser 'brug sgra grub pa yin// de ni chu ril sngags ni bya// oM rag mo rag mo ru ru/ tsa ba snying kha rag g+hu sid na ma shag mu shag mu sham phye phroM hril/ dur phroM/ dkar

phroM/ shu tri phroM/ yug ti smin/ sha ra sha la de drag tu phob// rtags dang mtshan ma nang du gsal// phyi rtags dngos su 'bab cing drag/ de nas dbab par bya ba ni// A+oM ma ma rak+sha 'da' na thun thun phroM hril/ ma ma

shig shig ru tra nan/ pu rtse pu rtse phroM hril/ ma ma ru rta nan/ b+h+yo dza mun dza rbud thum/ thum thun b+h+yo/ phroM hril hril phaT/ dgra bo'i lo thog snar mo mA ra ya phaT phaT/ dbus kyi thod pa 'ong dkyil du// shar thod yul

gyi lha la gnan// nub thod klu gnyan sa bdag la// lho ni dam rdzas ri sked la// byang ni thun rdzas ri rtser sba// thod pa khrag lam 'brel bar bya// phebs nas gta' dbyung gtang rag gtang// gtor tshogs

mchod par bya ba'o// kun tu thun kha gso ba dang// dgos pa'i dus na dpa' bo yi// ral gri phyung rgyag lus la 'chang// bstan pa tsam gyis gzhan 'pham mo// nga rgyal thog ser lo 'bras rlag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
to// de nas rje btsun dbang gi rtas// dbang 'dus 'byor pa spel ba gsungs// bsgom dang sngags bzlas kun 'grub pa'i// mgon po gnod 'dzin yang dag bshad// stong pa'i ngang las dzaM yig las// mgon
po gnod 'dzin dmar po'i sku// g.yas pa gser mdog a ru ra// g.yon pa ne'u le'i rkyal bu 'dzin// nor rgyun dmar mo rin chen snye// bsgom nas gtor ma chu sbyin dbul// de yi gsang sngags rnam par

brjod// A+oM dzUM swA hA/ A+oM bi tsi kuN+Da li in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ A+oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya pi tsi kuN+Da li ba su d+ha ri b+h+rUM rat+na sid+d+hi ba su puSh+ting ku ru swA hA/ chu yi lhag ma phyugs la blud// gtor phud nas kyi nang du
gzhug/ longs spyod rin chen char pa 'bebs// nor bu bum bzang bang mdzod ldan// dbul ba yongs su sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta mchog phrag dog ches// 'khor lo tsha tsha gsang

sngags nyung dkar bzlog/ rtsibs brgyad sde brgyad lta ba la// 'dod pa'i ming gzugs sngags dang bcas// tsha tsha dkar nag zhabs sprad ste// dkar po rang nyid nag po gzhan// A+oM ya ma rA dza hUM b+ha ta ya ma ma

rag mo long kab+ha sha ya nA ga ra tsa ha hU~M bzlog kha shar ling baM tan sad// rak+sha g+h+ri pa mu khe he ra sad/ yak+sha gri ba la char sad/ pra ma ya ru tra sad/ rA hu la sarba duSh+ta na sad/ oM AHhU~M/ saM b+ha ra mu ta ka ra hU~M hU~M
phaT phaT/ nyung dkar sngags te brab par bya// tsha tsha dkar nag gi ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen spyi dril rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ thun mong dngos grub las tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum

pa'o//// de dag ji ltar bgrod gyur pa// tshogs lam dang po'i 'jig rten pa// phyi dbyibs nang sngags gsang ba dbang// mthar thug rlung du bstan pa'o// yang dag spongs bzhi pad+ma can// rtsa mi rlung lnga

lus ngag yid// rlung sems 'dus pa'i bde bar brgyal// stong pa dgrar langs dran pa bzhi// lus dang ngag dang sngags dang ni// stong pa 'ba' zhig dran par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi pa'i rlung// chu rlung me

rlung rlung gi rlung// sbyor lam drod dang rtse mo la// drod ni chung ngu 'bring dang che// rtse mo phyi nang rnam pa gnyis// dbang po lnga ni rtsa ba'i rlung// gyen rgyu mthur sel me dang mnyam// srog 'dzin khyab par byed pa'i

rlung// gzod cig dbu mar rlung sems 'dus// chos mchog 'khor 'das tshogs gnyis rdzogs// stobs lnga yan lag rlung lnga nyid// rgyu ba rab tu rgyu ba dang// mngon par rgyu dang yang dag rgyu// shin tu rgyu ba rnam
lnga yin// de nas 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// mthong bsgom mthar phyin rnam pa gsum// 'khor lo bzhi dang srog shing gsum// byang chub yan lag bdun du rigs// bsgom lam rnam shes tshogs brgyad
po// kun gzhi yid dang nyon mongs yid// mig dang sna dang rna ba lce// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid// mthar lam rtsa dang yi ge dang// bdud rtsi rlung gi 'gros bzhir thim// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa
dang// bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa dang// bdun pa brgyad pa dgu pa dang// bcu pa bcu gcig bcu gnyis la// bcu gsum bgrod pa'i sa rnams ni// phyi rtags bdud 'dul dral ba dang// nang brtags phyi nang rlung
'gags pas// de kho na nyid rtags rnams 'char// mthong dang 'gyed dang 'byed 'chad ston// rdzu 'phrul sa la rim par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas// lam lnga sa bcu rdzogs pa rnams// 'jig rten drug tu
gsal bar gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen gsang ba khro bo 'dus pa// pad+ma gsang ba rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ sa lam rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnal 'byor pa'i lam grub pa la gnas pa 'di gsungs so// rnam par smin pa khyung seng 'dra// tshe la dbang ba nyi zla 'dra// phyag rgya chen po lha sku 'dra// lhun gyis grub pa gnyid sad

'dra// dang po sar ni chud pa dang// sa la gnas pa thob pa'o// nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam gyur pas// rang gi srog la dbang thob 'gyur// rang gi yi dam gsal gyur pa// rtsa dang yi ge bdud rtsi rlung// rnam par
gnas pa chos kyi nyi// legs par sad pas lus 'dzin 'gyur// thos bsam bsgom la rab gnas pa// lta ba ting 'dzin dbang na gsal// sprul pa'i sku las chos kyang nyan// lha mi'i lus su gnas par

ston// longs spyod sku yi 'khor 'dus pas// gsang ba rgyud kyi 'gro ba mdzad// chos kyi sku la rab gnas pas// myong la ma reg rgyal ba drug/ ces gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril pad+ma dbang chen
gsang ba rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ rig 'dzin gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas khro rgyal rta mgrin ni// ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs 'di gsungs so// sems kyi rnal 'byor thob pa yis// yan
lag ces su bstan pa yang// so sor spang dang bsam gtan dang// dbugs dgag stong dang gzung ba dang// rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug ces bya// so sor spong ba sdom la
gnas// dngos po gzhan dgag spang bar bya// de yi ming grangs bcas pa ni// so sor spang ba zhes su 'dod// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ni// ji ltar tshul tsam rnam dag pa// 'dod pa'i g.yeng ba med byed
cing// 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pa yis// rtag tu dbang po sdom pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu yin ltar// so sor spang ba zhes bya 'di// yid dang dbang po bsgoms nas ni// rnam par shes pa skye ba

kun// thams cad skyon du byas nas ni// spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin la// dngos por bltas te mtshan ma yi// rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin la// spyod yul cir snang thams cad kun// rtag tu rang gi lha nyid

du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing// 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang// ting nge 'dzin ni ma

zin pa// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor spyod ces bya// de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur pa
spang// so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa dang// sdig
to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum la yul du bya// de la

sku yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang yan lag gis// pad+ma dbang chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams

grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul du dmigs// de la gsung gi gsang ba ni// sgra dang sgra min rnam bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung// lha yi thugs la ljags steng

du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang// dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang// de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam
gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas pa ni// bsam gtan thar pa ster bar byed// ngag gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i

rgyur 'gyur ro// de la thugs kyi gsang ba ni// thugs kar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa
yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba gsum dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum gyis thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su
dag pa yi// lha rnams don dang rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag rnam pa lnga// rtog dpyod gnyis dang dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par

byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed pa ni// de nyid la ni blo nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing// de yi don dang
bcas pa la// zhib tu dpyod pa yang nas yang// spyod par byed cing 'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya ba ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan las// thob pas gsang ba gsum po yi// 'dra snang rnam par

'byung gyur te// de'i tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don nyid ni// myong bas thun mong ma yin pa'i// dga' ba rlabs po cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya ba ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa
na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des ni nyams su myong 'gyur ro// de la sems rtse gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus 'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang// gnyis su snang bar mi
skye ste// rang rig tsam du 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing

gtang bar bya// bslab thabs nad du zung ba dang// mtshan ma sngags dang phyi nang rtags// rnal 'byor pa la snang gyur bas// shin tu bslab par bya ba gces// de la ji ltar bslab pa'i thabs// pho rlung mo rlung ma

ning rlung// rnam pa de gsum bslab pa dang// phyir la gtad dang nang du 'jug/ khong du gnas la bslab pa dang// sa rlung chu rlung me rlung dang// rlung gi rlung la bslab pa dang// bslab pa'i go yang du mar
snang// ji ltar bslab kyang 'gal ba med// gdul bya'i rnam rtog bsam yas kyang// de snyed 'dul thabs sgo rnams spros// don du mi 'gyur gcig ma gsungs// de nas sems kyi rtog 'dul zhing// dbugs
zhi brtan par gyur pa dang// rtogs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir// gcig tu ma nges rgyu ba'i dbugs// nang du gzugs la bslab par bya// de nas yang ni dbugs zin te// sems kyang shin tu zhi bar

'gyur// brtan pa thob par gyur pas ni// mtshan ma rnam lnga 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po smig rgyu 'dra ba dang// gnyis pa la ni du ba'i tshul// gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra// bzhi pa mar me bzhin du 'bar// lnga

pa rtags su snang ba ni// sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin// de yi rtags ni phyi nang gnyis// phyi la nyin dang mtshan mor snang// de la phyi rtags bya ba ni// dbugs kyang nang du zin gyur na// phyi rol mdun gyi nam
mkha' la// rmi lam du ni 'od snang 'gyur// dang por dbugs ni brtan zin na// mkha' la yun ring brtan bltas te// 'od snang ba yi snga ltas su// du ba'i rnam pa lta bu'am// smig rgyu 'dra ba mthong bar
'gyur// de la brtan par gyur nas ni// srin bu me khyer 'dra ba yi// 'od 'dra ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// de la brtan par gyur nas yang// mar me'i 'od snang mthong bar 'gyur// de nas brtan par gyur nas
ni// sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin// thams cad du ni gsal gyur te// de rtags chad du phyin pa'o// 'di ni nyin par dbang du gsungs// mtshan mo'i ltas ni thams cad du// me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba
ni// rim gyis rgyas par mthong 'gyur ro// nyin mtshan khyad med nang gi rtags// dri med nam mkha' dngas pa bzhin// thams cad ma lus nyin mtshan gyis// khyad par med par mthong bar 'gyur// nang gi
rtags ni rang gi sems// je zhi je gsal gyur pa nyid// sems nyid 'od gsal nyi zla bzhin// ma bcos ngang du gzigs par 'gyur// dbugs 'gags stong gzugs bzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to// de ltar brtan pa'i rtags thob nas// shin tu sbyangs ba thob bya'i phyir// rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya// steng 'og sgo nas gsang ba gsum// brgya dang grangs la sems rtsal sbyang// thugs las steng sgo snang

las byung// dbang chen sku yi 'od zer spros// mchod nas sbyangs te dngos grub rnams// thim pas mi zad rgyan du 'gyur// gsung ni rlung dang sngags bcas spros// de nyid mi zad rgyan 'khor gsungs// thugs ni

phyag mtshan spros dang bsdu// de yang mi zad rgyan 'khor 'gyur// b+ha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag/ pad+ma'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// gsang ba gsum las byung ba yis// rjes su dran pa bcu drug bsgom// dbang po rab

'bring tha ma yi// rgya ni che chung rang stobs kyis// sems kyi rtsal ni sbyang bar bya// rnal 'byor rang sems rtsal sbyong bas// sku dang ye shes phyag mtshan rnams// gsang ba gsum po'i spro bsdu kun// mang nyung

sems kyi stobs dang sbyar// sems ni rang bzhin ma nges pas// til 'bru ri rab lta bu'am// gcig nas gang+gA'i phye rnyed par// sems kyi rtsal ni sbyang bar bya// rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de
ltar ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs nas// lus dang sems dang lha la dmigs// khyad par dbye ba bya ba ni// yid la byed dang mi byed pa'o// lus la dmigs par byed pa'o// dbugs kyi sgo nas dmigs pa ste// rang
bzhin gnas dang yul dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan yin// de la dbugs kyi rang bzhin ni// lus nyid khams lnga'i rang bzhin gnas// dbugs kyi rang bzhin khams lnga yin// sa chu me rlung

nam mkha' 'byed// sa yi dbugs ni sra zhing lci// chu yi dbugs ni dal zhing 'joms// me yi dbugs ni 'bar zhing dro// rlung gi dbugs ni yang zhing rtsub// mkha' ni 'phyo zhing rgyu mi tshor// dbugs kyi gnas

ni lus nyid la// snying ni khong stong na dag dang// glo ba khong stong nang dag gnas// dbugs kyi rlung ni nang du yang// lus kun la yang khyab par gyur// shas cher lte ba yan chad kun// phyi rol sor ni bcu drug

pa// tshun chad rgyu bar byed pa yin// mdor bsdus nang du bsdus 'dus kyang mi shes// dbugs kyi lam ni kun khyab kyang// gtso bo mgrin pa gsang gnas nas// sna yi bu gar byung ba'o// dbugs kyi lam ni rnam
gnyis te// 'dzin pa'i las dang phyed pa'i las// de la 'dzin pa'i las byed ni// reg pas lus la phan 'dogs shing// lus kyang 'dzin par byed pa dang// sems kyi 'dzin kyang dbugs kyi byed// sems kyang
'dzin par byed pa dang// lus sems gnyis ka 'dzin pas na// srog 'dzin pa yi las byed do// byed pa'i las ni g.yo ba'i tshe// lus sems gnyis ka g.yo bar byed// dbugs la dmigs
pa'i thabs sgo mang// phyi la 'gro na gtang bar bya// nang du 'gro na dgang par byed// khong du gnas na gzhag par bya// gang ltar dmigs kyang 'gal ba med// thams cad gdams ngag gnad yin no// de dag
mdor bsdus rnam pa gnyis// dbugs kyi sgo dang mthun dmigs dang// chos la ma brten dmigs pa'o// de la mthun par dmigs pa ni// g.yas nas rgyu bar byed pa ni// de ni me dang rung gi khams// g.yon

nas rgyu ba sa chu'i khams// dbus nas rgyu ba nam mkha'i khams// de las phye na g.yas dang g.yon// re re la yang khams lnga'o// lnga lnga tshang bar rgyu ba dang// rags rim mdo ru bsdus pa dang// g.yas g.yon re
re dag la yang// 'byung ba re re'i cha shas su// brtan pa dag gi sgo nas ni// kha dog dbyibs dang bong tshod dang// rnam pa'i sgo nas so sor phye// de la dmigs par bya ba'o// sa ser chu dkar me ni

dmar// rlung ni ljang ser nam mkha' mthing// de ni rgyu ba tha mar rgyu// gru bzhi zlum po gru gsum dang// zla gam spros bral chos 'byung dang// gtso bo che la 'khor rnam phra// goms nas chen po phra bar snang/

grangs dang rnam pa nges pa ni// dmigs pa brtan par 'byongs nas gsal// rnam pa'i 'od dang yi ge dang// mtshan ma dang ni phra mo'i sku// de lta bu yi rnam par dmigs// chos la ma brtan par dmigs la// bye
brag so sor dbye ba med// dbugs ni phyi nang rgyu tsam dmigs// mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang rung// gcig la dmigs par bya ba'am// reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung// sems ma yengs par gtad pa
ni// sems zin 'ba' zhig tsam gyis mtshon// spyi ru grags pa'i kha dog dang// bongs tshod skyon dang yon tan dang// khams rnams gdug pa'i mtshan nyid pas// brtan ni yul du dmigs pa tsam// mthu brtas

dus ngan skyon yon yod// de la kha dog dkar po ni// gdug pa zhi byed mtshan nyid la// ser po gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan// dmar po gdug pa mched mtshan nyid// nag po gdug pa'i slong ba'i mtshan// mtshan

nyid de ltar byed pa'o// reg bya dang ni bongs tshod dang// sra zhing sbom pa ltar snang ba// lus la mi bde ba dag 'byung// phra zhing dwangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung
ngo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang dngos por blta// bden zhing gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la
gnas pa thob pas ni// zhig nas las su rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams
la dmigs pa dang// rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor rnam rig mkhas// sems kyiganas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems
kyi yul ni rnamarig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi
las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag
ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung// sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu
blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad bzlog/ lhag mthong bskyed par byed pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi gnas thob pa'o// lus sems dmigs pa las rung
nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs thabs yon tan rim pa dang// dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la lha yi rang bzhin ni// chos nyid rnam par dag
pa dang// rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang// cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can
gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang// lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can
ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan ni// thams
cad kun dang ldan pa'o// byed pa'i las ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum
gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par gyur pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa
rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim gyis brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyi rang bzhin lha nyid yin// de bas

phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang gi ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes pa yin// bar du lha bsgom thabs shes pa// sgrub thabs sna tshogs gsungs pa dang// bsam gtan

lus dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad/ mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lhang nge lhan

ne lham me gsum// lham me ba ni ma rdos pa// lhan ne ba ni ma g.yos pa// lhang nge ba ni ma bsgribs pa// ma rdos snang la rang bzhin med// gzugs brnyan chu zla lta bu'o// ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi// zug rngu ma
skyes pa yin te// nor bu rin chen 'od lta bu// ma bsgribs de gnyis dang ldan pas// ma rtogs pa yi sgrib pa dang// mi gsal ba yi sgrib pa gnyis/ med par shin tu gsal bar snang// dbang pos blta bar mi
bzod ltar// lha sku shin tu gsal ba'o// tshul bzhin byed par ma nus na// bzlas brjod lha yi de kho nas// lhar grags lhun grub sems can khengs// rang la gnas pa de rtogs yin// tshul bzhin slob bar

'dod pa yis// de dag rnams kyis tshul du spyod// gang dag tshul bzhin byed ma nus// mos dang bya bas g.yeng 'gyur zhing// tshul bzhin sbyor bar mi nus rnams// brda' don lha yi ting 'dzin ni// ji ltar yin
pa yid la bya// des zin cho ga rim gyis bskyed// skad cig gcig la rdzogs tshul lam// bag chags shugs sam mos pa dang// nga rgyal dag gi sgo nas kyang// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis gzung// bzlas
brjod bya zhing bsam gtan 'jug/ bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe na yang// lha ni mi bsam ma dmigs rung// las sam 'bras bu gang dmigs kyang// spyir na dmigs pa rtse gcig la// 'bad pas mthu dang byin

rlabs che// spyir na lha yi de kho na// nyid las 'grub pa'i lha yang 'grub// don dam sems kyi lha dang ni/ kun rdzob mtshan ma'i lha nyid la// sems dpa' bye brag lha zhes bya// ming du lhar ni btags pa
yin// dam tshig can gyi skye bo'i lha// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lhar grags pa// btags pas rnam pa du mar 'jug/ rnam par smin pa'i lus dbyibs kyis/ bye brag dpe phyi zhes pa dang// de nyid bdag gi chen
po'o// mtshan ma'i gzugs zhes btags pa dang// de nyid skye bo'i byin rlabs sogs// nus mthu can zhes btags pa dang// de nyid rnam par smin pa'i gzugs// bye brag ye shes byin brlabs nyid// dbyer
med 'dres nas lha zhes btags// de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnam// thugs ni gsang ba'i ye shes nyid// mtshan ma'i gzugs su sprul pa ste// chu nyid grang pa'i rkyen gyis ni// 'khyags rom gyur pa

lta bu'o// chos rnams lhun gyis grub pa yi// phyag rgya'i rang bzhin yin pa la// las kyi 'phro dang skal ba yi// dbang gis so sor snang ba de// shin tu dag par 'dul gyur rnams// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur
snang ngo// sems can khengs pa dag la yang// las ni dag par gyur rnams la// sprul sku rab byung cha lugs snang// de yi 'og ma rnams la ni// cha shas dag gis phyag rgyar snang// de yi 'og ma rnams la

ni// thun mong gzugs brnyan la brten pa'i// phyag rgya tha dad snang bas te// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa la// phyag rgya'i bye brag med par 'dod// de ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin

te// rang lus yid ni rtsal las grub// sngags ni ye shes rang la gnas// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po rnams// snying po rlung gi 'phro 'du can// sprul sku mdzad pa bcu gnyis rdzogs// stong gsum ma lus 'dul

ba'i mgon// longs sku 'khor 'das gnyis la spyod// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yi// shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par sel// chos sku dri ma med pa ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi sku// sku gsung tha dad med gyur

pa// ngo bo nyid kyi sku gyur pa// gcig dang tha dad las grol ba// gdul bya'i rnam pa so sor snang// nam mkha'i dbyings nas rang shar ba// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rab rgyas pa// mun med mun pas bsgribs ltar
snang// mun snang don la grub pa med// ces gsungs so/ dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa pad+ma gsang ba rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'phags pa rta mchog chen po la 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho rje btsun gar gyi dbang// rig pa bzhi la gzigs pa yis// rgyud lung man ngag ma lus
pa// bcings pa'i mdud pa grol bar byed// 'od gsal sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs// dam tshig dngos grub lo tog smin// dug lnga bde chen lam du grol// 'khor 'das nyon mongs lnga mdud bkrol// dbang
gi sku la ma lus rdzogs// rgyan rnam chos nyid bde bar ldan// mchod bstod rgyal pa mnyes par byed// rta skad gdug pa gsum rnams 'dul// phrin las phan gnod las kun 'grub// sa yi gdug pa'i nad
rnams kun// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis sel bar byed// phan gnod thun mong dngos grub ster// sa lam gsang sngags ting 'dzin bgrod// rig 'dzin lam gyi 'bras bur 'gyur// sbyor drug rdzogs rim gnas
mthar phyin// rngog ma le brgan dbang bsdud rgyud// ma lus gyur nas gsung khyod 'dud// ces bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnam la 'di skad gsungs so// dbang chen sku la
rgyal ba 'dus// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// rta mgyogs rngog sprug gnas su 'gro/ 'khor ba sems can lha srin kun// dbang bsdus sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// rngog ma le brgan rgyud ces bya// gnas
lugs sems nyid gzhi yi rgyud// bskyed rdzogs grol ba lam gyi rgyud// rig 'dzin sku bzhi'i 'bras bu'i rgyud// gzhi lam 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya// rig pa bzhi yi chos rnams kun// gtan la 'bebs par

gzigs gyur pa// ma rig blo yi mun pa sel// shes bya sems kyi gras thag bcas// rig pas rgya mdud grol ba'i rgyud// thun mong las kyi tshogs rnams kun// phan gnod bdag gzhan don rnams 'grub// mchog gi 'bras bu
'grub 'gyur bas// thun mong mchog tu bsgrub pa'i rgyud// zab pas ye shes chos kyi sku// rgya che chos dbyings mu mtha' grol// rgya mtsho nam mkha' lta bu'i chos// zab pa rgya che bstan

pa'i rgyud// thabs mchog snying rje chen por shar/ shes rab stong nyid ma bcos rtogs// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i rgyud// rgya mtsho'i chu rgyun kun 'dzin cing// de las byung
nas der thim pas// chos nyid shar nas bde grol thim// byung thim chu bo lta bu'i rgyud// gnas dang mkhan pos rgyud kun 'dres// gong 'og 'khrugs pas bzang du song// lus skyob phan par mdzad pas

na// dar zab lta bu thags kyi rgyud// sman pa mkhas pas tsha grang sman/ bsil drod sman gyis nad sel zhing// nad med tshe yi bcud 'dzin pa// 'di ni sman sbyor lta bu'i rgyud// lha dang mkha' 'gro rig 'dzin

gyis// gang zag chos kyi spyan ldan la// rim par brgyud de grags gyur pa// khyed rnams tshogs kyis rgyud 'di zung// zhes rgyud 'di yongs su gtad de ston pa chos kyi sku'i dgongs pa la bzhugs so// 'khor
rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa bsrung ngo// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las// rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// pad+ma dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus
pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// pad+ma 'byung gnas dang kha che A nan ta dang bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ mnga' bdag nyang gi gter ma'o////
rgya gar skad du/ shrI ha ya grI ba karma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rta mgrin las rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad dag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i khams na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang/ khro bo dang khro mo dang/ sprul pa dang yang sprul dang/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs la sogs pa rnams
dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gar gyi dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs khro rgyal mthu stobs can// pad+ma dbang
gi rgyud chen po// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas khro rgyal gar dbang gis// mi rtog ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// 'khor rnams ma lus byin brlabs shing// rta mgrin dbang gi
skur bzhengs te// dbang gi rta skad thengs gsum gyis// khams gsum thams cad dbang bsdus shing// srid gsum thams cad zil gyis mnan// bgegs rnams ma lus btul nas kyang// klu rnams ma lus

tshar bcad de// nam mkha' lding la bka' stsal pa// mkha' lding rgyal po ga ru Na// rtse gcig yid kyis khyod nyon cig/ dbang gi rgyud chen bstan par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud las/
gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad zhus// e ma ho bcom ldan gar gyi bdag/ pad+ma dbang gi rgyud chen po// bdag gzhan rnams kyi don
gyi phyir// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las sbyor dang// rtags dang dam tshig las tshogs dang// dbang dang sbyin sreg mnan pa dang// bsrung dbab bcad 'khrul bri ba bstod// mthar thug blta ba'i don rnams

kun// nges par mgon pos bshad du gsol// zhes ched du gleng ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal// 'byung po ma thul 'dul byed pa'i// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bar chod bsrung dang skrod

par byed// A+oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M/ sarba nA ga u tsa ta ya phaT phaT/ badzra khaD+ga tIk+Sh+Na kI la ya/ badzra dzra la raM phaT phaT phaT/ de skad gsungs pas 'jig rten khams// thams cad ma lus dbang

bsdus shing// klu la stsogs pa brgyal zhing bogs// 'byung po ma lus skrod par byed// bsrung dang mtshams kyi las yin no// zhes gsungs so// gleng slong ba'i don zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas
mkha' lding rgyal po yis// bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba'i las rnams zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang thob dam tshig dang ldan pas// thog mar yid 'thad gzhung mthun gnas// mchod sbyin
gtor ma stsogs byas te// maN+Dal steng du mchod pa'i rdzas// dur khrod me khrag mtshams bcad do// ma skyes dbyings las thugs rjer bsgom// hrIHlas dbang chen yum lnga rdzogs// b+hUM las dur khrod

gzhal yas khang// nyi zla pad+ma chu bdag steng// khro rgyal kun las brjid pa'i sku// dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rta mgo ljang// lcags sgrog ral gri dgra s+t+wa byar// pad+ma
gshol dang tho ba bsnams// zhabs bzhi dor stabs brkyang bskum bgrad// e ka dmar nag chas kyis brgyan// kha T+wAM thod rlon yab la stob// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// pho nya byi la phu shud
mgo/ dmar nag lcags kyu phur pa 'dzin// dbyings nas spyan drang bzhugs brtan phyag/ sman raka gtor ma la sogs mchod// thugs ka'i ting 'dzin gsal byas te// bsnyen sngags bzlas te bcol sngags
gdags// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma rtags// bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa ni// dur khrod dben pa'i gnas dag tu// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor zla gam khyams sgor bcas// sman rag
gtor ma rdzas rnams bsags// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed spyan drangs// mchod bstod bsgrub pa'i bzlas pa bya// dmar nag gru gsum par khyams bcas// dbus su phur bsgo la yang dgod// ro ras
dag la 'khor lo ni// mkhas pas re'u mig mtshan mar bcas// thun dang rdzas la sogs byas te// cho ga gzhung bsrang bsad sngags bzlas// thun gyis brab cing gzir byas nas// tha mar mnan bsreg las
kyis bskul// yang na ling+ga dag la'o// dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud las// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po yis// dkyil 'khor dbang gi rim pa
zhus// bcom ldan dbang gis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen bsgrub mthar phyin slob dpon gyis// gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ni// mtshams bcad sa yi cho ga bya// stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du ni// bum pa la sogs
mchod rdzas dgram// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams bya// ting 'dzin rnam gsum gzhal yas khang// pad+ma dbang gi lhar bskyed cing// spyan drang la sogs rdzogs byas nas// bsnyen dang phrin las rdzogs par

bya// dkyil 'khor bsku zhing chag chag gdab// rta mchog dri yi thig le bya// bskyed dang spyan 'dren mchod rdzogs nas// slob ma khrus byas gsol gdab bkru// so shing chos bshad srung skud gdags// ku sha
gtad la rmi lam brtag/ de nas thig gdab tshon bris te// rgyan dang mchod rdzas sgrub rdzas dgod// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor las gzhung bsrang// gnas su lha rnams bskyed byas nas// slob ma 'jug pa'i rim
pa bya// dbang bzhi po yang bskur bar bya// ma smin pa rnams smin par byed// phyin chad 'khor bar ldog mi 'gyur// dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi

pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// gsang sngags gsang ba'i don rnams zhus// pad+ma dbang gis bka' stsal pa// hrI pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M hU~M phaT/

hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta de ma d+ha ri ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu dza dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba e/ dza ti hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ta ya grI ba che ge mo kI la ya kI la ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ gtubs gtubs

sod sod/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta de ma ha ya grI ba e ka tsa ti hu lu hu lu hU~M dza dza/ nA ga li badzra kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ hrIHnA ga tsakra mA ra la hU~M phaT/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha

ya grI ba che ge mo'i tsit+ta dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaT/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kri ta ha ya grI ba che ge mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ hrIHnI ga stam b+ha ya nan/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu che ge mo kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ shag ti tshal pa tshal pa

hU~M phaT/ ha ha na ra thA yi hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ tshal pa tshal pa/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ nA ga ma la ni tri phra du nA

ga ma la shig swA hA/ a ni la du ni swA hA/ shri tri a tri nan/ a nu tri su nan/ a tri su tri nan/ nA ga a li ki li nan/ shu li gu li nan/ shu li byi du nan/ ho lu ma nA ga ta li nan/ ho lu ma hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a/ tri mi

pa nu Ni hU~M/ oM tri du tri nan/ e nA ga so hri hU~M/ oM ta thA oM/ ta thA badzra hU~M phaT/ oM ga ru Na haM sa he tsa le tsa le swA hA/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta shAn+tiM puSh+tiM ba shang mA ra ya sarba big+h+nAM sha truM hU~M hU~M phaT/

oM ga ru tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT/ od kang od kang/ khyung ga ru Na khyung ga ru Na/ sha ma ra byid thum badzra ma hA kro ta hU~M phaT/ dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po
yis// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor la sogs pa'i// rtags dang mtshan ma'i rim pa zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rten sogs dang// mchod
dang bskor ba byed la sogs// sngon chad ma mthong yul khams na// nyi shar mchod rten grong khyer rnams// nyams dga'i gnas sogs du ma mthong// grub rtags ri bo'i rtser phyin dang// mkha' la 'phur dang
mkha' lding bya// rgya mtsho'i gting nas lto 'gro len// sbal lcong sdig pa rtsangs pa sogs// gsod dang skams dang shi gyur ba// gdug pa'i gzugs rnams ma lus kun// bdag gi 'khol zhing 'dus par
byed// bsad pa'i las la sbyor ba'i tshe// gang la dmigs pa khugs nas kyang// gsod gcod las rnams byed pa dang// klu gnyan sa gdag gdon tshogs rnams// nges par dbang du 'dus pa

dang// mngon spyod drag pos tshar gcod dang// bzang rtags mtshan ma kun kyang 'byung// 'jug pa'i rtags ni rmi lam du// cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang ston// skyes pa bud med btsun chen dang// lha khang chu dang
sprul la sogs// sems can sna tshogs bdag la 'tshe// snying mi dga' la nyams dma' dang// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs ston par byed// zhugs pa'i rtags ni lus la yang// sha 'phrig la sogs mdze yi

nad// mtshan rtags gsal zhing rmi lam ngan// gnod pa'i sa ru 'dug pa dang// sems can kun gyi snying brtse ba// gang gnod cho 'phrul dngos su 'byung// yi dwags 'byung po zhugs pa dang// rtags dang mtshan
ma rdzu 'phrul rnams// rmi lam la sogs ngan pa 'byung// zhugs nas thon pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnag khrag phyi ru thon pa dang// gzhan du 'tshong dang btson las thar// yid dga' ting 'dzin gsal ba

dang// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma rnams// rnyed dang mkha' las me tog 'bab// 'od dang 'ja' tshon 'jam pa'i sgra// bzang pa'i rtags rnams ston par byed// dpal rta mgrin gyi las rgyud las/ rtags dang
mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// mnan dang sbyin sreg bskrad pa yis// tshar gcod pa yi don rnams zhus// rta mgrin dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// rgyas pa'i

sbyin sreg chen po ni// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// e ste gru gsum nyi shu gcig/ khrag dang dug gis zhal ba bya// gdug pa hom gyi shing brtsigs te// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas 'bru dang drug/ sha dang

khrag dang mar nag sogs// thams cad tshogs par byas nas kyang// phrin las gzhung bsrang thab khung nang// me lha ag ne rA dza la// mchod bstod rdzogs par byas nas kyang// lto bar lha bskyed sbyin sreg

dbul// phrin las bya ba rnams skabs sbyar// thun la sogs pa ci rigs bya// bsdus pa thab khung bud shing brtsig/ bsreg rdzas la sogs 'byor tshogs bya// thab bskyed me dmar lhar bskyed nas// cho ga gzhung
bsrang mchod bstod nas// mjug tu thun dang bro brdungs te// thal ba rgya gram lam du 'phyar// mnan pa dgra bgegs rnam gsum las// dgra bo klu la gtad pa dang// bgegs la thod par gzugs bcug

ste// mnan nas rta gdong bro yis brdung// yang na gang gnod gzugs bris mnan// bskrad pa'i 'khrul 'khor bskor nas kyang// ri rtse chu gzhung rlung la bskur// 'byung po rengs ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsang la
brgyangs la sbad par bya// dpal rta mgrin gyi las rgyud las// mnan sreg skrod cing rengs par byed pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// las rnams rab tu byed
pa'i don// gar dbang nyid la rab tu zhus// dbang phyug gar gyis bka' stsal pa// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa mthar phyin nas// las ni gang byas 'grub par byed// dbab bcad
gnyis kyi las rnams ni// gang yang rung ba'i yul khams su// mchod dang sbyin gtong rgya cher bya// phur bu bcu sngags bris la gdags// rab gnas byin brlab mchod byas te// nyung dkar rdzas lnga dag la
bsngags// phyogs bcur gser skyems gtor ma gtang// phur bu bcu dang tho yis bskor// rang nyid lhar bsgom sdigs mdzub bsgreng// sngags bzlas rdzas kyis gtor bar bya// gzhan yang gtor ma thun rdzas

bsag/ lha bskyed yul gyi lha klu mchod// bsnyen dang bsgrub sngags mjug la yang// nA ga rA dza che phob ces// zhi drag gnyis kyis dbab par bya// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ras sam gro ga'i shun pa
la// srung ba'i 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// maN+Dal steng gzhag byin gyis brlab// mchod bstod byas la lus la gdags// yang na tshon skud sna lnga la// sngags bzlas mdud pa byas nas kyang// byin brlab
skyabs 'gro bya zhing gdags// ras sam 'khar gzhong nang dag tu// klu gzugs sna tshogs bcug nas ni// sman dang gtor ma byin brlab dbul// bka' bsgo byas te sbas gyur na// klu nad kun las thar par
byed// gang yang rung ba'i mthun rdzas dang// gtor ma dag gis mchod byas te// gnas skabs gang byed las bcol zhing// dbang bskur zil mnan bstod byas nas// tha ma las la gzud par bya// ting 'dzin

gzhal yas lha bskyed nas// spyan drang mchod bstod rdzogs byas nas// me yi rnal 'byor rdzogs byas nas// sngags bzlas gang 'dod bsreg par byed// rin po che yi bum pa'i nang// tshe chang rdzas dang sman blug
ste// maN+Dal steng gzhag byin gyis brlab// 'jig rten khams gyi tshe bkug nas// sngags bzlas bstod cing bstim par bya// las rnams dbang du bsdu ba la// rang nyid sngags bzlas lha bsgoms te// gtor ma

sngags bzlas rdzas rnams bsag/ seng ldeng phur ba byin brlabs la// tha ma las la sbyar byas na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// dpal rta mgrin gyi las rgyud las/ las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// dam tshig blta ba'i don rnams zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spyir na las rnams thams cad la// bsnyen bsgrub las rnams thams cad
kun// dam tshig sdom pa med na mi 'grub pas// de bas dam tshig tshul bzhin bsrung// dngos grub gnyis dang byin rlabs kyang// rtsa ba yan lag bsrungs las 'byung// bla ma bkur dang lus
ngag yid// sgo gsum rgyun du nyams mi bya// shes bzhin ldan pas mnyes pa'i thab// bag yod gnas pas 'gal mi bya// lha dang sngags la sogs pa dang// spyi dang bye brag dam tshig dang// thun bzhi'i rnal

'byor nyams mi bya// sems can rnams la byams pa bskyed// snying rje'i bsam pa rgyud du bskyed// bla ma mchod la nyams mi bya// rdzas dang mchod pa chag nyams med// yid gnyis the tshom rnam par spang// nga
rgyal rlom sems phrag dog dang// dug gsum nyon mongs 'joms par byed// le lo snyoms las dor byas te// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shing// mdor na dge bcu dang du blangs// gsang sngags lta spyod
zung du 'brel// bsnyen bsgrub gzhung bsrang las ngan dor// gsang sngags dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung// lta bas thag bcad gdeng du bca'// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ma lus rig pa byang chub

sems// skye 'gag med pa'i mtha' las grol// rnam rtog chos dbyings ngang du gzhil// ma spangs chos nyid gzung 'dzin med// ye nas rang byung chos nyid sku// mtshan ma'i spros pa ye sangs rgyas// mkha' ltar
khyab pa'i thugs rje yis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs rnams// thams cad ma lus 'joms mdzad ma// bde chen zung du gzhom mdzad ma// phyogs ris med pa snyoms mdzad ma// dpal rta mgrin gyi
las rgyud las/ dam tshig dang blta ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas mkha' lding rgyal po yis// bsdus pa'i tshigs rnams kun gyis kyang// khro rgyal dbang la 'di skad bstod// hU~M// bcom ldan dpal
chen pad+ma he ru ka/ nub phyogs snang ba mtha' yas zhing khams nas// dbang gi rgyal po zla gam gdengs pa la// dpal mchog ha ya grI ba dbang gi lha// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum
bzhugs// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu tse re re// spyan dgu gzigs nas sdang mig 'od lam lam// smin mtshams shangs dbrag khro gter glog ltar 'gyu// rngog ma le brgan dbang gi me dpung 'bar// dpral ba

zhur po byams pa'i nyi ma shar// shangs nas rlung 'byung rdo rje'i tshubs nag 'khyil// ljags 'dril mche gtsigs me stag 'od stong 'phro// bskal ba'i me stong 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// sprul pa'i dbu rgyan mang
po skar ltar 'khrugs// rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba'i thog thog 'phen// dbugs kyis rngubs pas khams gsum dbang du sdud// e ka dza ti gsang ba'i yum dang 'khril// yon tan brjod mi lang la phyag
'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// dpal gtso bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis// 'khor gnas tshogs la 'di skad gsungs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang

phyug che'i// pad+ma rigs kyi rgyud mchog 'di// nor bu lta bur dgos 'dod 'byung// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las phun sum tshogs pa ste// klu gnyan 'byung po 'dul ba dang// thun mong mchog
gi dngos grub gter// yon tan byin rlabs brjod mi lang// de ltar ston pa'i rgyud 'di yang// khyed rnams kun gyis 'di zung zhing// bstan pa'i snying po thub par srungs// zhes gsungs so// de nas nam
mkha' lding gi tshogs dang// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// dpal rta mgrin gyi las rgyud las tshogs dang bcas pa rdzogs so//// slob dpon pad+ma dang/ ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis bsgyur ba'o//// bar 'dir rta mgrin gsang rgyud ces
pa shog bu bcu skor le'u nyer lnga ba zhig 'dug kyang yig nor rgyun 'phyugs kho nas dpyad ma bzod pas bzhag/

rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma hA ba sha duSh+ta bi gra ha tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ 'os min gyi gnas yum gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las mnal sad de/
chos thams cad spyan gyi ra bar bcug nas/ thig le gcig gi ngang du ye rgyas thebs par gzigs te/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' yongs la khyab cing brdal ba'i sku'i

che ba'i yon tan thams cad rang la rdzogs par bstan te/ slar yang sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa las// ma byas rang byung ye shes pad+mor 'khyil te/ thig le chen po gcig tu mnyam pa las/ de ltar
la gzigs shing so sor brtags nas// che bas myos pa dang/ dregs pas brgyal ba rnams tshar gcod pa'i thabs su/ spyan ras gzigs su sku sprul zhing// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs khros pa las/ dpal pad+ma
dbang chen dbu lnga phyag bcu drug par gyur te/ sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu yi ye shes rang la rdzogs par bstan nas/ khams gsum dbang du bsdus shing srid gsum zil gyis mnan te/ 'khor ba'i skyam lings
btab nas/ thugs rjes rang sar bskyal lo// dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las/ gnyen po sngon byung gi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ sbas pa'i dkyil

'khor dgus 'dul ba'i thabs phyung ste/ klad pa dung khang gi gzhal yas khang du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ ltag pa'i rgyas su rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dul

ba'i thabs su phyung ba dang// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ phyag rgya'i gnas su 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ sku'i

gnas su ngan song skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ rin po che'i gshog pa las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ zhabs las hU~M mdzad

chen po'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ b+ha ga'i gnas su ling+ga chen po'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang/ gzhal yas khang gi gnas su lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gdul
bya'i thabs su phyung ba dang dgu'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dgus gdul bya zil gyis mnan/ theg pa rim dgu'i klong brtol nas sa dgur mnyam par sbyar/ dregs pa tshar bcad nas sku gsung thugs su
'khor ba btsan thabs su bzlog pas/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes su sbyar ro// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gdul bya btsan thabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa'i mchog lha srin sde
brgyad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbang byas te/ 'jig rten stongs par byed pa las/ dpal pad+ma he ru kas thugs rje'i rol pas gdul bya thabs kyis btul te/ sku mchog 'bar ba'i rngam stabs
kyis/ tsham rngams drag pos gzir ba dang// dpal gyi rta skad thengs gsum gyis// bred cing rab tu sngangs par byas// thugs rje rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// bka' dang dam la btags pas/ lha ma srin sde

brgyad kyis rang rang gi sde dang dpon du bcas pa mngags pa dang bcas te/ mgrin gcig tu rang rang gi brda' skad kyis dmod mo dang mtshang tshig mdongs gsol du phul ba 'di lta ste/ a ya du ru tsa sha na la/

lha ma srin sde brgyad dpung dang bcas pas phul te/ dpal chen po pad+ma he ru kas/ lha ma srin gyi brda' sgra dgu mi brjed pa'i gzungs su gtad/ dbang chen gyi pho nya gtad nas/ gzungs su bzhag go/ lha ma srin

gyi brda' sgra skad grags pa'i dus su/ snyan pa'i mda' bya bar khas 'ches so// de nas yang a ni ma byung ma skyes pa'i klong nas/ dpal chen po'i skur byung ste/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen la/ ya ni gshin rje
dgu dpung dang bcas pas phul lo// ma ni ma mo dgu dpung dang bcas pas phul lo// du ni gza' dgu dpung dang bcas pas phul lo// ru ni srin po sde tshan dang bcas pas phul lo// tsa ni bdud

sde tshan dang bcas pas phul lo// sha ni gnod sbyin sde tshan dang bcas pas phul lo// na ni klu dgu dpung dang bcas pas phul lo// la ni lha'i sde tshan dang bcas pas phul lo// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud
las lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis dmod btsugs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal pad+ma dbang phyug gis thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par bstan pa'i phyir/ yum khro mo gzi ldan

ma nyid kyi thugs las phyung ste/ gnyis su med par 'khril te de'i tshe de'i dus na yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa las/ bka' sdod kyi pho nya ba rig pa'i khro bo khro mo dang/ long ba rgyab 'brel dang/ dmus long

'khor ba dang/ me 'brug dang/ rlung 'brug dang/ za byed kyi khyi spyang dang/ dpal gyi khyi brgyad dang/ pho nya sprul pa'i tshogs dang/ spyang mo ro shal dang/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma dang/ rag ta tsa mun ti dang/

khrag gi lha mo dang/ phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi la sogs pa/ chos nyid dbyings kyi pho nya dang/ yab kyi bka' sdod pho nya dang/ yum gyi bka' sdod pho nya dang/ drag shul btsan thabs kyi pho dang/ rang dbang med
par 'dus pa'i pho nya la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la rang bzhin blta ba'i don gyi bka' stsal to// khams gsum srid gsum dag pa'i zhing du blta// rang las byung ba'i nyag gcig dgongs pa'i gdeng/ skyon gyi

ma gos 'dam gyi pad+ma 'dra// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun la dbang// yon tan thams cad rang la rdzogs pas che// gang la spyad kyang dbang phyug rol pa'i rgyan// ji ltar mthong ba'i dri med pad+ma'i

sku// gnyis su med par brdal ba cig gis dang// rnam pa cing yang ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gdul bya rnams la cing yang sprul pa'i sku// gcig las ma g.yos ngo bo tha dad med// ci ltar snang ba pad+ma

dbang chen klong// pad+ma'i klong na dbang phyug rol pa che// 'di yi gong na dbang chen gzhan med pas// bde gshegs thams cad dbang chen pa yi rgyan// nga yi rang bzhin 'di 'dra bstan med pas// dbang phyug

rol pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang// snang srid thams cad nga las rol pa'i rgyan// pad+ma dbang chen mthong ba gzhan med de// che ba'i ye shes blta na dbang chen nga la ltos// dbang chen nga mthong thams cad nga

dbang byed// nga las ma g.yos nga nyid cir yang snang// snang zhing srid pa dbang chen nga ru 'dus// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin lta ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// thun mong blta ba'i don 'di bka' stsal to/ dri med pad+ma 'dam gyi me tog ltar// ma byas rang byung thams cad nga yi dbang// yon tan thams cad rang la rdzogs pas

che// gcig las ma g.yos thams cad cir yang snang// dmyal ba me chu tsha grang sdug bsngal snang// nga las ma g.yos dmyal ba nga yi dbang// yi dwags rnag khrag ro myags 'dam snang ba// nga las ma g.yos yi
dwags nga yi dbang// byol song rten gnas bza' btung bkol spyod snang// las kyi skal bas byol song der gnas pa// nga las ma g.yos byol song nga yi dbang// mi las bdag gzhan snong bcud dngos por

snang// rkyen gyis 'khrul pa'i rnam pa der snang bas// nga las ma g.yos mi rnams nga yi dbang// lha min 'thab rtsod go mtshon g.yul 'gyed snang// rkyen gyi log tshul lha min dang snang ba// nga las ma g.yos lha

min nga yi dbang// lha rnams rol mo longs spyod rin chen klong// las kyi skal bas lha rnams der snang ba// nga las ma g.yos lha rnams nga yi dbang// las kyis skal bas 'gro drug der snang ba// pad+ma dbang

chen yon tan phyogs gcig la// rang sems phyogs 'then nan tan de ltar snang// nga las ma g.yos 'gro drug nga yi dbang// che ba'i yon tan longs spyod rol pa'i rgyan// mu stegs chad lta'i phyir na glo bur

snang// spang la sha mo rdol ba lta bu'o// tshe la snga phyi gnyis su med par blta// rkyen gyi log tshul mu stegs der snang ba// nga las ma g.yos mu stegs nga yi dbang// mu stegs rtag lta bdag ces rtog/ snying dkyil

rtag pa yungs 'bru tsam// dkar la dag pa'i bdag nyid de// ma byas ngo bo nyid kyis byung// dngos po 'di ltar snang ba yang// ma byas rang byung rtag par blta// rkyen gyis log tshul rtag lta ba// nga las ma g.yos

nga yi dbang// che ba'i yon tan longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyan// chos can lta ba'i nyan thos pa// mdo sde pa dang bye brag gnyis// phyi rol yul spyod byed pa dang// shes pa skad cig mthun par snang// theg pas

bskal nas der snang ba// nga las ma g.yos nga yi dbang// rang rgyal phyi nang rten 'brel ni// bcu gnyis dag las grub par lta// shes pa skad cig rjes su mthun// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// nga las
ma g.yos nga yi dbang// mtshan nyid theg pa rnam pa gsum// rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa// de bzhin mdo sde dbu ma pa'o// rnam rig phyi rol mtho yor mi// bsam ngor bdag lta med bzhin du// rang rig
shes pa 'khrul snang 'dod// don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// nga las ma g.yos nga yi dbang// nga yi rol pa der yang gnas// rnal 'byor dbu ma kun rdzob
mthun// theg pas bskal nas der 'dod pa// dri med pad+ma nga yi dbang// nga yi rol pa der yang gnas// mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam// yul rnams logs nas snang bar lta// don dam spros dang
bral bar lta// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// dri med pad+ma nga yi dbang// che ba'i yon tan de ltar gnas// kri ya don dam chos nyid lta// kun rdzob rang rig yon tan blta// rigs gsum dag pa'i

dkyil 'khor du// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// dri med pad+ma nga yi dbang// che ba'i yon tan der yang rdzogs// gnyis ka'i rgyud 'dzin theg pa ni// lta ba yo ga ltar spyod de// spyod pa kri ya'i gtsang sbra

byed// der 'dod lta ba'i gnas yin te// dri med pad+ma nga yi dbang// che ba'i yon tan der yang rdzogs// yo ga don dam rnam dag pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su// rtogs pa'i byin rlabs ltar snang
ba// ye shes lnga las rigs lnga ste// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// der 'dzin de yi gnad yin te// der yang dri med pad+ma'i dbang// che ba'i ye shes der yang
shar// ma hA yo ga don dam du// rang rig gnyis med de bzhin nyid// rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul bsgrub rtsol ba'i// lhar snang ba la 'khor ba med// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// de yang dri med pad+ma'i
dbang// che ba'i yon tan phyogs gcig ste// der 'dzin rtogs pa de yi gnad// dri ma med par gdod nas dag/ phyogs ris med par de yi sgo// a nu yo ga don dam du// bde ba stong pa rig pa'i rtsal// kun

rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor snang// theg pas bskal nas der gnas pa// der rtogs der 'dzin gnad yin te// dri med pad ma nga yi dbang/ a ti ma byung/ che ba'i yon tan theg pa dgu// dbang chen rmad byung spyod pa

te// thun mong thabs kyi khyad par yin// gdul bya rnams la snang bas te// rang las byung bas dbang phyug che// zhes bka' stsal to// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las// thun mong lta ba'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis// bsgrub pa zab mo'i don 'di bka' stsal to// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub ni// thun mong khyad par thabs kyis 'grub// thabs kyi
khyad par 'di che bas// thabs ni khyad par mchog tu bsngags// dregs pa 'dul ba'i sa phyogs ni// ri brag zla gam gru gsum gnas// gnam sa pad+ma 'khor lo'i rtsibs// 'bar ba me ris mtshan pa

ru// bdag gzhan dbang rdzogs dam tshig ldan// gsang thub yid brtan g.yeng ba chung// tshig phyir mi 'brang don rton pas// dam bcas dngos grub ma thob par// khyad par thun mong rdzas khyer la// grub pa'i nyi
ma shis la 'jug/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor yang// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor 'dir shes bya// dkyil 'khor ngo bo dbang chen thugs// nges tshig thugs ni yang dag pa'i// ye shes rdo
rje'i snying po la// rig pa'i cho 'phrul bskor bas na// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu bshad// dkyil ni chos kyi dbyings nyid la// 'khor ni rig pa'i ye shes bskor// dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
la// de la dbye ba rnam pa gsum// rang bzhin ting 'dzin rnam pa gnyis// rdul tshon dag gi dkyil 'khor ro// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis// don dam rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang// kun rdzob rang
bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// kun rdzob rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// mkha' dang gnas kyi 'og min no// mkha' yi 'og min yum gyi mkha'// thams cad 'byung zhing skyed par
byed// gnas kyi 'og min dbang chen ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing khams su// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// bsgom dang bskyed pa lhag pa'o// bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ni// dbang
chen yab yum skur bsgom pa'o// lhag pa lha yi dkyil 'khor ni// bsgom dang bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor de// chos kyi dbyings na gsal ba dang// yum gyi mkha' la gsal ba ste/ kri yog rnam pa gsum pas
lhag/ des na lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor te// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug/ dbang chen gtso 'khor bcas pa ste// gser dngul lugs su blugs pa dang// zangs lcags mgar du brdung ba dang/ rA 'am ba
so'i 'bur brkos dang// ras bal thags su btags pa dang// sa la rdul tshon bris pa dang// gyang logs 'bur du btod pa rnams// dkyil 'khor rim pa der gnas nas// mkhas pas khyad par dngos grub
rten// dmigs pa'i yul du bzhag nas kyang// rang dang gnyis su med par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor dbu lnga ste// bcu drug phyag dang ldan pa dang// gdul bya'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa la// yab yum 'khor dang
bcas pa yi// bdag nyid der gnas nyams su blangs// bdag nyid de yi skur gsal nas// sku yi dkyil 'khor dngos grub de// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang mnyam// gsung gi dkyil 'khor snying po

ste// 'di dag rgyun tu bzlas par bya'o// oM shrI pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ baM hU~M e A ra li hrI dzaM/ ma hA srog shan thun b+h+yo/ dri med rtsa brgyad gsang sngags 'bru// grangs rdzogs bsnyen pa tshad bskyal
bya// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gsung dang mnyam// 'di don rnal 'byor ma thob par// gsang sngags 'phro 'dus gdul bya sbyang// mgal me klad la bskor ba yis// ye shes dam tshig sems dpa' sbyang// gser
gyi ba thag gzengs pa yis// dpyang thag chad pa thugs rjes drangs// mgar gyi tsha tsha brdab pa yis// khams dang srid pa gsum po sbyang// gnam lcags thog chen brgyab pa yis// dregs pas myos

pa dbang du sdud// sgra dang sil bu shub bur bzla// khyad par dngos grub rdzas mchog dang// thun mong mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang// 'khor gyi mthun rdzas rim pas dbul// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i longs spyod
tshogs// rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs chen bsag/ ces bka' stsal to// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ sgrub pa zab mo'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen
gyis// phrin las zab mo'i don 'di bka' stsal to// grub pa'i nyi ma gang yin la// khyad par gnas mchog dam pa der// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dmigs pa'i rten// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas
kyang// nyams su ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor blang// bdag nyid lus ngag yid gsum yang// sku gsung thugs su sbyang bar bya// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dag la
bstim// bstims nas brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes pas phyag 'tshal phyi nang gi// mchod pas kyang ni mnyes par bya// sngags bzlas bstod bshags bskang ba bya// bkra shis gsol dang gzi byin
'bebs// ta na ga Na rmad byung spyod pas mchod// bka' bzhin spyad nas sbyor ba yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ste// spyod lam rnam pa thams cad du// lha dbang sku gsung thugs su brtag/ tha mal
dman par brtag mi bya// yengs shing nyams na 'das pa ste// khams gsum 'khor bar rang bzhin ltung// sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad spyod kyang// dal gyis spyad na zhi ba'i las// mang du spyad na rgyas pa'i

las// myur du spyad na dbang gi las// dpa' bar spyad na drag po'i las// gang gi phrin las mdzad spyod kyang// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIHdza/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ bcu gsum rtsa ba'i gsang sngags

la// shAn+tiM 'bru drug brda' bskyon na// dbang chen zhi ba'i phrin las so// bcu gsum rtsa ba'i gsang sngags la// puSh+tiM ku ru'i brda' bskyon na// dbang chen rgyas pa'i phrin las so// bcu gsum rtsa ba'i gsang
