sngags la// pa shaM ku ru'i brda' bskyon na// dbang chen dbang gi phrin las so// bcu gsum rtsa ba'i gsang sngags la// mA ra ya yi brda' bskyon na// dbang chen drag po'i phrin las so// thugs kyi phrin las
mdzad spyod kyang// rtse gcig snying rjes dgongs pa yis// dbang chen zhi ba'i phrin las so// thugs rje'i sprul pa'i dgongs pa yis// dbang chen rgyas pa'i las su 'gyur// thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa
yis// khams gsum dbang sdud dgongs par 'gyur// zhe sdang drag po 'khrugs pa yis// rjes shul spyod pa'i dgongs par 'gyur// dbang gi phrin las rgya mtsho la// gang ltar spyad kyang phrin las

bzhi// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi dgongs pas gso// dbang drag gnyis kyi dgongs pas bsgral// gang ltar spyad kyang dbang gi las// mnyam pa'i ngang du ro mnyam zhing// thugs rjes zhing khams mi gtong na// dbang
gi phrin las mdzad spyod yin// skye med ngang du ro gcig kyang// dgag sgrub med par kun spyod na// dbang gi phrin las mdzad spyod yin// chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs
'chang na// dbang gi phrin las mdzad spyod yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud las// phrin las zab mo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen

gyis// brtul zhugs drag po'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// bdag nyid dbang chen rnal 'byor pas// gnyis su med par sbyar ba dang// skye shi med par bsgral ba'i phyir// ta na ga Na rol pa'i rgyan// rnal 'byor

dbang phyug chen pos spyad// don gyi sbyor ba chen po dang// rtags kyi sbyor ba chen po ste// don gyi sbyor ba chen po ni// mdzad spyod gang yang ma spangs par// chos nyid ngang du mnyam sbyor na// don gyi sbyor ba chen

po'o// rtags kyi sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis// dga' bas don la sbyor ba dang// dgos pas don la sbyor ba'o// dga' bas don la sbyor ba ni// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// 'gro ba bzang mo rnams la sbyar// dang po
lo brgyad bcu gnyis nas// lnga bcu yan lag mtshan nyid brtag/ rigs kyi khyad par so sor dbye// gzi ldan yum du rnam par brtag/ gnyis su med phyir dga' ba spyad// chags pa bskyed cing brda' sbyar

te// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor nas// rtsa gnyis rang byung gyur pa dang// thig le dkyil 'khor bzhir phab la// dang po gsang ba'i gnas su bskyil// rdo rje'i sbu gur ma nyams sems// khad kyis rnam par sbyang bar

bya// rtsa nyid bral nas nyams pa ste// thig le ma shor lus khyab gnas// byang chub sems kyis gang bar gyur// skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal bral// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yi// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor

rgyun mi 'chad// byang chub sems su gnyis med bde// bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo nyid// bde chen gsang ba'i mchod pa ste// gnyis su med par skyes pa'i mchog/ dgos pa'i don la sbyor ba ni// 'dod spyod yon

tan rnam pa lnga// mig gi 'dod pas gzugs la sbyor// gnyis su med pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ rna ba'i 'dod pa'i sgra la sbyor// gnyis su med pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ sna yi 'dod pas dri la sbyor// gnyis su med
pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ lce yi 'dod pas ro la sbyor// gnyis su med pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ lus kyi 'dod pas chags par sbyor// gnyis su med pas sbyor ba'i mchog/ 'dod la spyod pa rnam pa

lnga// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo gnas// dri med pad+ma'i snying por gnas// gnyis med don la sbyor ba'o// skye shi med par bsgral ba'i phyir// ga Na rol pa bsgral ba'i lung// don gyi sgrol ba chen po dang// rtags

kyi sgrol ba chen po gnyis// don gyi sgrol ba chen po ni// khams gsum srid gsum 'khor ba yang// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang du bsgral// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// rnam dag byang chub sems su

bsgral// sems nyid ma skyes dag par bsgral// don gyi sgrol ba chen po'o// rtags kyi sgrol ba chen po ni// bdag tu 'dzin pas gzung ba dang// phyin ci log la 'chel ba rnams// ngo 'thon khyad par thabs kyis

sgrol// de yi lus ngag yid gsum yang// dbang chen sku gsum thugs su bsgral// de yi phung po skye mched la// rta mchog rol pa'i bros sbyangs la// lnga phung rtsad nas gcad par bya// lus ngag yid gsum sku
gsung thugs// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// sems nyid dag par snang bas na// khams gsum yongs bsgral bde ba'i zhing// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ ta na dang ga Na'i
le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis// rta skad thengs gsum gyi le'u 'di bka' stsal to// bde chen don dang ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po
yis// dbang chen sku dang gnyis med rtags// dngos su rtogs par snang mdzad de// spyod pa shor ba'i gnas dag tu// rta skad thengs gcig thos pa yis// las kyis bskal ba'i dregs pa can// 'bri rgod dregs

pa bzhin du ni// rang dbang med par yid kyis sngags// rta skad thengs gnyis thos pa yis// las kyis bskal ba'i mi ma yin// sha rul dong du bcug pa la// sha sbrang mkha' la 'du ba bzhin// rang dbang med
par dbang du 'dus/ rta skad thengs gsum thos pa yis// las kyis bskal ba'i mi ma yin// bka' khrims dam pa'i bka' 'og bzhin// rang dbang med par 'dur gyis btang// de ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs
te// dgongs pa'i gdeng can de gsum gyis// dregs pa pho mo las gzung pa// lha'i gdeng gsum rta skad lam// rta skad thengs gsum dgongs pa'i lam// bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum sa lam sbyor// rta
skad thengs gcig bskyed pa'i lam// thabs dang shes rab gdan sar sbyor// gnyis kyis cig char rdzogs pa'i lam// dbyings dang ye shes gdan sar sbyor// gsum gyis ye nyid yin pa'i lam// mnyam pa
nyid kyi gdan sar sbyor// ma hA bskyed pa'i rim pa yang// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrul gsum las// rim pas bskyed nas rdzogs par 'dod// lha yi dkyil 'khor thabs kyi mchog/ ma skyes spros
bral shes rab las// gnyis su med par rang sar sbyor// a nu rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang// lha yi dkyil 'khor skad cig gis// chu las chu bur rdol ba'i tshul// gtso 'khor dran rig rdzogs par 'dod// ma

skyes spros bral chos kyi dbyings// rig pa'i ye shes gnyis med pas// mnyam pa nyid kyi rang sar sbyor// a ti ye nas yin pa la// dri med snying po byang chub sems// gdod nas ma skyes rang byung bas// rang gi
ngo bo brjod du med// brjod med ji ltar btags par snang// car btags der snang dri med pas// snying po byang chub ye nas yin// gcig dang du mar ro gcig pas// de nas gnyis med gdan sar
sbyor// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yang// rta skad thengs gsum thos pa yis// blta bas sa gsum mnyam sbyar nas// spyod pas dregs pa tshar gcod na// rta skad thengs gsum thabs kyi mchog/ ces bka'
stsal to// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rta skad thengs gsum gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis// brtul zhugs chen po bzhi'i le'u 'di bka'
stsal to// bdag nyid pad+ma dbang chen gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor bas// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum 'khor ba skyam lings 'debs// rta skad thengs gsum bsgom pas
ni// khams gsum yongs bsgral sa gsum bsgral// bde gshegs mi 'gyur gdan gsum ste// bskyed rdzogs rnam gsum klong gsum rdol// shugs chen rta yi ra mda' yis// 'khor ba'i skyam lings dbyings

su gdab// rta skad thengs gcig rig pa'i lam// kun bzang mkha' dbyings klong rdol nas// mnyam pa nyid kyi rang sar sbyar// gnyis ni thabs dang shes rab ste// gsum ni skugasung thugs su sbyar// rta skad

bzhi ni phrin las bzhi// lnga ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// drug ni 'gro drug gnas su sbyong// bdun ni phrin las drag shul bdun// brgyad ni sde brgyad dbang du sdud// dgu ni theg pa'i sa dgu brtol// bcus ni sa
bcu zil gyis gnon// dbang phyug rol pa'i phrin las de// byed spyod rta yi skad kyis sbyong// gang ltar spyad kyang chos kyi dbyings// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// bya ba'i las rnams brtson par
mdzad// khams gsum 'khor ba thugs rje'i gzan// dbang gi/ phrin las khyur ming mdzad// dregs pa'i ngan sems ngan pa rnams// pho nya bya yi btsan thabs kyis// gzan mar byas te rol par bya/ chos nyid
dbyings kyi ngang du bskyal// bya yi brtul zhugs 'byon tshul gyis// g.yas su 'jol zhing g.yon du blta// phyir la nur zhing sngon du rgyug/ gang la dmigs par gzan dmar bza'// rol pa'i tshul
gyis za bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// thugs rjes mel tshes 'khor ba bsrung// rig pa sems kyi dbang po yis// phyi nang yul la thogs pa med// khams gsum 'khor ba thugs rje'i zhing// chos

nyid mnyam pa'i ngang du sbyar// gang la dmigs pa'i dregs pa can// dpal gyi khyi brgyad brtul zhugs kyis// phyogs mtshams rngam pa'i rgyug tshul bya// nye ring med pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// dbang po ye
shes thogs med pas// gang dmigs yul la rol par bya// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i khron pa la// thugs rje'i rol pa'i zas btsal la/ blang dor med pa'i spyod pa
dang// gtsang sme med par za bar bya// gang la dmigs pa'i khron pa ru// phag gi brtul zhugs stobs 'chang bas// thog med myur ba'i btsan thabs kyis// dregs pa thams cad gzir bar bya'o// gang gis

brtul zhugs 'di spyod tshe// chags med don gyi ngo tsha yang// ma spangs blang dor med par spyad// rnam dag don gyi gtsang sbra yang// mi spang blang dor med par spyad// mtshan ma gzhom phyir dge sdig mnyam// blang

dor med pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// gar gyi dbang phyug rol pa bya// chos kyi dbyings su ro mnyam ste// gang spyad mnyam pa ro gcig na// rnal 'byor gar gyi dbang phyug yin// zhes bka' stsal to// dregs pa tshar
gcod pa'i rgyud las/ brtul zhugs chen po bzhi'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis sku che ba la bstod pa dang/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i ting nge 'dzin

gsal gdab pa 'di bka' stsal to// chos sku dag pas mtshan ma kun spangs kyang// thugs rje'i dbang gis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// shin tu mi bzad khro bo'i tshul ston pa// yid bzhin sku mchog rnam pa cir
yang ston// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dpal gyi sku// re ba kun skong dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing// bsam 'das brjod med rnam rtog spros bral bas// mnyam nyid nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal
bstod// mkha' ltar dag pas gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// 'gro ba'i dpal rten 'phags lam 'dren pa'i gtso// rmad byung phrin las ma lus kun mkhyen pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel la phyag 'tshal

bstod// hU~M/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed hU~M sgra can// hU~M gi khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// hU~M gis dus gsum ma lus thams cad bskyed// hU~M gis bla med byang chub gnas su bgrod// hU~M gis bdud
rnams ma lus thams cad 'joms// hU~M gis ngan song gnas rnams stongs par mdzad// hU~M gis ma rig mun khang thams cad 'joms// hU~M mdzad hU~M gi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hU~M// rigs lnga

tshul gcig rigs dang dbyer med kyang// gdul bya'i dbang gi rigs lngar ston mdzad cing// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku de tha dad med// dbyer med ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku gsung thugs kyi rang

bzhin dpal gyi dpal// kun la dbang mdzad dbang mchog he ru ka/ khro bo rgyal po rta mgrin rta skad can// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang// rgyal ba
'khor bcas dbu rgyan cod paN can// ral pa dmar po 'bar ba'i me stag can// khro bo'i zhal ni 'bar bas phyogs gzhir gzigs// khros pas spyan bgrad khro gnyer sprul pa las// glog stong mang po 'od zer
'gyu zhing 'khrugs// srid gsum 'khor ba bshig par dam bcas pa// rno dbal ting 'dzin mche ba dkar po gtsigs// sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog ltar gsal// zhing lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi'i
sham thabs can// sbrul nag stong gis gdengs pa'i rngam brjid can// thod rlon 'phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas// bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// ljags 'dril rkan sgras bdud 'dul dpa'

skad sgrogs// tsham rngams drag shul rnam pa cir yang ston// sprul pa'i khro bo mang po phyogs bcur 'gyed// phyag 'tshal dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ mtshungs med che ba'i nga rgyal kun ston cing// nga rgyal mthus

snyems bdud dpung 'dul mdzad cing// hU~M dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems// rdo rje mtshon chas gnam lcags thu lum 'dril// gsang sngags log pa'i 'jig
rten rab tu 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gzhan na med/ sdig pa sel ba'i nyes 'joms gzhan na med// dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus bskyed pa'i phyir// hU~M mdzad khro bo brgyad kyang zhabs kyis

gnon// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing skal tshigs 'joms// sdug bsngal mnyam thag 'bod sgrogs sgra chen 'byin// hU~M mdzad khro brgyad snying yang changs bar bcug/ byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i sku mnga'

zhing// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal ba'i me chen 'bar// ma rig ldongs pa'i mun nag 'thibs po sel// mi rtog pa la 'gro ba 'dren pa'i rtags// thabs kyi zhags pa rdau

rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa la// nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'i 'od zer can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod phrin las kyis// thams cad bla med byang chub gnas su bkod// rdo rje gzhal
yas nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam// ka ba yid bzhin rin chen mchog las grub// sprin med nyi ma bdun brtsegs gsal bar brgyan// 'gyur med 'jigs spangs seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// mgon

po dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// mi g.yo brdal ba rdo rje lhun po 'dra// gzi brjid nyi ma bye ba stong bas lhag/ yon tan bsam yas bskal par brjod mi lang// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen mang pos
bskor// mthu chen mdzes pas ma mo brgyad dang rol// khro rgyal khro chen me yi zhags pa bsnams// ye shais nyi ma gsal ba'i gdan la bzhugs// zhal gdangs gsal bas nyi ma zla ba'i 'od// bzhad pa'i gad
rgyangs 'brug stong ldir ba yis// nam mkha' khyab par bshug par rab gsungs pas// rab tu 'jigs pa gsung gi byin gyis 'dul// mkha' ltar dag cing mtsho ltar gting dpag dka'// dus gsum rgyal ba

ma lus bskyed pa'i yab// phyag 'tshal khrag 'thung rdo rje sku khyod la'o// phyi yi phyag brnyan mang po'i tshogs rnams kyis// drag po'i phrin las ma lus rdzogs par mdzad// dpal chen phyag brnyen rdo rje lha mo'i
tshogs// dam las ma 'da' phrin las rdzogs par mdzod// nongs dran rjes su 'gyod pas bzod par gsol// bdag gis dam nyams bskang nas bzod par gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen khyod kyi thugs
dam ni// bo d+hi bdag 'dras bskul bar mi dmigs kyang// sku gsungs thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes bka' bstsal to// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rang gi che ba la bstod pa dang/
'khor dregs pa can zil gyis mnan pa dang// rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsal btab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis// yab kyi bka' sdod

pho nya khro bo'i gzer dang/ yum gyi dka' sdod pho nya khro mo'i gzer dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho nya'i gzer dang/ drag shul btsan thabs 'jig rten pho nya'i gzer dang/ khro bo dang khro mo ni yang dang yum la 'dus/

ye shes pho nya'i gzer las kham rgya ma'i gzer 'di bka' stsal to// dur khrod thod pa mtshan ngan du// gang dmigs gzugs dang ming bris la// sngon dmar dra bas thod pa gril// dkyil 'khor gru gsum phyogs

mtshams su// sprul pa'i pho nya kham rgya bri// bsham bya gcan gzan gdug pa'i mchu sder gyis// gru gsum tha ma bskor te bzhag/ bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgom ste// sku gsung thugs las kham rgya spros// gang
dmigs bkug pa de la bstim// nga rgyal drag po'i stobs kyis bskul// hrIHkhams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lha// gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum gyi// thugs las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// zangs kyi 'phar ba mgo

brgyad la// zangs kyi mi mo mgo brgyad zhon// rdo rje rtse lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// zhe sdang can gyi snying nas 'dren// yon tan sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// g.yu yi spyang mo rkang gsum la// g.yu yi yan lag

stong gis brgyan// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du sdud// gsung las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// pad+ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// 'dod chags can

rnams dbang du sdud// phrin las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// gser gyi seng ge rngam khri la// gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lcags kyi cod paN si li li// rdo rje rgya gram 'od zer 'phro// phrag dog can rnams dbang du

sdud// sku las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// bdud kyi dred mo rkang gsum pa// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro// gti mug can rnams dbang du sdud// khyab pa'i ye shes kham rgya mo// gnyis med thabs kyi sprul pa

ste// rkang lag med de nyung 'bru 'dra// lcags kyi tshwa tshwa mang po 'khrugs// gang la bya ba rdul phran bzhin// kun la thogs pa med par rgyug/ oM shrI pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+hA phaT/ baM hU~M/ e A ra li hriM dza/ ma

hA srog sha che ge mo la thun b+h+yo/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ tI k+Sha Na/ tI k+Sha Na/ ha la ha la/ tsa ti tsa ti/ tsa tra tsa tra hU~M phaT/ nyung dkar thun gyis brab// mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis brdung la// gzir mnan gyi bros sbyangs

na// srid pa gsum yang rdul du rlog go/ dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ pho nya kham rgya ma'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// sprul pa'i pho nya long ba

rgyab 'brel le'u 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum du// zhing ras gang dmigs ming gzugs bri// hrIHdang dza yis mtha' ma bskor// gru gsum kha khyer long ba bri// mtshon cha sna tshogs

mtha' bskor la// gar gyi dbang phyag yab yum gyi// sku gsung thugs las long ba spro// gang dmigs bkug la rten la bstim// yab yum snying po rgyun du bzlas// oM hrIHpad+man+ta kr-ita/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba

hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hU~M/ e ka dza ti A ra li hU~M dza/ khros pa'i sems kyis spro dgug bstim// gzir cing mnan pa'i las byas na// srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlog/ hU~M/ srid gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lha// gar gyi
dbang phyug yab yum gyi// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ste// shar phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// 'brug chen sngon po chibs su chibs// na bza' le brgan dpung bklubs gsol// dbu yi ral pa tshar re
la// gza' rgod mig dmar char du 'bebs// lho phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// lcags kyi dAM pI chibs su chibs// phyag na lcags kyi khyung sder bsnams// na bza' gser gyi ral ga gsol// dbu yi ral pa
tshar re la// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer can// nub phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// ba glang dkar po chibs su chibs// na bza' klu sbrul pags pa gsol// phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa

bsnams// dbu yi ral pa tshar re la// dug dang me yi char pa 'bebs// byang phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan steng na// rkang pa brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// dbu yi ral pa tshar

re la// long ba'i sprul pa 'bum 'bum 'phro// phyogs bzhi nas ni gshegs su gsol// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ baM hU~M e A ra li hrIM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo/ ma rang sha khA hi/ tsa ti tsa ti/
tsa tra tsa tra hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs so// gzir cing mnan pa'i bro brdung ngo// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i long ba rgyab 'brel gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ sprul pa'i dmus long 'khor ba can gyi le'u 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum du// gang la dmigs pa'i gzugs byas la// sngon dmar bcings la gu
gul bdug/ lcags kyu zhags pa mtshon cha yis// gru gsum kha khyer mtha' la bskor// gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum gyi// sku gsung thugs las dmus long spro// gang la dmigs pa dgug cing bstim// tsham
rngams drag pos rdul du rlog/ hrIHyab yum gnyis su med pa las// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// shar phyogs dmus long 'khor ba ni// lus ni mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs// yan lag med de nyung 'bru
'dra// 'od zer chen po phyogs bcu 'gyed// g.yo ba med par dbang du sdud// lho phyogs dmus long 'khor ba ni// mig ni ye nas med par ni// phyag ni me ri sngon dmar can// zhabs kyang med de nyung dkar

'dra// khyod ni gdung brgyud rgyal po ste// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// ci bgyis zhes dang chas te byon// nub phyogs dmus long 'khor ba ni// mgo yang med la yan lag med// skad kyi sgra yis stong

gsum gang// dung gi tshul du gnas pa'o// byang phyogs dmus long 'khor ba ni// khrag gi mi la khrag sha za// mig dang sna dang rna ba med// 'o dod drag pos phyogs bcur sgrog/ A+oM shrI pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro

ta phaT/ baM hU~M e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo/ ka tug sha ka tug sha b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M phaT/ gzir cing mnan pa'i bro brdung na// srid gsum thams cad rlog par nges// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud
las/ pho nya dmus long 'khor ba can gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ pho nya drag po'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum
la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis bskor// dza dang phaT dang b+h+yo yis bskor// mtshon cha 'bar bas phyogs mtshams gtams// gang la dmigs pa zhing ras la// ming gzugs rus dang bcas pa
bri// dkar nag sngon dmar thag pas bsdam// dme dug rdzas sbyor dud pas bdug/ dpal gyi snying pos dbang du bsdu// oM hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ e a ra yi hrIHdza/ gar gyi dbang phyug yab yum gyi/ sku
gsung thugs las pho nya spro// gang dmigs rten la dgug cing bstim// tsham rngams drag pos gzir mnan bya// khams gsum srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing// drag po'i pho nya 'dis bya'o// hrIHyab yum gnyis su
med pa yi// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od phung nag/ ral pa nag cing mche ba nag/ mig kyang nag cing lag pa nag/ mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyad du
med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin te// zhum pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// pha rol dpung rnams rab tu 'joms// 'di dag yang dag rab bsgoms na// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// g.yon pa gsum ni

lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yas pa gsum ni sta re 'phyar// yan lag sbrul nag stong gis brgyan// g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying nas 'dren// g.yas kyi s+t+wa res nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho

nyar rgyun du mngag par bya// dgra rnams nges par 'joms par byed// rkang gcig de yi pho nya ni// kha dog nges par ci 'dra na// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// mig kyang med

cing cang mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms shing// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// gnyis ka song ste der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// mgo brgyad
po la lag brgyad po// rkang pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// lag brgyad rdo rje phur pa 'dril// gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang drug mgo drug mig kyang drug/ lag pa drug gis rgyud drug

'joms// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma gtong// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dril// mgyogs pa rlung gi shugs dang 'dra// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya yin// ha la ru lu'i sgra sgrog cing// rang gi rlung phyogs song

ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges par 'chi// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud kha reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag

pa g.yon pa brkyang pas ni// phra men rnams ni 'khor dang bcas// kun kyang ral pa dmar po la// lcags kyi dgra sta rab thogs te// zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams dpal gyi pho nya ste// phyogs
bcu'i zhing khams kun la dbang// bar snang khams na rgyu ba'o// 'od zer dud khas reg pas ni// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrog cing// bskal ba'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa rlung
dang mtshungs// mig gsum po la lcags sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum po// lag pa gsum na 'khor lo bskor// dbu skra kham nag dkyil 'khor nas// phra men 'bum gyi rngam stabs can// rkang pa

gsum ni stabs kyang byed// mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams 'chi bar byed// klu yi gnas rnams nges par 'joms/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/

pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M phaT/ e A ra li hriM dza/ tsham rngams drag po'i stangs stabs kyis// rta bro brdung zhing thal bar rlog/ ces bka' stsal to// dreg pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ pho nya drag po'i

le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis spyang mo ro shal gyi le'u 'di bka' stsal to// gcan spyang gdug pa'i thod pa la// nag dang dmar gyi tshon rtsis byug/ mche ba

bzhi la sngags bris la// kha gdangs nang la dmigs pa gzhug/ sngon dmar tshon gyis kha bsngams la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nang du gzhug/ spyang thod kha dog so so la// rigs kyi khyad par phye ba la// pho nya'i
sngags dang snying po bri// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams so so ru// gru gsum dkyil 'khor kha bstan gzhag/ rno mtshon gdug pa'i dbal mtshon gyis// gru gsum tha ma bskor bar bya// bdag nyid gar dbang yab

yum gyi// sku gsung thugs las spyang mo spro// gang la dmigs la bkug cing bstim// gcer bur phyung la spyang du bya// tsham rngams drag \u0f84po'i rngam stabs can// skabs su bro brdung rdul du rlag/ spyang mo'i pho nya 'di

lta ste// hrIHyab yum gnyis su med pa las// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// shar phyogs zhabs kyi sprul pa ni// dung gi spyang mo mgo gsum ma// dung gi mi mo mgo brgyad zhon// sku dang phyag dang 'od zer

dkar// ral pa dkar po'i skra gseb nas// dung gi spyang mo 'bum 'bum 'phro// g.yab mo 'dor zhing 'o dod 'bod// snying khrag dron mo kha ru 'thung// lho phyogs zhabs kyi sprul pa ste// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo

gsum mar// lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// sku sngo phyag sngo zhabs kyang sngo// ral pa sngon po'i skra gseb nas// lcags kyi spyang mo 'bum 'bum 'phro// snying dang rgyu ma rkang gsum za// nub phyogs zhabs kyi sprul pa

ste// zangs kyi spyang mo mgo dgu mar// zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// sku dmar phyag dmar zhabs kyang dmar// ral pa dmar po'i skra gseb nas// zangs kyi spyang mo 'bum 'bum 'phro// yak+sha chen mo dbang du
sdud// zas su srin chen ril med mdzad// byang phyogs zhabs kyi sprul pa ste// g.yu yi spyang mo mgo gsum mar// g.yu yi mi mo chen mo zhon// sku ljang phyag ljang zhabs kyang ljang// ral pa ljang gu'i

sgra gseb nas// g.yu yi spyang mo 'bum 'bum 'phro// snying khrag 'thung zhing dam la nod// byang shar mtshams kyi spyang mo ni// gzi ldan chen mo shugs su sgrol// lus ni lcags kyi spyang mo la// dbu la dar gyi cod

paN can// mche ba rdo rje rtse gsum la// mi zer 'bum 'bum 'phro ba'i tshul// shar lho mtshams kyi spyang mo ni// rdo rje me khrag spyang mo la// me dgu'i phreng bas rgyan du bklubs// kha nas me yi skyugs pa

'byin// rkang lag me yi kha T+wAM ga/ lu gu rgyud las sgrol bar byed// lho nub mtshams kyi spyang mo ni// 'bar ba'i thod rus mang pos brgyan// khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur brgyan// ti ra chen po kha na thogs// nub

byang mtshams kyi spyang mo ni// g.yu yi sbyang mo mgo gsum la// gcan gzan gzig gi pags gyon pa// kha nas ru lu'i sgra sgrog ma// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT// tshin+da tshin+da hU~M phaT/ kro d+ha kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ha la ha la baM/

rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ e a ra li hriM dza hU~M phaT/ gzir mnan drag po'i rngam stabs kyis// zhing lpags dang sle'u nag gis spyang thod bsdams la/ spyang thod khyer te gang la dmigs pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du

mnan cing sbas na rdul du 'gro// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ spyang mo ro shal gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ za byed khyi brgyad kyi le'u 'di
bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// lcags kyu zhags pa dmar nag bri// dur khrod thod pa mtshan ngan du// gang la dmigs pa'i gzugs dang ming// zhing ras la ni bri bar bya// sngo dmar

mkhar nag dril byas la// khyi brgyad thod pa gru gsum bskor// sngon dmar sna brgyad khyi thod gdags// zhing la brtod pa'i tshul du bya// gdug pa sbyar ba'i dud pas bdug/ zhing chen lpags pas g.yab cing
rdul// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs las khyi brgyad spros// gang la dmigs pa bkug cing bstim// gzir mnan drag pos rdul du rlog/ hrIH/ yab yum gnyis su med pa las// sku gsung thugs

las sprul pa ni// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gyed pa'i khy-i// lcags kyi khyi ste mgo brgyad la/ gser dang mu tig ral pa can// rdo rje'i mche ba rtse gsum las// gdug pa'i me zer 'bum 'bum 'phros// rkang lag

bzhi ni lcags phur bzhi// zhe sdang can gyi snying la 'debs// g.yu mdog lcags kyi aM ku sha/ thog dang glog gi gshog pa can// res 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// ci 'gyis zhes ni chas te spyon// lho yi
phyogs nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mos mgo brgyad la// spyan mig nyi zla'i tshul du gnas// shangs kyi rdo rje rlung sgrom nas// rdo rje rtse gcig ser chen 'phro// mche ba rdo rje rtse gsum

las// thog gi bu yug char ltar 'babs// rkang lag rdo rje pA sha hU~M// grul bum rnams kyi snying khrag 'thung// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mo mgo brgyad la// gser gyi ral pa cod paN

can// de yi gseb nas thog thog 'phro// spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba las// khro chu khol ma'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// de yi cha la klu dbang g.yeng// shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'bar ba las// rdo rje 'khor lo'i ser chen

'bebs// mche ba rdo rje rtse gsum las// ye shes bskal ba'i me yang 'bar// rkang lag rdo rje rtse dgu nas// nyan thos kri ya rang sangs rgyas// rdo rje de la bsgom pa'i tshul// g.yu mdog rdo rje s+pho Ta baM// byang gi

phyogs nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mo mgo brgyad la// lcags kyi ral pa cod pan can// shangs nas rdo rje'i 'tshubs ma 'phro// kha na ti ra'i dbyug pa thogs// rkang lag rdo rje rtse gsum la// g.yu mdog

rdo rje g+haN+De ho// byang shar mtshams nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mo rkang brgyad la// g.yu yi ral pa si li li// rkang lag dbang ldan rgyal po gnon// kha mig rna ba'i bu ga nas// phra men thod rus pho nyar

'gyed// spu ni lcags kyu gzings pa 'dra// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs// shar lho mtshams nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mo mgo brgyad la// me ri 'bar ba'i ral pa can// kha nas me dang dug tu

skyugs// spyan nas rdo rje'i ser chen 'bebs// rkang lag drang srong rgyal po gnon// lho nub mtshams nas 'gyed pa'i khy-i// lcags kyi khyi mo mgo brgyad la// rdo rje rtse dgu'i ral pa can// kha mig rna ba'i bu ga

nas// sre mong byi la 'ug pa'i mgo/ dom dred stag gi mche ba can// kang ka dur bya pu shud mgo/ srin mo byi ba smig bu'i mgo/ stag g.yag sha ba gzig gi mgo/ rta dang seng ge phra men ma// rkang lag rdo rje rtse

gsum pos// sha khrag za ba'i srin mo gnon// nub byang mtshams nas 'gyed pa'i khyi// lcags kyi khyi mo mgo brgyad la// g.yu yi ral pa si li li// shangs nas rdo rje'i 'thor rlung 'phro// spyan nas ye shes me yang
'bar// mche ba zang yag gtams pa la// sbrul nag stong gi gdengs kas dkris// sbrul gyi kha nas char chen 'bebs// dug dang me yi skyugs pa 'dor// rkang lag rdo rje rtse gsum pos// rlung lha'i rgyal po

gnon pa'i tshul// oM hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ sarba duSh+tA na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ e a ra li hriM dza hU~M phaT/ tshams rngams bro dang bcas pas te// gzir gnon drag pos brdung bya'o// dregs
pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ za byed khyi brgyad kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis// dregs pa can lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi le'u

'di bka' stsal to// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse phyogs sam// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'go phug tu// maN+Dal byi dor byas pa la// snying khrag bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// dur khrod ro ras khru gang la// rtsibs brgyad yi ge 'bru

brgyad dgod// sha khrag snying sna tshogs pa yi// gtor ma a mr-i ta sbyar la// khrag dang chang sbyar rgyun du sbreng// bdag nyid dbang chen gsal gyur la// 'bru brgyad sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor// gang dmigs
gzugs la gzir mnan bya// ma grub 'bru brgyad go bzlog la// gnad la dbab pa'i 'khor lo bskor// chas rab phyung la dgra dgug 'bod// tsa ma ra yis g.yab cing gdul// grub na sna tshogs gzugs su

ston// 'khor lo dril la phung shul mnan// oM shrI pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro ta phaT/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha na la/ baM hU~M e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// sku bskyed dregs pa dbang du sdud// tha ma las

gzung gzir cing mnan// gyad kyi rngam stabs bro brdung na// srid gsum mthu chen thal bar rlog/ ces gsungs so// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ lha ma srin sde brgyad spyir bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco
brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ gshin rje sde tshan bsgrub pa 'di bka' stsal to// dur khrod ma la yar song la// maN+Dal byi dor byas pa la// bdud rtsi rnam lngas

chag chag gdab// dur khrod ras la ming bris la// tha ma gshin rje sngags kyis bskor// dur khrod thod gshag nang du bcug/ thod pa khar la zhabs mas bcad// sngon dmar byad thag rgya gram bsngam// ag cho

ba nas sngags thun brdeg/ bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms la// dbang du bsdu zhing las la gzud// oM shrI pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya baM hU~M/ e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog

sha thun b+h+yo// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// tsa ma ra yis g.yab cing rdul// lho phyogs snying chen gsung bas bdug/ mtshan ma chung zhing rtags 'gor na// gshin rje'i gsang sngags go bzlog la// dur khrod ras

kyis thod pa gril/ stong lam hom khung rnying par mnan// tsham rngams drag shul bro yang brdung// khams gsum srid gsum thal bar rlog/ ces gsungs so// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gshin rje sgrub
pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ ma mo'i sde tshan sgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// dur khrod mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i sar// gri mo shi ba'i thod pa
ru// tsit+ta rak+ta btsan shug brug/ mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// gru gsum drag po'i gnas su gzhag/ nyung dkar nyung nag drag po la// bdun 'bum drag po'i stobs kyis brdeg/ sha khrag
dmar dang snying sna tshogs// gdung ba'i sems kyi ma tshogs bsten// bshugs pas 'bod cing zhing gis g.yab// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms la// ma tshogs dbang sdud las la gzud// gsung chen dud

pa rgyun mi gcad// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta krota hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ ma rak+mo rak+sha ma snying kha rag dza dzaH/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ srog rtsa snying rtsa rbad// baM hU~M/ e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo/ bdag nyid drag
po'i cha lugs kyis// nyi shu dgu par nyi shar nas/ gang la dmigs pa'i gnas su brdeg/ 'or cig ma grub gsum du sbogs// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// gsang sngags bzlas pa gong bzhin bya// ma rag

mo snying kha rag ma/ rag mo snying rtsa la thun thun/ srog rtsa snying rtsa rbad// smra bcad nyi shu rtsa gcig gi/ bar du nan tan khros la bzlas/ bud med nag mo me reg mas// 'jig rten khams shing 'khrugs ni
bzang// thod khrag gar dmigs par brgyab nas// lo ka 'bar ba'i bros sbyangs na// srid pa bsrub pa'i las su 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ ma mo sde tshan dang bcas pa'i

bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ gza' sde tshan bsgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// ri bo chen po'i khar song la// drag po'i rang bzhin gru
gsum du// gdug pa'i shing las hom byas la// phyogs mtshams brgyad du dmigs la gdab// nyin bzhin dkar gsum sbyin sreg bya// mtshan bzhin dmar dang gsur chen bsreg/ gang dmigs ling+ga de dang
bcas// dus char khyad par shes la bya// drag shul rngam stabs rta bro byas// gcer bu shun brdab 'o dod 'bod// bdag nyid dbang chen skur khros nas// gza' dgu'i dpung dang bcas pa gzir// dbang bsdus

las la gzud par bya// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ pa sha mi ki rA hu la/ hur thums mA ra ya dza dza/ baM hU~M e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// zhes ni gzir zhing mnan byas na// 'khor
ba bsgral ba'i las su 'gyur// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gza' sde tshan dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/

srin po sde tshan bsgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// lho nub kha bltas ri brag tu// mi ro brtsegs pa'i khri la bzhugs// bam chen snying dag kha drag nas// gang dmigs srin po'i sngags dang sbel// snying gar
bcug la tshon skud bsdam// rnal 'byor srin lag g.yon par gdags// bam chen blangs la lho nub bstan// bdag nyid byang shar kha bltas la// srin po gdug pa'i sngags kyis brdeg/ skabs

su bam chen bskor zhing gzhag/ lho nub kha bltas lang ka bod// mi rkang gling bu'i brda' btang la// mi sha mi khrag tshil bus mchod// srin po dbang sdud las la gzud// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro

d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha dza/ hri ta dza/ dur ti/ ra sha na dza/ rak+Sha rbad ni chom/ dgra la nr-i dza/ baM hU~M/ a A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog thun b+h+yo// nyung dkar sngags bzlas srin po'i mdas// lho nub mtshams nas brab byas
na// cog pur 'gyel dang rengs nas 'chi// bam chen gzir mnan bro brdungs na// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i thabs su bsgyur// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ srin po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ bdud kyi sde tshan sgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// brag nag bdud kyi rten gnas par// drag po'i rang bzhin gru gsum du// bam chen

snying shun dmigs dang bcas// tshon skud bdud kyi zhags pas bcings// dmu lug nag po'i thod par stsal// bya nag mtshal bu gzan du bor// sha khrag snying sna tshogs kyis mchod// khyi nag brdung zhing dar nag

g.yab// drag sngags bzlas la nyung dkar brdeg/ bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms la// dbang du bsdu zhing las la gzud// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ tsa thang le bre ba mA ra ya nr-i dza/ baM

hU~M/ e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// khyi nag brdung zhing sngags 'di bzlas/ nag po kha mun dred chod/ dgra la b+h+yo// nag po bdud med ya sha khyed/ che ge mo 'di zlum khyim baM baM ro la 'dus/ za spugs ro
spugs/ bdud rtsis 'byung mos rol/ bdud mos btang bam khyims swA hA// bzlas brjod gnam lcags lta bu ste// gdug pa sbrul gyi sems 'chang bas// lug nag thod par gzir zhing mnan// yas stags

zan brdzis khyi la byin// khyis ma 'dod na bsgrub pa bskyar// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi sde tshan sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma

dbang chen gyis/ gnod sbyin sde tshan sgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// byang du kha bltas dben pa ru// nya sha sgog btsong la phug dang// 'byung po'i kha zas 'khar gzhong bsag/ rin chen sna tshogs brdar byas
la// gnod pa sbyin pa'i tshogs la sbyin// 'bru yi chang ngam chu gtsang gis// rtag tu de la mchod pa bya// dre'u'am ni mdzo yi thod pa ru// gang la dmigs pa'i ming rus gzhug/ gu gul bdug cing dme gos

brdab// dbang chen skur bsgom dbang du bsdus// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ sha i sen ti yam du yak+sha phor pa du hab/ baM hU~M e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// sngags
bzlas skyi ba ram bus brab// de nas mdzo'am dre'u thod la// gzir zhing mnan pa'i rta bros mnan// gnod pa sbyin pa'i lag tu gtad// sngags 'di brgya'am stong du bzlas// hab sha ma ya tri nir zung chum
shig/ mngon spyod drag shul 'di spyad na// 'jig rten spong ba'i las su 'gyur// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin sde tshan sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ klu sde tshan dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u 'di bka' stsal to// byol song gdug pa gnas pa'i sar// rin chen bum par sman dang rtsi// dkar gsum sbyar ba'i gtor mas

mchod// mdze pho'i thod pa gsar ba ru// shel dang phug ma sna bdun gyis// zag pa'i rdzas la gzugs ming bya// gu gul bdug dang tshon gyis bcing// skye tshe nyung gsum sngags bzlas brab// dbang chen skur

bsgoms dbang du bsdu// gdug pa gnas pa'i khyim dag gzhug/ klu nad the tshom med par 'debs// oM shrI badzra pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+hA phaT/ oM ta nan rat+na nA ga pu nA g.yu hU~M dza hU~M dza dza/ baM hU~M e a ra li

hrIM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// sngags 'di sbyor ba'i las byas na// rU tra phung ba'i las su 'gyur// des kyang sbyor ba ma thebs na// mdze pho'i thod pa dme khrag bcas// bra ma'i shing la me btang ste// byol song

gdug pa'i rten par sreg/ sngags 'di bzlas shing khrag bskol la// mdze thod rbab tu sgril byas na// mdze rims the tshom med par yang// nA ga gur ling snying khrag ma mo rul// zhes pa sreg go/ dregs pa tshar
gcod pa'i rgyud las/ klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ lha'i sde tshan sgrub pa 'di bka' stsal to// dri sman me tog chags pa'i

zar// maN+Dal bzang drug byi dor bya// tA la'i shing la ming byang bri// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan gra phyir rten// til gyi gcal bkram steng du gzhag/ tsan+dan smug po'i dud pa btang// spyan gzigs dkor cha'i gtor mas

mchod// gri lcags 'dra yin nam/ lcags las byas pa mde'u rtse gsum// mda' lnga mi rtsib gzhu dang bcas// sngags bzlas dbang po rnam lngar brdeg/ sprul gyi rgyal mtshan dag gis g.yab// sngags bzlas til gyis

brab par bya// dbang chen skur bsgom dbang du bsdu// oM badzra pad+man+ta kr-ita hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha phaT/ la dril ra kha d+he ba a ra pa gi sha ka/ ma ru pa la/ hri a hrI baM hU~M e A ra li hriM dza/ ma hA srog sha thun b+h+yo// tsan+dan

shing la me btang la// tsha ba'i rdzas dang ling+ga bsreg/ g+hi la de ba a ra pa mi bi ka pa ma ra khA hi/ bsreg cing gzir ba'i las byas la// thal ba ling+ga mnan pa'i bro// drag shul rngam pa'i spyod pa

yis// khams gsum rdul du rlog par byed// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ lha sgrub le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ rak+Sha khrag gi lha mo

tsa muN+Da'i bsgrub pa 'di bka' stsal to// dur khrod gsar rnying sar song la/ dkyil 'khor khrag gis chag chag gdab// mtshan ldan bam chen chas su gzhug/ mon thod lha yi gzugs byas la// rak+ta khrag gis rgyun
du mchod// rgyan byas phyag byas dpe byad can// mkhas pas bam la nan tan bya// bam ma rnying na thod par brten// gtad na klu sbal ling+gar bcas// ba dmar glang mchog rwar bcug la// gdug pa gnas pa'i

sa ru gtad// srog rbad bsad pa'i snying po ni// oM ru ti dza ri ti dza dza/ tsa tsa tsi tsi/ trag rak+sha kha mun tri snying kha rag ma ma du b+h+yo// rag mo kha rag tsit+ta kha rag hU~M phaT/ dril ba 'di la rtags byung na// dgu gsogs

gtad dang mnan bsreg bya// oM nr-i khrag tshal pa badzra gu ya tsi ra ma snying la tsa dza dza/ oM thod pa ya ni mA ra ya rtog pa srog ya mi ta hU~M phaT/ oM sos pa shig mi snying la khang du ya ni ro shan gum ya dza/ ro shan mi snying

la nr-i dza/ gnad nas ming nyid 'di skad bskul// gnod sbyin srin mo'i gzugs kyi mthu yis 'khor sdud ma// zhing gsod khrag 'thung dmar mo mkha' 'gro bye ba 'khor// mthing gi rta zhon 'brug gi gtso mo mdzad

cing dgra 'dul ma// sa bdag nad kyis brlag mdzad kha T+wAM ra tra sgrol// phung byed stobs kyis sha rus ma lus gsol// rlung la bcibs shing dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'gro// rnal 'byor las mkhan mkha' 'gro
dpal gyi bka' nyan tha tshig can// bdag gi dgra ni myur du brlag par mdzad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ rak+ta tsa muN+Da'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma sgrub pa 'di bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin ma tshogs gnas pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor khru ni nyis brtsegs la// mgo 'phyangs
mthun pa'i rdzas su bcas// gang dmigs gro shog bris pa la// na chung lag pas g.yas cing brdab// thod pa mtshan ngan khar bcug la// sngon dmar tshon gyis rgya gram bsdam// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa phyogs

mnan// dur khrod thod pa mtshan ngan du// sna tshogs dug dang khrag blugs la// sgrol sngags thod mda' gnas su brdeg/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i las su gyur// srog gi snying po 'di nas bod// ma ma trag rak+sha kha

mun tra snying kha rag mo thun b+h+yo dza dza/ bdag nyid dpal chen skur sgoms la// dbang sdud snying po 'di yis rbad// ma ma nag mo du na/ ma mo ha ra hu ra mu ha la cho cho/ sa ma ya dza dza/ las la gzud pa

'di yis bsad/ ma ma rU tra he rbad na ling/ snying lag gzer// kha phur kha phur ma hA phar b+h+yo// ru lu mA ra ya sod/ nyung dkar thun la sgrol sngags 'di'o// ma tri rag sha ma thun trag hal/ ma hA srog sha snying za

ma thun b+h+yo// 'bur ma gar gyi bka' sdod ma// mgo 'phyangs ci bzhin mdun du dmigs// drag po'i stobs kyi bsgral bar bya// 'bar ma khrag 'thung bro brdung zhing// rngam pa'i rta skad zil gyis mnan// mo nyid

gnad nas 'di skad bskul// hUM/ bskal ba stong gi pha rol nas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i pho nya mo// srin mo 'bum gyi gtso mo ste// srin mo chen mo go 'phyangs ma// dpag tshad kyis kyang sku ma sleb// khrag gi ral

pa dmar po las// lcags kyi ser ba 'bebs pa mo// spyan ni nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'dra// khyod kyi dpral ba'i dbyes nyid las// sme ba sminadrug 'dra ba yod// zhal nas khrag dang zhag 'dzag ma// srin mo'i phrag

pa g.yas pa na// srin mo rnams kyi rgyal mtshan can// srin mo'i phrag pa g.yon pa na// thod pa gsar rnying phreng ba can// phyag ni g.yas pa'i sor mo las/ lcags kyu mang po'i 'phro 'du 'gyed// dgra bo rnams kyi
snying nas 'dren// g.yon pa gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// dgra bo thams cad rdul du rlog/ sbrul nag gdug pas sku la brgyan// mi lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can// zhabs g.yas mi thod khri la

bzhugs// g.yon pa keng rus khri la bzhugs// nag mo khyod kyi zas skal ni// nang ma gcig la mi 'bum gyi// tsit+ta phyung nas za byed ma// nub mo gcig la mi 'bum gyi// snying khrag phyung nas 'thung byed

ma// dam nyams 'di yi tsit+ta phyung// dam nyams 'di yi snying khrag 'thung// lcags kyus 'di yi snying nas drongs// gnod sbyin phyag rgyas sdem la shog/ bsgral ba'i phrin las dus la bab// srin mo khyod kyis
ma btang zhig/ dus la bab po shor ra re// zhes drag brda' cher byas la// khros pas bsgral ba'i las bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dregs pa tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma bsgrub pa'i
le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis/ dgyes pa'i brda' skad phyogs bzhir bsgrags nas/ ha ha dang ru lu dang/ phaT phaT kyi sgra 'brug stong
dus gcig tu ldir ba bsgrags pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dus gcig la g.yos par 'gyur ro// dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad kyang rab tu myos shing brgyal
bar gyur to// 'bar ba chen po mi gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings su slar mnal ba las/ dregs pa can thams cad brgyal sangs nas// sngon gyi dam las mi 'da' zhing bden pa'i bka' la
gnas par gyur to// dregs pa can tshar gcod pa'i rgyud las/ gdug pa spa bkong ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// rgyud 'di ni u rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+mas bsgyur nas// rgyal po byang chub sems
dpa' la gtad nas sbas pa'i man ngag 'di/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog pad+ma dbang chen gyi dregs pa can tshar gcod pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya r
gya//// rgya gar skad du// pad+me shu ra ma hA gu h+ya kro ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal ha ya grI wa la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das ha ya grI wa dbang gi rgyal po de// dbang chen rngams pa 'bar ba'i gnas na// 'khor gyi tshogs pad+ma'i khro bo khro mo rnams dang/ 'jig rten 'dul ba'i

dregs pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma khrag 'thung chen po des/ dbang chen khyad par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos te/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem/ 'degs shing 'jigs la khad par gyur to// 'khor thams cad brgyal te lus sa la rdebs so// srid
pa gsum gyi dregs pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang/ dper na shing lo skam po rlung gis btab pa bzhin du rang la dbang med par dbang du 'dus so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud
zil gyi mnan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas thams cad kyang dbugs phyung ste dran pa rnyed par gyur to// de nas 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// e ma ho bcom ldan 'das dbang chen dpal// pad+ma khrag 'thung dbang chen rgyal// byin rlab cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che// bdag cag snang srid dregs pa can// srog gi snying po nyid la
'bul// dpal gyi bran g.yog pho nya bgyid// ci bgyi la sogs bka' stsal nyan// gal te spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin// ma bgyis bdag cag dregs rnams kyi// mgo lus snying yang 'gas gyur cig/ ces bro
bor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis 'khor du 'dus pa'i dregs pa can de dag dam la btags te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar mngags so// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i
rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yum khro mo pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan 'das rta mchog
dpal// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// nyag gcig dpal la nyan par 'tshal// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu

la// rang byung ye nas dkyil 'khor ni// dbus na gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// thod pa skam rlon 'phreng ba zlum// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// mtha' ma rdo rje me ris

bskor// gru gsum smug nag zla gam dmar// rtsibs bzhi gru chad sgo phyogs tshon// rtsibs mchan mdzes tshon rtsigs pa lnga// 'dod yon dra phyed pha gu dang// rta babs dang bcas rab tu mdzes// dbus kyi gru
gsum bdud nag dag/ pad+ma nyi ma 'od du 'bar// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// pad+ma khrag 'thung rta mchog dpal// sku mdog dmar nag chen po la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas

dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar gnag/ dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// dbu la thod skam lnga yis brgyan// gtsug na rta mgo ljang khu mtsher// sku stod zhing chen glang chen mnabs/ sku smad stag sham thod rlon

phreng// rigs bzhi'i sbrul rgyan chas rnams rdzogs// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs// smin ma sma ra ag tshom ser// pad+ma lcags kyu be con g.yas// b+han dmar zhags pa ral gri g.yon// zhabs bzhi

brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// g.yon na yum chen khro mo ni// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog sngon nag dur khrod chas// dbu ral nag po rin chen spras// khro tshul spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// g.yas

'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// shar gyi rtsibs la dri za'i gdan// rdo rje dbang chen khro bo'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis shin tu khros// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par ldan// rdo rje thod dbyug phyag na

bsnams// lho yi rtsibs la grul bum gdan// rin chen dbang chen khros pa'i sku// rin chen lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// nub kyi rtsibs la klu dbang gdan// pad+ma dbang chen khros pa'i sku// pad+ma zhags pa phyag na

bsnams// byang gi rtsibs la gnod sbyin gdan// phrin las dbang chen khro bo'i sku// ral gri kha T+wAM phyag na bsnams// bzhi ka'ang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// chas brgyad me dpung klong na bzhugs// sgo bzhir

sgo ma bzhi gnas te// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// dkar ser dmar ljang dur khrod rgyan// de ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las rang bzhin gyi dkyil
'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yum pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rta mchog dpal// rtsa ba'i sgrub

dang phrin las dang// drag po las kyi rim pa rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i phrin las 'di bshad do// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i phyir// pad+ma
dbang chen sgrub thabs brtsam// dbang drod dang ldan slob dpon 'khur// brtson 'grus ldan pas rtse gcig bsgrub// dur khrod ri brag dmar po la// nub ri mtho brjid shar ri dma'// nags tshal stug po nub

tu bltas// nam mkha' pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra// nyi zla gza' skar 'od 'bar zhing// chu bran ri brag kun 'dud par// tsha tsha sbyin gtang mdo sde 'don// 'dus byas dge rtsa nus tshad bya// dur khrod ri lhun thal

chen la// maN+Dal khru gang gru gsum pa// gru bzhi rtsibs la khrag snas byug/ grub sman bdud rtsi'i go ma ye// dkyil 'khor bris la rgyan rnams dgram// dbus su pad+ma b+han d+ha ru// skyes pa dar ma bud med

gzhon// me tog sna tshogs pad+ma'i mdangs// gling lnga'i kha bcad dar dmar gril// hU~M gis rgyas btab bdud rtsi blugs// nub sgor 'bru sna sha ru tshogs// me tog sna tshogs gtor ma bsham// bdud rtsi rak+ta phyi

mchod lnga// bla re 'phan gdug phreng ba dang// gling bu gsur dang keng rus bsham// dur khrod ras la sku bris te// rab gnas byas la nub tu dgram// de ltar rdzas rnams rab rdzogs nas// rang nyid skad cig
ting 'dzin gyis// pad+ma khrag 'thung sku ru bskyed// thugs kyi snying po 'od 'phros pas// phyogs bcur me mtshon khro bo'i gur// de ltar gsal bas mtshams bcad do// hU~M dpal chen mi bzad dkyil 'khor
nas// 'bar ba'i khro bo me dpung 'bar// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// bgegs dang log 'dren rdul du rlog/ dbang chen me dpung dmar nag 'bar// bskal ba dus mtha'i me lta bu// dbang drag

mtshon cha brag ltar gtams// gang la bab kyang gcod cing sgrol// dbang chen khro bo mi bzad rngams// srid pa'i ye shes 'khor lo 'khrigs// dbang chen mtshams las gang 'da' ba// rdul phran bzhin du rlag

par gyis// de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la// yi dam lha rnams spyan drangs la// sdig sgrib bshags pa gang rung bya// de nas mchod pa byin gyis brlab// raM gyis sbyangs la a yis spel// phyi mchod lha mo lnga ru

brlab// nang mchod 'dod yon longs spyod brlab// de ltar rdzogs nas phrin las gzhung bsrang ngo// hU~M chos nyid nam mkha' klong yangs nas// chos rnams sna tshogs rang shar ba// rang bzhin med pa chu zla

'dra// thugs rje chen po kun la khyab// snying po ye shes hU~M gi dbyibs// chen po lnga yi snying po lnga// 'byung ba lnga yi dwangs ma chags// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// chos kyi dbyings kyi

gnas chen po// 'khor lo dbang chen pho brang ldan// phyi nang med pa yongs su gsal// gdan steng sku bskyed dbang bskur cing// byin gyis brlab pa rab tu bya// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las// sprul pa'i
dkyil 'khor rab tu gdon// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces so// hU~M
chos kyi dbyings las sku bzhengs pa// dbang chen khros pa'i rgyal po bzhengs// dbus kyi ye shes gzhal yas nas// pad+ma rta mchog gshegs su gsol// yum chen khro mo gshegs su gsol// phyogs bzhi 'khor
lo rtsibs stengs nas// sprul pa'i khro bo gshegs su gsol// sgo bzhi gnas kyi gzhal yas nas// sgo ma bzhi rnams gshegs su gsol// hU~M dpal chen khro bo mi bzad pa// rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal

lo// khro mo yum la phyag 'tshal lo// sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sgo srung bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M dam tshig dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// hU~M bdug spos
snang gsal zhugs tog sgra// zhal zas dri chab gtsang ma 'di// pad+ma dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes su gsol// hU~M rang byung gdod nas

rnam par dag/ rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// 'chi med bdud rtsi rA sa yan// dam rdzas mchog gi mchod pa 'di// khro rgyal pad+ma dbang chen la// bdag gis dad pas 'bul
lags kyi// bzhes te 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol// 'chi med bdud rtsi rA' sa yan// dam rdzas mchog gi mchod pa 'di// yum chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la// bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te
'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol// 'chi med bdud rtsi rA' sa yan// dam rdzas mchog gi mchod pa 'di// sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi rnams la// bdag gis dad pas 'dul lags kyi// bzhes te 'phrul gyi dngos grub

stsol// 'chi med bdud rtsi rA sa yan// dam rdzas mchog gi mchod pa 'di// sgo srung chen po bzhi rnams la// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyi// bzhes te 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol// hU~M ye shes khro bo dbang

chen gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ rnal 'byor lus ngag yid la thim// gnyis med gyur nas brtan pa che// hU~M rnam dag rang byung grub sman 'di// pad+ma dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa
'bul lo kha raM khA hi// rak+ta dmar gyi mchod pa 'di// pad+ma dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// gsang ba thabs dang shes rab las// pad+ma nor bu mnyam sbyar

nas// dgyes pa chen po bde chen dang// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'di// pad+ma dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hU~M zhing gyur thams cad rang bzhin bsgral// sha khrag srog
dbugs mchod pa 'di// pad+ma dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// khyad par 'dod yon mchod pa'i mchog/ sha khrag keM rus gtor ma yis// khro rgyal dbang chen thugs dam
bskang// yum chen khro mo'i thugs dam bskang// sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// hU~M bdag cag ma rig nyon mongs sems can gyi// bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te// pad+ma dbang chen lha tshogs

kyi// thugs dang 'gal ba'i las ni ci bgyis pa// thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsol/ pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las

phrin las kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las/ sngags 'di bstan to// oM raM kro tang ka shwa badzra dz+wa la raM/ tik+Sha bi shwa dz+wa la raM/ phaT phaT/ raM raM/ oM badzra d+hU pe A

hU~M/ puSh+pe A hU~M/ A lo ke A hU~M/ gan+d+he A hU~M/ ni wi d+ye A' hU~M/ sha b+ta A hU~M/ oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M/ oM ma hA pad+ma rak+ta hU~M/ oM ma hA ba liM ta pU dza hU~M/ A+oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na sa mA tiM hU~M/ d+ha ma d+hA tu sa mA ti hU~M/ hU~M dz+nyA na badzra sa

mA ti hU~M/ hU~M e yaM raM khaM suM keM b+h+rUM/ e ag+ni maN+Dal/ yaM karma raka sha maN+Dal/ raM dz+wa ya maN+Dal/ khaM rak+ta maN+Dal/ suM suk+Sh+me maN+Dal/ b+hUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Dal/ ru dra baM d+he ba baM/ ya ma baM/ nA ga baM/ yak+sha baM/ paM

pad+ma maN+Dal/ ma sUr+ya maN+Dal/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal/ hri ma spa ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hU~M/ tiSh+tha badzra hU~M/ oM ma hA kro ta ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro tI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ oM AHhU~M/ hU~M oM aM ha/ hU~M badzra he ru ka kro tI

shwa rI hU~M phaT/ oM bud+d+ha he ru ka kro tI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ swa rat+na he ru ka kro tI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma he ru ka kro tI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ ha karma he ru ka kro tI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ a pi Shiny+tsa hU~M hU~M paM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ badzre shwa rI

kro tI hU~M phaT/ rat+ne shwa rI kro tI hU~M phaT/ pad+me shwa rI kro tI hU~M phaT/ karme shwa rI kro twi hU~M phaT/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hU~M/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+Da hoH/ sa mA dzaH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA badzra d+hA tu sa

pa ri wA ra dzaHhU~M baM ho:/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM na ma:sarba ta thA ga badzra d+hU pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na ma:sarba ta thA ga ta badzra puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma

ye hU~M/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta badzra A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma ya hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra ni wi d+ye pU

dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra shab+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ya rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta pU dza khA hi khA hi/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi khA hi/ oM pad+ma su kha

bo d+hi tsit+ta swA hA/ oM ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA mAM sa khA hi/ ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ ma hA ko ro tsa na khA hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ keM ni ri ti khA hi/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi pi pa ho/ pad+ma dbang chen yang
gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs kyi mchod pa dang/ bsnyen pa'i rim gnyis bshad do// longs spyod traM la hriHyis bsangs// aHyis

sbyangs la 'dod yon gyis// lha mo'i tshogs su byin gyis brlabs/ oM sarba bi shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA rat+na ka ma la d+he bi shud+d+he hU~M// hU~M rang bzhin rnam dag ngang nyid las// sprul pa'i khro bo mi bzad pa// pad+ma dbang

chen dkyil 'khor lha// longs spyod tshogs la gshegs su gsol// pad+ma ka ma lA ya s+t+waM hU~M dzaH// hU~M sprul pa'i khro bo 'bar ba yis// zhing bcu ma lus thams cad dang// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs rgya dbral

nas// dug lnga dbyings su bsgral bar bya'o// mA ra ya phaT// dang por bar dang tha ma la// bstod dang gshegs dang bstab pa bya// hU~M mdzes sdug gzugs kyi mchod pa 'di// dbang chen dkyil 'khor spyan la

'bul// spyan gyi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ gzugs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// snyan pa sgra yi mchod pa 'di// dbang chen dkyil 'khor snyan la 'bul// snyan gyi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ sgra yi mchod pa
bzhes su gsol// dri zhim ngad kyi mchod pa 'di// dbang chen dkyil 'khor shangs la 'bul// shangs kyi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ dri yi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// ro mngar zhal zas mchod pa 'di// dbang
chen dkyil 'khor ljags la 'bul/ ljags kyi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ ro yi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// 'jam pa reg bya'i mchod pa 'di// dbang chen dkyil 'khor sku la 'bul// sku yi thugs dam skong

gyur cig/ reg bya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// gzugs kyi lha mo sku mdog dkar// gzugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs 'dzin// dbang chen khro bo'i spyan la 'bul// sgra yi lha mo sku mdog sngo// sgra yi longs spyod

sna tshogs 'dzin// dbang chen khro bo'i snyan la 'bul// dri yi lha mo sku mdog ser// dri yi longs spyod sna tshogs 'dzin// dbang chen khro bo'i shangs la 'bul// ro yi lha mo sku mdog dmar// ro yi longs spyod sna
tshogs 'dzin// dbang chen khro bo'i ljags la 'bul// reg bya'i lha mo sku mdog ljang// reg bya'i longs spyod sna tshogs 'dzin// dbang chen khro bo'i sku la 'bul// bar ba gong gi bshags pa

bya// tha ma ling+ga bstab pa bya// hU~M sha khrag rus pa nang khrol mkhris// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mchod pa 'bul// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las dngos por bzhes

su gsol// hrIHbdag nyid khro rgyal rta mchog dpal// thugs kar pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// ge sar la ni snying po hrIH// 'dab ma brgyad la sngags kyis bskor// 'od 'phros bde gshegs rnams la thim// phyi nang
gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po bsdus// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// de ltar gsal bas rgyun du bgrangs// mchod pa gsum yar 'dzab bstod bya// sku nyid dngos su mthong

ba'am// slob dpon nyi zla mgo la 'char// rdzas la me 'bar 'od 'phro zhing// sgrub khang g.yo 'gyur sgrar chen 'byung// pad+ma'i sdong por bdag 'dug dang// snang srid me tog pad+mas khengs// sangs rgyas nyag
gcig chos nyan pa// mi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang// mthong nas dngos grub dam rdzas blang// dag po'i las rnams kun la sbyar// mtshan ma ma mthong las rtsom pa// 'ja' tshon sbar 'dzin don med

yin// hrIHpad+ma rigs kyi khro rgyal mchog/ dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ mi bzad khro bo rta mchog dpal// dbang drag stobs chen rngom brjid gtum// sku mdog dmar nag brjid cing 'gying// dbu gsum rnam thar
gsum yang ston// phyag drug rgyu drug rtsad nas gcod// zhabs bzhi 'khor ba'i chos bzhi sgrol// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la rdzogs// rta mgo ljang zhur rta skad mtsher// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na

bzhugs// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong sgrog/ dregs pa pho mo dbang du sdud// dbang chen sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ hU~M khro rgyal rngam pa'i rta mchog dpal// dpal gyi sku gsung thugs mchog las// mchog gi dngos

grub ye shes dbyig/ dus 'dir rnal 'byor bdag la stsol// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita pad+me shwa ri ma hA kro ta ha ya grI wa/ ma ma drag mo dun ting hriM hriM hU~M dzaH/ oM pad+ma kro ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi a la la ho// pad+ma dbang chen
yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drag po'i las 'di bshad do// stegs bu'i dbus su drag po'i sa// phung sa gsum gyis 'brub khung

brtsig/ khru gang mtho gang dpangs su bya// phyi ru khrag ni sna tshogs byug/ nang du rgya sol dug sna byug/ kha khyer grangs med rtsang gis bskor// rten drug ling+ga sor brgyad la// ming rus gro ga snying gar bslan// tsha ba
gsum dang dug snas byug/ dbang po dod byas byad du gzhug/ srubs drug thod pa dong du gnag/ bdag nyid dbang chen 'khor rnams bskyed// sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi po las// yang sprul khro chung
bsam mi khyab// lcags kyu zhags pa phyag na bsnams// khros pas brnag pa'i snying ske bzung// gzugs la rang dbang med par bstim// sum yar bskul zhing gzhung yang bsrang// brun gsum gzhob gnyis mu

zi dang// gu gul bdug pas lha dang dbral// stong dang bcu ru shes par bya// dgra bo dngos sam kho yi phyugs// dud 'gro 'ching bkyigs skye shing gcod// ma phyung bar du dgug cing dbye// rtags byung gsod

pa'i las bya'o// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// oM badzra kro ta tsaN+Da rA' ga/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba hUM lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ ma ma sha ri pad+ma raka sha b+h+yo/ kro ta thum ril rag sha srog la b+h+yo// nr-i aM ku sha dza dza/ srog la

khug sa ma ya dza/ d+he ba pra be sha phaT phaT/ de nas bsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// rabs chad nag po'i ka pA la// yungs kar nyung nag skye tshe dang// dug bzhi khrag lnga thal chen dang// tsher ma sna tshogs gcan gzan

sder// mtshon cha sna tshogs me stag rlab// rgyab nas gzugs la thun brab pas// me stag mtshon cha rtsa srog gcod// khrag skam lus dang shes pa dbye// bskul dang mchod pa sum yar bya// dgra bo dngos bsad sha

zos sam// kho'i phyugs dngos bsad rang nyid byed// dud 'gro bsad pa'i sha skyel ba// mtshan ma mthong nas ling+ga dril// lha 'dre che ba'i sa ru mnan// 'byung ba lto gshags 'og tu brnag/ 'byung ba rim

brtsegs ri rab dang// dbang chen pad+ma'i pho brang gdab// thun ni zor 'phangs nad snar dbab// srog chags phung zhing rlag par byed// de dag ngan sngags 'di lta ste// hrI ha ya grI ba rag sha rbad/ thun bsod

pad+mAn+ta kr-ita ta dgra bo che ge mo'i snying la thun rbad/ ma ma rag sha dgra bo'i srog la thun rbad/ trag mo rtsal thur snying la khas rbad snying thur khas rbad/ kro ta rag sha d+ha ra dgra bo'i snying la rbad thun// mA ra ya rbad/ staM

b+ha ya nan/ sha truM nan/ thum ril ha na ha na tsit+ta la breng/ shag hri b+h+yo b+h+yo/ pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las// thun gyis bsad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

drag sngags bdun pa'i 'khor lo mnan gtad 'di bshad do// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// drag po'i khyim gang mtshon cha mngag/ dur khrod ras la dug snas byugs// khrag sna tshogs kyis 'khor lo
bri// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs chen bdun// mtha' mar me ri ra bas bskor// dbus su ling+ga ming rus brnag/ zla gam gsum la
srung ba'i sngags// rtsibs bdun drag sngags mtshon pa re// me ri mnan dang 'phang sngags dang// kha sbyor yab yum lto ba bca'// dong brtsegs mkha' la lding du gzhug/ yungs kar khrag sna dug
snas byug/ sum yar mchod bskul btags la dbab// thon nas ling+ga 'khor lo bcas// gdug pa can gyi snying la gtad// bla sogs mtshon chas dbus su bstim// lha yi dbang po'ang sgrol bar nges// de dag

drag sngags 'di lta ste// oM hri pad+ma b+han+d+ha hri dbang/ hri tsaN+Da rak+sha srog la rbad/ hri pad+man+ta kr-ita snying la rbad/ hri ha ya grI ba mA ra ya rbad/ hri ba mo d+ha ya rA ga mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma trag shig tsit+ta la rbad b+h+yo/ kro ta rak+sha

dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ rbad nan b+h+yo// gsad pa rbad la mnan pa nan// 'phang la b+h+yo zhes yul la mngag/ drag sngags bdun pa'i 'khor lo bshad// gzhan yang dus kyi snyigs ma la// zhe sdang rbod gtong

drag po 'khrugs// sngags pa nang dme byed pa'i tshe// dme thab dmar po'i drag sngags mngag/ 'di yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rten drug ling+ga sor bcu gnyis// dbang po dod pa'i snying ga ru// zhing chen pags pa'i

gzugs bris te// dug dang tshab gsum gyis byug/ dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// lte bar lha srung yod tshad bri// mtha' mar drag sngags mtshon chas bskor// 'khor sngags yan lag bzhi la dgod// snying
gar bcug la mon thod mnan// dong du bcug la thun gyis brab// 'khor lo dang bcas phur pas gdab// sum yar mchod bskul 'bum gsum bzlas// thon nas 'khor lo thod par gzhug/ kho yi mkhar gyi

'gram la sba// kho yi lha srung bdud du babs// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// hri pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka/ g+h+ri ya ha ta kro badzra ma sad kro pa ta ra tsag shog rag ma ma ri shwa sha rag trag ta tro trid pad+ma shrI he ru shad shad

dza phaT/ dgra bo tsit+ta pra ma ya thums rbad/ srog mA ra ya rbad// mA ra ya sod/ ma hA ba la pad+mAn+ta kr-ita suM laM khaM paM stam b+ha ya nan/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA krota pad+mAn+ta krota tsaN+Da rA ga ba shaM mA ra ya kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT/

dug gsum khrag sna 'bru gsum brdeg/ gri lcags seng ldeng phur bu ni// khro zhal pad+ma'i dpal ldan brdeg/ sngags pa nang rgyas sbyor bar bshad// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo nang

rgyas kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa 'di bshad do// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba'i phyir// skyin thang chu 'khyags sbyor ba rtsom// sngon du rtsa ba'i drod thon

pas// maN+Dal dang ni 'brub khur la// gang 'bebs pa yi rdzas kyi byug/ dong bur mi ra rta khyi phag/ 'bru gsum thun byas mi mdzo rta'i// thod par yul rdzas ming dang dbyibs// ser bsrung 'og tu thun rnams
brnag/ bdag nyid dong bu nam mkha' la// gzhal yas khang du dkyil 'khor bskyed// sprin gtib glog 'khyug 'brug sgra sgrog/ bu yug 'tshub cing ser ba 'bebs// gsal ba'i mchod pa sum

yar 'bul// thun ni rdor dang rta la brab// skya shar lug khyu ser ba 'dril// rkang 'bebs 'khyags pa lo thog snga// de mthong rda ma yul dbus btsan// klu gnyan gdug pa can la gtad// de nas thun gsum zor
la brab// sum yar bskul zhing mchod pa 'bul// 'bum bzlas ser ba'i dus rnams su// ngan sngags bdag mo rnam bzhi dang// khyab 'jug chen po las la mngag/ de nas dus brgyad gang rung la// zor
'phangs bskul dang drag tu rbad// gal te des kyang stobs zhen na// klu gnas chu mig gnyan po ru// me sbar zor bskol lo thog bsreg/ tshil bzhi 'bog dang mu zi bsreg/ thab byas thal 'jim phyogasabacur

gtor// de nas skyin thang gdon mi za// de nas ngan sngags 'di lta ste// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita phroM phroM/ tsaN+Da rA ga phroM phroM// ha ya gr-I wa phroM phroM/ ma ma trag rak+sha phroM phroM/ hu lu hu lu phroM

phroM/ badzra rag sha ga te phroM phroM/ ma ra tsa sha phroM phroM/ hril hril shar shar/ trag tu hril b+h+yo// hri la phrel rA hu la badzra yag sha ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag hril shar/ lo thog la phob/ ma ma khrag la mu sha ma snying rtsa sha ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma rA tsa sha hril thim 'ur yaM traM sib b+h+yo/

lo thog la phob/ oM hri ba shaM ku ru pad+ma shrI he ru ka ha ya grI pa pad+ma rA ga tsan+da hri/ nA ga shu la/ d+he ba tri gnan/ lo thog la b+ha ri sha rbad/ ha na ha na shar phob ya/ gzhan yang gnam thog dbab pa ni// gri bo'i thod

pa dmar chod du// mon tshil rta tshil 'bri dug pa// gri khrag sna tshogs gri thogs lcags// bya yi rkang rus byi la'i gcin// gling drug thod pas steng nas dgab// gser rgod phung rgod dkrug sngags bri// bka'
bstod lnga bcas dkyil 'khor bskyed// yungs kar yungs nag brab cing bzlas// rdzas rnams khol 'phel 'chad 'tshegs na// gri mdas zhabs nas rlogs te 'phang// thod mkhar 'gram la rta dmar sba// me

dang lcags kyi gza' la rtsom yang rtsi// gnam lcags 'bar ba nges par 'bab// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// hri raM ba shaM ku ru pad+ma b+han+d+ha ba d+he ba tsaN+Da rA ga pad+ma ti dz+wa la raM/ ya ma sha ri trag rag khrag la rngubs dzra

la raM/ rA hu la pi pi badzra ya ga dz+wa la raM/ ma ma khrag la mu sha dz+wa la raM/ ma ma khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ tsa ram sha dz+wa la raM/ badzra shad shad dgra bo'i srog la rbad raM// thog thog gnam lcags ur mo dgra bo'i srog la b+h+yo
b+h+yo/ mA ra ya rbad/ phob phob// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ thog ser dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung gzigs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
rnal 'byor rang bsrung 'khor bsrung bas// gdon chen btsan thabs gzir ba yis// las kyi 'khor lo 'di lta ste// rgya shog dug dang tsha bas byug/ dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru gsum

gdon la zla gam stong// phyi rol lcags mkhar rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs rtsibs la spu gri dgod// kha sbyar yab yum lto bar bca'// gang gnod rdzas la ling+ga bca'// ming rta tho mo snying gar brnag/ thod chen
bcug pa dong du brnag/ yungs kar dug brab gu gul dang// dug gsum dang ni mu zi dang// brun gsum tshil gsum gzhob pas bdug/ ting 'dzin gsal ba'i phur bu gdab// khro tshogs 'od zer gzir myos
brgyal// gang gdon bskyel ba gdan du 'ding// mthong nas bka' rten mgo nas mnan// klu gnyan sa bdag zug pa la// phag tshil sbrul brun yin nam dang gla rtsi byug/ ga pur mngar gsum bzang drug

rnams// skar chu dang sbyar khong du gtang// gong gi rdzas bdug gang gnod par// tsha tshogs sbong la sbyar la byug/ kha dmar glang dmar chus sbyar gtang// snying la dud thun phur pas gdab// sri'ur rin chen sna lnga

gdags// phyugs nad sman lnga skye ru gdags// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da rA ga ba shaM ku ru/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra kro ta ha ya grI ba tsaN+Da rak+sha// ma hA ba la/ ma me shwa rI pad+ma kro tI hri

hri/ sarba duSh+tAM trig nan/ ha na ha na pa tsad na tsit+ta rbad nan/ myag thum ril rbad/ hur thum dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ stam b+ha ya nan/ gzhan yang las rnams mtha' sdud pa// sreg pa me yi sbyor ba bya// mi thab dmar po

gru gsum la// dug khrag tsha ba gsum gyis byug/ gang gnod rdzas sam rten drug la// ling+ga sor brgyad gan rkyal mnan// yam shing seng ldeng mdzo mo dang// tsher gnag glang kal bra skyer se// dug ril bag phye

mar nag btsos// mi rta bya phag sha tshil khrag/ yungs kar nyungs nag skye tshe dang// dug sna mtshal dang 'o ma chags// mar nag la sogs bsreg pa'i rdzas// bdag nyid me thabs dkyil 'khor bskyed// me lha
dmar ser ra la zhon// me dar lcags kyu bka' bstod mngags// zhag gsum yar bskul sngags bzlas bsreg/ thon nas thal 'jim gnod pa'i khar// gnan dang 'phang pa'i las bya'o// de nas bsad

gzir las 'grub ste// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// oM pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma hA tsaN+Da pad+man+ta kr-ita b+ha na d+ha ha ya grI ba/ na mo d+he ba tsaN+Da rA ga pad+ma kro tI shwa rI ma ma trag dun hri/ g+ha ba sha ri ka dz+wa la raM kha raM khA hi/

mA ra ya dz+wa la raM/ ag na ye dz+wa la raM/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ dz+wa la raM dz+wa la raM/ mA ra ya rbad raM/ u kri kri ta ya rA' ga rA ga/ a ti u ti ya/ rA ga rA ga/ pad+ma b+ha na d+ha rA ga rA ga/ gri khrag sna tshogs bsreg byas
na// gri ru 'chi ba gdon mi za// rims khrag yungs mo dug de bzhin// sbal sha bse zhom dze yis 'dzin// chud gu a chus sbos grir 'chi// sgog skya mu zi gu gul gyis// gdon du srub nas rims

kyis 'debs// ba glang lci ba dang ma shing// bse zho gdon de khrag tu skyugs// til dang me tog bdud rtsi yis// rang gi bsod nams skyed pa yin// khu byug rtsa yis nor 'phel te// byis dang 'bras bu rigs

rgyud 'phel// ru ta chu dag rgya sbos dang// sri yang ku dang lan tshwa dang// pad+ma ge sar nA ga dbus// bsregs te dud pas rang la bdug/ mi yi rgyal po bdag dbang 'gyur// khros dang dgra rkun brtse zhing
byams// bud med kun gyi yid du 'ong// gcan gzan gdug pa can kun byams// skye 'gro kun kyang bdag dbang 'gyur// 'dre gdon kun dang mi gnod bsrung// de dag bsreg pa'i las yin no// pad+ma dbang
chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ bsrung gzir dang sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yul pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// pad+ma dbang chen
bcom ldan 'das// khyad par nye bar drag po'i las// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par drag po'i las 'di bshad do// spu gri lta bu'i sbyor ba
'di// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba rtags rdzogs pas// ye shes dpal gyi gtor ma bca'// bshos du dkar po'i mkhar thabs la// g.yu bad gser sgo gser gyi skad khung

can// ljang bu dkar po ra lug bya// snying dang gzugs tsam de ltar bca'// shar du bshos bu gru bzhi dkar// ba dan dkar po ra dkar snying// lho ru bshos bu gru bzhi ldem// ba dan ser po ra yi snying// nub tu
bshos bu gru bzhi gnag/ ba dan nag po ra yi snying// byang du bshos bu zur gsum snying// ba dan dmar po ra dmar snying// bdag nyid dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// gying lnga bka' sdod las la
mngag/ dmigs pa'i bla tshe bkrag mdangs 'gugs// rtsa dang srog gcod lus srog 'brel// gru gsum rten drug ling+ga brnag/ phye gsum yungs kar dug sna khrag/ 'brub khung gzugs la sngags la brdeg/ 'od
dkar tshub nag me 'bar gzugs mthong ba// rang rang gzugs kyi mi rta nye ba yin// gsod pa'i rtags byung ling+ga gnyan sar mnan// zor 'phang smyo 'bog 'thib dang gri gzir gsod// de dag drag sngags 'di

lta ste// oM ha ya gri ba hri dbang pad+ma ban d+ha hri dbang pad+ma d+he ba hri dbang// tsakra a bi hri/ tsan d+ha rak+sha hri dbang ba shaM ku ru hri dza/ rA tsa srog la hri/ a shug me ri srog la dza/ hri dun dun badzra ba tri shu la g+h+ri ba tsa pa la

a shug tsa tri'i dza/ dgra bo'i snying la khyer b+h+yo/ tsa pa la mi tri khyair b+h+yo// nr-i dun dun srog khug dza dza/ a shug rtsa ba la g+h+ri na pa la hri/ li ma dun dun khi shag ru tri/ dgra bo'i snying myog rbad/ snying khrag

rngubs dun yun rol yaM yaM rbad/ ro myags tshal thum liM ti ti/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ hri ba ya nan/ stam ba ya nan/ kha long ka cho ho thum ril shu la sad tra dgra bo la b+h+yo/ gying lnga drag po'i sbyor ba bshad// gzhan

yang chu rgod sbyor ba ni// sngon du rtsa ba'i rtags thon pas// chu dar dang ni rgya shog la// dbus su yul gyi ser bsrung bri// phyi rim rtsa bzhi 'bru bzhi dgod// yang logs chu ris zlum po la// ming sring bcas pa'i
drag sngags dgod// kha sbyar yul gyi rdzas kyis byugs// thod chen gang bzhugs dong du brnag/ dong bu'i zor thun gong bzhin bcas// mtshan ma mthong nas yul dbus kyi// klu la gta' gzhug zor 'phang

bskul// sbobs na bsregs shing thab bya gtor// des ni chu 'khyags lo la 'bebs// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// oM pad+ma b+han d+ha hri dbang// ha ya grI ba hri dbang// tsaN+Da ga sha hri dbang// tsaN+Da ga sha hri

dbang// ba shang ku ru hri dbang/ phroM phroM shar shar yaM hril/ badzra yag sha ya ma snying myog/ ya ma khrag rA hu la phroM phroM hril hril shar shar/ rtsar ma shag ru tri/ thibs ru pa'i hril// rA hu la phroM phroM/ ya ma snying myog/ ya

ma khrag phroM phroM badzra yag sha phroM phroM/ drag tu phob phob/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya b+h+yo/ tsa ra rag seg traM si ba b+h+yo/ tril shar phob phob/ nA' ga du la na la b+ha ra shas da drag tu phob phob/ dbab pa chu yi 'khor lo bshad// gzhan

yang dbang chen las mchog ni// ri rgyal sa dang mi yi rgyal po/ bka' rten byin can dur khrod kyi// sa la 'brub khung zla gam bya// mtshal dang rgya skyegs tsan+dan byugs// gang gnod rdzas la gzugs byas la// ming

byang snying po snying gar bri// thod pa srubs med nang du gzhug/ seng ldeng mes bsro tshol chen dang// mngal khrag tsan+dan rgya skyegs dang// gi'u wang bse zho byugs shing bzlas// me tog dmar po mchod cing
gtor// dgra la de bzhin rten drug gzug/ dar dmar grol la sum yar mchod// bdag nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sprul pa'i khro chung dmar nag ni// lag na lcags kyu zhags pa thogs// snang srid kun
khengs 'od du 'bar// gang la dmigs pa'i snying skye bzung// bla srog drangs te gzugs la bstim// yul gsum gsal bas drag tu bzlas// bskul sngags thon nas rang 'og sba// gzhan gyi rbod gtong drag po
dang// srid pa'i spyi bgegs thams cad dang// gnod sbyin ma rungs pa kun dang// gcan gzan gdug pa mche sder can// rwa can la sogs ma rungs pa// kun kyang bdag la dbang nyer 'dud// rin chen sna

bdun 'bru sna tshogs// zas sna tshogs kyi rten sbyar na// snang srid zas nor dbang du 'du// de yi gsang sngags 'di lta ste/ oM hri hri pad+man+ta kr-ita bA shaM ku ru hri ha ya grI ba ba shaM ku ru hri/ tsaN+Da tsan+da shrI ba

shaM ku ru hri/ pad+ma rA ga pa shaM ku ru hri/ hri dbang ba shaM ma na ya hri hri dza dza rA ga dun dun/ dbang chen sbyor ba'i dam par bshad// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba rnam gsum gyi le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro rgyal pad+ma'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i bskul ba 'di bshad do// hrIHrang bzhin chos kyi sku la rang byung ba// dmar nag gru gsum dbang gi dkyil

'khor nas// pad+ma 'khyil ba dbang chen khro bo'i sku// thugs rje thabs kyi sprul sku bzhengs su gsol// bdud pho bdud mo phyi chings bsnol ba'i khri// chags med pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan stengs na// dus gsum dbang

bsgyur ye shes lha yi lha// dbang chen khrag 'thung ha ya grI ba'i sku// sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum rngam 'gying brjid pa'i sku// spyan gsum zhal bgrad dbang gi mche ba

gtsigs// smin ma sma ra ag tshogs me ltar 'bar// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'khyil// spyi gtsug rta mgo ljang gu zil gnon rngam// rngog ma dmar po dbang gi rta skad mtsher// g.yas dkar g.yon ljang

dbus dmar rngam sgra sgrogs// sku stod zhing chen g.yang gzhi glang chen ko rlon gsol// sku smad stag gi sham thabs bdud dpung 'dul// thod rlon tshar gsum phreng bas rgyan du byas// sbrul rigs bzhi yis sku
brgyan phyag zhabs spras// dang po pad+ma b+han d+has dbang du sdud// bar pa lcags kyu zhags pas dmigs pa 'gugs// tha ma be con ral gris dgra bgegs sgrol// dbang drag me dpung klong dkyil rin chen

spras// sku la dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par ldan// dbang chen gdug pa'i spyan rtsa bzlog pa yis// snang srid drag po thams cad dbang du sdud// shangs nas rlung nag 'tshub ma'i bskal pa 'byung// snang srid
kun gtor mthu chen drag rtsal 'dul// snyan nas bskal ba'i 'brug stong lding ba yis// srid pa'i che btsan thams cad zil gyis gnon// tshems las drag po'i thog chen 'bab pa yis// sdang dgra gdon
bgegs thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ zhal nas rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrug cing 'khyil// bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra la skyin thang phob// khro rgyal dbang gi rta skad tse re re// thugs rje dbang chen che btsan

dbang du sdud// pad+ma dbang chen khrag 'thung mi bzad pa// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus la bab// sdang dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ hrIH/ khro rgyal dbang chen sku yi g.yon phyogs nas// khro mo pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
ma// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// spyan gsum zhal bgrad dbang gi mche ba gtsigs// dbu skra ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs// sku la dur khrod chas brgyad legs par
