ldan// phyag g.yas tsit+ta thogs nas yab la 'khyud// phyag g.yon dung chen dmar 'khyil gtso la stob// khro mo kun gyi dbang phyug chen mo khyod// rngams pa'i nga ros thams cad zil gyis gnon// spyan nas khrag

'dzag zhal nas mi ro 'brul// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs shangs nas rlung nag 'tshubs// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus la bab// sdang dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ hrIHyab yum thabs dang shes rab

rol pa las// thugs kyi sprul pa dbang chen khro bo'i sku// shar phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng nas// dri za pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// rdo rje dbang chen dkar po khro bo'i sku// zhal gcig phyag
gnyis dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche gtsigs mi ro za// dbu skra kham nag gyen sbrengs sbrul gyis bcings// phyag g.yas rdo rje dgra bgegs mgo lus gshogs// phyag g.yon

dbyug thos myos shing brgyal bar byed// me dpung klong nas 'gying gar stabs tshul du// rngams ba'i nga ro 'brug stong ldi ri ri// thugs kyi sprul pas stong gsum khyab par byed// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus

la bab// sdang dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ yab yum thabs dang shes rab rol pa las// thugs kyi sprul pa dbang chen khro bo'i sku// lho phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng nas// grul bum pho mo

bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// rin chen dbang chen mthing nag khro bo'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche gtsigs mi ro za// dbu skra kham nag gyen sgrang

sbrul gyis bcings// phyag g.yas rin chen myu gus dgos 'dod skong// phyag g.yon lcags kyus bla 'gugs tsit+ta 'byin// me dpung klong nas 'gying gar stabs tshul du// rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldi ri

ri// thugs kyi sprul pas stong gsum khyab par 'gyed// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus la bab// sdang dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ hrIHyab yum thabs dang shes rab rol pa las// thugs kyi sprul

pas stong gsum khyab par byed// nub phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs stengs na// mi'am pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// pad+ma dbang chen dmar smug khro bo'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dur khrod chas
brgyad rdzogs// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche gtsigs mi ro za// dbu skra kham nag gyen sgrengs sbrul gyis bcings// phyag g.yas pad+mas che btsan dbang du sdud// phyag g.yon zhags pas lus dang yan lag
'ching// me dpung klong nas 'gying gar stabs tshul du// rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldi ri ri// thugs kyi sprul pas stong gsum khyab par byed// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus la bab// sdang

dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ hrIHyab yum thabs dang shes rab rol pa las// thugs kyi sprul pa dbang chen khro bo'i sku// byang phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng nas// lto 'phye pho mo bsnol pa'i

gdan stengs na// phrin las dbang chen ljang dmar khro bo'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs// spyan gsum zhal bgrad mche gtsigs mi ro za// dbu skra kham nag gyen stengs sbrul gyis

bcings// phyag g.yas ral gris rtsa dang srog gzugs gcod// phyag g.yon kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum sgrol// me dpung klong nas 'gying gar stabs tshul du// rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldi ri ri// thugs kyi

sprul pas stong gsum khyab par byed// khyod kyi dbang drag phrin las dus la bab// sdang dgra gnod byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ hU~M shar phyogs dung gi sgo khyud la// bud med nag mo 'jigs tshul can// khrag gi

ral pa sha ra ra// phyag na lcags kyus dgra snying 'byin// rengs par khug cig ang+ku sha/ lho phyogs gser gyi sgo khyud la// bud med ser mo 'jigs tshul can// g.yu yi ral pa sha ra ra// phyag na zhags pa bla tshe

'gugs// chings shig sdoms shig pA sha hri// nub phyogs zangs kyi sgo khyud la// bud med dmar mo 'jigs tshul can/ mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// phyag na lcags sgrog tshe srog bstim// rten la stims shig s+pho Ta

baM// byang phyogs g.yu yi sgo khyud la// bud med sngon mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gser gyi ral pa sha ra ra// phyag na dril bus brgyan par byed// myos par gyis shig g+haN+De hoH// hrIHbcom ldan pad+ma he ru
ka/ dbang chen thugs kyi sprul pa ni// srog bdag 'od kyi rgyal po 'byung// skyes mchog 'od kyi mi bo che// sku la seng ge'i slog pa gsol// dbu la ji lo dkar po bcings// nam mkha' 'ja' yi ske rags

can// lcags kyi sder mos dgra snying 'byin// g.yas pa ral gri dgra srog gcod// g.yon pa 'od kyi zhags pa 'phen// dgra bo'i tshe srog don snying phyung// drag tu bskul lo dgra srog gcod// shar gyi dkar po
dam tshig can// rta ru dkar po ngang ring zhon// sku la dar dkar ral ga gsol// dbu la dung gi cod paN can// phyag na shel gyi zangs gri thogs// phyag g.yon zhags pa dgra la 'debs// tshangs pa dung

gi thor tshugs can// dgra bo'i lha khrol khong snying phyung// lho yi dge bsnyen dam tshig can// sku la za 'og sngo khrag gsol// dbu la bse men 'gying thod bcings// rta ni khams pa lag dkar zhon// g.yas na
bse yi rdo rje thogs// g.yon na tsit+ta dmar po thogs// gling chen rdo rje gshog rgod rtsal// dgra bo'i snying phyung srog rtsa chod// nub kyi bdud nag dam tshig can// sku la lcags kyi zhun khrab
gsol// dbu la bdud zhwa lding nag gsol// chibs su bdud rta nag po chibs// phyag g.yas bdud kyi khyam shing bsnams// phyag g.yon zhags pa nag po 'debs// nag po gsod byed bdud kyi bu// dgra bo'i
tshe phrog khram la thob// byang gi srog bdag dam tshig can// sku la bse khrab dmar po gsol// dbu la bse rmog zangs ring gsol// chibs su bse yi ra skyes chibs// phyag g.yas zangs kyi gri rings
bsnams// g.yon pa zhags pa dgra la 'debs// bswo ro srog gcod lag dmar gyis/ dgra bo'i mdangs grogs srog rtsa gcod// dam nyams ma btang sho ra re// hrIHpad+ma'i rgyal po rta mchog dpal// khro rgyal

khrag 'thung he ru ka/ thugs kyi sprul pa mi bzad pa// skyin thang chu 'khyags mnga' bdag khyod// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu la// bi tri pa tra sgra gcan 'dzin// drang srong chen po kun tu rgyu// gza' rgod drag
po skyin thang bdag/ dung kha mgo dgu mig gis khengs// ro smad sbrul gyis rgya mtsho 'khrugs// phyag g.yas skyin thang 'khor lo bsnams// phyag g.yon chu srin zhags pa 'phen// dgra yul lo thog rdul du

rlog/ hrIHphyogs bzhin nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// ngan sngags bdag mo skyin thang phob// shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// lho yi baM srin dred mo gdong// nubakyi kong srin ba lang gdong// byang gi 'brog

srin chu srin gdong// ngan sngags bdag mo bzhi po ni// g.yas pa zor ba g.yon nad rkyal// skyin thang chu rgod mnga' bdag mo// dgra bo'i lo thog snar ma la// chu rgod 'khyags pa'i skyin thang phob// dgra
yul thal ba rdul du rlogs// de ltar drag tu bskul zhing rbad// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud 'khor la
gtad pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho// nga yi gsang rgyud rin po che// drag po dbang chen pad+ma 'khyil// dngos grub kun gyi gnas mdzod yin// 'khor du 'dus pa khyod la gtad// mi nub rgyal mtsho thugs la

zung// bstan pa bsrung ba'i mtshon char bshad// phyi rabs 'dus tshogs phal che la// gsang rgyud dam pa 'di gtad zung// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum
pa'o//// pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mnga' bdag rje la gtad pa yin// bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur// yer pa'i
lha ri gdong la sbas// gter shog dag las zhal bshus so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ mang+galaM//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ha ya grI ba gu h+ya karma tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/
dpal rta mgrin gsang ba phrin las kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas pad+ma dbang gi
dkyil 'khor rnam par rol pa'i dur khrod chen po// dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ dpal rta mgrin chen po yab yum pad+ma gzi ldan ma dang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po la snyoms par
zhugs te/ ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba mdzad pa las/ yab kyi thugs ka nas 'od dmar po me long tsam zhig 'phros pa las sgrol ging sku mdog dmar por gyur to// yum gyi thugs ka nas 'od dmar po me long
tsam zhig 'phros pa las/ lha mo smug mo nam mkha'i go zu can du gyur to// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i thugs kyi sras yum dral gnyis las srid pa pho rgyud dang mo rgyud thams cad srid nas 'khor dregs pa

can thams cad kyis bskor nas gnas so// de nas gtso bo yab kyis de rnams kyi lag tu rdo rje gtad// yum gyis thod khrag gtad de// hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu hri dza dza/ e ka dza TI ma hA

kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rak+ta tsa mun ti kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ dregs pa can pho mo de rnams thams cad lus ngag yid gsum rang dbang med par 'dar la dngangs shing bred par gyur to// trag rak+sha dza

b+h+yo// yab yum bdag cag srog gi snying po 'bul na bka' ci stsal zhus pa dang/ rta mgrin yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le dang// dam tshig gi chu'i bdud rtsi lce la bzhag
nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur// thugs kyi sras su byas nas bka'i srung mar bzhag go/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas thugs kyi lcam dral gnyis kyis 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma dpal

chen yab yum sku// nyid kyi lta ba ji ltar lags// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// snang srid dngos por snang ba kun// nga yi rol pa sku yi rgyan// sgra ru grag pa thams cad kun// nga yi gsung gi rang bzhin
yin// sems kyi dran rtog thams cad kun// nga yi thugs kyi longs spyod rgyan// thig le byang chub sems nyid las// rig dang ma rig khyad par kun// las dang ye shes gnyis su snang// ma rig pa las 'khor
ba las// rig pa'i ye shes mya ngan 'das// 'khor 'das khyad par dbyings su mnyam// las dang ye shes gnyis su med// ma 'gags pa ni chos kyi sku// mi dmigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings// de rtogs de la
gnas pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa yin// da ltar ngas kyang de ltar bshad// ces gsungs so// blta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang zhus pa// nyid kyi
bsgom pa ji ltar lags// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// sems nyid skye med gdod nas dag/ yod med rtag chad gzung 'dzin yang// ma bstsal bzhag na bsgom pa yin// sems nyid rtogs pa chos
dbyings la// ma 'gags dug lnga'i rnam rtog shar// dbyings las shar zhing dbyings la thim// rang shar ngang grol bsgom pa'i mchog/ lha dang gzugs sku dang sbyar bas// dngos por bzung na rtag par
gol// blta ba gnyis med chos kyi sku// med par bzung na chad pa ste// yod med mnyam pa'i ngo bo las// bde gshegs 'gro don cir yang mdzad// bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug bsgom pa yin// zhes gsungs
so// bsgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang zhus pa// nyid kyi spyod pa ji ltar lags// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba kun// gang yin thams

cad phyag rgya'i tshogs// nges pa sku yi rgyan du shar// sgra ru grag pa sngags kyi tshig/ nga yi gsung gi sgra skad yin// sems kyi dran rtog thams cad kyang// ma lus thugs kyi mtshan nyid yin// sku dang gsum thugs

longs spyod pas// 'di yang nga yi spyod pa yin// skye shi med pa'i don rtogs nas// snang srid thams cad dbyings su sgrol// bstan pa'i rU tra gang yin pa// bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol// 'di yang nga yi spyod pa

yin// chos dbyings skye ba med pa las// rig pa'i ye shes gnyis med sbyor// thabs kyi rang bzhin skye med las// shes rab ma 'gags gnyis med sbyor// 'di yang nga yi spyod pa yin// zhes gsungs so// spyod
pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang zhus pa// nyid kyi 'bras bu+i ji ltar lags// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal ba// rig pa ye shes chos kyi sku// rang bzhin med pa lhun grub

ngang// ma btsal rang shar ye nas gnas// sems nyid sna tshogs rang 'gyu ba// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi ngang// rang las byung zhing rang las spyod// 'di yang nga yi 'bras bu yin// 'di ltar snang ba thams

cad kun// sna tshogs rang shar sprul pa'i sku// gang ltar brtag pa 'di ltar snang// 'di ltar nga yi 'bras bu yin// sku gsum rang la ye nas rdzogs// ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// ma bsgrubs rang las
'byung zhing gnas// 'di yang nga yi 'bras bu yin// zhes gsungs so// 'bras bu'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang zhus pa// nyid kyi sgrub pa ji ltar lags// dpal chen yab kyis bka'
stsal pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgrub pa yin// rnal 'byor blta bas thag chod nas// thog mar bkra shis dben pa'i gnas// nub tu kha bltas sa gzhi dmar// kun tu zla gam dbyibs su 'dug/ me
tog dmar po'i snam bu chags// rtsi shing yal ga g.yur za ba// ston pa'i zhabs kyis bcags pa der// dkyil 'khor dang ni mchod rdzas kun// thams cad kha dog dmar por bya// bla ma lha tshogs bcas pa

la// yan lag bdun gyi tshogs bsags la// de bzhin nyid dang kun snang rgyus// 'byung ba lnga po rim brtsegs la// b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas la// smug nag gru gsum gnam sgo can// zla gam mu khyud gru

chad dang// sgo bzhi'i rgyan dang khor yug mdzes// klu dang nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// rang sems hriH'i spro bsdu las// phyag mtshan rdo rje yongs su gyur// bdag nyid dpal chen rta mgrin sku// dmar nag zhal gcig
phyag gnyis pa// g.yas g.yon rdo rje dung dmar dkrug/ zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum stangs stabs bgrad// spyan gsum smin ma khro gnyer ldan// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs sma ra ser// dbu ska ral pa gyen du
brdzes// dbu gtsug rta mgo rta skad 'tsher// sku la dur khrod chas brgyad gsol// yum chen gzi ldan sku la 'khril// dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa kha T+wAM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung

dmar gtso la stob// zhabs gnyis yab kyi sku la 'khyud// de ltar sku bskyed gsal ba dang// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// ye shes lnga yi dbang rdzogs bskur// spyan drang bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal

mchod// bstod cing dpal gyi rta skad gdon// ma mo'i b+h+yo skad thengs gcig dang// rnal 'byor brda skad thengs gcig don// thugs kyi ye shes sems dpa' la// sngags kyi 'phro 'du tsakra la// spro bsdu bya zhing

bsnyen pa bya// hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba e ka dza TI hu lu hu lu hri dza dza// yi dam bcas pa'i 'dzab rdzogs nas// tshogs dang ba liM cho ga bya// dpal gyi bka' srung lcam dral mchod// 'khor gyi DA ki lhag mas
mchod// ba liM gtang zhing rta bro brdung// dkyil 'khor bsdus te slar yang bsgom// bskyed pa'i rim bsgrub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// bskyed ma hA yo gar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// lcam dral
gnyis kyis yang zhus pa// rdzogs pa'i rim pa ji ltar bsgrub// dpa' bo yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa dang// skad cig dran rdzogs lhar bskyed nas// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod thams cad

du// lha yi ngang nas 'bral mi bya// gzugs su snang ba rta mgrin sku// sgra ru grag pa rta mgrin gsung// sems kyi dran rtog rta mgrin thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi mu dra che// gu Na sna tshogs zad mi shes// karma sna
tshogs thogs med spyod// pad+ma dbang gi rang bzhin las// bdag kyang snang la yod ma yin// thams cad dbang gi dkyil 'khor che// ma btsal bzhag pas 'gro don 'grub// yid bzhin nor bu ma
btsal rnyed// rta mgrin dbang gi yon tan yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa a nu yo gar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang gsol pa// rdzogs pa chen po ji ltar

bsgrub// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor de// logs na yod pa ma yin te// rang nyid rta mchog skur snang bas// rang nyid lha la lha nyid rang// lha dang rang nyid gnyis su
med// sems nyid rtogs na sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma btsal cig/ sku mdog phyag mtshan zhugs tshul dang// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang yum// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa yang// sems kyi
snang ba de ltar yin// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gang ltar brtags pa de ltar snang// sems la rgyu rkyen med pa des// ma bsgrubs ye nas rang byung gnas// ma btsal bzhag pas rang sa zin// de
ltar rtogs na rta mchog dpal// chos nyid don gyi dbang chen yin// gzugs su mtshan mar 'dzin pa des// grol bar 'dod kyang 'khor ba 'ching// grub par 'dod kyang rtag 'dzin yin// des na ma btsal
bzhag na grol// ma bsgrubs lhun grub ngang la gnas// rdzogs pa chen por bsgrub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs pa a ti yo gar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang
gsol pa// rdzas la bten nas sgrub pa'i thabs// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ des nas yab kyis bka' stsal pa// shugs 'chang dmar zhur thod pa la// dpral bar rta mchog yab yum bri// 'gram
par las byed lcam dral bri// pad+ma rak+tas dmar por byug/ mig dang rna ba gsal bar btod// le brgan dar dang zab kyis brgyan// klad phor nang du gzhug pa'i rdzas// rang sngags 'khor lo bcas pa

dang// las byed lcam dral srog snying ni// le brgan dar la bris pa'am// yang na mthing la mtshal gyis bri// pha wang long bu shel gyi rdo// pho rgyud ging gi bla rdo yin// mchong dang na chung mtshal khrag ni// mo rgyud DA
ki'i bla rdo yin// le brgan dar gyis dril nas ni// za 'og dar dmar skud pas bsdam// rta thod klad phor nang du'o// rta thod dbang chen skur mnga' gsol// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag la bsgrub// dgra

bgegs sgrol na ling+ga gzhug/ rnam shes srog snying spu grir sdeb// nyung dkar la sogs drag rdzas la// bsngags la thun du brab par bya// me 'bar 'od dang sgra yang 'byung// ling+ga phyug la las sbyor bya// rta thod
bsgrub pa'i rten du gzung// srid pa'i pho rgyud mo rgyud kyi// srog lus bla gsum zil mnan nas// bka' nyan mi ldog las kun byed// ces gsung so// phyi rta thod lha zhal la brten nas bsgrub pa'i
le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmigs pa rten gyi dam rdzas ni// gdong dmar dred kyi thod pa'am// stobs chen dmar po'i pho thod las// rta mgrin yab yum zhal bris la// dmigs
pa'i rten du mkhas pas bzhag/ goms 'dris brtan par gyur pa dang// rang nyid lha ru bsgom par bya// rang nyid lha ru gsal tsam na// gnyis su phye la bsgom par bya// mang du bsgom dang nyung du

bsgom// gcig las du mar spro ba dang// du ma gcig tu bsdu ba dang// ji ltar 'dod pa de 'ong na// skad cig dran rdzogs lha ru bsgom// spyod lam rnam bzhi lam du 'khyer// de la rten pa thob pa dang// lha de

sems kyi ngo bor bltas// sems nyid lha yi rang bzhin las// rang byung ma skyes ye nas gnas// ma bsgrubs rang las byung bar snang// rta mgrin sku de zhal mthong ba'i// snang tshad sku la grag tshad gsung// dran

rig thugs las ma g.yos par// che ba'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// phrin las rnam bzhi bsam pas 'grub// rang sems stong pa chos kyi sku// stong nyid lhar gsal longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs 'gro don sprul

pa'i sku// 'bras bu sku gsum rang la rdzogs// lta ba'i gdeng chen rtogs tsa na// spyod pa dregs pa las la 'dzud// dpal gyi rta skad thengs gsum gdon// ma mo'i b+h+yo skad thengs gcig dang// rnal 'byor
hrIHskad thengs gcig gis// 'jig rten dregs pa pho mo rnams// rang dbang med par las la 'gro// bstan pa'i dgra bgegs rtsad nas gcod// 'jig rten dregs pa thams cad kyang// srog thob bran bzhin

bka' sdod byed// thod pa'i bris sku rten du gzung// mngon spyod dgra bgegs sgrol 'dod na// ma ru tse yi gri thod du// dug khrag mtshal gyis byug par bya// nang du e la sngags kyis bskor// mA ra ya yi ling+ga

gzhug/ zhing lpags ngas kyis thod kha bcad// nyung dkar sngags kyi thun gyis brab// thod pa 'phar dang ldeg pa dang// ling+ga 'tsheg cing tsig sgra 'byung// dug shing me la sbyin sreg bya// rgya gram lam du gnan par
bya// yang na nag po'i klu la gtad// myur du grol bar the tshom med// ces gsungs so/ nang thod pa lha zhal la brten nas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba

tsakra'i dam rdzas kyis// dgra bgegs rnam gnyis bsad pa ni// gro ga shing shun ras dag la// tsakra rtsibs bzhir bri bar bya// rta mgrin yab yum zhal phyag 'don// tsakra'i khar ni sngags bskor la// kha sbyar
bar du ling+ga gzhug/ mnga' gsol byin brlab dbang bskur bya// dgug gzhug byas la dmigs pa bya// dgra bgegs mtshon cha'i tsakras gtub// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// sngags la

tsakra'i las sngags gdags// 'khor lo 'phar dang ldeg pa dang// dgra bgegs sod pa'i rtags byung na// tsakra'i bar gyi ling+ga dbyung// phur pas gdab cing mi la bsreg/ thal ba nya bo byas pa la// snying gar
dgra bgegs ming rus gzhug/ lha khang them 'og mchod rten rmad// rgya gram lam la sogs par mnan// tsakra bsgrub pa'i rten du bzung// nam dgos dus na las la sbyar// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba tsakra lha
zhal la brten nas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mo grub snel gri'i snying thun ni// snel gri mo yi thod pa ru// pad+ma rak+ta'i mtshal gyis byug/ dbus su gru

gsum srog snying bri// snel gri'i snying du ling+ga gzhug/ tshon skud dmar pos ling+ga bcings// le brgan dar gyis thod kha bcad// srog rtsa bya rgod sgro rtsa'am// zangs kyi sbu gur gzhug par bya// kha khebs dkyil du

mthongs phye gzhug/ ling+ga'i tshon skud yar la drangs// seng ldeng mdzo mo'i phur pa gnyis// lcam dral gnyis su mnga' gsol bstod// snel gri 'brub khung nag por gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag thun bsgrubs

nas// srog rtsa'i nang du thun brab la// thod pa 'phar dang ling+ga 'tsheg/ 'od dang sgra dang me stag 'phro// snying nang ling+ga phur pas gdab// gtor ma gtang dang bsreg pa dang// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// rtsa
gcig gsum la grub par gsungs// des ma grub na lan gsum spogs// des ni mi 'grub mi srid do// zhes gsungs so// ma mo snying thun gyis bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang

dag bshad bya ba// dug khrag zor gyis bsad pa ni// snel gyi mo yi thong pa ru// mi khrag khyi khrag ra khrag gsum// btsan dug thang phrom thar nu gsum// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe gsum// sbyar te thod par blug

par bya// khrag dug thun du bsgrub par bya// rtags ni thun khrag khol nas 'ong// dgra yi khad khyim ngag la brdeg/ rims nad phog nas kha phung 'chi// zhes gsungs so// dug khrag thun gyis bsad pa'i le'u ste
bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// drag sngags nyung dkar bsgrub pa yis// 'brub khung dmar por bsad pa ni// sme ba'i sa la 'brub khung bya// bang rim gnyis brtsegs bya ba la// kha

chod dbus su bu ga btod// me la bsregs te tshos par bya// nang du dug dang khrag gis byug/ gang la bya ba'i ling+ga gzhug/ drag sngags nyung dkar la bsngags bgrub// rtags ni thun dang ling+ga 'tsheg/ phur pas
btab la ling+ga bsreg/ dgra bgegs myur du sgrol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// thun sngags kyis bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// lcam dral gnyis kyis yang gsol pa// las
kyi mde thung ji ltar lags// dpa' bo yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phan gnod las kyi mde kha ni// gang la bya ba dmigs la bya// ltas ngan ma mo'i gzugs bcas rbad// rmi lam thun brab dgra la bzlog/ smyo

'bog thang phrom thun gyis brab// ser ba dag la phur pas gzir// thog gi thod snying thod par bsgrub// rang srung phyi grub zhwa la bya// char 'dod klu la phur pas gzir// thog ser kha char phur pas bzlog/ rbod
gtong gtor ma'i thun gyis bzlog/ rmi lam ngan pa thal brdab bzlog/ dus min 'chi ba 'chi bdag gzir// tshe ring bum par tshe bsgrub bya// bsod nams longs spyod rdzas kyis bsgrub// rigs 'dod srung skud
skye la gdags// nang 'gras mchod rten dmar por bya// ngag mnan lce la phur pas gzir// ngag 'grol rang lce rdo rjer sgom// klu gtad ba dmar glang rur bya// shugs sgrol nyung dkar gzugs la brdeg/ jag

'ching mi snying nyung dkar sgrub// dbye ba bya rog 'ug sgros bya// dbang sdud zangs kyi ga 'ur bsgrub// sel ni dkor rdzas thod ngan sba// las mde nyi shu rtsa gcig pos// dpa' bo'i lag tu mtshon bskur
'dra// gang la bya ba myur du 'grub// ces gsungs so// las kyi mde kha rdzas kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi mde kha gang byed kyang// dang po rta mgrin yab yum

gyi// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni rtags phyin bzlas// hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti hu lu hu lu hrIHdza dza/ de nas las byed lcam dral sngags// de dang dril la bsgrub par bya// trag rak+sha dza b+h+yo// de la bsgrub pa

shin tu gces// ma bsgrubs gang la'ang don mi 'byung// bsad pa spu gri'i sham bu ni// nr-i hur thum dza/ sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ rta thod mi thod gang bsgrubs kyang// bsad pa'i sham bu gong dang sbrel// che ge mo tsakra

mA ra ya hU~M phaT// tsakras bsad pa'i spu gri'o// trag rak+sha mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying ling rbud// snying thun bsad pa'i spu gri yin// mu tra rak+sha tsa mun ti b+h+yo rbad/ rak+sha tsa mun ti b+h+yo rbad/ thun gyis bsad pa'i sngags

so// ma he dun tse swA hA phob// dul ya swA hA phob// ltas ngan rbad pa'i sngags so// mu raM mu raM thuM thuM rmi lam thuM swA hA phob/ rmi lam ngan pa dgra la bzlog pa'o// d+huM ta pa ta ni la swA hA phob/ rmi lam ngan pa dgra la

bzlog cing smyo 'bog dbab pa'o// phrom phrom hril hril shar shar phob/ ser ba dbab pa'o// raM hril raM hril raM raM hril hril shar shar phob phob/ thog ser dbab pa'i mde'u'o// shar shar phob/ sil sil phob/

nA gas phob/ char dbab pa'i mde'u'o// badzra ki ki rbad/ thog ser kha char bcad pa'o// sarba gra ha bzlog/ sarba big+ha nAM/ rbo gtod bzlog pa'o// sarba dur swap+na sarba durni mi ti bzlog/ rmi lam ngan

pa bzlog pa'o// sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu bzlog/ dus min 'chi ba bzlog pa'o// sarba A yu rbar+d+ha ni pu+iSh+taM ku ru swA hA/ tshe bsgrub pa'o// sarba puN+ya bar+b+ha ni sarba rat+na ba hu bar+n+d+ra ni buSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ bsod nams spel

ba'o// sarba puN+ya pu tra pa raM pa ra Ni phuSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rigs brgyud bsgrub pa'o/ rbod gtor byol kha sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ sha hU~M a mu ka mA ra ya rbad/ nang rgyas bsad pa'o// kA ya bA ka tsit+ta staM b+ha ya nan/ ngag mnan

pa'o// a shig a shig dur phyung dur phyung/ khrol khrol swA hA/ ngag dgrol ba'o// nA ga rA dza nyi ma dag shig/ che ge mo gtad do// klu la gtad pa'o// che ge mo mA ra ya sod sod/ rbud ling shag rbad/ thums ri li

li rbad/ shugs sgrol gyi sngags so// ka ta rU pa bA ka tsit+ta ni thogs/ jag chings so// a nr-i traka rag sha mA ra ye phye phye/ lha dang dbye ba'i mde'u'o// che ge mo ni shag trag phye shag shag phye phye/ mA ra ya thuM ril rbad/

nye 'byed las so// che ge mo A kar+Sh+ya ya ho// Akar+Sh+ya ya hri// dbang bsdud sngags so// tsa pa tri mu tsan tri a phu che ge mo phung gnam rdeb// dkrugs dkrugs/ sel gyi las so// las mde nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sngags
kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dbang chen rta mgrin yab yum dang// lcam dral bcas pa'i srog 'phrog pa// gdong dmar dred kyi thod pa la// yab yum lcam dral sku
gzugs bri// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ ba liM rak+ta sman phud bshams// rnal 'byor gos dang rgyan la sogs// dmar por byas la nub tu blta// pad+ma rA ga'i phreng ba bgrang// thod pa'i lha la
dmigs pa gtad// yab yum lcam dral dngos su dmigs// shes pa mi 'phro rtse gcig gzhag/ de la dmigs pa gtad pa dang// rang nyid rta mgrin skur bsgoms la// las byed lcam dral las la btang// hri

b+h+yo trag rak+sha dza b+h+yo// dpal gyi rta skad thengs gcig gis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdu// ma mo'i b+h+yo skad thengs gcig gis// srid pa'i ma mo las la bkol// rnal 'byor hrIHskad thengs gcig
gis// srid gsum gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgrol// zhes gsungs so// phyi ltar srog 'phrog pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nang ltar srog 'phrog sgrub pa
ni// dbang chen rta mgrin yab yum dang// sprul pa lcam dral bcas pa de// grub nas dngos su zhal mthong yang// de la dngos su bzung ba na// las kyi srin po srin mo dag/ dngos su mthong dang khyad par
med// de nyid sems kyi cho 'phrul gyi// sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med// sems las byung zhing sems la spyod// dpal chen rta mgrin yab yum nas// las kyi sgrol ba'i lcam dral

yang// mi mnyam mnyam par ye nas gnas// mnyam nyid chen po chos kyi sku// srog ni ma yengs sa ma d+hi// snying po rang dbang med pa'i sngags// dngos su byung na las la bskul// las mde nyi shu rtsa gcig
gis// gang 'dod dmigs pa'i phrin las bcol// thun mong sid+d+hi de las 'byung// zhes gsungs so// nang ltar srog 'phrog pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba
srog 'phrog 'di lta ste// sems nyid ngo bo rta mgrin te// logs nas bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med// rang sems gsal la ma 'gags pa// rang byung rang shar cir yang snang// zhi ba spyan ras gzigs su

snang// zhal dang phyag ni cir yang snang// sku mdog sna tshogs gang yang snang// de dag sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// rang rgyud pa zhig bsgrub tu med// khro bo dbang chen rta mgrin te// zhal dang phyag ni cir yang

snang// pad+ma'i rigs te sku mdog dmar// de yang ma nges sna tshogs la// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// sems la rgyu dang rkyen med pas// rang byung rang sar rang sar grol// ngo bo stong par 'dug pa
de// rta mgrin chos sku rang la gnas// rang gsal ma 'gags shar ba ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rta mgrin yin// rig pa'i rtsal du ma 'gags shar// sprul pa'i sku yi rta mgrin yin// sku gsum ma bsgrubs
rang la rdzogs// rta mgrin srog thob ma bsgrubs 'grub// ces gsungs so// gsang ba ltar srog 'phrog pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyi nang gsang ba'i srog thob
nas// dgra bgegs la sogs sgrol 'dod na// bdag nyid lha yi skur gsal nas// yid kyi 'dzin phur thebs pa ni// bzlog pa he ru kas mi bskyod// gsod byed snying gi rtsa ba can// lta ba gdeng du tshud pa
des// lha srin srog thob gnad la dbab// dus la babs pa'i skabs chen yin// dus ma yin na thugs rje yin// rnam par smin pa'i phung po 'di// bsgral ba 'ba' zhig thugs rje'i mchog/ stong gsum ma lus

srog bton pa'i// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// bstan pa 'jig dang rang gzhan smod// rnal 'byor sku la bsdo ba la// srog 'phrog bla dang lus sems dbral// srog ni yi ge nr-i ru gnas// hur thums dza yis

snying nas 'dren// mA ra ya ni gsod pa'i sngags// srog gcod spu gri 'bru bzhi pa'o// bla ni 'khyams pa rnam bzhi ste// rang dbang med par bsad pa yis// phung po rdos pa phyir bzhag nas// ltos med lus sems
bral ba yin// srog gcod pa yi las rnams ni// bstan srung phyi rabs ma gtogs pa// phran tshegs tsam la byas pa na// sngags pa bdud kyi las byas pas// shi nas rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// de
bas legs par shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// bsgral ba khyad par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nam zhig dus ngan tha ma la// sngags pa rbod gtong nad 'gras

byed// de tshe mnyam gnyis khyad 'ong na// nad dang gdon rnams bsrung ba dang// phrin las dmigs su gang byed kyang// rang nyid rta mgrin skur gsal na// cis kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i mchog
tu 'di 'gyur ro// cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// 'di ni srung ba'i rgyal po yin// rnam par rtog pa bgegs yin te// bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung// sems nyid ye nas
dag shes na// gzhan na bgegs zhes bya ba med// de ltar shes na bgegs las grol// gdon 'joms pa ni mchog tu 'gyur// sems nyid rig pa'i rtsal thon na// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin
pa bla na med// nad do cog gi dgra che ba// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing// sems kyi bya ba ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas cho 'phrul logs na med// thams cad gnyis med rtogs 'gyur na// de mi don dam
stong pa'i dbyings// nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la// mgon tshul de las gzhan med do// zhes gsungs so// bzlog srung khyad par du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// dpa' bo yab kyis bka'

stsal pa// bstan pa bsrung ba'i lcam dral khyed// bstan pa'i rgyud 'di gang gnas par// nga yi bstan pa de na gnas// khyed kyis bstan pa bsrung bar gyis// tha tshig bstan las ma 'da' bar// rnal 'byor dam

ldan bstan pa srungs// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang// bla ma'i dbu 'phang smod pa dang// rnal 'byor sku la bsdo ba'i dgra// khyed kyis myur du bsgral bar gyis// zhes las kyi gnyer gtad do// gtso bo
yab yum chos nyid la gnas so// lcam dral gnyis bstan pa'i srung mar bzhag go/ dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i phrin las drag sngags dpa' bo gcig pa'i rgyud las/ mjug las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi
shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// dpal rta mgrin dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang ba phrin las kyi rgyud rdzogs so//// slob dpon pad+mas rgyal po khri srong lde btsan dang// ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs la
gdams pa'o// shog ser gyi tsha bo las zhus so// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya////

rgya gar skad du/ prat+YaM gi ra ma hA ba la ha ya grI wa tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyir bzlog pa stobs chen rta mgrin gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad rdo rje dang 'khor los rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ri bo ta la'i spo la khro bo'i rgyal po bdud
las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu snyoms par zhugs te// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog la/ gang dag bdud la sogs pas gtses pa rnams la thugs rjes skyobs shig ces bka' stsal to// rta
mchog gis gsol pa// ji ltar bskyab pa dang bsrung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs lo legs so rta mchog rgyal// thugs rje'i bdag po stobs po
che// rigs pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags 'chang// mdog dmar byu ru'i mdog lta bu// khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// de nas khro bo bdud las rgyal ba la sogs pas g.yas nas 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rta
mchog la bstod pa/ rta mchog rgyal po rigs sngags 'chang// thugs rje'i bdag po stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// rig pa'i rgyal po gang gsungs pa// ye shes khro bo khyod kyis
zung// de nas rta mchog rgyal po stan las langs te// de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas// 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pas me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ yon chab la sogs pa dang/ gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan la sogs pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ gzhi de nyid du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i tshul gyis gnas so// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog gis spyan mi 'dzum par bcom
ldan 'das la gzigs nas bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyogs thams cad nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa spros pas bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bskrad cing dngangs par gyur to// sa'i
phyogs thams cad kyang g.yos rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 'ur rab tu 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to// rta

mchog gi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rta mchog rgyal po thugs rje can// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kyis zung// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba

hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ las rnams thams cad grub pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad zhi bar byed// oM nA ga ra tsa mA ra ya rbad/ nA ga ra tsa mA ra ya sod sod/ nA ga ha la ha la/ nA ga chod chod/ nA ga khos khos/ nA ga mgo

la nan/ nA ga shig/ nA ga bying bying/ nA ga zlog zlog nA ga thums/ nA ga tsit+ta zur/ nA ga tsit+ta shig tsit+ta khos/ tsit+ta phrog phrog ha sa ha sa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da bin+da/ sarba sha truM chod chod/

tsit+ta shig shig tsit+ta raM raM/ tsit+ta myong myong/ tsit+ta rmugs rmugs/ sha truM rbad rbad/ khos khos/ zlog zlog b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hU~M hU~M/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badzra kro d+ha zlog zlog ha ya grI ba zlog zlog ma hA ka ru Na zlog zlog

bo d+hi s+pha ra Na zlog zlog tsaN+Da kro d+ha ni zlog zlog/ badzra kro d+ha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya rak+ta rdubs rdubs/ oM badzra kro d+ha zlog zlog/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ shig shig/ zlog byer zlog byer/ tsit+ta mgo la nan/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT

phaT/ phyir zlog pa stobs chen rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba dgra thams cad dang// gshed byed thams cad dang// byad stems thams cad dang// ro langs thams cad dang// bkra mi shis pa thams cad dang rgyal
po'i 'jigs pa dang// me dang chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ grib gnon dang/ brjed byed dang/ klu'i 'jigs pa dang/ sbyin sreg byed pa dang/
byed du 'jug pa dang/ byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gang dag 'khrul 'khor byed pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o// rengs par

bgyi'o// 'khrul par bgyi'o// 'byung po thams cad dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ sbyin sreg tu byed pa thams cad du byed po thams cad ra ro bar bgyi'o// tshig par bgyi'o// oM badzra kro

d+ha nan nan/ shi g+h+raM ka ra ya nan nan s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya s+phu Ta ya s+phu Ta ya kro ta nan nan/ sarba sha truM de ba nan nan/ sarba mo ha ti mo ha ti hU~M hU~M nan nan/ phaT phaT/ gang dag bdag la gnod par sems pa thams
cad kyi lha thams cad mnan par bgyi'o// dgra thams cad gyi mig bcing ngo// rna ba bcing ngo// sna bcing ngo// mnan par bgyi'o// lus bcing ngo/ yid bcing ngo// yan lag dang nyid lag
bcing ngo// rdo rje khro bos chings shig chings shig rnam par non cig kun tu non cig/ rengs par gyis shig/ mnan par bgyi'o// nA ga 'dus 'dus/ nA ga sho 'dus 'dus/ hi li hi li/ 'dus
nA ga 'dus/ klu chen po'i srog snying ste/ gnad la bor ba'i snying po'o// bal po se'u'i lcug ma'am/ smyag shad dag gi lcug mas lus brab/ de ni klu bzlog pa'i cho ga'o// srung ba'i sbags badzra kro

d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha/ badzra kA wA tsi rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha/ badzra kA wA tsi rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra tsan d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarba bud+d+ha na rak+Sha rak+Sha/ badzra pA ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/ bo d+hi sa twa ni rak+Sha rak+Sha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/
hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ dgra dang bgegs thams cad bsrung bar bgyi'o// gang gis bsrungs na rdo rje khro bos bsrung bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas rigs lnga la sogs pa thams cad kyis
bsrung bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rje gtum pos bsrung bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rje zhi ba mang pos srungs shig rdo rje'i lus su srungs shig

byad las grol nas tshur mi tshugs par phar 'joms pa rdo rje'i lus su byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// oM AHhU~M/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ ad+yA nu t+pan+na twa ta oM AHhU~M swA hA/ sngags de thams cad
bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ rab kyis brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas byas la/ mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ bdag gi srung ma gtor ma'i phud kyis mchod/ rang la byad byed pa'i srung ma bos
nas ni/ gtor ma shin tu rgya cher btang de/ de'am gang la bdag la gnod sems dang ldan bde dag la phyir la dug gi rang bzhin de bzhin 'gyur/ gang dag bdag la phan sems pa// de dag
gtor ma de bdun rtsis bde bar 'gyur// gnod sems 'byung po gang yin pa// de dag me yi gtor ma'i me yis bsreg par bgyi// dgra bgegs kyi phyogs su zor ltar 'phangs pas dgra
bgegs phung ba 'gyur// dpal rta mchog gi rgyud las/ sngags dang gtor ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rta mchog rgyal po'i srung ba'i thabs// mchog tu
bshad kyi rta mchog dpal// khyod kyis legs par ma nor zung// skya rangs shar ba'i dus dag tu// bdag bskyed khro bo rta mgrin dmar// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa thod dbyug
g.yon pa ni// sdigs mdzub bsdig pa mdzad pa'i tshul// sku la sbrul dang stag gis brgyan// zhabs gnyis g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum nas// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma yi// gdan bzhugs thugs
kar gnas pa ni// a dang ma las zla ba dang// nyi ma dkar dang ser po bsam// zla ba'i dbyibs ni mtha' skor can// nyi ma'i dbyibs ni dkyil bug can// de nyid kyi bar du ngo bo yi ge a ste/
sa bon las thod pa las rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags ngag tu brjod pas rtag mchog tu bsam/ gnod byed skad bsgrags pas bsreg/ ka pA la dang bse yi snod// kha sbyor rdo rje'i dra ba can// phyogs
bzhir lcags kyu bdun bdun bsam// bum pa bzang po'i kha rgyan can// pad+ma'i dpag bsam shing du bsam// lte bar rig pa'i rgyal po dang// 'dab bzhir khro bo phyogs dang mthun// mtshams
bzhi 'chol ba'i phyag mtshan dang// sku mdog sna tshogs gtso la phyogs// rdo rje'i sa gzhi gcig pa dang// ra ba dra ba gdugs kyang dbub// mtshon cha me ri 'khor lo bsgom// byad
byed rnam la skrag mi dgos// dpal rta mchog gi rgyud las/ srung ba'i 'khor lo bsdom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs rje'i bdag po legs par
nyon// zlog pa'i 'khor lo gang 'dod pa// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// bya la ma khams su yaM dang baM// laM dang raM las 'byung ba yi// 'khor lo rnam par bsgom par bya// b+h+rUMlas 'khor lo
rtsibs brgyad pa// rtsibs steng rdo rje'i gzhal yas khang// rta mchog zhal gnyis phyag bzhi pa// mda' gzhu 'gengs shing rta skad sgrog/ phyogs bzhir rigs kyi khro bo bsam// shar gyi 'khor lo'i
rtsibs la ni// bdud las rgyal byed mdog dkar ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'phyang// sdigs mdzub g.yon pas bgegs rnams bsreg/ lho ru khro bo gzi brjid 'bar// mdog ser ha
ha'i sgra sgrog pa// rdo rje byug tho g.yas dang g.yon// nub tu rngam pa'i sgra sgrog pa// rdo rje g.yas 'dzin sbrul zhags g.yon// 'dzin pas klu rnams dbang du sdud// byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la
ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ljang// rdo rje be con g.yas dang g.yon// thams cad zhabs gnyis g.yas dang g.yon// bskum dang brkyang ba'i tshul du bzhugs// sbrul dang stag gis rab tu
brgyan// mtshams bzhir sna tshogs 'jigs pa bsgom// bsrung bya gang 'dod rdo rje'i nang// bsgom la drag po yi ni sngags// mgrin gcig tu ni brjod par bsam// rtsibs kyi so yis thams
cad gcod// khro bo rnams kyang dgyes pa'i tshul// chod cig gtubs shig legs par gtubs// me yis bsregs shing rdul du rlogs// shog gu'am gro ga dag la ni// za byed gnod pa'i
gzugs bris la// khru gang tsam gyi tshad nyid la// dug dang khrag gis bris la ni// kha la rdo rje rgya gram dgod// lus kyi steng du lam las ni// gling bzhi ri rab legs par dgod// mgo la rta
mchog yan lag la// hU~M bzhi rdo rje 'greng bu gnyis// dpung pa g.yas dang g.yon du dgod// lu gu rgyud kyis dam par bcings// mi stsogs rnams la hU~M yang bri// dgug dang gzhug pa dang por

bya// gru gsum nang du rdo rjes mnan// drag po'i sngags brjod non par 'gyur// gang dag bsrung ba'i go cha bgo// zhal gnyis phyag drug rta mchog la// gong du bzhi byung// ljang zhur le brgyan mdog 'dra
ba// mche ba gtsigs shing phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya 'ching// hU~M las 'od 'phros log par 'dren// rdo rje'i char phab sku la bstim// drag po'i sngags brjod legs par
bsrung// rdo rje khro bo gtum po che// phyag na rdo rje 'jigs pa'i sku// rin chen gsum gyis bsrung bar bya// dpal rta mchog gi rgyud las// bzlog pa dang go cha'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de
nas cho ga yang dag mchog/ bshad kyis rig pa'i rgyal po zung// rig pa'i rgyal po 'bum du bzlas// drag po'i sngags rgod rgyun tu bsnyen// las la sbyar ba brtag par gyis// rgyal po bzlog na
rA tsa dang// yak+sha gnod sbyin nA ga klu// phyi la gnod byed legs par brtag/ mi tshig ma 'dres gsal ba'i mchog/ gsang ba kun tu zla bar bgyis// gzhan yang dag bshad bya ba// srung byed
rnam rgyal a ru ra// bcangs sam lus la bsten pa yis// mar me'i snang bas mun sel ltar// phyogs su gnas pa mi 'gyur te// don kun 'grub byed nor bu dang// de bzhin tshe srid nor bu
dang// rin chen sna tshogs bcangs pa yis// nyi shar grib ma mi gnas ltar// bgegs kyis rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang// de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa'i
gdung// mchod cing bcangs pa tsam gyis ni// zhe sdang zhi nas mchod byed 'gyur// lnga brgya stong du lon pa yis// sngags btab bskus na dpag tshad brgyar// gnod pa thams cad 'bros par
'gyur// dug dgra'i sgro rtsa snying dang ni// smyag shang lcugs ma'i bcings pa yis// klu yi bzung na btang nas kyang// de dag phyir la 'bros par 'gyur// ga bur dzA ti tsan+dan dang// gla rtsi gu gul
dri lnga ni// bcangs pas rab tu bye bar 'gyur// gu gul nag dang dri sna tshogs// bdugs shing bsreg pas klad pa 'gas// dri lnga 'thungs pas nang gi dug/ chus bshal snod bzhin sel bar
'gyur// gu gul gla rtsi lus byugs pas// me lces sbrang bu bsregs pa ltar// thams cad myur du 'bros par 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags 'chang// sngags dang phyag rgya rten 'brel
gyis// nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// 'bad par bya zhing brtson par gyis// dpal rta mgrin gyi rgyud las// rdzas kyi bsrung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po rta
mchog stan las langs te// khro bo'i stangs stabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa// ston pa'i rgyal po rigs sngags 'chang// bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa// thabs dang shes
rab gnyis kyi ni// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad pa// rig pa'i rgyal por phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i ra ba dra ba yis// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bsrung// rdo
rje 'khor lo'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad bzlog cing med par byed// 'khor lo'i bdag por phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad ces gsol ba dang// bcom ldan 'das kyang zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas
pa bzhugs so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal ba la sogs pa thams cad dang// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog dang/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal rta mchog gi rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ nA ga bi na ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal rta mgrin dregs pa klu 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
na/ gdug pa can gyi gnas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i klong dkyil/ klu chen po brgyad kyi gnas/ sbrul nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnas de na/ klu'i rje bo ha ya grI ba dang/ lag
na rdo rje dang/ bya khyung ga ru Da rnams kyis/ klu rnams 'dul ba'i don du/ klu'i gnas su bzhugs te/ nA ga klu 'dul gyi rigs sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo b+hud+d+ha ya/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ nA
ga du na tsan d+he tsan d+he/ mi li mi li/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ nA ga ni swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ klu thams cad skrag dngangs te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis 'di skad ces gsol
to// kye kye dpa' bo chen po 'jigs byed drag po gsum// bdag cag klu yi tshogs bcas la// bka' dbab mi 'tshal 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ hU~M nA ga rA dza sa ma ya
dza/ zhes klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis phul lo// nA ga ra dza ba su ki ni dza dza/ zhes klu rigs bzhis phul lo// klu 'dul srog snying phul ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang klu
brgyad kyis gsol pa// e ma 'jigs byed chen po gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// bdag cag klu yi bstan pa 'byung// bdag cag klu yi 'khor rnams ni// 'gro ba mi la gnod
byed pas// de tshe bsrung dang gdul ba dang// bzlas dang las kyi rim pa dang// gsad dang gnan dang bsreg pa dang// klu bsgrub klu gso klu gtor dang// gta' bsdam rten spo la sogs
pa// 'jug lugs thugs dang rtags dang ni// srog ser gtad dang las mthar rnams// rim pa bzhin du bka' stsol cig/ zhus pa gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rta
mchog rgyal po yis// 'khor gyi tshogs la bka' stsal pa// dang po ting 'dzin sgom rim ni// thog mar chos nyid stong pa nyid// de las khyab pa'i snying rje bsgom// de nas rang sems ye shes
hrIH// de las 'od 'phros e las mkha'// de steng yaM las rlung dkyil 'khor// de steng ra las khrag gi mtsho// de steng raM las me'i dkyil 'khor// de steng laM las zhing chen sa// de steng keM las

rus pa'i raM// de steng b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang// phyi ni rin chen sna lngas brtsigs// nang ni b+han d+ha'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhi ldan pa la// chu srin ka ba sbrul chen gdung// nya
sbal gral drab sbrul zar tshags// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzhal yas khang// rgyu yig hrIHde gzhal yas kyi// nyi zla pad klu'i gdan stengs babs// de las rta mgrin dbang gi sku// sku mdog dmar
nag zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis phur pa 'dril ba la// zhal gyis sbrul ni 'dren cing za// zhabs kyis sbrul gyi mgo mnan pa// pad+ma'i gshog pas zil gyis gnon// phrag pa g.yas g.yon spyi
gtsug tu// sprul pa'i bya khyung re re bsgom// lus po gser la gshog pa lcags// mchu sder zangs la sder drug lcags// zhal gyis sbrul ni 'dren cing za// klu rnams sgrol cing za bar bsgom// de
lta bu yi skur gsal dang// sprul pa yang sprul mang po yis// gang bar bsgom pa ting 'dzin no// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs shing// mchod dang bstod pa ma lus 'bul// zhes gsungs
so// lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor gyi klu'i tshogs kyis zhus pa// kye ma dpal chen rta mgrin sku// klu rnams phur pas ji ltar 'dul// dpal chen yab
kyis bka' stsal pa// nA ga phur pas gdul 'dod na// gru gsum 'bar ba'i me ris bskor// bsad pa'i maN+Dal de yin pas// dug khrag sol bas nag por byugs// shar du sha la lhor rdo
rje// nub tu me tog byang du tshil// dbus su seng ldeng phur bu bzhag/ phur bu rta mchog lha gsum bsam// gu gul dud pas phur pa 'dug/ bzlas pa 'bum du bzlas shing
bsngags// bar bar bstod dang zil gnon bya// sha tshil gtor ma mchod pa 'bul// sha tshil za zhing byug par bya// bye ma lus la bcang zhing brdeg/ phur pa dag las 'od 'phros pas// nyi ma lta
bu'i 'od zer gyis// klu gdug thams cad zhi bar nus// rigs bzhi zil gyis mnan par 'gyur// ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar// klu yi sbyor bas mi tshugs so// klu phur bus bzlog pa'i
le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bzlas shing klu srin 'dul ba 'di gsungs so// dang po hrIHzhes brjod pa yis// gting mtha' med pa'i dbyings nyid nas// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba
kun// rta mgrin dbang gi lha ru gyur// bdag nyid rta mgrin thugs ka nas// rta mgrin khro chung tshon gang ba// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// phar 'phros pad+ma'i lha tshogs la// sku
gsung thugs kyi mchod pa 'bul// sprul pa'i khyung rnams phar 'phros pas// gnod byed thams cad lcags kyus bkug/ zhags pas bcings shing lcags sgrog bsnams// phur bus btab nas
brlag par bsgom// khyad par klu gnyan pho mo dang// klu srin ma lus thams cad bsgral// bskal ba'i me dpung klong dkyil nas// dbang gi rta skad phyogs bcur sgrogs// gdug pa'i tshogs
rnams 'dul ba dang// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba dang// zhing khams dbang du sdud par bsgom// ting nge 'dzin
gyis klu 'dul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bum pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// ting nge 'dzin du bsgom pa ni// khyad par dbang chen bum pa
'dzin// rin chen las byas bum pa ru// sman lnga 'bru lnga blugs byas la// bum pa b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang// de na dbang chen bskyed nas ni// gzungs thag dmar po btags byas la// bsnyen

pa'i sngags kyi sham bu ru// oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he swA hA// btags pa brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// de nas nad pa la sogs bkru// dbang chen bum pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// rdzas bsag lha bsgom 'khor lo bskor// khyad par lha chen 'khor lo 'dzin// mtho gang tsam gyi ro ras la// 'ching bar byed pa'i snag tsha
yis// bltas pas lus gnag sgro rtsa yis// sngags grangs mnyam pa de dmigs bri// de nas mtshan ma gang byung bri// kha dog rigs bzhi'i tshul du'o// de yi snying gar drag sngags re
re la'o// maN+Dal gtsang ma dris byugs la// mdun du nyung dkar nyung nag gzhag/ gu gul gla rtsis lus byugs te// sngags grangs mnyam par nyin par bzlas// nA ga nA dza khrag mA ra ya hU~M phaT/
ces las la sbyar ro// 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas phur pa'i sbyor ba ni// lha bsgom rdza bsag phur bus btab// seng ldeng lcags phur dug shing gis// drag sngags mnyam
pa'i phur pa bshams// drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ nA ga badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ drag sngags mnam par gdab par bya// phur pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas
sbyin sreg bya ba'i rim pa ni// lha bsgom rdzas bsag sbyin bsreg bya// khyad par lha chen me dpung 'dzin// gdug pa'i hom shing khru gang tshad// sngags kyi grangs dang mnyam par bya// sngo dmar skud
pas rim gsum bkyig/ bar der 'khor lo srog rtsa bcad// gri khyer g.yas su thogs nas ni// gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bzlas// nA ga tIk+Sha mA ra ya hU~M phaT// rim pa grangs te yaM bzhi
brgyud// byang shar mtshams su gzhag par bya// 'khor lo gris gtubs thogs nas ni// gra dang mnyam par bsreg par bya/ me ni yugs sa mo las blang// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa
ni// nA ga tsit+ta dz+wa la raM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas mnan pa'i rim pa ni// lha bsgom rdzas bsag mnan sngags bzlas// khyad

par lha chen ri rab 'dzin// rdzas bsag pa yi rim pa ni// chu srin nya sram spre thod du// thal ba dag ni blugs bya ste// rta mgrin bya khyung 'dra ba bsam// chu srin 'dra ba'i kha ru btsang// nA ga mA ra
ya nan s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ oM laM hU~M laM staM b+ha ya nan/ zhes gnan par bya'o// mnan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gsungs// dpal chen rta mchog rgyal po yi// las
kyi 'bras bu mngon dbyung phyir// las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bshad par bya// de yang phrin las rnam bzhi la// dus dang phyogs dang thab dang ni// rdzas dang sngags dang lha bsgom dang// spyi don bdun du

shes par bya// dus ni rgyas pa snga dro la// dbang ni nyin phyed zhi ba sred// drag po nyin mtshan gung la bya// phyogs ni zhi ba shar du blta// rgyas pa lho la dbang ni nub// drag po byang du bya bar
bshad// thab ni zhi ba zlum po la// rgyas pa gru bzhi dbang zla gam// drag po mthing nag gru gsum mo// shing ni yal ga rgyas pa la// zhi ba rtse mo dbang la lhun// drag po rtsa ba'i shing

la bya// rdzas ni zhi ba til dang mar// rgyas pa zho dang 'bras chan dang// dbang la mngar ba'i rdzas la bya// drag po dug khrag tsha ba'i rdzas// sngags ni zhi ba la shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa la puSh+tiM
ku ru swA hA// dbang ni pa shang ku ru swA hA/ drag po mA ra ya phaT/ lha ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// me lha dang ni dkyil 'khor lha// gnyis ka zhi ba sku mdog dkar// rgyas pa ser po dmar po
dbang// drag po sku mdog nag por bstan// spyi yi don skor rnam bdun gyis// pad+ma'i las bzhi'i sbyin sreg rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// las bzhi'i sbyin sreg mthar dbyung ba'i le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// de nas klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul gyi le'u las/ sa bdag klu gnyan 'dul ba dang// klu nad gso ba'i le'u las// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms la// dbu la rta mchog
'thon pa ste// bya khyung rigs lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i gshog pa re re la// bya khyung re res gtams pa yis// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang// klu gnyan 'dul ba'i gnyan bor brtag/ de la

sngags kyi rim pa ni// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+h+ri wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ na mo b+hud+d+ha ya/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ nA ga dun/ tsan+d+hetsan+d+he/ mi li mi li/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ nA ga ni swA hA/ oM badzra pA ni ga ru Ta kA ya

dz+wa la nA ga ru pa ya/ mA hA rA dza kro d+ha b+he ya b+he ya/ badzra dun te dz+wa li ta/ nA ga sarba A kaN+Da ta ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ nA ga pa la pra ha ra pra ha ra/ kra ma sa ras ra u ts+tsha ta ya phaT/ nA ga bo d+ha

ya kha da ya kha da ya/ nA ga sarba duSh+tan dzi bi ni ha ra pra ma ka nA ga bi dA ra ya ti ling ga le/ nA ga b+hasmi ku ru hU~M phaT/ de skad bzlas shing gdul bar bya// drag po'i sngags brjid ldan pa 'dis/ klu rnams
kun kyang gsod par 'gyur// gdug pa gzhan la smos ci dgos// klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul klu gnyan sa bdag 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba

'di gsungs so// oM hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita hU~M dza/ ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ces sku'i sngags so// A+oM hU~M e A ra li hriM hriM dza/ zhes gsung sngags so// ma hA srog shag thun b+h+yo phaT/ ces pa thugs kyi sngags
so// dang po dbang gi sku ru bskyed// gnyis pa khams gsum dbang du sdud// gsum pa thams cad las la 'dzud// las sngags 'di la mtha' sbyar te// re rtse re b+hu te le bu/ Ta da la bu nan/ hri
kar rtse rtse b+h+rUM ba ba tu ma oM ga ta ga tig/ mug mug ti ti ri sad/ mchu yi sngags rgod klu thams cad sel ba'o// A+oM a pa ta a pa ta/ 'brug thog 'brug thog nan sad nan sad/ ti
ti saM ha ri sad/ paM sad thum ril sad/ thum shi sad swA hA/ sder mo'i sngags snying nas 'dren pa ste/ klu nad thams cad sel bar byed pa'o// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hU~M

phaT/ oM A+oMHhU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ga ru Ta/ ma hA ga ru Ta/ nA ga mA ra Na dun dun/ nA ga mA ra Na myogs myogs/ nA ga mar Na bying bying/ thum ri li li dza dza/ rtag tu bzlas shing klu las gyur pa'i nad
rigs thams cad la gdab bo// drag sngags gsang ba las kyi sngags// klu gdug 'dul ba'i sngags rgod yin// mdze nad thams cad sel bar byed// drag po'i sngags rgod bstan pa'i le'u ste
bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas sngags rnams bstan pa ni// nye bsnyen ga la dgug pa 'di// nA ga srog tshig nan rbad lus brtul nA ga mA ra ya rbad/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la shi shi// rul phung nA ga
mA ra ya rbad sod/ sgrub pa dag la rbad pa ni/ nA ga shig nan/ nA ga ber raM/ nA ga chings/ nA ga stims nA ga sod/ nA ga mgo la nan/ nA ga rA dza mA ra ya chings/ las la sbyar te bsad pa'i

sngags// nA ga rA dza hU~M/ nA ga rA dza phaT/ nA ga shu shu nan/ nA ga shu shu ber/ snying la tshal srog la rbud// pra ti sa ma ya dza dza/ nA ga snying la tshal pa dum bur rbad/ si ta sarba ga ta na bi shad de nA ga

nan kha thaM kha thaM/ nyi ma sa la zla ba nan/ klad pa nan/ rtsi ti ku ling nan/ ku na shi rtsi tri mu tra bzlog byed/ nA ga shig nA ga nan/ nA ga mgo la nan/ nA ga rA dza bir ber phaT rbad/ klu btsan thal
bar brlag pa ni/ ya ma shu shu sod/ ya ma shu shu rbad/ ya ma shu shu nan/ klu bdud dag la brdeg pa'i sngags// nag po shu shu mgo la nan/ nag po shu shu rbad/ nag po shu shu nan rbad/ sa bdag dag
la brdeg pa ni/ sa gdon nag po sod/ sa khrag mA ra ya rbad/ klu bsen dag la brdeg pa'i sngags// ya ma yaM tri nan rbad/ ya ma yaM tri sod/ ya ma yaM tri nan/ rak+sha mA ra ya rbad/ gnyan la brdeg

pa'i sngags 'di'o// rtsag kraM ru tri rbad/ rtsag kraM ru tri rbud/ rtsag kraM ru tri sod/ du ma mA ra la rbad/ rgyal po dag la bsnun pa ni/ rA dza thang thang shi shi rbad/ trang ril trang ril thum/ kyi ma thar ga ma

tang/ khug shel khug shel/ rA dza ma rA ya rbad rbad/ gza' la brdeg pa'i drag sngags ni/ nA ga ya tig nan/ du ma mA ra ya dza la rbad/ d+hi ri d+hi ri phung phung sod/ nA ga rA dza mA ra ya/ thuM thuM ril
ril shi shi rbad/ ma ti ya ma nA ga mA ra ya thuM ri li li/ zhung zhung myogs rbad/ klu la sogs pa thams cad la brdeg cing bsad pa'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// nA ga
klu 'dul rgyud las ni/ bsad pa'i thun bsgrub 'di gsungs so// de la thun lum thun 'di'o// lcags la sogs pa'i thun lum la// gsang sngags 'di yis gdab par bya// nA ga hU~M thuM ril rbad/
ces pa khri dang stong bzlas nas// brgyab pas gnod byed brlag par 'gyur// rdo rje'i thun ni bstan pa yin// de la bye tshan thun bstan pa// zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye la// sngags 'di bzlas te
gdab par bya// nA ga ag ni dz+wa la raM/ mA ra ya rbad/ khri tsho sum stong bzlas la gdab// nA ga ag ni dz+wa la raM mA ra ya rbad/ ces pa khri tsho sum stong bzlas// chu 'gram bye ma dag dang
bsres// rten la btab na 'tshig par 'gyur// de nas dug thun bstan pa ni// dug sna tshogs la sngags 'di bzlas// nA ga rak+sha ta tha dug thuM ril mA ra ya phaT/ lnga stong brgyad dang rtsa brgyad
bzlas// klu rnams myos shing 'thibs par 'gyur// de nas phur bu'i thun bstan pa// dug shing phur pa sor brgyad la// sngags 'di bzlas shing sngags par bya// nA ga kI li kI la mA ra ya phaT/

stong dang nyis brgya bzlas byas nas// phur pa ling+ga dag la brdeg/ klu rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur// de nas ske tse'i thun bstan pa// ske tshe la ni sngags 'di bzlas// na' ga raM raM dz+wa la mA
ra ya rbad// stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas nas// klu la btab na 'tshig par 'gyur// gu gul ra gzhob thun bstan pa// khyi lud mi gtsang sna tshogs la// sngags 'di bzlas te brdeg par
bya// nA ga thibs thibs mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces sum stong bzlas nas btab pa na// gdon rnams thams cad 'bros par 'gyur// dug shing lcug gi thun bstan pa// ka ra bAM ra'i lcugs
ma'am// ser shing smyag shar lcug ma la// sngags 'di bzlas shing brdeg par bya// nA ga zhung zhung rbad rbad mA ra ya rbad/ khri dang drug stong bzlas shing brdeg/ nad pa la ni bdug la
brdeg/ gdon rnams thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur// klu yang skad ngan tse ri 'ong// thun bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul rgyud las ni// las kyi mtha' brtul zor thun gsungs// me
zor las kyi mtha' brtul ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i las dang ni// drag po'i sbyin bsreg me ro la// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brdeg/ nA ga ag ni ma ti b+h+yo
b+h+yo// zhes klu la btab na 'tshig par 'gyur// de nas rdo yi zor las bstan// lcags kyi rdo lnga bsreg bya la// gnod pa'i bgegs la sngags 'dis 'phang// nA ga thuM thuM mA ra ya
dug thuM ril b+h+yo// zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// rdo bsregs 'ur rdor bcug la 'phang// klu rnams thams cad 'tshig par 'gyur// de nas phur bu'i zor bstan pa// gdug pa can gyi shing
rnams la// phur pa sor brgyad byas nas ni// sngags 'di khri dang brgya stong bzlas// nA ga kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT// gnod sar btab na brlag par 'gyur// de nas mda' yi zor las
bstan// mda' yi nang du dug khrag ske tshe blugs// mde'u la gnod pa'i ming bris la// sngags 'dis 'phang zhing brdeg par bya// nA ga ra ya thun b+h+yo// zhes pa stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// gnod
pa'i sa ru 'phang bar bya// gnod byed ma lus gsod par 'gyur// khrag dang dug gi zor bstan pa// rabs chad thod par dug sna tshogs// khrag sna tshogs tshad blugs par bya// sngags 'di

bzlas shing brdeg par bya// khrag ti mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo// stong dang lnga khri bzlas byas la// thod pa gnod pa'i phyogs su 'phang// gnod byed myos shing 'ching bar 'gyur// drag po zor thun las sbyor
'dis// nA ga gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad ma lus brlag par byed// drag po'i las thun bstan pa yin// zor thun bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// bzlog pa'i

las zhig bka' stsal pa// rang nyid dbang chen ting 'dzin bsgom// sngags 'di nyung dkar dag la bzlas// oM hrI pad+man+ta kr-ita hU~M/ oM badzra ma hA kro ta hU~M phaT/ baM hU~M e A ra li hriM hriM dza/ e ha ri ma

hA ha ri ta sa la ta sa la/ ha ri ha ri ni hU~M phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo sa ma ya bzlog bzlog/ a la la pra ma du ru ka b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA pa k+Sha phaT/ thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'am// dgra bgegs drag
po'i gnod phyogs sam// ri gzar kha yi rbab byung bzlog/ dgra bgegs mdon sum smos ci dgos// mi ma yin pa thams cad bzlog/ thal chen la sngags ser ba bzlog/ oM ta kri dza ti bi dza ti/
hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru ti swA hA/ klu yi byad dang gtad mnan bzlog/ khyad par gyi bzlog pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas dgug pa'i las bstan pa// mdun
du gru gsum khru gang bru// nang du klu gnyan sna tshogs gzugs// shog shog ling+ga bris la gzhug/ rang 'thag rdo rje rgya gram gyis// 'brub khung kha bcad rta rmig mnan// de nas dgug gzhug bya ba
de// rang nyid rta mchog skur bsgoms la// sngags 'di bzlas shing rta rmig brdung// ru rung rdung rdung khug dza/ rug tha than ri nye lug dza/ ti rbad nA ga nyur ra ram khug dza/ ces gnod
byed dgug cing rta sug brdung// gdug pa gzer cing brdung bar bya// gnod byed gang yin sod par 'gyur// 'byung po ma lus sod 'gyur na// dgra bgegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug
cing brdung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas nA ga klu yi dug/ mi la zhugs pa'i rtags bstan pa// rus pa dag la zhugs pa na// lus po skam la zug gzer che// thang nge na zhing dri
mi zhim// sha ro 'byung ba sha yi rtags// rtsa la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lus sbrid ber ber byed pa dang// sgyid lug pa dang sgyid lci dang// tsha zhing tsha 'brab byed

pa dang// tsha ber tsha sgreng zhugs pa dang// tsha thang tsha ker byed pa dang// yan lag na ba rtsa yi rtags// khrag la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lus lci sna khrag skabs su 'dzag/ tsha ber 'dir ba dka' ba yin// nang khrol dag la

zhugs pa ni// glo snying mi bde stong skyugs byed// snying mi bde la tsha ltar phyo// bcud la tshud pa'i rtags bstan pa// khu chu mi 'byung dbang po nyal// khu ba skyo mar 'byung ba dang// chu ni dngas
snyigs bye nas 'ongs// chu la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sna chu skya bor rtag tu 'dzag/ sbugs ni chu ni rgya skyegs khu ba 'dra// mig rtsa rul te se ru 'byung// lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa na// sgyid
zhum pa dang nyal nyal byed// lus kyi mdog la zhugs pa ni// lce mdog 'ol ma ze ltar dmar// dmar po thig le 'ong ba'o// byings la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lus lci sna khrag skabs su
'dzag/ lus la gnyer chung khebs pa dang// lag sor byi gzhug 'dra bar 'ong// reg pa dag la zhugs pa ni// sna rtse tsha zhing ber ber byed// chu rgyus dag la zhugs pa ni// yan lag rengs shing
na ba dang// sha bur 'dra zhing tshigs rnams 'khor// chu ser dag la zhugs pa'i rtags// lus po tsha zhing khol ba dang// tsha la cag cing tsha la 'jibs// lus la 'brum rjes thag thug 'ong// klad
pa dag la zhugs pa ni// skra bye bem bem byed pa dang// gdong bkrag chu ni mi chags pa'o// lha ba dag la zhugs pa ni// gdong ba dag ni yar yal byed// gdong ba grang ni seng seng byed// lus
la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lus la tshor ba med pa yis// gdong ba la sogs sha 'gul 'ong// rus pa dag la zhugs pa ni// rkang lag tshigs bzhi'i rus rnams khol// byad kyi rus pa khol
zhing na// na tsha med par phol mig 'ong// sor mo 'brul zhing rkang lag 'chad// kha mig sle zhing mchu yang sle// byad ni srab zhing leb par 'ongs// sna lpags dag la zhugs pa
ni// dang po rang nas byad kyang bzlog/ byad lugs gdong ba'i sha yang 'chor// smin ma 'tshor zhing mig phugs lug/ gzhug tu sna yang 'chad par 'gyur// de ni gso bar dka' ba yin// sha ro
'ong zhing sha ro mang ba dang// bas ldag rkong pa thor ba 'ong// rgya thor mang la lus po za// smin ma za zhing smin phrag za// lus dang sha 'phrig mang ba dang// skabs su skya la skabs su
dmar// phags pa dag la zin pa ni// lus po sbrid la snyam byed dang// rkang lag sbrid pa mang ba dang// sha lpags mtshams nas za ba dang// sha lpags na zhing tsha ba dang// sems can 'gul
snyam byed pa dang// ro stod nya bzhi 'gul ba dang// mig kong gting nas 'gul ba dang// mchu 'gul 'phrig pa mang ba 'ong// sha lpags mtshams su zhugs pa yin// rtsa rnams 'khyug cing breng
ba dang// khrag lud mig ni dmar ba dang// sna khrag rgyun du 'dzag pa dang// byad lus dmar la thig le 'ong// lus dang rkang lag bro zhing tsha// rmun long byad lus dbur zhing skrangs// de yang tsha
zhing bro bar 'ong// na tsha yar 'gro mar 'gro byed// sna 'gags lus lci byad mi bde// mi gtsang 'khon dang thab la sdar// de ni rtsa la zhugs pa'i rtags// de ltar nad ngos bzung byas la// zin
pa gnyan dang mi gnyan dang// gso ba dka' sla shes par bya// sngon gyi rnam smin ma yin na// srung ba'i sbyor bas sos par 'gyur/ klu yis zin pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste bcu dgu
pa'o//// de nas rmi ltas rim pa ni// gnod pa'i rtags rnams bstan pa ni// rtag tu rang sha za ba dang// lus la khrus dag byed pa dang// rgya gram lam na nyal ba dang// rgya ru 'dzul dang
'phur pa rnams// ngan pa'i rtags su shes par bya// gzhan yang rtag tu sha za dang// khyi phag bya dang nya sbrul dang// byol song rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rtag tu mi gtsang gos nag gon// ngan pa'i
rtags te rim gro 'bad// yang na bzang rtags ngan rtags dang// rnam par smin pa'i rtags dang gsum// de la dang po bsgrub pa'i rtags// bdag gis mthong yul tho phyi ru// nya sbrul sbal lcong
shi ba dang// bya yis god sha za ba dang// bya yis bdag gi brag gzhib dang// rgya mtsho skam gnas 'dug pa dang// de na sems can shi ba dang// sems can thams cad kha bcing dang// lus
las sbal lcong 'thon pa dang// de rnams bzang ba'i rtags bstan yin// ngan pa'i rtags rnams bstan pa ni// sbal sbrul glog ltar 'gyu ba dang// sdig sbrul char ltar 'bab pa
dang// chu srin 'brug ltar sgrog pa dang// sdig sgrib sbyin ltar gtibs pa dang// de rnams ngan pa'i rtags su bstan// rnam par smin pa'i rtags su ni// me dpung 'bar bas gdung ba
dang// 'dam rdzab chen por tshud par dang// phyar nag lus la gyon pa dang// phag pa zhon nas sa gting 'gro// phyar ba gon nas chu nang nyal// 'di rnams las kyi rnam smin yin// 'dus byas
dge rtsa dag la 'bad// srog tshig nan gyi sngags bzlas la// 'byung po mi zan byung ba na// zla ba gcig gis 'tsho ba yin// sbrul du byung na zla phyed bzlas// phyugs su byung na zhag gsum
gdags// sha ro bya rjes sbal mig dang// sha 'gul rtsa 'khyug byung ba na// mi bzad rdzas sbyor de la byug/ lhag pa skrangs po byung ba bzhin// mi bzad drag po'i sngags rgod gdab// nad ngos
bzung ba 'di ltar ro// dpral bar byung ba 'tsho ba bul// mig dang yan lag gso ba sla// mkhur tshos snying babs gsor mi btub/ rtags kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
pa'o//// de nas bsrung ba'i rdzas bstan pa// lcags phur seng ldeng phur pa la// sngags bzlas lus la btags pa dang// ring bsrel spyi bor gdags byas la// de la bya khyung bskor
ba bsgom// rus sbal khog pa mchan khung gzhug/ stobs chen mche ba glo la gdags// sreg pa'i rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// mu zi gu gul gla rtsi bsreg/ bza' ba'i rdzas ni sha chen la// byug pa'i
rdzas ni dri chen no// mtshams gcad rdzas ni thod chen dang// phag rgod bya khyung gzugs kyis bya// lus la bcang ba'i rdzas bstan pa// mu zi btsan dug gla rtsi dang// sgog skya khu byug spu dang
sha/ gser ma bzhu dang ske tshe ste// de rnams bsrel la lus la gdags// snying la zhugs pa phag ril gtang// mig la byung na gtsang sha gtang// gla rtsi shing kun shu dag dang// gu gul nya mkhris
mkhris chen dang// dri chen nyung dkar sngags btab la// chu la btab la lto ru gtang// nang nas dbyung ba'i thabs yin no// dud pas bdug pa bar nas dbyung// khrus byas phyi nas dbyung bar
byed// phyis nas mi ldang bya ba'i thabs// mi thod nang du bag zan la// klu gzugs byas la them 'gag nan// ban chen rnga brdung byed pa dang// sgrog dang mthur stod rmis na bzang// lha srin sde
brgyad thub pa'i rdzas// stag gi mche sder btsan thub rdzas// bya rog mgo bo bdud thub rdzas// mu zi 'byung po thub pa'i rdzas// spyang khyi'i brun gyis rgyal po thub// gla rtsi gu gul the
rang thub// klu rigs bzhi po thub pa'i rdzas// thal chen a mr-i ta dang ni// ma nu gser tshil bram ze thub// pha bong dregs pas dmangs rigs thub// ba glang ra gzhob rje rigs thub// btsan dug
dang ni ske tshe dang// zi ra nag pos rgyal rigs thub// rje rigs dbang po lag pa dang// rgya mtsho lbu ba chu srin sder// kaN+Da ka ris klu 'khor thub// srung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
pa'o//// de nas gdug pa'i nang dbye ba// rlung las gyur dang mkhris pa dang// bad kan nad las gyur pa dang// 'dus pa dag las gyur pa dang// srin bu'i nad dang rnam pa
lnga// rlung las gyur pa skya sbab shu ba 'ong// mkhris pa las gyur dmar seng chu bur 'ong// bad kan las gyur mdze nad ni// sha lpags bem la smug nag 'jil// 'dus pa de gsum 'dus pa
yin// da ni srin bu'i nad rnams dbye// chu rgyus zin na zha grum 'theng// rtsa la zin na tsha zhing 'khrug/ lpags la zin na sna shu 'ong// sha la zin na phol 'bras 'ong// khrag la zin na sna khrag
'ong// glo snying la zin skye yang 'gag/ klad pa la zin mgo bo na// klu yi nad la rnam pa lnga// kha mig sle zhing sha yang skam// rlung dang ser bu'i sran yang chung// sa bdag dag la rnam pa
gnyis// yan lag rengs dang gzhogs skams so// gnyan gyis ske rags ga shar 'ong// rtags de byung na sman bcos bya// des kyang ma phan sngags la gzhug/ nad rnams brtag pa'i man ngag
ni// tsha la me drod 'dra na yin// gu gul nag po rgya tshwa dang// yugs sa mo yi mngal khrag dang// sa 'og thal ba bsregs la bsku// tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba na// sa dug pa dang re lcag pa// ra mo

shag gis bsku bar bya// tsha zhing 'brum bu byung na ngan// btsod khu spos kyis bsku bar bya// kor tsher zug par byung ba na// ra lug thun po'i rmang kha'i sbre// me tog zhes bya'i rtsa yis byug/ rma dang

ser ga byung ba na// spyang tsher shog bu chor can byug/ gu gul ra gzhob tsha sreg bsku// nyam chung na ni chu yis bkru// glang thabs byung na sngags kyis gdab// sha khrag byung na bul chu dang// phag
pa'i tshil bu bsku bar bya// de ltar byas nas 'tsho bar 'gyur// sman gyis bcos pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// klu gnyan sa bdag rtags bstan pa// dang po klu yi rtags rnams
ni// nya sbrul khye'u pho mo dang// sbal pa lcong mo la sogs 'ong// sa bdag dag gi rtags bstan pa// ba glang mdzo dang 'bri dag dang// rtol dang sdom srin dag tu 'ong// gnyan la
glang dmar brag nag dang// mdze can nya lcibs gos gyon 'ong// klu bsen bu mo ral pa can// khyi dmar phag pa sre 'o 'ong// sa srin sdig pa bud med dang// ba glang 'phyi ba bud med nag/ khyi
nag sgra skad sna tshogs 'don// rtags de byung na rta mchog bsgom// klu mchod klu gtor gtang ba dang// zhi bas bcos dang drag pos 'dul// klu gnyan sa bdag thul bar 'gyur// klu gnyan dang
sa bdag gi rtags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas gso ba'i las bshad pa// smyo 'bog chen po gso ba dang// glo bur rkyen du na ba dang// srin bu gso ba rnam pa gsum// rig
'dzin rgyal por bsdongs pa dang// klu dang rgyal por bsdongs pa dang// bdud dang rgyal por bsdongs pa dang// ma mo rgyal por bsdongs pa dang// lcam dral gnyis su bsdongs pa rnams// srid
pa'i che 'dre gnod pa dang// kha smras rgyang mig lta byed cing// ngo nag klu dang rgyal por bsdongs// ngo gnag smra nyung kha lkugs na// klu dang bdud du bsdongs pa'i rtags// dgod cing glu len gya
tshom smra// 'bros shing 'dug tu mi 'dod na// ma mo rgyal por bsdongs pa'i rtags// lag rdeb mi la rgol 'dod dang// ngu zhing smra bar byed pa ni// bdud dang rgyal po bsdongs pa'i rtags// ma
nges spyod pa sna tshogs byed// kha skams glo snying mi bde zhing// col 'brus smra zhing 'gro 'dod na// srid pa'i lcam dral gnod pa yin// bcos pa'i thabs kyang 'di lta ste// rig 'dzin skongs la
rgyal po mchod// lug po dkar po gnyis pa yang// gso bsad mnan dang sbyar bar bya// se bo rta la dkar po gtang// klu dang rgyal po bsdongs pa'i tshe// kha brgya lag brgya'i klu la gtang// bya
pho dkar pos rgyal po mchod// ra dkar lug dkar gta' ru gzug/ bdud dang rgyal po bsdongs pa'i tshe// ra rog nag po mkhal dkar dang// ra ltag nag la lug mig gnag/ de ni rgyal po
nag po yin// ma mo rgyal po bsdongs pa'i tshe// bya smug lug smug bya rog dkar// mda' 'phang bya yi phod kyis brgyan// lcam dral gnyis su bsdongs pa'i tshe// mi rta 'bri yi snying gis bskang// de
ltar gal te mang na yang// snying sna khrag sna tshogs pa yi// gtor ma phud kyis bcos par bya// gdon ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// ban bon gtad du bcug pa
yas// mi la klu yis gnod pa mi// btsun pa btsan po rgyal po yin// bud med bya mo nag mo yin// mi nag rta nag bdud kyi ltas// skyes pa gcan gzan btsan gyi ltas// sbal sbrul
ba glang khyi dang phag/ klu dang sa bdag ltas su bstan// nyi zla mig mang lug ni gza'// byis pa sran can the brang ltas// de ltar rtags rnams byung ba'i tshe// rgyal po sngags 'dis bzlog par
bya// oM rA dza stam b+ha ya chings chings swA hA// klu rnams 'di yis bzlog par bya// nag po sod nag po sod/ nA ga 'dus nA ga 'dus/ nA ga chings nA ga chings swA hA/ srin po 'di yis bzlog par

bya// dzA la rak+Sha phaT/ ma mo 'di yis bzlog par bya// b+h+yo ma mor rak+sha ma ma trag tu swA hA/ bdud rnams 'di yis bzlog par bya// hU~M tri ta ya sa man ta li laM badzra baM rbad/ s+t+waM b+ha ya mA ra ya dza dza/
btsan rnams 'di yis bzlog par bya// hU~M btsan tshal pa tshal pa shag shag hU~M phaT/ the brang 'di yis bzlog par bya// tri duM su tri duM bu the brang mA ra ya dza dza/ gza' rnams 'di yis bzlog par

bya// oM rA hu la s+t+waM b+ha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dza dza rbad swA hA/ sde brgyad gnad la bor ba'i sngags// gtan rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin// lha srin sde brgyad gnad la dbab pa'i le'u
ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul rgyud las ni// klu yi thogs ser dbab pa bstan// mon nag rabs chad thod pa'am// mdze po'i thod pa'i nang du ni// mi ra khyi gsum khrag dang
ni// nyung dkar yungs nag thal chen dang// ra dug spyang dug la sogs la// dgra yi lo thog sna tshogs stsal// thod pa'i phyi rol khrag gis byug/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// thogs ser

dbab pa 'di yis bsgrub// bdag nyid rta mchog skur bsgom bzlas// na mo b+hud+d+ha ya/ oM badzrakI li kI la ya/ tsan d+ha mi ri li/ tsan d+ha tsan d+ha/ tsan d+he tsan d+he/ nA ga b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ b+han d+ha ya
b+han d+ha ya/ phaT phaT/ thod pa phur pa dag la sngags// klu gnas yul lha'i rten la sba// yul lha bskrad pa'i sngags 'di'o// hU~M badzra de ba tad da gu h+ya tad de phaT/ rol pa yo kI b+h+yo// nA ma

nyung nyung/ sprin sdud pa'i sngags yin no// pa ra trad tra hu ya hu ya/ 'brug btang ba'i sngags 'di yin no// mA ti hI la phu phu ti/ e nA ga nA ga g+ho la/ drag po thun khrag phob/ bu ta pra ta ya/ A be
sha ya A be sha ya/ b+ha re sha ya b+ha ri sha ya/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ nA ga nA ga drag po phob/ ser sprin byung nas ser ba byung ba na/ nA ga nA ga mgo la thog phob/ re ma rak+sha shag/ e ma du
sprin thog rgyob// i ma ka tsa la phrom shig/ du ma sprin thog rgyob// thun phrom 'ur 'ur chem chem/ lo thog sna tshogs rang la chem/ lhogs lhogs zhes// gong gi khrag la sngags la
gtor// yul zhing ji tsam 'dod pa bskor// gta' ni ma phyung bar du 'ong// thod pa phur pa sngags bcas sba// klu yod gnas ni 'phrog par byed// thog dang ser ba gdon mi za// gal te des
kyang ma phebs na// rta mchog rgyal po'i skur bsgoms la// seng ldeng phur pas sbal pa gzer// dgun yang thog dang ser ba 'ong// ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/// nA ga
klu 'dul rgyud las ni// thun mong khyad par zab pa yi// char pa dbab pa'i cho ga bshad// de la lugs ni gnyis yod de// zhi bas bslang dang drag pos dbab// 'di ni zhi ba'i dbab lugs
te// dkar gsum mngar gsum bag phye la// ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya// gser ram dngul gyi snod du blugs// ba yi rnam lngas maN+Dal bya// de nas bzlas pa'i sngags la zhugs// ril bu re
la brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags grangs them par gyur pa dang// gang yod chu mig nang du blugs// sngags grangs thems na gdon mi za// oM nA ga ka la hU~M/ nA ga le ye/ dum pa le le/ nA ga rA dza hU~M
phaT/ klu mchod klu gtong gtang bar bya// 'dis ni mi phebs mi srid do// ji srid des kyang ma phebs na// drag po'i las 'di bya bar gsungs// mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang dag tu// snying sna sha snas
bkang ste bsgrub// oM g+hu li g+hu li/ b+ha ra sha ya b+ha ra sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ sbogs pa'o// bdag nyid rta mgrin skur bsgoms la// dbang du sdud pa'i sngags 'di

bzlas// thuM thuM chem chem/ badzra kha phyir chad/ 'khrug bskur sngags kyang 'di yin te/ oM tri shi zhim gyi tshi bar na le/ bi sha pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ sprin bsdu ba'i sngags 'di bzlas/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/

bag ti rad na ya/ tad+ya thA/ a na le ba'i shad d+he/ be ra ba ra daM daM thibs thibs swA hA// rnam cig sngags ni 'di yin te/ hU~M hU~M sab sab/ hU~M sib sib/ rlung gtong sngags ni 'di yin no// char pa
ya char pa ya/ ti ti la nan/ de ltar las rnams rdzogs pa dang// sngags bzlas dbang sdud ting 'dzin bsar// klu rnams 'dar nas char 'bebs shing// rta mgrin bka' las mi 'da'
bar// ci bcol las rnams byed par 'gyur// char dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul rgyud las ni// ser ba bzlog pa'i las rim ni// ser gta' yas stags
'di lta ste// lci ba g.yar skye rgod la ster// mtsho chur 'bring mar gnyan 'du dang// ngang pa'i sgo nga lan tshwa mkhal// nyung dkar nyung nag bra yos dang// kham blug gsar pa'i nang du

ni// 'bru sna rin chen lnga yang bsag/ la rdzas sna tshogs dkar sna tshogs// mar phud zho phud sbrul gyi sha/ spyang khus la thud nya ri rab// ba lus lo ma 'brum bu dang// chang phung kham blug nang du
stsal// dbus kyi tho yi nang du gzhag/ yul khams me dpung 'bar bar bsgom// me yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms la bzhag/ sha sha shu shu ri bo'i rtsa non// raM raM 'ur 'ur/ 'brug gi sgang ri li li/
phaT phaT/ shig shig swA hA/ gta' yi phyogs bzhir bag zan skyu bzhi ru// nyung dkar 'bru bdun mi skye'i thal chen blug/ tad+ya thA/ ku lu ku lu sha sha ku lu/ ka ru byi ta ru/ gta' la 'tha'o zhes
byas la sba'o// zhag gsum lo gnas skyu tsho blta// gas na phud gtang bzlas pa bskyar// ma gas bzang ste thub pa'o// yang na shog thum byas nas ni// phyogs bzhir yas stags gong ma
stsal// shar gyi shog thum sngags 'di'o// shAkya rtsa dur zhil zhil// du ru du ru zhil zhil/ gnyan ser bzlog pa'i sngags 'di'o// tad+ya thA/ ga to tsag to phaT phaT/ tshal tshal/ klu ser bzlog pa'i
sngags 'di'o// bya dang bkra ma zhil zhil// gza' ser bsrung ba'i sngags 'di'o// du ru du ru shig shig/ btsan gyi ser ba bsrung ba ni/ du ru du ru raM/ gnam lcags bsrung ba'i sngags
'di'o// du ru du ru pa ka raM/ du ru du ru na byir tsa ra d+hi tri na// lan bdun bzlas la shog thum gdags// ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul rgyud las
ni// gdug pa klu yi gtad khram 'di// gro ga'am shog bu ras dag la// dmigs pa'i ling+ga bris byas la// rigs bzhi'i sbal pas lus bzung bri// la cha'i sbal par gzhug par bya// yang na
gson ma'i kha ru btsang// sngon dmar skud pas kha bcoms la// drag sngags 'di yis bsgrub par bya// oM nA ga rA dza sa ma ya/ nag po tsi ta sa ma ya dza/ oM nag po tsit+ta mA ra ya khrag ti mA ra ya
rgyas// tsit+ta tsit+ta mA ra ya/ oM nA ga shig mA ra ya swA hA/ rtags ni sbal pa mang po dang// sbrul lcong la sogs 'ded pa rmis// sbal pa dngos su 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas klu yod sa ru gtad// sbal
pa gson ma'i gtad byed na// klu yod sa nas sbal pa bzung// ling+ga gro ga dag la bri// 'o ma'i nang du ru rta brdar// zhu mkhan phye ma blugs byas te// zhag bdun par du sbal pa gso// drag
sngags bzla shing bsgrub pa bya// grub rtags sbal pa che ru 'gro// de tshe ling+ga kha ru brdzang// sngon dmar skud pas kha bcings la// dgra yi 'gram rtsar dong brus sba// yang na klu yod de
ru bskyal// zla ba gcig na kha phung 'chi// zla gshed nag po zhes kyang grags// 'di las lhag pa'i gtad gzhan med// log rdug 'khyams pa 'di la med// dgra la btsan la rang la shis// drag
sngags gnad dang ldan pa 'di// rta mgrin bsnyen pa sngon song bas// las 'di yis ni 'grub ces bstan// dgra bo klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul rgyud las
su// tsi tsi dz+wa la gso ba'i phyir// zhi ba klu bsgrub cho ga bshad// zangs sam lcags sam 'khar gzhong nang// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// de lta bu yi klu gzugs brgyad// mdzo dang rtol yang
brgyad brgyad bya// sbal pa nya lcong rta dang glang// de rnams dkar ser dmar nag bzhi// sdig pa 'bu srin gnyis gnyis bya// gnyan dang sa bdag khra bor bya// klu chen brgyad ni ser por
bya// bum par ba dmar ra dkar gyi// 'o ma dkar gsum mngar gsum dang// klu sman sna tshogs blug par bya// de nas bdag nyid rta mgrin bsgom// thugs las phuHni mang po
