'phros// gzugs brnyan re la phuHre phog/ ma hA nA ga zhes brjod pas// klu rigs bzhi po gang yin pa// de rang dngos su gyur par bsgom// klu rnams ci bya zer bar bsgom// bran dang khol bo'i

tshul gyis shig/ nad 'di thang la glud 'di longs// zhes bya'o// klu chen po brgyad 'bod pa// hU~M nA ga rA dza sa mA dza/ zhes stong bzlas/ klu gnyan sa bdag kun gyi snying po bzlas/ oM nA ga shaM kha

pA la ni dza/ oM nA ga pad+ma ni dza/ oM ba ye be ru phu ni dza/ ces brjod do// oM nA ga pU dza a mr-i ta ba liM ta kha kha/ khA hi khI hi/ hi hi sarba swA hA/ bdud rtsi blugs la dbul bar bya// nub gtor nyi ma
phyed nas gtang// nyi ma bzang ba'i dus dag ni// zla ba kun gyi tshes brgyad la// klu rnams khrus byed khrus chog bya// nya la klu rnams mi 'du ba// bsgrub kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// des na zhag
bdun bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gang bsgrub sgrub pa thon pa dang// yas stags gnod pa'i sa ru bskyal// tsi tsi dz+wa la byung ba yang// sos par 'gyur ba the tshom med// klu bsgrub kyis gso ba'i
le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// klu gta' sdom pa'i rim pa ni// gang gnod pa yi sar song la// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// tshon rtsis legs par bsgyur byas la// gser
dngul zangs lcags g.yu la sogs// rin po che dang 'bru rnams bsdus// 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang dbus su ni// nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dza// zhes dgod de lta'i 'khor lo de// kham sa'i
ga'u gru bzhi pa// gzhal yas tshul du byas la gzhug/ lha bshos pad 'dab brgyad pas mchod// de nas gnod pa'i klu de yang// klu sman klu gzugs bcas pas mchod// rin chen nor gyis gang
bar bsam// klu yi 'dod pa byung bar bsam// dus 'di tshun chad gnod pa rnams// ma byed ces pa'i bka' yang bsgo// gnod pa'i sbyor ba zhi bar 'gyur// klu gta' sdom pa'i le'u ste sum cu so
gcig pa'o//// klu gter sbas pa'i thabs bstan pa// zangs la glang bu dmar po bya// gser dngul zangs lcags byi ru g.yu// de rnams glang bu'i khog bar gzhug/ klu sman sna tshogs
rnyed tshang blug/ yang na bag tsan dag la bya// khog par ba ra dkar mo yi// 'o mar klu sman btab la blug/ blu gu gsang bar glang bu bzhag/ gta' la ma tha gnyan la tha// mi za yun gyi gter
mdzod cig/ ces pa bris la gzhug par bya// de nas gnod pa'i sar song la// klu gtor gtang zhing bden par brdar// ma gnod cig pa'i bka' yang bsgo// glang bu rdze'u gnas sar
sba// gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyun 'chad 'gyur// klu gter gzhug pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o//// klu rten spo pa'i thabs bstan pa// shing dang ne'u chu mig yod// de lta bu yi gnas dag
tu// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad bzhengs// klu de'i gzhal yas khang du bsam// sman dang 'bru dang spos rnams dang// de dag sbyar ba'i gtor ma bsham// zangs kyi gla bur rin chen sna
tshogs blugs// hU~M nA' ga sa ma ya dza/ nA' ga u tsa ta ya phaT/ ces pa zhag gcig zhag gsum bzlas// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang// rdzas dang gto mar bcas pa rnams// rtsi shing chu mig
can du bskyal// des ni klu rnams de ru 'gro// rang la gnod par mi 'gyur te// spo sa'i sa gzhi gang yin te// gzhal yas khang du bsam par bya// klu de spo bar the tshom med// klu rten spo ba'i
le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//// klu yi byad dgrol thabs bstan pa// klu yi byad du tshud pa na// zha dang grum dang 'gro mi shes// de la byad 'grol cho ga bya// nad pa'i yan lag tshon skud
dkri// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// klu brgyad klu mo brgyad rnams dang// rigs bzhi'i gnyan dang sa bdag gnod// klu gtor klu sman rdzas kyi mchod// sngags 'di brjod cing mchod pa
dbul// hU~M nA ga rA dza sa ma ya dza/ shig shig khrol khrol/ chod chod/ byad khrol zhes bzlas// rang nyid rta mgrin ting 'dzin bsgom// klu yi byad de bcad par bsam// nA' ga rA dza
chod khrol zhes byas la// gri yi tshon skud gcad par bya// tshon skud gtor ma'i nang du gzhug/ klu yi sa ru gtor ma yi// yas stags dkyil 'khor sa tshon bskyal// byad du bcug pa grol bar
'gyur// byad dgrol ba'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// klu rnams dbang du sdud pa dang// mchod cing phrin las bcol ba ni// hU~M/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog 'dir// chu
srin gzhal yas bya khyung bla re ni// pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la gsal bzhugs pa// dbang gi rgyal po khro rgyal rta mgrin dpal// sku mdog dmar nag chags med pad+ma 'dra// zhal cig phyag gnyis
zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bgrad// phyag mtshan mtshon chas dregs pa ma lus 'joms// mgur chu dkar khra'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa ni// rgyal rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// dbu rgyan
dmar khra'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa 'di// bram ze'i klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// phyag gdub ser khra'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa 'di// rje rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// sku regs
dmar khra'i sbrul gyis brgyan pa ni// gdol pa'i klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// zhabs gdub khra nag sbrul gyis brgyan pa ni// dmangs rigs klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// klu
rigs lnga yi ral pa sbrul 'khril pa// klu rigs thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// thugs kyi dkyil nas bya khyung mang po 'gyed// phrag pa gnyis nas bya khyung gzan la 'gyed// bka' las
'da' byed klu rnams zas su za// klu 'dul khro bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbu yi gtsug na rta mgo rgyang thon pa// ljang gu lhang lhang tser tser phyogs bcur sgrogs// chos ston mchog rtsol ma
tshogs dbang du sdud// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs drag pos thams cad brgyal// spyan nas me 'bar khams gsum sreg par byed// shangs nas 'thor ba'i rlung gis stong gsum 'gengs// zhal nas
rngam pa'i dug phyung nyon mongs sgrol// rngog ma le brgan srid gsum thal bar rlog/ dpral ba zhur po dgyes pa'i mdangs su che// dbang bdag khro bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod pa'i yon
tan lnga yi mchod 'bul bzhes// yun gyi lhar gyur mchog khyed bsgrub pa na// bdag la bsrung ba'i las dang cho ga mdzod// klu rnams bka' bzhin byed dang gnod pa sel// bcol pa'i 'bras bu
dus 'dir stsal du gsol// nga ni dpa' bo rta mgrin rgyal po ste// klu rgyal gdan steng klu bran zas su za// klu rnams nga yi bka' las ma 'da' cig/ klu rnams nga yi bka' las

'da' gyur na// mgo lus yan lag 'tshig par 'gyur ba dang// klu yi gnas ris brlag par 'gyur ta re// oM shrI pad+man+ta kr-ita badzra kro ta hU~M/ ha ya grI wa hriM hriM/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la
badzra pa ti sa ma ya dza/ zhes klu rnams bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ba dang bran du 'gyur ro// dpal rta mgrin la bstod cing// klu dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//// klu rnams
mchod cing phrin las bcol ba ni/ kye kye tshur spyon tshur spyon phrin las mdzod// klu rgyal khyed kyi zhal zas 'di na mchis// brtse zhing gdung phyir gshegs su gsol// bcol ba'i las rnams
'grub par mdzod// ka ra bu ram mngar gyi bcud// khyed kyi longs spyod 'di na mchis// klu gnyan pho mo 'di bzhes la// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// tshur spyon tshur gshegs klu
rgyal rnams// nA' ga ge sar nA' ga pu Sh+pa dang// rgya mtsho lbu ba ut+pa la// dbang lag chu srin sder mo rnams// klu rgyal khyed la mchod par 'bul// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// tshur
byon tshur byon klu tshogs rnams// rin chen lnga dang dar zab dang// dgyes mchod dam pa 'o ma mar// bu ram sbrang rtsi rtsi bcud 'bul// klu rgyal bzhugs pa 'khor bcas la// mgron gyi dam
par spyan 'dren na// bdag nyid dad pas mchod lags kyi// bzhes shig rol cig klu yi tshogs// rgyan gyi mchod pa 'di bzhes shig/ nA' ga rA dza sa ma ya a mr-i ta sarba kha kha le le/ zhes mchod
cing phrin las bcol lo// mtha' bsgyur las kyi skabs kyis shes// klu mchod cing phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin gyis nA' ga
klu 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gdug pa can gyi tshogs// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// klu yi bstan pa dar ba'i tshe// nad du tsi
tsi dz+wa la 'byung// de tshe klu chen byed rnams kyis// khro rgyal nga yi bka' ma bcag/ gal te nga yi bka' bcag na// khyed rnams rdul du brlag par 'gyur// nga yi bka' ni bden par sgrubs// zhes
gsungs pas/ klu yi tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyis gsol ba// kye kye dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal// klu bdag rgyal po'i bka' bzhin bgyid// khyod ni klu rje nam mkha' lding// rgyal po'i rgyal po rta
mgrin lags// khyed kyi bka' bzhin ma bgyis na// bdag cag rdul du brlag par 'gyur// zhes klu rnams kyis dam bcas te/ rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o// dpal
chen po rta mgrin ni chos nyid kyi dbyings su thim par gyur to// klu rnams rang gi gnas su dengs nas dam tshig la gnas par gyur to// lung bstan dam bcas pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun
pa'o//// nA ga klu 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// ! zhi khro 'bum rgyud// dpal he ru ka'i gal po// zhi khro 'bum gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad thos nas bshad
pa'i dus kyi tshe/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga bstan te/ nam mkha' stong pa las yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po gcig rang byung du sprul pas/ chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo gcig de'i byin rlabs las
byung ba las/ 'bras bu rgyu rkyen las rigs lngar lhun gyis grub par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// phung po lnga zhes ci la bgyi// 'byung ba lnga zhes ci la bgyi// rnam
shes brgyad ces ci la bgyi// de'i yul brgyad ces ci la bgyi// 'jig rten drug ces ci la bgyi// theg pa dgu zhes ci la bgyi// de las mang na ci skyon lags// de las nyung na ci 'gal
lags// nyan thos zhes ni ci la bgyi// rang sangs rgyas zhes ci la bgyi// mdo sde zhes pa ci la bgyi// kr-i ya zhes ni ci la bgyi// yo ga zhes ni ci la bgyi// u pa ya zhes ci la bgyi// ma hA yo ga
ci la bgyi// a nu yo ga ci la bgyi// a ti yo ga ci la bgyi// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bi ro tsa na ci la bgyi// badzra satwa ci la bgyi/

rat+na saM b+ha ci la bgyi/ a mi de ba ci la bgyi/ a mo g+ha zhes ci la bgyi// d+hA twI shwa rI ci la bgyi// dwe Sha ra ti ci la bgyi// mo ha ra ti ci la bgyi// rA ga ra ti ci la bgyi// badzra sa ma ya tA rA ci la

bgyi// k+Shi hi rA dza ci la bgyi// A gar b+ha zhes ci la bgyi// pA' da pad+ma Ar+ya ba lo zhes ci la bgyi// badzra pA Ni ci la bgyi// mai tri zhes ni ci la bgyi// dI pa zhes ni ci la bgyi// raM madz+nyu shrI zhes ni

ci la bgyi// ma mo du zhes ci la bgyi// lA s+ya zhes ni ci la bgyi// mA l+ya zhes ni ci la bgyi// gIrti zhes ni ci la bgyi// nIrti zhes ni ci la bgyi// ng+hU pe zhes ni ci la bgyi// puSh+pe zhes ni ci la

bgyi// A lo ka zhes ci la bgyi// gan+d+he zhes ni ci la bgyi// shAkya mu ni ci la bgyi// kriM zhes bya ba ci la bgyi// truM zhes bya ba ci la bgyi// sruM zhes bya ba ci la bgyi// braM zhes bya ba ci la bgyi// k+ShaM
zhes bya ba ci la bgyi// ya mAn zhes ni ci la bgyi// pra dz+nyA na zhes ni ci la bgyi// ha ya grI ba ci la bgyi// a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ci la bgyi// aM ku sha zhes ci la bgyi// pA sha zhes ni ci la

bgyi// a mu ka yi ci la bgyi// g+haN+De zhes ni ci la bgyi// de nas rdo rje sems dpas don zhus pa/ badzra bu ng+ng+has ci la bgyi// badzra tsi t+tas ci la bgyi// badzra rat+nas ci la bgyi// badzra pad+mas ci la

bgyi// badzra karmas ci la bgyi// badzra rA dza ci la bgyi/ badzra rA ga ci la bgyi// badzra sA ng+hu ci la bgyi// badzra rat+na ci la bgyi// badzra sUr+Ya ci la bgyi// badzra ke tu ci la bgyi// badzra ha sa ci la

bgyi// badzra ng+harmA ci la bgyi// badzra ti k+Sha zhes ni ci la bgyi// badzra he ru ci la bgyi// badzra b+hA Sha zhes ni ci la bgy-i// badzra karma sing+ng+hi ci la bgyi// badzra rak+Sha ci la bgyi// badzra yak+sha ci la bgyi// badzra
san ng+hi ci la bgyi// rA tsa phu ta sha raM ga ma ci la bgyi// sa man+ta su ru pU tras ci la bgyi// tsan+d+ra pra b+ha ci la bgyi// pA la b+ha dra ci la bgyi// ku mA rA tsa ci la bgyi// pe ta ki

zhes ci la bgyi// pra b+hany+dza zhes ci la bgyi// ga ga gany+dza ci la bgyi// by-i ta mo ti ci la bgyi// bu ta ku zhes ci la bgyi// dz+nyA na u ka tsi t+tas ci la bgyi// badzra ya saM b+ha ba mi ta ka shris ci la bgyi// ga ga ti zhes ci la

bgyi// dur+ya tsi t+ta ci la bgyi// karma tsi t+ta ci la bgyi// ka ra mu kha ci la bgyi// ma hA zhes ni ci la bgyi// pak+Sha zhes ni ci la bgyi// dza la pU ti ci la bgyi// sa ha ka ni ci la bgyi// sa tas gas ni

ci la bgyi// ma gas zhes ni ci la bgyi// yaM ya ces ni ci la bgyi// ma ka sha zhes ci la bgyi// sha ra rta zhes ci la bgyi// du ra na zhes ci la bgyi// nu mo nu bo ci la bgyi// badzra mi Na ta pa zhes

gang la bgyi// ya ma zhes ni gang la bgyi// ma ga ga du gang la bgyi// pU ta ga sta gang la bgyi// sha tra zhes ni gang la bgyi// pra ma zhes ni gang la bgyi// pra ma shung+ng+ha gang la bgyi// ma hA pa zhes
gang la bgyi ba lags// su da ra zhes gang la bgyi ba lags// pa ra shu zhes gang la bgyi// pa ri ha zhes gang la bgyi// u ta pa raM gang la bgyi// ma pu mo nyas gang la bgyi// pa ri shu tas gang
la bgyi// shu ta ga bus gang la bgyi// a ma shar dus gang la bgyi// u na du gas gang la bgyi// su ka pra pa ka zhes gang la bgyi// puSh+pe ma hA gang la bgyi// u bya ta ma gang la bgyi// u ta tra
zhes gang la bgyi// su ta shi mi gang la bgyi// u ka nir zhes gang la bgyi// su ta nya shas gang la bgyi// u tsa bya zhes gang la bgyi// u ba sha ra yas zhes gang la bgyi// bidz+nyA na ka man ta gang
la bgyi// sha ba Ta ku ga tas gang la bgyi// ba na ba sa yas gang la bgyi// he ru ka'i gal po las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas yab mngon

rdzogs kyi rgyal po la zhus pa// dA na pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// shI la ba ra mi ta gang la bgyi// k+Shan+ti pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// ng+h+ya na par mi ta gang la bgyi// bIr+ya pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// u pA ya

pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// ba la pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// dz+nyA na pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// sa ma gang ris pa ra mi ta gang la bgyi// de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang
po la/ rdo rje 'dzin pas don zhus pa// pra ma mu tis gang la bgyi// bye ma mu tis gang la bgyi// pad+ma ka'i sa ga pra Ni ng+hA na gang la bgyi// u tsi ta mis gang la bgyi// su ri dza yas gang la
bgyi// mu sti ma ges gang la bgyi// su ra ma gas gang la bgyi// a sta ga mas gang la bgyi// ya tra mi tras gang la bgyi// d+harma u kas gang la bgyi// a tha pra b+has gang la bgyi// Ar+ya ti mi bu bi
sha ta ti pu me zhes gang la bgyi// a ti ma ga dza ba ku mi ci la bya// mu ge ka shas ci la bgyi// u le ka zhes ci la bgyi// ta kri ka ni sha ni bra te ko shas ci la bgyi// a pa rA dza ma hAs ci la

bgyi// pad+ma rA tsas ci la bgyi// dz+nyA na u da ri zhes ci la bgyi// badzra sa twa kA yas ci la bgyi// sa ma b+ha sta ra ci la bgyi// ha ri rA tsa ya len pa sha zhes ci la bgyi// 'di rnams ni byang chub
sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// zhes ma gsungs par grags so// rtsa gnyis pa zhes gang la gdags// rtsa gcig pa zhes gang la gdags// nyi shu pa zhes gang la bgyi// bcu dgu pa zhes
gang la bgyi// bco brgyad pa ni gang gi sa// bcu bdun pa ni gang gi sa// bcu drug pa ni gang gi sa// bco lnga pa ni gang gi sa// bcu bzhi pa ni gang gi sa// bcu gsum pa ni gang gi sa// bcu
gnyis pa ni gang gi sa// bcu gcig pa ni gang gi sa// bcu pa zhes pa gang gi sa// dgu pa zhes ni gang gi sa// brgyad pa zhes ni gang gi sa// bdun pa zhes ni gang gi sa// drug pa zhes ni gang gi
sa// lnga pa zhes pa gang gi sa// bzhi pa zhes pa gang gi sa// gsum pa zhes pa gang gi sa// gnyis pa zhes pa gang gi sa// gcig pa zhes pa gang sa lags// he ru ka'i gal po las sa'i rim par
bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po la/ gnod 'dul lhas gtor ma'i don dang gtan tshigs zhus pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gtor ma ji ltar bca'// ye
shes rol pa'i gtor ma ji ltar bca'// thugs rje sprul pa'i gtor ma ji ltar bca'// gtor ma'i lta ba ji ltar blta// gtor ma'i spyod pa ji ltar spyad// gtor ma'i 'bras bu ji
ltar bsgrub// sha yi gtor ma ji ltar lags// khrag gi gtor ma ji ltar lags// rus pa'i gtor ma ji ltar lags// gtor zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// ma zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// bkra
gsal ting nge 'dzin gyi gtor ma ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gtor ma spungs gtor bya// ye shes rol pa'i gtor ma gtubs gtor
bya// thugs rje rol pa'i gtor ma skyu gtor bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi gtor ma mi zad gter du sba// ye shes rol ba'i gtor ma sbyin bsreg bya// thugs rje sprul pa'i gtor ma khams gsum
yongs la khyab par gtong// gtor ma'i lta ba snang srid gtor mar blta// gtor ma'i spyod pa thabs dang shes rab po// gtor ma'i 'bras bu dug gsum sku gsung thugs// gti mug mchod pa
phul ba sha yi gtor ma yin// 'dod chags mchod pa phul ba khrag gi gtor ma yin// zhe sdang mchod pa phul na rus pa'i gtor ma yin// gtor ni thabs kyis rang bzhin te// ma ni shes rab
rang bzhin pas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// yang gnod 'dul lhas phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i gtor ma zhus pa/ zhi ba'i gtor ma gang ltar lags// rgyas pa zhes
ni gang ltar bgyi// dbang gi gtor ma gang ltar bgyi// drag po'i gtor ma gang ltar bgyi// gtor ma dkar po zlum po ni// zhi ba'i gtor ma yin par bshad// gtor ma ser po gru bzhi
ni// rgyas pa'i gtor ma yin par bshad// gtor ma dmar po zla gam ni// dbang gi gtor ma yin par bshad// gtor ma nag po gru gsum ni// drag po'i las la rab tu shes// de nas yang
gnod 'dul lhas zhus pa/ dus bzhi'i gtor ma ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dpyid ni sman gyi gtor ma yin// dgun ni sha yi gtor ma yin// ston ni 'bras bu'i
gtor ma yin// dbyar ni me tog gtor ma yin// zhes bka' stsal to// he ru ka'i gal po las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang lha gnod 'dul gyis gnas kyi don
zhus pa/ g.ya' ri gangs rgyud gang gi gnas// spang ri nags tshal gang gi gnas// dur khrod shig gcig gang gi gnas// bkra shis nyams dga' gang gi gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ g.ya' ri
gangs rgyud gnod sbyin gnas// spang ri nags tshal drang srong gnas// dur khrod shig gcig mu stegs gnas// bkra shis nyams dga' rnal 'byor gnas// de nas yang ston pa la
lha gnod 'dul gyis tshogs kyi don zhus pa// tshogs kyi nges tshigs ji ltar lags// tshogs kyi slob dpon gang gis bya// tshogs kyi karma gang gis byas// tshogs kyi ging ni ji lta bus// tshogs
kyi yo byad ci zhig 'tshol// tshogs kyi yum ni ji lta bus// phul bas yon tan ci dang ldan// ma phul skyon ni du zhig mchis// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// tshogs zhes bya ba'i nges tshig
ni// don dang mthun pa'i bka' dang ldan// snod du rung zhing rtsa ba dang// yan lag dam tshig ma nyams pa// ras chod gzu lum gtan spangs nas// dbang rnams rim par nod pa ni// tshogs kyi
nges tshigs yin par bshad// tshogs kyi slob dpon bya ba yang// kun gyis bya bar ma gsungs te// lta ba gnyis med rtsal dang ldan// spyod pa gsang ba'i bka' dang ldan// thabs mkhas phrin
las thogs rdug med// dam tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin bsrung// dbang rnams rim par brtsegs pa dang// rig pa'i rgyal por rang dbang thob// de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon yin// tshogs
kyi rgyal tshab bya ba yang// dper na rgyal pos bka' bsgo ba// de ni blon pos bsrung ba bzhin// dgongs spyod don dang ldan pa dang// gzhan 'dren nus pa'i thabs mkhas dang// slob dpon sku
bsnyel thun spo ba'i// zhal tshab gzhan la chos ston pa// tshogs kyi rgyal tshab yin par gsungs// tshogs kyi ging zhes bya ba yang// rang gi sgos ched mi len par// rnal 'byor spyi ched brtson pa
dang// zhing bcur gyur pa sgrol byed cing// dgongs pa'i las rgyud brtan par bya// tshogs kyi yum zhes bya ba yang// kun gyis bya bar ma gsung te// gtso bo yab kyi dgongs pa skong// dad pa che
la brnags thub dang// gsang sgo sdom dang dam la gnas// dad pas mos dang rtog pa chung// mtshan gyis brgyan dang sems bzang dang// rgyud dang ldan pa ma gtogs pas// kun gyis bya bar
ngas ma bshad// tshogs kyi yo byad bya ba ni// sangs rgyas rnams la sgrib pa dang// snyems pa bya ba mi mnga' yang// dper na rgyal po chen po la// dkor dang longs spyod mi brel yang// 'bang la
sogs pas skyabs 'dod phyir// dkor dang longs spyod phul bas ni// 'phral phan yun du bde ba yin// rgyal ba'i sku la sgribs skyems mi mnga' yang// dga' dang gus pas phul ba'i bsod
nams kyis// sgrib pa gnyis byang tshogs gnyis rdzogs gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan rdzogs sa la phyin par 'gyur// de nas yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos tshogs kyi rnam
grangs gsungs pa/ phyi yi gzugs kyi mchod pa la// grangs ni bcu drug dag tu bshad// nang gi sgrol ba'i mchod pa la// gang bsgral gang gis bsgral ba dang// bsgral ba'i yon tan ma bsgral
skyon// gang du bsgral dang dus tshod rnams// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba dang// nga rgyal brag bzhin khengs pa dang// 'dod chags bse ltar zhen pa
dang// gti mug mun ltar 'thibs pa dang// phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshubs pa lnga// ma nyes klan ka tshol dang drug/ khas dman zas su za dang bdun// bden pa khyad du gsod dang brgyad// bu skyes
pha mar rgol dang dgu// g.yo mtshang ngo la rgos dang bcu// snying gtam gshed mar 'ong dang gcig/ dkar po'i phyogs su smod dang gnyis// nag po'i phyogs su bstod dang gsum// dge ba
can thugs dkrug dang bzhi// dang pa can gyi tshogs bcags lnga// dkyil 'khor gnyen po 'bral dang drug/ rdo rje slo?b dpon sku smod bdun// de bzhin mched la 'khu dang brgyad// dam las log
dang dgu ru bshad// nyams pa'i bzas zos chu 'thung dang// 'di ldan nyi shu tham pa'o// de yi steng du ngas bshad pa// glang chen mchong ltar slob pa dang// u ma tshang na nyal ba dang// bcu drug
tshang na 'khyil ba dang// mkha' la 'gro ba'i ka ma la// rtsibs la rlung ltar 'phyo ba dang// chags 'brel phra mo byung ba dang// sna nas khrag phyung ngo byugs nas// brang brdung 'o dod 'bod dang
drug/ nags tshal dben par mi bsgrub par// dben pa grong dang log par bca'// rnga sgra rdung zhing b+h+yo yis 'debs// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs dang bdun// sgro ba nag po khur du
khur// mar gyi gtor ma glo la btags// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra 'don brgyad// rtsa ba yan lag mi bsrung zhing// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs te dgu// shes
pa chung la phrag dog che// sems la chos kyis ma thul bas// chos re thos zhing khe ber skye// spro thung tshig gis go mi 'jal// rang gi nor dang a cang che// gzhan gyi nor kyang kho la dgos// 'di
yang bsgral ba'i zhing du bshad// 'di ltar sum cu thams pa ru// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' stsal to// de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal pos grangs du dbul bka' stsal pa// rab kyis chu bo'i rgyun
bzhin dbul// 'bring gis nyin gsum mtshan gsum dbul// tha mas nyin re mtshan re dbul// tshogs su phul ba'i yon tan ni// dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes gyur nas// nyi shu rtsa
gcig sa thob 'gyur// ma phul ba yi skyon dag ni// 'di ru nyam thag phongs pa dang// phyi mar yi dwags gnas su skye// gzhan yang ma phul ba yi skyon// brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pas// 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ma gsungs so// he ru ka'i gal po las gnas dang tshogs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang dang dam tshig ci ltar
lags// dam tshig rtsa ba du zhig mchis// de las bsdu ba du zhig mchi// bsrung pa'i thabs ni du zhig mchi// dam can zhes ni gang la bgyi// nyams pa zhes bya ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab
kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig rtsa ba bsam yas kyang// rtsa ba brgya dang rtsa brgyad yod// de las bsdu na nyi shu brgyad// de las bsdu na bcu ru 'dus// de yi rtsa ba'i mdo don ni// sku yi dam tshig
nad la gnod pa'i zas ltar bsrung// gsung gi dam tshig nad la phan pa'i sman bzhin btung// thugs kyi dam tshig ma byams zas bzhin khong du chud// lta spyod bsgrub pa'i phrin las ni// lus
kyi rtsal shugs bzhin du phyung// bar du gcod pa'i zhing bcu ni// sdang ba'i dgra ltar gdul bar bya// dngos grub rnam gsum dbus kyi dpal ltar bskyed// dam can zhes kyang de la bya// gang
zhig dam tshig nyams pa la// drung na su yang mi blta ste// de la blta zhing spyod pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod mi lang// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dbang gi don zhus pa// dbang gi slob
dpon mtshan nyid gang// slob ma ji lta bu la bskur// dbang gi bskur thabs du zhig mchis// mtshan nyid ngan pa'i skyon ci lags// dbang gi dkyil 'khor gang ltar lags// dbang gi rdzas ni
du zhig mchis// bskur ba'i dus tshod gang la shis// dbang gi yum ni gang lta bu// dbang la yon ni ci zhig dbul// dbang rtags ci zhig sbyin par bya// de nas yab mdon rdzogs rgyal pos
dbang gi don gsungs pa/ dbang gi slob dpon bya ba yang// kun gyis bya bar ma gsungs te// rigs kyi mkhas pa rgyud btsun dang// rdo rje zam pa ma chad legs// de dag rnams dang ldan pa
na// 'jig rten 'di na mthu dbang che// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran bzhin khol// de ni dbang gi slob dpon yin// dbang gi slob ma bya ba yang// shes pa sgo yangs thos pa che// bsgo ba bran bzhin
nyan pa dang// 'di la dbang rnams bskur bar bya'o// dbang gi bskur thabs brgyad cu rtsa gcig go/ slob dpon slob bu'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad kyis// slob
dpon dbang med 'dod pas brgyal// slob ma dam med phyar ka gtong// gnyis ka log pa'i 'dre dang mtshungs// de 'dra dmyal ba'i rgyu ru bstan// dbang bskur ba yi dkyil 'khor ni// thig
bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// zla gam dgu dang ldan par bya// dbang gi rdzas rnams ngas bshad pa// rdzas kyi grangs ni lnga ru bshad// dbang gi dus tshod ngas bstan pa// dbyar dgun ston dpyid
ra ba'am// ston zla ra ba'i nya la bskur bar bya// dbang gi yum rnams ngas bshad pa// tshul dgu dag dang ldan par bya// dbang bskur ba yi yon rnams ni// rta dang glang po ma he dang// gser
dngul la sogs rin chen g.yu// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang bskur gnang ba'i rtags sbyin pa// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dang po bdag la
gang gnang ba// slob ma de la rtags su sbyin// slob mas yon gyi mchog phul nas// dbang rtags med du mi rung zhes// rdo rje sems dpas yang dag bshad// yon phul 'phangs nas dbang yang
'phangs// shes brnyes byas na bka' dang 'gal// thug thug byas na gzhung yang nyams// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las dbang dang dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// lta spyod ting 'dzin ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi lta spyod ji ltar lags// lung gi lta spyod ji ltar lags// nges pa'i man ngag ci ltar
lags// lta spyod ting 'dzin rnam pa yang// gcig gam gal te tha dad lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bka' nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// lta spyod bsam gyis mi khyab
kyang// ma hA yo ga'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsam mi khyab ste sku gsung thugs// a nu yo ga'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsam mi khyab ste gnyis su med// a ti yo ga'i dkyil 'khor ni// rang sems
gdod nas rnam par dag/ bu gcig ma bcos bde bar gnas// bskyed dang mngon rdzogs rdzogs chen la// rnam par rtog pa med mod kyang// mi nag 'du 'dzi yongs btang nas// rtogs pa'i
gnad ni 'di ka che// che ba bas ni gnad kyang gnad// chos nyid bden pa'i don rtogs na// sems la dran rig rnam rtog ci skyes kyang// rtog pa de nyid chos nyid yin shes na// rnam dag byang
chub sems kyi bsgom pa yin// lta spyod ting 'dzin gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// tan+ta he ru ka'i gal po las/ lta ba bsgom pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha
yis yang gsol pa// phyi yi ma mo gang la bgyi// nang gi ma mo gang la bgyi// gsang ba'i ma mo gang la bgyi// dbyings kyi ma mo gang la bgyi// srung ba'i ma mo gang la bgyi// 'gyur ba'i ma mo gang
la bgyi// rang bzhin ma mo gang la bgyi// ma dang mo zhes gang la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi yi ma mo bya ba ni// yum chen shes
rab pha rol phyin// dmyal ba 'joms pa'i tho ba yin// nang gi ma mo bya ba ni// ma mo kun gyi rje mo ste// nyid bzhi mu kha le zhes bya// gsang ba'i ma mo bya ba ni// lung dang man ngag chos yin
te// ci yi phyir na gsang bas bya// rdo rje theg pa re bzang yang// kun gyis spyad pa rab tu ngan// ci phyir zhe na grags pa nyams// byis pa rnams la bkri drang bstan// rgan po rnams la nges don
bstan// gsang phyir gtan tshig sna tshogs bstan// gsang sngags na yod ma yin te// 'gro ba'i don phyir rab tu gsang// dbyings kyi ma mo bya ba ni// 'byung ba dgu ni yum chen dgu// dur khrod
brgyad ni khro mo brgyad// de yi yul brgyad phra men brgyad// yan lag bzhi ni sgo ma bzhi// sgal tshogs ye nas dbang phyug tshogs// so ni ye nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// nang khrol ma mo bdun du
gsal// nam tshod sring mo bzhi yi tshogs// sha ni ye nas pho nya'i tshogs// khrag ni ye nas ma sring tshogs// rtsi ma ye nas ging gi tshogs// bsgom mi dgos te ye nas yin// sprul pa'i ma mo bya ba
ni// hU~M chen dgu las yab yum bskyed// ha he las kai ri phra men bskyed// phaT las sgo ba phra men bskyed// b+h+yo las dbang phyug tshogs rnams bskyed// a ra li las mkha' 'gro bskyed// hU~M las
ma bdun sring bzhi bskyed// dza las pho nya sum brgya drug cu bskyod// a dang ha las ging chen bskyed// spyan drangs mchod cing bsgrub pa las// sku gsum dngos grub stsol ba de// sprul pa'i ma mo
yin par bshad// 'gyur ba'i mo ma ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// sems dpa' brgyad ni khro mo brgyad du 'gyur// sems ma brgyad ni phra men brgyad du 'gyur// thub drug
yid chos spor ma brgyad du 'gyur// rgyu 'bras sems dpa' sum cu gnyis// sgrol byed sum cu gnyis su 'gyur// pho las mo ru gyur pa ste// 'gyur pa'i ma mo yin par bshad// rang bzhin ma
mo'i don gsungs pa// snod kyi 'jig rten ma yin te// bcud kyi 'jig rten mo zhes bya// ma ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// mo ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// ma ni kun gzhi yongs bral
te// mo ni rig pa'i rgyal po yin// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// las kyi ma mo ji ltar lags// 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan
'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// las kyi ma mo byung khungs ni// ston pa mar me mdzad ni 'das// shAka thub ma byon sngon rol du// dbus kyi

rU tra sde gsum dang// phyogs kyi rU tra rnam pa bzhis// snang snang bsgral nas 'phrad 'phrad sbyar// sha dang rus pa ri ltar spungs// khrag dang chu ser mtsho ltar bskyil// ha ha phaT phaT 'brug bzhin
bsgrags// gsur dang du ba spr-in bzhin gtibs// de yi 'khor du 'dus pa ni// brgyad gsum zung du 'brel ba dang// bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// de bzhin sum cu so gnyis dang// bdun
dang bzhi dang sum brgya drug cu dang// de bzhin bdud chen bco brgyad po// 'khor dang bran du gnas pa las// gnam lcags thog gi ser byung bas// nang min phyi yi bskor bzhugs so// gnod
'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gzhal yas kha dog mi 'tshal na// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// d+harma ha sti ci la bgyi// shu kla da ste ci la bgyi// kA la kr-iSh+Na ci la bgyi// lo hi ta zhes
ci la bgyi// nI la zhes ni ci la bgyi// pa lA sha zhes ci la bgyi// pI ta na zhes ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rat+na ma hA ste rin po che// shu kla na ste dkar po bshad// kA la

kr-iSh+Na nag por bshad// lo hi ta ni dmar por bshad// nI la bya bar sngon por bshad// pa lA sha zhes ljang gur bshad// pI ta na ni ser por bshad// b+hUM bi shwa bi shung+ng+he tsakra maN+Da la// skam rlon ra
ri'i gzhal yas ni// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dkar po zangs yag 'tsher ba de// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas yin// chos kyi sku
dang rab ldan pas// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu ru bshad// rlon pa lcang lor bzhugs pa de// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa'i sku dang rab ldan pas// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu ru
bshad// dmar po ra ri bzhugs pa de// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas yin// longs spyod rdzogs sku rab ldan pas// gzhal yas khang gi rgyu ru bshad// gzhal yas gdan mchog gzhan du
bas// las kyi ma mo bya ba de// rgyal po btson du bzung ba na// 'bangs rnams cham la phebs pa bzhin// rU tra bsgral nas dur khrod gzhal yas khang// 'khor dang bran la sogs pa
la// ston pas hU~M dang ha he phaT// b+h+yo dang a ra li dza brjod// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor du gyur// thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// srin mo'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// steng gi lha yi
khams kyang za// bar gyi mi yi khams kyang za// 'og gi klu yi khams kyang za// thams cad ma lus za ba de// don dang rtogs pa ci dang ldan// ngan song gsum du mi skye'am// bdud kyi 'khor gyis
slar gsol pa// bsad dang bcad pa'i las rnams ni// dang po pha mas bskos pa yin// ngan song gsum zhes bya ba ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i 'khor gyis bka' stsal pa// ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nged
cag lha la che// 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gling bzhi'i mi la che// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal ngan song gsum la che// ngan song gsum la bzod blag med// sha re g.ya' la skyi re bung// de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams brgyal nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo// brgyal sangs nas dam bcas so// he ru ka'i gal po las rU tra btul ba'i le'u ste bdun
pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// dpal chen dgu po mi 'tshal na// dpal chen dgu zhes gang la bgyi// yum chen dgu zhes gang la bgyi// badzra he ru ci la bgyi// bung+ng+ha he

ru ci la bgyi// rat+na he ru ci la bgyi// pad+ma he ru ci la bgyi// karma he ru ci la bgyi// yak+Sha he ru gang la bgyi// gu ya he ru gang la bgyi// sa nu he ru gang la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag
nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// gti mug gnas gyur rnam par snang mdzad yin// de las gnas gyur bung+ng+ha he ru ka/ zhe sdang gnas gyur rdo rje sems dpa' yin// de las
gnas gyur badzra he ru ka/ nga rgyal gnas gyur rin chen 'byung ldan yin// de las gnas gyur rah+na he ru ka/ 'dod chags gnas gyur snang ba mtha' yas yin// de las gnas gyur pad+ma he ru
ka/ phrag dog gnas gyur don yod grub pa yin// de las gnas gyur karma he ru ka/ dgra bgegs 'dul pas rak+sha he ru ka/ dam nyams sgrol bas yak+sha he ru ka/ yi dam lha spong gnyen po 'gu h+ya
he ru ka// sa rnams thob pas sa nu he ru ka/ 'byung lnga snod bzhi gnas gyur pas// de yi yum dgu yin par bshad// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rdo rje gzhon nu ci la bgyi// 'khor lo
rgyas 'debs gang la bgyi// khro bo pha bcu gang la bgyi// khro mo ma bcu gang la bgyi// phra thabs nyi shu gang la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab
kyis bka' stsal pa// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje ste// skye med 'gag med gzhon nu'o// cir yang 'byung bas 'khor lo bzhin// 'du 'bral med pas rgyas 'debs so// khro bo bcu yis dgra bo
'dul// khro mo bcu yis bgegs rnams 'dul// phra thabs rnams kyis sri gdon 'dul// ces gsungs so// tan tra he ru ka'i gal po las/ he ru ka dang khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyi le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ko ri ma zhes gang la bgyi// tso'u ri ma zhes gang la bgyi// phra mo ha zhes gang la bgyi// bai ta lI zhes gang la bgyi// puk+ka sI zhes ci la
bgyi// g+hasma rI zhes gang la bgyi// sma sha nI zhes ci la bgyi// tsaN+Da lI zhes gang la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyid 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rgya gar yul nas
grub pa'i ko rI ma// seng+ha'i yul nas grub pa'i tso'u rI ma// tho gar yul nas grub pa'i pra mo hA// kha che'i yul nas grub pa'i be ta lI// bal po yul nas grub pa'i puk+ka sI// u rgyan yul nas grub

pa'i g+hasma rI// za hor yul nas grub pa'i sma sha nI// li yi yul nas grub pa'i tsaN+Da lI// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sing+ha ma zhes ci la bgyi// byA g+ha ma zhes ci la bgyi// sr-i la ma zhes
ci la bgyi// shwa na ma zhes ci la bgyi// gr-iD+ha ma zhes ci la bgyi// kang ka ma zhes ci la bgyi// kA ka ma zhes ci la bgyi// hu lu ma zhes ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan
'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud dpung 'joms pas sid+ha ma// bgegs dpung 'joms pas byA g+h+ra ma// sri gdon 'dul bas sri la ma// 'dral zhing gshogs pas shwa na
ma// rtog 'joms che bas gr-i D+ha ma// dur khrod 'joms pas kang+ka ma// yid bzhin bsgyur bas kA ka ma// spyan dang ldan pas hu lu ma'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rta gdong ma zhes
ci la bgyi// phag gdong ma zhes ci la bgyi// dred gdongs ma zhes ci la bgyi// nyi zla ma zhes ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// khams gsum gnas nas 'dren pa'i lcags
kyu ma// yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// kun mkhyen ma rig mun sel nyi zla ma// chos ston bag chags sbyangs pas dril bu ma// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sku 'bar
ma zhes ci la bgyi// glog phreng 'dzin zhes ci la bgyi// skar mda' gdong zhes ci la bgyi// ral gri'i skra zhes ci la bgyi// lce 'bebs ma zhes ci la bgyi// ba dan 'phyar zhes ci la
bgyi// khyung thogs ma zhes ci la bgyi// ban glang sna zhes ci la bgyi// 'jigs pa'i gzugs zhes gang la bgyi// phag gdong ma zhes ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyid
'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// 'bar ma'i don rnams ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dri za'i bu mo sku 'bar ma// ag ne'i bu mo glog 'phreng
ma// gshin rje'i bu mo skar mda' gdong// srin po'i bu mor ral gri'i skra// klu dbang bu mo lce 'bebs ma// rlung lha'i bu mo ba dan phyar// gnod sbyin bu mo khyung thogs ma// 'byung po'i bu mo ban
glang sna// nyi zla'i bu mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sa bdag bu mo phag gdong ma// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// tan tra he ru ka'i gal po las// dbyings kyi sgo ma dang 'bar ma'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma nu rak+Sha sI zhes ci la bgyi// prat+ma NI zhes ci la bgyi// rau trI ma zhes ci la bgyi// biSh+Na be zhes ci la bgyi// ku mA rI zhes ci la bgyi// sha

kra Na ces ci la bgyi// pIM ga la zhes ci la bgyi// a mr-i ta zhes ci la bgyi// so'u mya zhes ci la bgyi// daN+Da daM zhes ci la bgyi// rak+shA sI zhes ci la bgyi// b+hak+Sha sI zhes ci la bgyi// ra tri badzra sa

ci la bgyi// ru tri ra mat+ta zhes ci la bgyi// e ka tsa ra ci la bgyi// ma no ha ra ci la bgyi// sing+ng+hi ka zhes ci la bgyi// bA ya be zhes ci la bgyi// ma ra Na zhes ci la bgyi// a ga ni zhes ci la

bgyi// bA ra nI zhes ci la bgyi// su ta na zhes ci la bgyi// tsa muN+Da zhes ci la bgyi// ba ru NI zhes ci la bgyi// badzra ma hA kA lI zhes ci la bgyi// tsa kA la zhes ci la bgyi// ku ma b+ha ka r+Na zhes ni
ci la bgyi// laM bo da ra zhes ni ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang phyug ma yi don bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rak+sha sI zhes bdud kyi bu mo yin
pas mgo bo g.yag/ prat+ma tshangs pa'i chung ma yin pas mgo bo sbrul// rau tri lha chen chung ma yin pas mgo bo gzig/ biSh+Na khyab 'jug chung ma yin pas sre mo'i mgo/ ku mA rI ni gzhon nu'i chung ma

yin pas pha waM mgo/ sha kra brgya byin chung ma yin pas mgo bo dred// piM ga la ni be con chung ma yin pas mgo bo khra// a mraM ta ni bdud rtsi'i chung ma yin pas mgo bo sdig/ so'u mya ni zla ba'i chung
ma yin pas mgo bo khra// daN+Da daM ni be con chung ma yin pas mgo bo wa// rak+sha sI ni srin mo'i chung ma yin pas mgo bo khwa// b+ha k+Sha sI ni khyo med ma ste stag gi mgo/ rA' ti badzra dga'

byed chung ma yin pas bya rgod mgo/ ru ng+hi ra man+tA ni khrag 'thung chung ma yin pas rta yis mgo/ e ka tsa ra mig mi bzang gi chung ma mgo bo nam mkha'i lding// ma no ha ra mgo bo khyi ste khyo med
ma// sing+ng+ha kaM ni 'dod pa'i chung ma yin pas pu shud mgo/ ba ya rlung la'i chung ma yin pas sha ba'i mgo/ mar Na lus po ljang nag spyang ki'i mgo/ ag ni me lha'i chung ma yin pas skyin gyi
mgo/ bA' ra ni ni sa bdag chung ma yin pas mgo bo phag/ tsa muN+Da ni dga' byed bu mo yin pas mgo bo khwa// bA ru Na ni klu yi chung ma yin pas mgo bo sbrul// su ta na ni khyo med ma ste mgo bo

glang// ma hA kA lI ni khyo med ma ste mgo bo rta// tsa kA la ni lho yi sgo ma yin pas mgo bo ra// kum+b+ha ka r+Na nyi zla'i chung ma yin pas mgo bo seng ge'o// lam bo da ra byang gi sgo ma yin pas skye ga'i
mgo// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// lag nya ces pa ci la bgyi// pu tri zhes pa ci la bgyi// saM bo lam zhes ci la bgyi// ra ba zhes ni ci la bgyi// ya ma na tsa ra zhes ci la bgyi// ku ma

zhes ni ci la bgye// yak+sha zhes ni ci la bgyi// rU tra zhes ni ci la bgyi// nak+Sha tra zhes ci la bgyi// tsakra zhes ni ci la bgyi// un+ma da zhes ci la bgyi// ut+ta ra sti ci la bgyi// d+harma mi pa ta zhes ci
la bgyi// si ti pa la zhes ci la bgyi// yak+Sha tsi pu ta zhes ci la bgyi// pu ti mi ti sha zhes ci la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// gtan
tshigs chen pos ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lag nya pa ni grul bum yin// pu tri na ni 'byung po yin// saM po na ni drang srong yin// ra ba zhes ni lto 'phye yin// ya ma na
ni ma mo yin// ku ma na ni nor lha yin// yak+sha na ni gnod sbyin yin// rU tra na ni bgegs chen yin// nak+Sha tra ni gza' dang rgyu skar yin// tsakra na ni yul 'khor srung// un+ma da ni myos byed
ma// ut+ta na ni 'phags skyes po// u da ya ni yang sbyin ma ste yum// ra ra mi sa mig mi bzang// so ti ri ni rig pa'i yum// yak+sha tsi bu ta ni rnam thos sras// pu ti mi shag gnod sbyin 'dul
mkhas ma// tan tra he ru ka'i gal po las// dbang phyug ma yi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// ma hA badzra da ri gang la bgyi// tri ta badzra tsakra gang la
bgyi// badzra ma he ma hA gang la bgyi// badzra ku mA ra ti gang la bgyi// ma hA badzra ma sha gang la bgyi// badzra kra shi ci la bgyi// badzra a ga ni ci la bgyi// ma hA badzra ma hA kro ta ci la

bgyi// ma hA badzra a mr-i to zhes ci la bgyi// ma hA so mi ci la bgyi// ma hA ha sti ci la bgyi// ma hA ra ni ci la bgyi// ma hA pri to ci la bgyi// badzra ni ra ka ni zhes ci la bgyi// badzra so'u ma zhes ci la

bgyi// ma hA badzra ba rim ma zhes ci la bgyi// badzra sha ni she zhes ci la bgyi// badzra sha ni ka zhes ci la bgyi// badzra ma ti ma zhes ci la bgyi// badzra a na ya zhes ci la bgyi// badzra pe ta ga zhes ci la
bgyi// badzra dza du ra zhes ci la bgyi// badzra sa nu a ti ci la bgyi// badzra ma he ta pa ci la bgyi// mkha' 'gro'i gtan tshigs mi 'tshal na// yang dag rdzogs la bka' nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs
yab kyis bka' stsal pa// mkha' 'gro'i gtan tshigs ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// badzra da ri mkha' 'gro dga' 'byed ma// tri ta badzra mkha' 'gro 'dren byed dkar skya
ma// badzra ma he mkha' 'gro gsod byed mda' 'gengs ma// badzra ku ma ri ni mkha' 'gro sgrol byed shugs ldan ma// ma hA badzra ma sha mkha' 'gro dgos 'dod skong byed ma// badzra sha ti mkha' 'gro
gzi brjid ma ste 'od dang thog 'bebs ma// ag ni bya ba mkha' 'gro bdud las rgyal// badzra kro ti dur khrod bdud 'joms mkha' 'gro ma// mA hA badzra a mr-i to ni 'dod chags dmar nag
ma// ma hA so mi so ni sgrol byed mthu dbang rdzogs// ma hA ba ti na ni dmar ser 'khor lo 'phen// ma hA ra ni rgyas 'degs ma ste dmar nag lce 'byin ma// ma hA pri ti ka ni sna tshogs lus can rgya
gram bsnams// badzra bi ra ka dwag sems 'phrog ma ste ma lus rdul du rlog/ badzra se'u na ni 'jigs pa kun du bsrung// ma hA badzra bi ra ma ni rnam shes 'joms pa mo// badzra sha ni sha na thams cad

'joms pa mo// badzra sha ka ni thams cad sgrol byed ma// badzra bi ta ma ni ma lus lhag sdud ma// badzra a na ya ni khyi mgo mthu ldan ma// badzra pe ta ka ni ma sa phag gi mgo/ badzra dza du ya ni sngo nag

srog 'dren rnga mo'i mgo/ badzra ka pa ti ni thod dbyug dgra s+t+wa pu shud mgo/ badzra tar sha ta ni dmar nag spu gri'i mgo/ badzra ka li pra bi sha ni dmar nag rus 'cha' byi la'i mgo/ badzra du ti ma ni

mkha' 'gro dmar ljang spre'u mgo/ badzra ka ran dza ti dmar ser rus phreng ce spyang mgo/ badzra pra b+ha na a ta ka ni srin po bum sna ma// badzra sa ban i ma ni da sha g+h+rI ba ma// pa ti a ti ma ni mkha'
'gro 'bod sgrogs ma// badzra ma hA ni gshin rnam par 'joms// zhes bka' stsal to// tan hra he ru ka'i gal po las mkha' 'gro ma'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gnod
'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// nang gi ma bdun ji ltar lags// phyi yi ma bdun ji ltar lags// dbyings kyi ma bdun ji ltar lags// don la khyad par yod dam med// nyag gcig yab la
bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// kun grags la sogs nang gyi ma bdun yin// phor thogs la sogs phyi yi ma bdun yin// nang grol smad bdun gsang ba'i ma
bdun yin// skyed par byed pas ma yin no// tshig gi bye brag bsam yas kyang// don la bye brag med par bstan// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sbrul pa'i sring bzhi gang la
bgyi// dbyings kyi sring bzhi gang la bgyi// las kyi sring bzhi gang la bgyi// don la bye brag yod dam med// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol ba gsan nas
kyang// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// sbrul pa'i sring bzhi bya ba ni// yi ge hU~M las bskyed pa yin// dbyings kyi sring bzhi bya ba ni// nam tshod rtsib ma bzhi ru grags// don snying nyid la
'du ba'i phyir// las kyi sring bzhi bya ba ni// lha yi sring la sogs pa'o// brtse zhing gdung bas sring bzhi'o// tshig gi bye brag bsam yas kyang// don la bye brag med par bshad// tan tra he ru
ka'i gal po las ma bdun sring bzhi'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sbrul pa'i ging chen ji ltar lags// dbyings kyi ging chen ji ltar yin// las kyi
ging chen ji ltar lags// don la bye brag yod dam med// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje spyang ki la sogs sbrul pa'i ging chen yin//
rtsibs ma g.yas dgu g.yon dgu dbyings kyi ging chen yin// pho mo kag pa las sogs las kyi ging chen yin// thams cad sgrol bas ging zhes bshad// tshig gi bye brag bsam yas kyang// don
la bye brag med par bshad// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// pho nya sum rgya drug cu ma 'tshal na// dung gi mi mo drug cu ci la bgyi// g.yu y-i mi mo drug cu ci la bgyi// lcags kyi mi mo drug cu
ci la bgyi// zangs kyi mi mo drug cu ci la bgyi// gser kyi mi mo drug cu gang la bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs yab kyis
bka' stsal pa// sku yi 'od zer rnam pa drug cu la// sum brgya drug cu don bgrangs phyir// pho nya sum brgya drug cur sprul// shar phyogs 'od zer dkar po las// dung gi mo mi drug
cur sprul// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yin// shar gyi phyogs su bkye ba las// dri za'i 'khor tshogs phung par byed// dri za pho ni bsgral te btad// dri za mo ni dam la btags// 'khor gyi gdon
tshogs dbang du bsdus// lho phyogs 'od zer sngon po las// g.yu yi mi mo drug cur sprul// rin chen rigs kyi pho nya yin// lho yi phyogs su bkye ba las// lho yi bgegs rnams phung bar
byed// gshin rje pho ni bsgral te btang// gshin rje mo ni dam la btags// 'khor gyi bgegs rnams dbang du bsdus// nub phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer dmar po
las// zangs kyi mi mo drug cur sprul// pad+ma gsung gi pho nya ma// nub kyi phyogs su bkye ba las// nub phyogs gdon rnams phung bar byed// chu bdag pho ni bsgral te btang// chu bdag mo ni dam
la btags// 'khor gyi gdon bgegs dbang du bsdus// byang phyogs dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// sku yi 'od zer lcags kha las// lcags kyi mi mo drug cur sprul// las kyi rigs kyi pho nya
yin// byang gi phyogs su bkye ba las// byang phyogs gdon bgegs phung bar byed// gnod sbyin pho ni bsgral te btang// gnod sbyin mo ni dam la btags// 'khor gyi gdon bgegs dbang du
bsdus// 'og gi 'od zer ser po las// gser gyi mi mo drug cur sprul// khro bo 'bum gyi pho nya yin// 'og gi gdon rnams phung bar byed// sa bdag pho ni bsgral te btang// sa bdag mo ni
dam la btags// 'khor gyi gdon bgegs dbang du bsdus// steng gi 'od zer smug po las// bse yi mi mo drug cur sprul// ma mo 'bum gyi pho nya yin// yang bran brgyad cu rtsa gnyis ni// za
byed mche ba can gyi tshogs// gsod byed mtshon cha can gyi tshogs// 'dzin byed sder mo can gyi tshogs// snyeg byed gshog pa can gyi tshogs// ngas gsung ba la gdon mi za// dpal he ru ka'i
gal po las// ging dang pho nya le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// khro bo dpal chen chos rnams la// khyung gi gshog pa ji ltar lags// ral pa kham nag ji
ltar lags// smin ma khro gnyer ji ltar lags// shangs nas rlung 'byin ci ltar lags// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs ji ltar lags// sku stod glang chen ko rlon ji ltar lags// zhing chen g.yang
gzhi gsol ba ji ltar lags// sbrul nag chun pos brgyan pa ji ltar lags// me dpung klong na bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// stag gi sham thabs mnabs pa ji ltar lags// mngon
rdzogs yab la bka' nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// khyung gshog khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yin// ral ba kham nag chos nyid spros bral yin// smin mtshams khro
gnyer 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// shangs nas rlung 'byin las dang nyon mongs 'bud// zhal bgrad mche gtsig skye shi rtsad gcod yin// glang chen ko rlon gti mug dbang sdud yin// zhing chen
g.yang gzhi 'khor ba gnas su dag/ sbrul nag chun pos gti mug klu rnams dbang sdud yin// me dpung 'bar bas las dang nyon mongs sreg/ stag gi sham thabs gdug pa zil gnon
yin// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las// khro bo'i chas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i 'khor tshogs rnams// phyag rgya'i
don kyang ma 'tshal na// dbu gsum phyag drug ji ltar lags// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ji ltar lags// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ji ltar lags/ bar ma kha T+wAM rtse gsum
bsnams pa ji ltar lags// tha ma rnge'u chung bsnams pa ji ltar lags// g.yon pa dril bu bsnams pa ji ltar lags// ban+d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa ji ltar lags// rgyu ma'i zhags
pa thogs pa ji ltar lags// kro ti shwa rI dpal 'bar rnams// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams pa ji ltar lags// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob pa ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab la
bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya'i don rnams ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dbu gsum sku gsum thob pa ste// rnam thar gsum dang

ldan pa'o// phyag drug mdzad pa sna tshogs ni// ye shes drug gi rol pa nyid// sna tshogs las la dbang bsgyur pa'o// de la phyag mtshan ngas bshad pa// rdo rje rtse dgu ye shes dgu dang ldan/ kha T+wAM rtse
gsum sku gsung thugs ldan yin// rnge'u chung dreg pa gzhan gyis thub pa med pa yin// dril bu dbyings te ma nor ma bcos rtags// ban+d+ha 'khor ba chos nyid dbyings su rtogs// rgyu zhags 'khor
ba dbyings su 'ching sdom yin// yum gyi kha T+wAM rtse gsum sku gsung thugs ldan yin// b+han dmar gtso la stob pa yab kyi thugs dam skong ba yin// zhal cig dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal// mthing
ka gzhan du mi 'gyur rtags// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ko'u ri b+han dmar gyis dbyung sngo ba ji ltar lags// tso'u ri ser mo mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ji ltar
lags// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba ji ltar lags// pe ta byis bra rdor 'phyar gnag pa ji ltar lags// puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren pa ji ltar lags// g+hasma dung khrag 'thung ba ji
ltar lags// sma sha dgra snying za ba ji ltar lags// tsan+DA mchog lus 'bral ba ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyin 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// gau rI ban+DA
chos nyid spros dang bral// khrag ni chos nyid 'khor bar rtogs// zhing dbyug nyon mongs rdul du rlog/ mda' gzhu chos nyid dbyings su 'bigs// rgyal mtshan nub pa'i dus med ye shes kyang yin// rdo
rje ye shes dgu dang ldan// byis rgyu bla med dbyings su 'dren// thod khrag 'khor ba chos nyid yin// byis snying chos nyid thugs chud rtags// mchog lus dbyings dang ye shes yin// ngas gsung ba
la gdon mi za// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sed+ha gsod byed bsnol ser ji ltar lags// bya g+h+ra bsnol dmar ji ltar lags// sri la byis ldag ji ltar lags// shwa na 'dral lta ji
ltar lags// gr-i D+ha rgyu 'dren ji ltar lags// kang ka zhing khur ji ltar lags// kha kha ban gri ji ji ltar lags// hu lu sgron khyer ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyid
'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnol ser dbyings dang ye shes yin// bsnol blta sku gsum bde ba thob// sri la chos nyid ro myang yin// shwa nas chos nyid bde

ba thob// gr-i D+ha mgrin dmar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dral// kang ka zhing khur 'khor ba chos nyid yin// kha kha rgyu 'dren yid bzhin 'khor ba 'khor lo sbyar kyang 'dren// hu lu sgron khyer ye shes spyan dag
ldan// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rta gdong lcags kyu ji ltar lags// phag gdong zhags pa ji ltar lags// seng gdong nyi zla ji ltar lags// thal byed dril bu ji ltar
lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// lcags kyus bla med gnas su 'dren// zhags pas las dang nyon mongs 'ching// nyi zla ye shes spyan
dang ldan// yang na mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel// dril bus shes pa'i rgyud rnams 'grol// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang phyug mkha' 'gro ma bdun dang// sring bzhi ging dang pho nya'i
tshogs// phyag rgya phul ba'i yon tan dang// ma phul ba yi skyon ci lags// nyag gcig yab la bka' nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag rgya phul ba'i yon
tan ni// rgyal ba'i spyan rnams mnyes par byed// phyag rgya ma phul ma shes na// don dang rtags su yongs mi ldan/ dbang phyug la sogs phyag rgya rnams// rgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs dang
mthun// dgongs pa yid kyi bzlas pa yin// 'dzab ni ngag gi bzlas pa yin// phyag rgya lus kyi bzlas pa yin// rab kyis nyin gsum mtshan gsum dbul// 'bring gis nyin gnyis mtshan
gnyis dbul// tha mas nyin re mtshan re dbul// tha mas tshes grangs dus bzang la// rgyun mi 'chad par dbul bar bya// de las 'das na nyams pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i gal po
las// phyag rgya'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sman dang bdud rtsi sgrub pa yi// don dang gtan tshigs ji lta bu// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan
'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bkra shis nyams dga' nags tshal rgyas pa'am// shin tu bden pa'i sa phyogs su// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad la// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan
lag stong// de yi mdo don dam pa ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir shes par gyis// de ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang khor
yug/ rus sbal mgo 'am 'khar gzhong du// dbus su byang chub sems kyis bskor// yi ge hUM gis 'ju 'dul bya// gar du dri chen rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge oM gyis bzhu 'dul bya// lho ru sha chen
rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge swA yis bzhu 'dul bya// nub tu rak+ta rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge oM gis bzhu 'dul bya// byang du dri chu rdzas kyis bskor// yi ge hA yis bzhu 'dul bya// pha yi rgyu bzhi ma yi
'brel ba bzhi// mthar thug bzhi zhes bya ba ni// ming gis med du mi rung ngo// rdzas lnga tshom bu lnga rdzogs nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhag gcig bya// nye ba'i bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni// bdud kyi
'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brdung dang btsags dang gzhal bar bya// khro bo drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// ru lu gar gyi bro yis sbyang// 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// lha mo'i gzugs rnams byung ba
na// rta mchog dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri// bla ma dag la dbang rnams nod// bkra shis tshigs bcad dag kyang brjod// ye shes lha la gtang rag btang// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las/ ra sa
ya na'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di/ lha gnod 'dul dang/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang/ gsang ba'i yum lnga
dang/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems ma'-i tshogs dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jog po dang/ drang srong dang/ lha rnams dang/ mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa bi dri ma
med par grags pa dang 'khor mang po dang bcas pa rnams la/ yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos mya ngan las 'das pa'i klong rum nas bzhengs te/ bka' stsal pa/ zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad
dang theg pa rim dgu la sogs pa'i don ni/ gsang rgyud chen po 'dir 'dus la/ gsang rgyud chen po 'di rab tu shes par gyis shig/ ces bka' stsal to// gtad do// dzam+bu'i gling nas gsungs
pa thams cad dang/ theg pa'i rnam grangs thams cad kyang/ rgyud chen po 'di la 'dus/ 'di la brtson 'grus nan tan skyed// rgyud chen 'di yi rang bzhin ni// yan lag drug rnams spros pa
dang// rang byung thugs rje brdal pa'i klong// dam tshig kun bzang sku gsung thugs// chu srin gre ba dgu brtsegs nang// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba sbas// sdud pa po rdo rje rnon po la gtad
do// 'jam dpal rnon po dang/ 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la 'di skad ces brjod do// stongs gsum ma spangs srid pa yongs kyi dpal// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa rnams
kyi thugs// dgongs pa tha dag rnams kyi brnag pa ste// byang chub sems kyi thig le che// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po chen po ni// tshig dang yi ges mtshon du med// ston pa'i dgongs pa rgya
mtsho chen po 'dra// chos nyid stong ste dmigs su med// kun gzhig gting dpag med pas rgya mtsho chen po'i dbyings// sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'od gsal bas// bde chen byang chub
sems ni 'gyur med nam mkha' 'dra// chos dang byang chub sems ni bde bas kun la khyab// ces 'khor la bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis legs so legs so la ho// zhes brjod
nas/ rtogs te dbang pos go bar gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga ldan zhing// snang srid thams cad yongs su gsal// 'khor ba'i rgyun
rnams kun bkag nas// chos rnams ma lus sangs rgyas par// ston pas bstan pa nyid du rdzogs// zhes gsol to// bsngo ba med pa'i mchod pa dang/ 'dod pa med pa'i yon tan nam mkha' lta
bur kun la khyab par sprul te/ ston pa la mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yang ma bkag chos kyi dbyings// lta ba khyung chen nam mkha' lding// spyod pa ma bkag rgya mtsho'i
'jing// dam tshig ma bkag bsrung du med// bsgrub pa ma bkag yongs su rdzogs// phrin las ma bkag kun la rol// zhes ston pa la gsol to// de nas ston pas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho
rnams la/ gsang ba chen po byin pa/ gsang ba'i gsang chen de kho na nyid// 'khor ba'i rgyu bstan 'byung ba lnga// 'khor ba'i rgyan bstan phyag rgya yin// 'khor ba'i gnas su bstan pas byang chub
sems// sa chu me rlung 'byung ba lnga// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// smon pa med pa'i yab lnga dang// chags pa med pa'i yum lnga dang// gsang ba'i gnas mchog byang chub sems// 'chi
ba med pa'i srog kyang yin// gol sa med pa'i lam yang yin// re dogs med pa'i gnas kyang yin// lhun gyis gyub pa'i lta ba yin// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig yin// che ba rang byung
bcom ldan 'das// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen ye nas rdzogs// tan tra he ru ka'i gal po las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas sdud pa po rdo rje rnon po la
sogs pa rnams kyis thams cad he ru ka'i ngang du rtogs pa phul po// stong gsum ye shes rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// dur khrod chen po byang chub lus// rtogs chen rnal 'byor byang chub
mdzod// bshad pas nyan pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas gzhan nas yong mi 'dren/ !/ nyid las kun rdzogs gzhal yas khang// dngos grub gzhan nas mi slong ste// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor rang
la shar// re dogs med par ye nas gnas// gzhan nas mi slong nyid la rdzogs// mnyam nyid ma skyes mya ngan 'das// zhes brjod do// shin tu ngoms shing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ ston pa la 'khor
rnams lhags nas nyan to// de nas mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa khyed rnams// ngas chos 'di bsdus la bshad
do// dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di ni rgya che zhing zab pa yin te/ khyed kyis zin par gyis shig/ rtogs shig chongs shig sgrubs shig dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di ni dper na me dang 'dra ste/
chung ngu nas che ba'i ri rab kyang sreg go/ theg pa chen po'i de ni nyi ma'i zer dang 'dra'o// 'dzam gling gzhi dang ri'i rgyal po rnams kyang/ 'khor yug dang/ gangs rgyud dang/ bog ri dang/ de'u la
sogs pa gsal ste/ blang dor dang/ dbye ba mi srid do// de bzhin du ston pa'i thugs rje yang// nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ thugs rje dbri bskol med do// de bzhin du sems can rnam par
shes pa de dang 'dra'o// dbri bskol med do// de nas mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos// lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams zhing gi rdul rnyed las/ lus zhing
gi rdul rnyed du sprul pas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bas ni/ tan+ta chen po 'di'i don rtogs pa bsod nams che'o/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba bas ni/ tan+t+ra chen po 'di yi
zhal mthong ba bsod nams che'o// gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing bskur ba bas ni/ tan+t+ra 'di'i sgrub pa la thang cig yud tsam zhugs pa
bsod nams che'o// bskal pa stong du 'gro ba'i don byas pa bas ni/ tan+t+ra chen po 'di thang gcig tsam bcangs sam klags pa bsod nams che'o// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gnas 'gyur ba// ma
lus pa yi lam yin no// sangs rgyas sems su mya ngan 'das// sems ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// yul ni ma bsgrub bde chen klong// yul chen gnyis med spros dang bral// kun bzang nam
mkha'i mtshan nyid dang// gnod 'dul lha yis sems la gtad// tan+t+ra he ru ka'i gal po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka tsit+ta tan+t+ra kalpa nA ma/ bod skad
du/ dpal he ru ka'i thugs kyi rgyud gal po zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de'i tshe brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'khor la 'di lta ste/ lnga
dang gsum dang brgyad gnyis dang// bzhi dang gcig dang bzhi bcu gcig/ mkha' dang 'degs dang 'bar dang gsal// rin chen mchog phran yon tan brgyan// shrI ni gnyis med ston pa'i don// he ni
dgyes pa'i gad mo ste// ru ni chags pa chen po'i don// ka ni ye shes phrin las bzhi// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin sku// lus kyi rnam shes gzugs sku rnam snang mdzad// gti mug rnam dag yang dag
bcom ldan 'das// kun gzhi'i rnam shes mi bskyod rdo rje sems// zhe sdang rab grub bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// nyon mongs rnam shes tshor ba rin chen 'byung// nga rgyal rang grub gcig pu bcom
ldan 'das// yid kyi rnam shes 'du shes snang mtha' yas// 'dod chags rang byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sgo lnga'i rnam shes 'du byed don yod grub// phrag dog rang byung
rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// kun gzhi'i rnam shes rang byung dpal chen nyid// dug lnga rang byung kun 'dus bcom ldan 'das// rnal 'byor zab mo'i ngang du sku gsum rdzogs// yang dag grub
pa chos sku gcig nyid ni// ye nas dag pa chos kyi sku// lhun gyis gnas pa'i longs spyod rdzogs// 'joms byed ces bya'i dam tshig ni// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor du// phung po lnga nyid
rdzogs sangs rgyas// nyon mongs pa ni gnas su dag/ skye 'jig med pa'i gnas la bzhugs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde// tsham rngams drag pos lha chen 'dar zhing brdzis// brtul
zhugs rol pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rnam shes mi 'chi rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs// nyon mongs mi spang sha rus khrag la rol// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'das dpal gyi sku// spos mo
dkar ser chom rkun rmongs byed ma// mthing dang ljang sogs chags pas khro bar byed// rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams dang// dpal gyi bka' nyan lhag mar dbang ba bdun// 'dus pa'i
'khor tshogs ye shes A ra li// gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos// rnam pa gsum gyi don bshad do// he ru ka thugs kyi gal po las/ glaing gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil
'khor gru bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di byin gyis brlabs
so// byin gyis brlabs ma thag du byang chub sems kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur gyur te// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i tshe nam
mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i byin kyi rlabs kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs
pa thams cad ngo mtshar che ste/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang la dam zhing bstod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sem dpa' don thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/
byang chub kyi snying por zhugs pa gang na bder gshegs te// byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bstan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi
bu khyod gang gi phyir yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dbang gi tshul 'di dag go/ rang bzhin lhun grub ye dkyil du// slon ma rab
gzhug dbang skur te// bya bral ye rdzogs man ngag bstan// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs bsgrub pa'i man ngag
bsten// gzugs brnyan bsnyen bsgrub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma'i slob gzhug dbang bskur te// rim gyis bslab sbyang man ngag bstan// rdo rje tshul du dbang dag sbyin// lha mo dag dang gar byed
cing// der ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid// pho brang dag byed rab dges che// rab dgyes bdag po de thob ldan// seng ge'i bden rab 'joms byed cing// gzhi dang gzhi yi mchog nyid
kyis// rdo rje pad+ma ldan byas te// dbyings kyi bde chen de las so// g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// dkyil 'khor zla gam zhes gsungs te// mchog nyid
yid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gzhal yas khang chen ye shes te// 'khor 'das mnyam pa gru bzhi zhes// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// rnam thar brgyad dang rta babs so// rin chen sgo
stegs thugs rje'i ngang// yang dag spong bzhi twa ra na// dran pa nyer gzhag sgo khyud dang// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i sgo khyams dang// phreng ba byang chub yan lag bdun// 'phags lam brgyad kyi ka
bas mdzes// lam gyi ye shes rnga yab dang// nyon mongs 'ching 'joms mu tig phreng// dril bu ba dan rlung bskyod pa// shes rab chos kyi sgra sgrogs dang// che ba'i yon tan 'dus pa'i
rtags// bdud bzhi 'jom pa'i rgyal mtshan dang// thong phreng sku gsum 'thob pa'i rtags// gzhal yas khang mchog dmar po der// yan dang nus mthu'i dbang yang sbyin// dbu rgyan cod pan
phreng ba dang// go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang// snying po lnga dang nus pa lnga// gsang ba'i dbang gsum byin byas la// dbang bskur man ngag snying por
sbyin// sa lam rim gyi rab tu bgrod// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga
rnams te// bsgrub dang srung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi sha chen dang// dag pa'i snod chu mi 'dor
ro// ran lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// dam tshig nyams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga nyid
las// gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// he ru ka'i gal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ dbang dang dam tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya
ba// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// grub pa dang ni rab tu bsgrub// sgrub pa'i 'bras bu blang bar bya// zhi ba'i dgon gnas lha yi gnas// ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtser// gangs dkar shel
gyis gtams pa'i 'dabs// seng chen khros pa'i gnas dang ni// tsan dan nags dang me tog tshal// yid 'ong dben par rab tu bshad// khro bo'i dgon gnas srin po'i gnas// ri bo chen po
btsan po'i ngos// khrag dmar gtams pa'i dkyil ngos la// stag dred 'thab pa'i gnas su bya// ma mo'i dgon gnas dur khrod dang// shin tu 'phen pa'i sa phyogs na// gsar rnying dbugs
bral ma bdun khyim// rdo rje rigs kyi dgon gnas ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang// ma mo'i khyim dang yid du 'ong// der ni sa yi cho ga dang// phyi nang las kyi rim pa brtsam// gnas su phyin
la mtshams su bcad// ma dag bshags pa'i bya ba dang// b+ha lan sku yi sbyor ba yis// bsgral zhing mnan pa'i las kyang brtsam// dben pa'i gnas su bla ma la// dam tshig dbang gi brtul
zhugs nod// thig le zla gam gcig pa ru// dmigs rten mngon par bzhags nas su// sems nyid gnas par bya ba'i phyir// thabs kyi ngo bo thams cad dam// de bzhin srog dang rtsa las
byung// rang gi lha yi cha byad du// sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya// char sprin mdog 'dra dpa' po'i gzugs// shin tu gtum po 'khor dang bcas// yang na gtso bo gcig pu bri//

slob dpon dang ni slob bu dang// gnas dang yo byad ldan gyur nas// sgrub pa'i las la gzhugs par bya// bslang dang brtag dang sbyang ba dang// bgegs bskrad sa bzung dpang po gzhag/ 'jig rten sa bdag lha
klu la// sa rin gzhal te sa bslang sbyang// rnam par rtog pa bgegs yin te// bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung// sems la rang bzhin med shes na// gzhan na bgegs zhes bya ba
med// shes rab kyis ni rnam bshad bya// cod pan bde gshegs lngar bsgom nas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gnod mi nus// btab pa tsam gyis bgegs 'phen byed// zhe sdang rdo rje'i
ting 'dzin gyi// gnas bsrung ba ni rab tu bya// g.yas kyi spyan zur bzlog pa las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// gu lang dbang chen nye dbang dang// u ma gshin rje tshangs par
bcas// thams cad ma lus sreg par byed// zla bas gso bar byed pa dang// ka ta ra li 'bar spro zhing// mtshon cha 'bar pa'i sa bon gyis// thams cad ma lus bsal bar bya// sangs rgyas
kun gyi ting nge 'dzin// stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas gsungs// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// thams cad tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs// pho brang lha dang dmigs pa'i yul// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor

ba dang// chags pa'i chen po yul du bya// dur khrod gnas kyi sa blangs la// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// steng du khru gang pa yi tshad// ba byung sna ldas skyang nul bya// rang byung lnga yi khyad par
las// sa bon ye shes lnga ru rdzogs// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig la// shar du bstan pa byas nas su// kha dog sdug gu'i tshon gyis bri// chos kun rtsa ba sems yin te// sems kyi rtsa ba
gsum du shar// de nyid gzhal yas gnyis dang lha// mi rtsol bde bar rab 'bad pas// snying rje chen pos 'gro don mdzad// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu las ni// 'byung ba lnga yi phra bkod
pas// yum lnga rnam dag mkha' dbyings te// ma bcos lhun grub yum gyi mkha'// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rnam par dag/ bzhi po rtsa ba yan lag dang// rigs dang sku mdog phyag mtshan
dang// yi ge snying po phyag rgyar ldan// go rim gdan dang rgyan lugs dang// bzhugs thabs tshul dang bcu bzhi yis// zhi ba'i las rnams bskyed par bya// mi bskyod mthing ga dkar dmar
zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// dbyings phyug g.yas b+han g.yon dril sngo// dkyil 'khor lnga dang ldan par bsgom// spyan drang mchod bstod la sogs
pa// ji ltar rim pa bzhin du bya// spros med bar mar rab tu khros// blo yi rim pas bsgom par bya// tshom bu lnga yi maN+Dal la// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor gyis bskor// dang por stong nyid rnam
bsam ste// lus can kun gyi dri ma bkru// gru gsum mthing nag nam mkha' la// 'degs byed rlung nag rgya gram gtams// raka ta'i rgya mtsho rba klong 'khyil// keng rus ri rab brtsegs pa'i
steng// dur khrod me ri smug nag 'bar// zla gam dbang chen maN+Da la// dur khrod yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan// phyi dang nang med rab tu gsal// ye shes gzhal yas nam mkha'i

rgya// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shung+ng+he dz+nyA na tsa kra maN+Dal b+h+rUM/ dpal stobs nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// rdo rje dbyings las dpal gyi skur bsgyur ba// dngas pa'i mtsho la rlabs chen 'khrugs pa bzhin// zhi ba'i sku las khro
ba'i phyag rgya bstan// gcig dgu nyi shu gnyis dang lnga bcu brgyad// 'bar ba'i rgyal po cir yang ston par mdzad// bsgrub dang gsang sngags spyod pa dang// grub pa dang ni gnas dag
dang// bzlas pa'i sgra yang phyag rgyar rtogs// ting 'dzin lta stangs cho 'phrul brtag/ dbus su rgyal rigs dum bu gcig/ phyogs bzhir bram ze rgyal rigs dang// rje'u rigs dmangs rigs
bzhi la bya// mtshams bzhir khrus kyi mkhan po dang// rje rigs btso blag mkhan rnam dal// mi yi khrag la snag tsha bya// mchog gi rkang gi smyug gu yis// lha dgu so so'i snying po bri// rab tu mtshan
gsol bzhugs su gsol// zla gam dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha'// b+han+d+ha bde gshegs sku yi sku// yig 'bru bde gshegs gsung gi gsung// ma ram bde gshegs thugs kyi thugs// he ru ka'i
gal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ lha rnams 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yab khrag 'thung chen po de nyid kyis sngags bsdus pa'i 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM ru lu ru lu

hU~M b+h+yaM hU~M/ badzra gau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pra mo he ha/ badzra bai tA lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+has ma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra tsan ng+ha lI ha/ badzra seng ha mu kha he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu kha he/ badzra shr-i

ga la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra gr-ing+ng+ha mu kha he/ badzra kAng+ka mu kha he/ badzra kA ka mu kha he/ badzra u lU ka mu kha he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza tang dza phaT/ badzra a mu khe hU~M phaT/ badzra lo ka baM phaT// badzra b+ha
smi pa la ya ba tu hoHphaT/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir// phyag rgya chen por mngon rdzogs shing// sku gsung thugs su

rang dbang bskur// ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// oM AHhU~M/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// wA ka badza?swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA lba A ko\u0f85 haM/ de

nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyAn

badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ye be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// oM ma hA kr-i h+ya a nuSh+Tha dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ shri he ru ka ma hA ka ru

Ni ka i daM sa ma ya dzaH/ ba ling+ta gr-ih+Na ho khA hi khA hi/ pi pa ho/ a la la ho// a mr-i ta khA hi/ mkha' 'gro'i ming dang gtor sngags sbyar// rdo rje thod chen sha chen dang// glang chen mi dang shugs chen
sha// khyi sha bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// me rlung skyor pa ldan pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul// dpal he ru ka 'gal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge 'phreng ba 'byung ba zhes bya
ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste// rnam shes gzugs tshor 'du shes dang// 'du byed la sogs 'dzin lnga 'joms// nam mkha' sa chu me rlung
'joms// mig dang rna ba sna lce rnams// de dbang yid 'dzin rnam bzhi 'joms// gzung 'dzin sgra dri ror 'dzin dang// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs 'byung// 'byung bar ma nges 'joms par
byed// nga rgyal phrag dog 'dod chags dang// ser sna gti mug zhe sdang 'joms// yid kyi rnam shes 'dus byas dang// gsang dbang gsang ba'i rnam shes dang// gsang yul gsum 'dus rtog pa
bcom// rtag chad bdag dang mtshan mar 'dzin// rnam dag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bshad// bcu ldan ye shes dpal dgu'o// gnyis ldan zag med yum gyi sku// rnam shes brgyad dag mkha' 'gro
brgyad// rnam par shes brgyad sing ha'i sku// rtag chad mu bzhi sgo ma bzhi// snod bcud lha dang gzhal yas khang// phung po lnga la sogs pa'i chos// de ni spang bar bya ba min// theg pa gsum ni
spang ba min// ka ta li bzhin yongs su bzung// dpal he ru ka'i gal po zhes bya ba las/ rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ stong dang
stong min he ru ka/ ngo bo gzugs med sgra sogs bral// myong dang snom dang byed pa po// kun nas yod pa yin te// ngang gis rnam par dag pa las// lha dang lha mor gang snang yang// yod
pa ma yin rang bzhin bral// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// 'dod pa log par g.yems par bya// rdzun gyi tshig kyang sma bar bya// de dag rtsa ba yin shes
na// tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'da'// dpal he ru ka'i gal po las/ de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir// dpal chen
khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yas// dung dmar rgyu zhags khyung khrag
yin// shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal cig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kro d+hI shwa rI dbyings kyi rgya// gau rI
b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo// tsau rI mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be tA byi za rdor 'phyar nag/ pu ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+has ma dung dmar khrag 'thung

ljang// sma sha mthing nag byi snying za// tsan ng+ha ser skya mchog lus 'bral// sing ha kha ro bsnol ser seng// byA g+h+ra gnan blta bsnol dmar stag/ sr-i la nag mo byis ldag wa// shwa na sha 'drad mthing
ga spyang// gr-iD+d+ha krid dmar rgyu 'dren rgod// kang ka zhing phrag snar mgo dmar// kA ka kha ro ban gri nag/ u lU mthing tshogs 'ug pa'i mgo/ rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyus 'dren// phag gdong
nag mo zhags pas 'chings// nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// thal phyed mthing nag dril 'khrol dgyes// zhes so// dpal he ru ka gal po'i rgyud las/ lha rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// snga ma las ni gnas 'gyur te// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// phung po rdos bcas bem po de// phyogs
bzhir bro bzhis sbyang bar bya// ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bskang zhing thugs dam bskul// 'bru lnga bkod la lam lnga dgag/ khrus bya zla gam nub tu bzhag/ de la lha rnams
dgod pa ni// rigs lnga yab yum bsam par bya// mdun rgyab gnyis su bsgom pa ni// A li kA li bsam par bya// rnam shes dbang po yul dus la// sems dpa' yab yum bsgom par
bya// spyi bo rgyab dang lce yi steng// rkang mthil yan chung thub pa drug/ lte ba mjug to mkhal khung gnyis// sgo ba yab yum bsgom par bya// rnam smin zag bcas phung po la// phyag rgya'i dkyil
'khor gsal bkod nas// 'od zer 'gro 'dus sbyangs byas nas// gnyis don mthar phyin phyag rgya sgrol// cho ga lnga dang yan lag lngas// gang mos bskyed cing rab bsnyom la// rang bzhin dkyil
'khor spyan drang bstim// phyag 'tshal mchog de gnas pa dang// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i 'phro 'du yis// yang nas yang du sbyang bar bya// yang na khrag 'thung chen po'i sku// bdag nyid rab tu
gsal bsgom ste// ro yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// khrag 'thung lha tshogs rdzas su te// glo snying dpal chen yab yum gyi// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung
yab yum rdzas// bum pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzhag sha dang// rgyu ma mchin pa mgo sha rnams// rtsa ba'i lha dgu'i rdzas su bzhag/ go ro tsa na gzhung pa dang// rkang dang

tshil du sha dang khrag/ srog rtsa mkhris pa brgyad rnam ni// mu kha phra men brgyad kyi rdzas// yan lag rnam thar bzhi rnams ni// ye shes sgo ma bzhi yi rdzas// sgal tshigs phrugs re bsdeb pa ni// dbang

mo nyi shu brgyad kyi rdzas// ne sag che phra bsdeb pa ni// rang byung khro bo bcu yi rdzas// sha khrag rus ba rkang dang tshil// mkha' la 'gro ba kun gyi rdzas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha de// dpal chen

bzhugs pa'i rten yang yin// de yi nang du blug pa yang// go ro tsa ni dri chen dang// snying dang srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ mAM sa mkhris pa dri chu dang// so dang dbang po rnam lnga dang// de rnams cha ni mnyam

pa dag/ b+han+dAr blug pa dngos grub rdzas// brla rkang gnyis dang rje ngar rkang// dung chen 'bud pa'i gling bu bya// dpung pa'i rkang mgo gnyis po la// rak+ta sbreng ba'i gzar bu bya// shar sgo dngos
grub gsol byang dang// rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang// bdud rtsi'i bum pa dngos grub rdzas// de bzhin dbang gi bum pa gzhag/ ting 'dzin ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// dmigs pa'i rten yang mngon
par bri// 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir// rigs kyi yum yang mngon par gzung// yul rnams kun gyi mtshan ma ni// dmar ser mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can// spyan 'phangs dma' la gzi
brjid ldan// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ut+pal zhabs// dpung mgo mthe bo ring ba ni// de bzhin rigs kyi gzungs mar shis// dkar gsal dung mdog sgeg mo'i gzugs// sha rus 'khyil ba rdo rje
dbyibs// mdangs can yid 'phrog ut+pal zhabs// dung can ma yi rigs mchog ste// rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzungs mar shis// ut+pal sngon po kha dog 'dra// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin
'phro// shes rab dang ni blo stobs che// mi zad blo gros sems la 'char// rin chen rigs kyi gzungs mar shis// dkar la dmar chags pad+ma'i mdog/ chags pa che shing yid gzhungs
pa// mchu ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra// mig rtsa dmar zhing mdangs 'phrog pa// pad+ma rigs kyi gzungs mar shis// dmar ljang 'khrug pa'i ngo bo la// khro btson las rab don la brtson// sha rgyas mchu zhing
gab par 'dug/ lag par rdo rje rgya gram 'chang// las kyi rigs kyi gzungs mar shis// gzhan yang gang dag kha cig tu// ri mo gcig pa de bzhin bya// dur khrod blangs pa'i rin
chen la// tshon rtsi sbyin med rab tu bzang// sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa dang// 'bri mkhan dag kyang dam tshig can// lha dgu dmigs pa'i rten yang bri// de bzhin sgrub pa po yang bri// rab tu gnas
par rab byas te// ri yi rtse'am chu 'gram mam// gling ngam rang dga'i gnas dag tu// de la bsnyen bkur byed pa la// myur du dngos grub ster la brtson// sgrub dang 'bri mkhan ma yin
par// lhag ma kun la bstan pa min// sgrub pa dag la 'bad pa'i tshe// skyes bu rtogs pa'i blo gros can// dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis// srog lus man chad rdzas rnams ni// ser sna med
pa'i sems kyis dbul// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon gyi mchog ni rab tu
dbul// gang na yongs su gtang dka' ba// de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// bla ma'i rdzas ni srog ji bzhin// gzhi 'dzin snum 'dra dam tshig rin po che// ma rig tha rgod ko khengs lta bu
btul// yang dag don rtogs sems dang chos su 'dres// lus dang srog la babs kyang dam tshig mchog mi gtong// rnal 'byor dbang phyug yon tan brgyad dang ldan// bla ma mchog nyid yin
par ngas bshad do// dag pa'i ye shes he ru ka/ gnyis med don la rab brtson pa// dbyangs drug blangs bas don drug grub// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pa// des ni dkyil 'khor lha rnams
bskyed// zab cing 'brug sgra ltar sgrogs pas// gtum po gdug pa'ang lhan nor 'gyur// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// rdo rje srin po ngur skad
kyi// gdug pa thams cad spa yang bkong// mkhun zhing gdung pa'i sgra 'byin pas// gdug pa thams cad rdul du rlog/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul gyis// thams cad ma lus dbang
sdud// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M// stong tsho gsum gyi grangs dag ni// rnal 'byor nyin zhag gang bzla ba// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gis// rig 'dzin thob par gdon mi za// rnal 'byor pa de 'chi
ba'i tshe// 'jig rten pa dag shi zhes brjod// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// legs shes rab tu brjod nas kyang// rig 'dzin sa la nges par 'khod// dpal he ru ka gal po zhes bya ba'i
rgyud las/ sna tshogs rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thig le gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje bdud rtsi sgrub pa
bshad// phun sum tshogs pa bzhir ldan nas// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhi khro spel ma'i dkyil 'khor bri// shar du zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma bsham// lho ru
rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du// mar me dgu dang gsol byang gzhag/ nub tu dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i tshe dang dngos grub rdzas// byang du drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// bsgral ba'i rdzas
mchog gzhag par bya// dbus kyi b+han+d+ha srubs med du// rtsa ba brgyad dang lo ma stong// min pa gsum dang yin pa lnga// skyong dang yan lag nyi shu bdun// kha cher skyes dang tsan dan dri// gnyis
'thung la sogs sha sna stong// 'bru dang rin chen bcud la sogs// gang yang sman chen min pa ni// rab tu bsgrims te bsgrub par bya// bar chod nyul le dus su bzlog/ dus ni yar gyi brgyad la

'jug/ spyan drang rtog pa zlog pa dang// sman nyid zhi khro'i lhar bsams te// sman 'dzab lha 'dzab spel te bgrang// oM ru lu ru lu hU~Mb+h+yohU~M// oM AHhU~Msarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha// oM ma hA su kha dz+nyAn

bo d+hi tsit+ta d+harma ng+ha tu AH/ oM AHhU~M badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha/ sman nyid lha ru rab sbyangs nas// grogs po dpa' la sems stobs che// khro bo'i tshul can ging chen ni// hU~M gi sgra dang ldan pa de// chas
brgyad khro bcu lus la 'god// mnga' gsol bton la btag btsag bya// ye shes 'od kyi snang ba dril// dpal chen skur bsgom dbang yang bskur// dkyil 'khor chen por rab bskor zhing// ru
lu'i bro dang brab dang bdug/ dbus su gzhugs la slob dpon gyis// gzhi rgyud ldan pa'i dgongs pa bya// tshogs chen mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// gtsang sbra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen

gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos brgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char yang mi phod na// mthar thug pa ni tshogs 'khor lo// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rdo rje nyi ma
nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang par bya// sman chen 'di yi bsod nams ni// lha gnyan dam skong phrin las 'grub// rig 'dzin bzhi dang sgrub pa brgyad// he ru ka yi gsungs bzhin
du// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// gal te 'di la gzugs yod na// 'jig rten srog chags thams cad kyis// brjod par nus pa ma yin no// rdo rje bdud rtsi sman chen de// gsum du
bgos la spyad par bya// mdor na mang po smos ci dgos// bde gshegs thams cad mchod pa bas// 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i khyad par ni// lhag pa bas kyang ches lhag go/ 'di ma
yin pas bsod nams ni// gzhan na nam yang yod ma yin// de bas bsgrab pa 'bad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rgyud las/ rdo rje bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas khrag 'thung
chen po des// de skad ces bka' stsal nas// lha dang/ srin po dang// ging dang/ lang ka dang/ ma bdun dang sring mo bzhi dang/ 'bar ma'i tshogs thams cad yi rangs te/ dgyes pa'i gad mo
bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i rgyud thugs kyi gal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma sam b+ha ba dang/
lo tsA ba dge slong nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// nub phyogs u rgyan gyi gnas nas slob dpon hU~M ka ras bton pa'o// rgyud 'di'i bka'i srung ma ni mkha'
'gro ma gtsug gi rgyan gcig ma dang srog gi nyul le ma bzhi la gtad de// bka'i dus tshigs dang nyi tshod las 'das na mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis chad pa chod cig/ bka' rgya gsum mo/ a+thi+-i/
